GE07mbh_09_u:001.000-0001_02: devīṃ sarasvatīṃ caiva tato jayam udīrayet
GE07mbh_09_u:001.001c: alpāvaśiṣṭāḥ kuravaḥ kim akurvata vai dvija
GE07mbh_09_u:001.002a: udīryamāṇaṃ ca balaṃ dṛṣṭvā rājā suyodhanaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:001.002c: pāṇḍavaiḥ prāptakālaṃ ca kiṃ prāpadyata kauravaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:001.003a: etad icchāmy ahaṃ śrotuṃ tad ācakṣva dvijottama
GE07mbh_09_u:001.003c: na hi tṛpyāmi pūrveṣāṃ śṛṇvānaś caritaṃ mahat
GE07mbh_09_u:001.004a: tataḥ karṇe hate rājan dhārtarāṣṭraḥ suyodhanaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:001.005a: hā karṇa hā karṇa iti śocamānaḥ punaḥ punaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:001.005c: kṛcchrāt svaśibiraṃ prāyād dhataśeṣair nṛpaiḥ saha
GE07mbh_09_u:001.007a: sa daivaṃ balavan matvā bhavitavyaṃ ca pārthivaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:001.007c: saṃgrāme niścayaṃ kṛtvā punar yuddhāya niryayau
GE07mbh_09_u:001.008c: raṇāya niryayau rājā hataśeṣair nṛpaiḥ saha
GE07mbh_09_u:001.010a: tataḥ śalyo mahārāja kṛtvā kadanam āhave
GE07mbh_09_u:001.011c: apasṛtya hradaṃ ghoraṃ viveśa ripujād bhayāt
GE07mbh_09_u:001.013a: tasmin hate maheṣvāse hataśiṣṭās trayo rathāḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:001.015a: praviśya ca puraṃ tūrṇaṃ bhujāv ucchritya duḥkhitaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:001.016a: ruroda ca naravyāghra hā rājann iti duḥkhitaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:001.016c: aho bata vivignāḥ sma nidhanena mahātmanaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:001.017a: aho subalavān kālo gatiś ca paramā tathā
GE07mbh_09_u:001.017b-0006_01: vidhis tu balavān atra pauruṣaṃ tu nirarthakam
GE07mbh_09_u:001.018a: dṛṣṭvaiva ca puro rājañ janaḥ sarvaḥ sa saṃjayam
GE07mbh_09_u:001.018c: praruroda bhṛśodvigno hā rājann iti sasvaram
GE07mbh_09_u:001.019a: ākumāraṃ naravyāghra tat puraṃ vai samantataḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:001.019c: ārtanādaṃ mahac cakre śrutvā vinihataṃ nṛpam
GE07mbh_09_u:001.020a: dhāvataś cāpy apaśyac ca tatra trīn puruṣarṣabhān
GE07mbh_09_u:001.021a: tathā sa vihvalaḥ sūtaḥ praviśya nṛpatikṣayam
GE07mbh_09_u:001.023a: tathānyaiś ca suhṛdbhiś ca jñātibhiś ca hitaiṣibhiḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:001.023c: tam eva cārthaṃ dhyāyantaṃ karṇasya nidhanaṃ prati
GE07mbh_09_u:001.025c: madrādhipo hataḥ śalyaḥ śakuniḥ saubalas tathā
GE07mbh_09_u:001.026a: saṃśaptakā hatāḥ sarve kāmbojāś ca śakaiḥ saha
GE07mbh_09_u:001.026c: mlecchāś ca pārvatīyāś ca yavanāś ca nipātitāḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:001.027a: prācyā hatā mahārāja dākṣiṇātyāś ca sarvaśaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:001.027c: udīcyā nihatāḥ sarve pratīcyāś ca narādhipa
GE07mbh_09_u:001.027e: rājāno rājaputrāś ca sarvato nihatā nṛpa
GE07mbh_09_u:001.028a: duryodhano hato rājan yathoktaṃ pāṇḍavena ca
GE07mbh_09_u:001.028d-0010_01: duryodhanasya bhīmena bhagnāv ūrū sutasya te
GE07mbh_09_u:001.028d-0010_02: sa bhūmau patitaḥ śete pāṃśubhiḥ pariguṇṭhitaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:001.030a: pāñcālāś ca naravyāghrāś cedayaś ca niṣūditāḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:001.030c: tava putrā hatāḥ sarve draupadeyāś ca bhārata
GE07mbh_09_u:001.031a: narā vinihatāḥ sarve gajāś ca vinipātitāḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:001.031c: rathinaś ca naravyāghra hayāś ca nihatā yudhi
GE07mbh_09_u:001.032a: kiṃciccheṣaṃ ca śibiraṃ tāvakānāṃ kṛtaṃ vibho
GE07mbh_09_u:001.033a: prāyaḥ strīśeṣam abhavaj jagat kālena mohitam
GE07mbh_09_u:001.033c: sapta pāṇḍavataḥ śeṣā dhārtarāṣṭrās tathā trayaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:001.034a: te caiva bhrātaraḥ pañca vāsudevo 'tha sātyakiḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:001.034c: kṛpaś ca kṛtavarmā ca drauṇiś ca jayatāṃ varaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:001.035e: ete śeṣā mahārāja sarve 'nye nidhanaṃ gatāḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:001.036a: kālena nihataṃ sarvaṃ jagad vai bharatarṣabha
GE07mbh_09_u:001.036c: duryodhanaṃ vai purataḥ kṛtvā vairasya bhārata
GE07mbh_09_u:001.037a: etac chrutvā vacaḥ krūraṃ dhṛtarāṣṭro janeśvaraḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:001.039a: gāndhārī ca nṛpaśreṣṭha sarvāś ca kuruyoṣitaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:001.039c: patitāḥ sahasā bhūmau śrutvā krūraṃ vacaś ca tāḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:001.040c: pralāpayuktā mahatī kathā nyastā paṭe yathā
GE07mbh_09_u:001.041a: kṛcchreṇa tu tato rājā dhṛtarāṣṭro mahīpatiḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:001.042a: labdhvā tu sa nṛpaḥ saṃjñāṃ vepamānaḥ suduḥkhitaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:001.042c: udīkṣya ca diśaḥ sarvāḥ kṣattāraṃ vākyam abravīt
GE07mbh_09_u:001.043a: vidvan kṣattar mahāprājña tvaṃ gatir bharatarṣabha
GE07mbh_09_u:001.043e: evam uktvā tato bhūyo visaṃjño nipapāta ha
GE07mbh_09_u:001.044a: taṃ tathā patitaṃ dṛṣṭvā bāndhavā ye 'sya ke cana
GE07mbh_09_u:001.044c: śītais tu siṣicus toyair vivyajur vyajanair api
GE07mbh_09_u:001.045a: sa tu dīrgheṇa kālena pratyāśvasto mahīpatiḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:001.045e: niḥśvasañ jihmaga iva kumbhakṣipto viśāṃ pate
GE07mbh_09_u:001.046a: saṃjayo 'py arudat tatra dṛṣṭvā rājānam āturam
GE07mbh_09_u:001.046c: tathā sarvāḥ striyaś caiva gāndhārī ca yaśasvinī
GE07mbh_09_u:001.047a: tato dīrgheṇa kālena viduraṃ vākyam abravīt
GE07mbh_09_u:001.048a: gacchantu yoṣitaḥ sarvā gāndhārī ca yaśasvinī
GE07mbh_09_u:001.048c: tatheme suhṛdaḥ sarve bhraśyate me mano bhṛśam
GE07mbh_09_u:001.049a: evam uktas tataḥ kṣattā tāḥ striyo bharatarṣabha
GE07mbh_09_u:001.049c: visarjayām āsa śanair vepamānaḥ punaḥ punaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:001.050a: niścakramus tataḥ sarvās tāḥ striyo bharatarṣabha
GE07mbh_09_u:001.050c: suhṛdaś ca tataḥ sarve dṛṣṭvā rājānam āturam
GE07mbh_09_u:001.051b-0011_01: gatir me ko bhaved adya iti cintāsamākulaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:001.052a: prāñjalir niḥśvasantaṃ ca taṃ narendraṃ muhur muhuḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:001.052b-0012_01: jñātīn striyo 'tha niryāpya praviśya viduraḥ punaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:001.052b-0012_02: rājānaṃ śocamānas tu taṃ śocantaṃ muhur muhuḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:002.002a: sadhūmam iva niḥśvasya karau dhunvan punaḥ punaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:002.002c: vicintya ca mahārāja tato vacanam abravīt
GE07mbh_09_u:002.003a: aho bata mahad duḥkhaṃ yad ahaṃ pāṇḍavān raṇe
GE07mbh_09_u:002.003c: kṣemiṇaś cāvyayāṃś caiva tvattaḥ sūta śṛṇomi vai
GE07mbh_09_u:002.004c: yac chrutvā nihatān putrān dīryate na sahasradhā
GE07mbh_09_u:002.005a: cintayitvā vacas teṣāṃ bālakrīḍāṃ ca saṃjaya
GE07mbh_09_u:002.005c: adya śrutvā hatān putrān bhṛśaṃ me dīryate manaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:002.006a: andhatvād yadi teṣāṃ tu na me rūpanidarśanam
GE07mbh_09_u:002.007a: bālabhāvam atikrāntān yauvanasthāṃś ca tān aham
GE07mbh_09_u:002.007c: madhyaprāptāṃs tathā śrutvā hṛṣṭa āsaṃ tathānagha
GE07mbh_09_u:002.008a: tān adya nihatāñ śrutvā hṛtaiśvaryān hṛtaujasaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:002.008c: na labhe vai kva cic chāntiṃ putrādhibhir abhiplutaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:002.009a: ehy ehi putra rājendra mamānāthasya sāṃpratam
GE07mbh_09_u:002.009c: tvayā hīno mahābāho kāṃ nu yāsyāmy ahaṃ gatim
GE07mbh_09_u:002.010a: gatir bhūtvā mahārāja jñātīnāṃ suhṛdāṃ tathā
GE07mbh_09_u:002.010c: andhaṃ vṛddhaṃ ca māṃ vīra vihāya kva nu gacchasi
GE07mbh_09_u:002.011a: sā kṛpā sā ca te prītiḥ sā ca rājan sumānitā
GE07mbh_09_u:002.012a: kathaṃ tvaṃ pṛthivīpālān bhuktvā tāta samāgatān
GE07mbh_09_u:002.012c: śeṣe vinihato bhūmau prākṛtaḥ kunṛpo yathā
GE07mbh_09_u:002.013a: ko nu mām utthitaṃ kālye tāta tāteti vakṣyati
GE07mbh_09_u:002.014c: anuśādhīti kauravya tat sādhu vada me vacaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:002.015a: nanu nāmāham aśrauṣaṃ vacanaṃ tava putraka
GE07mbh_09_u:002.015c: bhūyasī mama pṛthvīyaṃ yathā pārthasya no tathā
GE07mbh_09_u:002.017a: aśvatthāmā ca bhojaś ca māgadhaś ca mahābalaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:002.017c: bṛhadbalaś ca kāśīśaḥ śakuniś cāpi saubalaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:002.018a: mlecchāś ca bahusāhasrāḥ śakāś ca yavanaiḥ saha
GE07mbh_09_u:002.019c: śrutāyuś cācyutāyuś ca śatāyuś cāpi vīryavān
GE07mbh_09_u:002.021c: madartham udyatāḥ sarve prāṇāṃs tyaktvā raṇe prabho
GE07mbh_09_u:002.022a: yeṣāṃ madhye sthito yuddhe bhrātṛbhiḥ parivāritaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:002.022c: yodhayiṣyāmy ahaṃ pārthān pāñcālāṃś caiva sarvaśaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:002.023a: cedīṃś ca nṛpaśārdūla draupadeyāṃś ca saṃyuge
GE07mbh_09_u:002.023c: sātyakiṃ kuntibhojaṃ ca rākṣasaṃ ca ghaṭotkacam
GE07mbh_09_u:002.024e: kiṃ punaḥ sahitā vīrāḥ kṛtavairāś ca pāṇḍavaiḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:002.025c: yotsyanti saha rājendra haniṣyanti ca tān mṛdhe
GE07mbh_09_u:002.026a: karṇas tv eko mayā sārdhaṃ nihaniṣyati pāṇḍavān
GE07mbh_09_u:002.026c: tato nṛpatayo vīrāḥ sthāsyanti mama śāsane
GE07mbh_09_u:002.027a: yaś ca teṣāṃ praṇetā vai vāsudevo mahābalaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:002.027c: na sa saṃnahyate rājann iti mām abravīd vacaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:002.028a: tasyāhaṃ vadataḥ sūta bahuśo mama saṃnidhau
GE07mbh_09_u:002.028c: yuktito hy anupaśyāmi nihatān pāṇḍavān mṛdhe
GE07mbh_09_u:002.029a: teṣāṃ madhye sthitā yatra hanyante mama putrakāḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:002.030a: bhīṣmaś ca nihato yatra lokanāthaḥ pratāpavān
GE07mbh_09_u:002.031c: nihataḥ pāṇḍavaiḥ saṃkhye kim anyad bhāgadheyataḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:002.031d-0014_01: karṇaś ca nihataḥ saṃkhye divyāstrajño mahābalaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:002.032a: bhūriśravā hato yatra somadattaś ca saṃyuge
GE07mbh_09_u:002.032c: bāhlīkaś ca mahārāja kim anyad bhāgadheyataḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:002.032d-0015_02: jayadrathaś ca nihataḥ kim anyad bhāgadheyataḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:002.033a: sudakṣiṇo hato yatra jalasaṃdhaś ca kauravaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:002.033c: śrutāyuś cācyutāyuś ca kim anyad bhāgadheyataḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:002.033d-0016_02: nihataḥ pāṇḍavaiḥ saṃkhye kim anyad bhāgadheyataḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:002.034a: bṛhadbalo hato yatra māgadhaś ca mahābalaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:002.034b-0018_01: śatāyuś caiva vikrāntaḥ kim anyad bhāgadheyataḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:002.034c: āvantyo nihato yatra trigartaś ca janādhipaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:002.034e: saṃśaptakāś ca bahavaḥ kim anyad bhāgadheyataḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:002.034f-0019_02: trigartaś ca mahābāhuḥ saṃśaptāś ca mahābalāḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:002.035a: alaṃbusas tathā rājan rākṣasaś cāpy alāyudhaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:002.035c: ārśyaśṛṅgaś ca nihataḥ kim anyad bhāgadheyataḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:002.036c: mlecchāś ca bahusāhasrāḥ kim anyad bhāgadheyataḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:002.037a: śakuniḥ saubalo yatra kaitavyaś ca mahābalaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:002.037c: nihataḥ sabalo vīraḥ kim anyad bhāgadheyataḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:002.037d-0021_01: ete cānye ca bahavaḥ kṛtāstrā yuddhadurmadāḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:002.038c: nihatā bahavo yatra kim anyad bhāgadheyataḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:002.039c: nihatāḥ samare sarve kim anyad bhāgadheyataḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:002.040a: putrāś ca me vinihatāḥ pautrāś caiva mahābalāḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:002.040b-0025_01: duryodhano hato yatra putraś cāsya mahātmanaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:002.040c: vayasyā bhrātaraś caiva kim anyad bhāgadheyataḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:002.040d-0026_01: pārthena saṃyuge ghore kim anyad bhāgadheyataḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:002.041c: yaś ca bhāgyasamāyuktaḥ sa śubhaṃ prāpnuyān naraḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:002.042a: ahaṃ viyuktaḥ svair bhāgyaiḥ putraiś caiveha saṃjaya
GE07mbh_09_u:002.042c: katham adya bhaviṣyāmi vṛddhaḥ śatruvaśaṃ gataḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:002.043a: nānyad atra paraṃ manye vanavāsād ṛte prabho
GE07mbh_09_u:002.044a: na hi me 'nyad bhavec chreyo vanābhyupagamād ṛte
GE07mbh_09_u:002.045a: duryodhano hato yatra śalyaś ca nihato yudhi
GE07mbh_09_u:002.045c: duḥśāsano viśastaś ca vikarṇaś ca mahābalaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:002.046a: kathaṃ hi bhīmasenasya śroṣye 'haṃ śabdam uttamam
GE07mbh_09_u:002.046c: ekena samare yena hataṃ putraśataṃ mama
GE07mbh_09_u:002.049c: dīrgham uṣṇaṃ ca niḥśvasya cintayitvā parābhavam
GE07mbh_09_u:002.051a: bhīṣmadroṇau hatau śrutvā sūtaputraṃ ca pātitam
GE07mbh_09_u:002.051d-0027_01: tathā śalyaṃ maheṣvāsaṃ madrāṇām īśvaraṃ vibhum
GE07mbh_09_u:002.052a: yaṃ yaṃ senāpraṇetāraṃ yudhi kurvanti māmakāḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:002.052c: acireṇaiva kālena taṃ taṃ nighnanti pāṇḍavāḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:002.053a: raṇamūrdhni hato bhīṣmaḥ paśyatāṃ vaḥ kirīṭinā
GE07mbh_09_u:002.053c: evam eva hato droṇaḥ sarveṣām eva paśyatām
GE07mbh_09_u:002.054a: evam eva hataḥ karṇaḥ sūtaputraḥ pratāpavān
GE07mbh_09_u:002.054c: sa rājakānāṃ sarveṣāṃ paśyatāṃ vaḥ kirīṭinā
GE07mbh_09_u:002.055a: pūrvam evāham ukto vai vidureṇa mahātmanā
GE07mbh_09_u:002.056a: ke cin na samyak paśyanti mūḍhāḥ samyak tathāpare
GE07mbh_09_u:002.056c: tad idaṃ mama mūḍhasya tathābhūtaṃ vacaḥ sma ha
GE07mbh_09_u:002.057a: yad abravīn me dharmātmā viduro dīrghadarśivān
GE07mbh_09_u:002.058c: anayasya phalaṃ tasya brūhi gāvalgaṇe punaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:002.059a: ko vā mukham anīkānām āsīt karṇe nipātite
GE07mbh_09_u:002.059c: arjunaṃ vāsudevaṃ ca ko vā pratyudyayau rathī
GE07mbh_09_u:002.060c: vāmaṃ ca yoddhukāmasya ke vā vīrasya pṛṣṭhataḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:002.061a: kathaṃ ca vaḥ sametānāṃ madrarājo mahābalaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:002.061c: nihataḥ pāṇḍavaiḥ saṃkhye putro vā mama saṃjaya
GE07mbh_09_u:002.062c: yathā ca nihataḥ saṃkhye putro duryodhano mama
GE07mbh_09_u:002.063a: pāñcālāś ca yathā sarve nihatāḥ sapadānugāḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:002.063c: dhṛṣṭadyumnaḥ śikhaṇḍī ca draupadyāḥ pañca cātmajāḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:002.064a: pāṇḍavāś ca yathā muktās tathobhau sātvatau yudhi
GE07mbh_09_u:002.064c: kṛpaś ca kṛtavarmā ca bhāradvājasya cātmajaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:002.065a: yad yathā yādṛśaṃ caiva yuddhaṃ vṛttaṃ ca sāṃpratam
GE07mbh_09_u:002.065c: akhilaṃ śrotum icchāmi kuśalo hy asi saṃjaya
GE07mbh_09_u:003.001a: śṛṇu rājann avahito yathā vṛtto mahān kṣayaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:003.002d-001_0002: yat tat karṇe hate pārthaḥ siṃhanādam athākarot
GE07mbh_09_u:003.002d-001_0003: tadā tava sutān rājan prāviśat sumahad bhayam
GE07mbh_09_u:003.002d-001_0004: na saṃdhātum anīkāni na caivātha parākrame
GE07mbh_09_u:003.002d-001_0005: āsīd buddhir hate karṇe tava yodhasya kasya cit
GE07mbh_09_u:003.002d-001_0006: vaṇijo nāvi bhinnāyām agādhe viplavā iva
GE07mbh_09_u:003.002d-001_0007: apāre pāram icchanto hate dvīpe kirīṭinā
GE07mbh_09_u:003.002d-001_0009: anāthā nātham icchanto mṛgāḥ siṃhārditā iva
GE07mbh_09_u:003.002d-001_0013: sūtaputre hate rājan putrās te prādravan bhayāt
GE07mbh_09_u:003.002d-001_0016: mām eva nūnaṃ bībhatsur mām eva ca vṛkodaraḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:003.002d-001_0017: abhiyātīti manvānāḥ petur mamluś ca bhārata
GE07mbh_09_u:003.002d-001_0018: hayān anye gajān anye rathān anye mahārathāḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:003.002d-001_0020: kuñjaraiḥ syandanā bhagnāḥ sādinaś ca mahārathaiḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:003.002d-001_0025: sarvaṃ pārthamayaṃ lokam apaśyan vai bhayārditāḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:003.002d-001_0029: jaghane yudhyamānaṃ māṃ tūrṇam aśvān pracodaya
GE07mbh_09_u:003.002d-001_0030: samare yudhyamānaṃ hi kaunteyo māṃ dhanaṃjayaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:003.002d-001_0033: nihatya śiṣṭāñ śatrūṃś ca karṇasyānṛṇyam āpnuyām
GE07mbh_09_u:003.002d-001_0038: tān bhīmasenaḥ saṃkruddho dhṛṣṭadyumnaś ca pārṣataḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:003.002d-001_0042: akrudhyata raṇe bhīmas tair mṛdhe pratyavasthitaiḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:003.002d-001_0044: na tān rathastho bhūmiṣṭhān dharmāpekṣī vṛkodaraḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:003.002d-001_0049: bhīmam abhyadravan saṃkhye pataṃgā jvalanaṃ yathā
GE07mbh_09_u:003.002d-001_0052: śyenavad vyacarad bhīmaḥ khaḍgena gadayā tathā
GE07mbh_09_u:003.002d-001_0057: mādrīputrau ca śakuniṃ sātyakiś ca mahābalaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:003.002d-001_0059: tasyāśvavārān subahūṃs te nihatya śitaiḥ śaraiḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:003.002d-001_0060: tam anvadhāvaṃs tvaritās tatra yuddham avartata
GE07mbh_09_u:003.002d-001_0062: viśrutaṃ triṣu lokeṣu gāṇḍīvaṃ vyākṣipan dhanuḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:003.002d-001_0064: arjunaṃ cāpi yoddhāraṃ tvadīyāḥ prādravan bhayāt
GE07mbh_09_u:003.002d-001_0072: dhṛṣṭadyumnaṃ raṇe dṛṣṭvā tvadīyāḥ prādravan bhayāt
GE07mbh_09_u:003.002d-001_0075: cekitānaḥ śikhaṇḍī ca draupadeyāś ca māriṣa
GE07mbh_09_u:003.002d-001_0076: hatvā tvadīyaṃ sumahat sainyaṃ śaṅkhān athādhaman
GE07mbh_09_u:003.002d-001_0077: te sarve tāvakān prekṣya dravato vai parāṅmukhān
GE07mbh_09_u:003.002d-001_0078: abhyadhāvanta nighnanto vṛṣāñ jitvā vṛṣā iva
GE07mbh_09_u:003.002d-001_0079: senāvaśeṣaṃ taṃ dṛṣṭvā tava putrasya pāṇḍavaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:003.002d-001_0081: tata enaṃ śarai rājan sahasā samavākirat
GE07mbh_09_u:003.002d-001_0082: rajasā codgatenātha na sma kiṃ cana dṛśyate
GE07mbh_09_u:003.002d-001_0084: diśaḥ sarvā mahārāja tāvakāḥ prādravan bhayāt
GE07mbh_09_u:003.002d-001_0088: yuddhāya bharataśreṣṭha devān iva purā baliḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:003.002d-001_0091: duryodhano 'py asaṃbhrāntas tān arīn vyadhamac charaiḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:003.002d-001_0093: yad enaṃ pāṇḍavāḥ sarve na śekur ativartitum
GE07mbh_09_u:003.002d-001_0097: harṣayann iva tān yodhān idaṃ vacanam abravīt
GE07mbh_09_u:003.002d-001_0098: na taṃ deśaṃ prapaśyāmi pṛthivyāṃ parvateṣu ca
GE07mbh_09_u:003.002d-001_0099: yatra yātān na vo hanyuḥ pāṇḍavāḥ kiṃ sṛtena vaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:003.002d-001_0100: svalpaṃ caiva balaṃ teṣāṃ kṛṣṇau ca bhṛśavikṣatau
GE07mbh_09_u:003.002d-001_0101: yadi sarve 'tra tiṣṭhāmo dhruvo no vijayo bhavet
GE07mbh_09_u:003.002d-001_0102: viprayātāṃs tu vo bhinnān pāṇḍavāḥ kṛtakilbiṣān
GE07mbh_09_u:003.002d-001_0103: anusṛtya haniṣyanti śreyo naḥ samare vadhaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:003.002d-001_0105: mṛto duḥkhaṃ na jānīte pretya cānantyam aśnute
GE07mbh_09_u:003.002d-001_0106: śṛṇvantu kṣatriyāḥ sarve yāvanto vai samāgatāḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:003.002d-001_0107: dviṣato bhīmasenasya kruddhasya vaśam eṣy atha
GE07mbh_09_u:003.002d-001_0108: pitāmahair ācaritaṃ na dharmaṃ hātum arhatha
GE07mbh_09_u:003.002d-001_0109: na hi karmāsti pāpīyaḥ kṣatriyasya palāyanāt
GE07mbh_09_u:003.002d-001_0110: na yuddhadharmāc chreyān hi panthāḥ svargasya kauravāḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:003.002d-001_0112: tasya tad vacanaṃ rājñaḥ pūjayitvā mahārathāḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:003.002d-001_0115: tataḥ pravavṛte yuddhaṃ punar eva sudāruṇam
GE07mbh_09_u:003.003b-0028_01: pātiteṣu turaṃgeṣu gajeṣu ca ratheṣu ca
GE07mbh_09_u:003.005c: patitān rathanīḍāṃś ca rathāṃś cāpi mahātmanām
GE07mbh_09_u:003.006a: raṇe vinihatān nāgān dṛṣṭvā pattīṃś ca māriṣa
GE07mbh_09_u:003.009a: duryodhana nibodhedaṃ yat tvā vakṣyāmi kaurava
GE07mbh_09_u:003.009c: śrutvā kuru mahārāja yadi te rocate 'nagha
GE07mbh_09_u:003.010a: na yuddhadharmāc chreyān vai panthā rājendra vidyate
GE07mbh_09_u:003.011a: putro bhrātā pitā caiva svasreyo mātulas tathā
GE07mbh_09_u:003.012a: vadhe caiva paro dharmas tathādharmaḥ palāyane
GE07mbh_09_u:003.012c: te sma ghorāṃ samāpannā jīvikāṃ jīvitārthinaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:003.013a: tatra tvāṃ prativakṣyāmi kiṃ cid eva hitaṃ vacaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:003.013c: hate bhīṣme ca droṇe ca karṇe caiva mahārathe
GE07mbh_09_u:003.014a: jayadrathe ca nihate tava bhrātṛṣu cānagha
GE07mbh_09_u:003.014c: lakṣmaṇe tava putre ca kiṃ śeṣaṃ paryupāsmahe
GE07mbh_09_u:003.015a: yeṣu bhāraṃ samāsajya rājye matim akurmahi
GE07mbh_09_u:003.015c: te saṃtyajya tanūr yātāḥ śūrā brahmavidāṃ gatim
GE07mbh_09_u:003.016a: vayaṃ tv iha vinābhūtā guṇavadbhir mahārathaiḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:003.017a: sarvair api ca jīvadbhir bībhatsur aparājitaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:003.019c: gāṇḍīvasya ca nirghoṣāt saṃhṛṣyanti manāṃsi naḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:003.021c: dṛśyate dikṣu sarvāsu vidyud abhraghaneṣv iva
GE07mbh_09_u:003.021d-0029_02: pibanta iva cākāśaṃ rathe yuktās tu vājinaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:003.022c: tāvakaṃ tad balaṃ rājann arjuno 'stravidāṃ varaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:003.024a: vikṣobhayantaṃ senāṃ te trāsayantaṃ ca pārthivān
GE07mbh_09_u:003.025a: trāsayantaṃ tathā yodhān dhanur ghoṣeṇa pāṇḍavam
GE07mbh_09_u:003.025c: bhūya enam apaśyāma siṃhaṃ mṛgagaṇā iva
GE07mbh_09_u:003.029a: tāṃ nāvam iva paryastāṃ bhrāntavātāṃ mahārṇave
GE07mbh_09_u:003.030a: kva nu te sūtaputro 'bhūt kva nu droṇaḥ sahānugaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:003.030c: ahaṃ kva ca kva cātmā te hārdikyaś ca tathā kva nu
GE07mbh_09_u:003.030e: duḥśāsanaś ca bhrātā te bhrātṛbhiḥ sahitaḥ kva nu
GE07mbh_09_u:003.031c: saṃbandhinas te bhrātṝṃś ca sahāyān mātulāṃs tathā
GE07mbh_09_u:003.032a: sarvān vikramya miṣato lokāṃś cākramya mūrdhani
GE07mbh_09_u:003.032c: jayadratho hato rājan kiṃ nu śeṣam upāsmahe
GE07mbh_09_u:003.033a: ko veha sa pumān asti yo vijeṣyati pāṇḍavam
GE07mbh_09_u:003.033b-0031_01: asti kaḥ puruṣaś cādya yo jeṣyati dhanaṃjayam
GE07mbh_09_u:003.033e: gāṇḍīvasya ca nirghoṣo vīryāṇi harate hi naḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:003.034d-0032_02: yathā nadī śuṣkajalā senā karṇaṃ vinā tathā
GE07mbh_09_u:003.036a: sātyakeś caiva yo vego bhīmasenasya cobhayoḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:003.036c: dārayeta girīn sarvāñ śoṣayeta ca sāgarān
GE07mbh_09_u:003.037a: uvāca vākyaṃ yad bhīmaḥ sabhāmadhye viśāṃ pate
GE07mbh_09_u:003.037c: kṛtaṃ tat sakalaṃ tena bhūyaś caiva kariṣyati
GE07mbh_09_u:003.039a: yuṣmābhis tāni cīrṇāni yāny asādhūni sādhuṣu
GE07mbh_09_u:003.039c: akāraṇakṛtāny eva teṣāṃ vaḥ phalam āgatam
GE07mbh_09_u:003.040a: ātmano 'rthe tvayā loko yatnataḥ sarva āhṛtaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:003.040c: sa te saṃśayitas tāta ātmā ca bharatarṣabha
GE07mbh_09_u:003.041c: bhinne hi bhājane tāta diśo gacchati tadgatam
GE07mbh_09_u:003.042a: hīyamānena vai saṃdhiḥ paryeṣṭavyaḥ samena ca
GE07mbh_09_u:003.043c: atra te pāṇḍavaiḥ sārdhaṃ saṃdhiṃ manye kṣamaṃ prabho
GE07mbh_09_u:003.044a: na jānīte hi yaḥ śreyaḥ śreyasaś cāvamanyate
GE07mbh_09_u:003.044c: sa kṣipraṃ bhraśyate rājyān na ca śreyo 'nuvindati
GE07mbh_09_u:003.045a: praṇipatya hi rājānaṃ rājyaṃ yadi labhemahi
GE07mbh_09_u:003.045c: śreyaḥ syān na tu mauḍhyena rājan gantuṃ parābhavam
GE07mbh_09_u:003.046d-0033_03: kurvanti bhrātaraś cāsya vacanaṃ nātra saṃśayaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:003.047a: yad brūyād dhi hṛṣīkeśo rājānam aparājitam
GE07mbh_09_u:003.047c: arjunaṃ bhīmasenaṃ ca sarvaṃ kuryur asaṃśayam
GE07mbh_09_u:003.049a: etat kṣamam ahaṃ manye tava pārthair avigraham
GE07mbh_09_u:003.049c: na tvā bravīmi kārpaṇyān na prāṇaparirakṣaṇāt
GE07mbh_09_u:003.049e: pathyaṃ rājan bravīmi tvāṃ tat parāsuḥ smariṣyasi
GE07mbh_09_u:003.050a: iti vṛddho vilapyaitat kṛpaḥ śāradvato vacaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:003.050c: dīrgham uṣṇaṃ ca niḥśvasya śuśoca ca mumoha ca
GE07mbh_09_u:004.001a: evam uktas tato rājā gautamena yaśasvinā
GE07mbh_09_u:004.001c: niḥśvasya dīrgham uṣṇaṃ ca tūṣṇīm āsīd viśāṃ pate
GE07mbh_09_u:004.002a: tato muhūrtaṃ sa dhyātvā dhārtarāṣṭro mahāmanāḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:004.002c: kṛpaṃ śāradvataṃ vākyam ity uvāca paraṃtapaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:004.003a: yat kiṃ cit suhṛdā vācyaṃ tat sarvaṃ śrāvito hy aham
GE07mbh_09_u:004.003c: kṛtaṃ ca bhavatā sarvaṃ prāṇān saṃtyajya yudhyatā
GE07mbh_09_u:004.005a: suhṛdā yad idaṃ vācyaṃ bhavatā śrāvito hy aham
GE07mbh_09_u:004.005c: na māṃ prīṇāti tat sarvaṃ mumūrṣor iva bheṣajam
GE07mbh_09_u:004.006c: ucyamānaṃ mahābāho na me viprāgrya rocate
GE07mbh_09_u:004.007e: sa kathaṃ mama vākyāni śraddadhyād bhūya eva tu
GE07mbh_09_u:004.008a: tathā dautyena saṃprāptaḥ kṛṣṇaḥ pārthahite rataḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:004.008c: pralabdhaś ca hṛṣīkeśas tac ca karma virodhitam
GE07mbh_09_u:004.008e: sa ca me vacanaṃ brahman katham evābhimaṃsyate
GE07mbh_09_u:004.009a: vilalāpa hi yat kṛṣṇā sabhāmadhye sameyuṣī
GE07mbh_09_u:004.009c: na tan marṣayate kṛṣṇo na rājyaharaṇaṃ tathā
GE07mbh_09_u:004.010a: ekaprāṇāv ubhau kṛṣṇāv anyonyaṃ prati saṃhatau
GE07mbh_09_u:004.010c: purā yac chrutam evāsīd adya paśyāmi tat prabho
GE07mbh_09_u:004.011a: svasrīyaṃ ca hataṃ śrutvā duḥkhaṃ svapiti keśavaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:004.011c: kṛtāgaso vayaṃ tasya sa madarthaṃ kathaṃ kṣamet
GE07mbh_09_u:004.012c: sa kathaṃ maddhite yatnaṃ prakariṣyati yācitaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:004.013c: pratijñātaṃ ca tenograṃ sa bhajyeta na saṃnamet
GE07mbh_09_u:004.013d-0034_01: sa haniṣyati māṃ rudrahastenāpi hi rakṣitam
GE07mbh_09_u:004.014c: kṛtavairāv ubhau vīrau yamāv api yamopamau
GE07mbh_09_u:004.015a: dhṛṣṭadyumnaḥ śikhaṇḍī ca kṛtavairau mayā saha
GE07mbh_09_u:004.015c: tau kathaṃ maddhite yatnaṃ prakuryātāṃ dvijottama
GE07mbh_09_u:004.017a: tathā vivasanāṃ dīnāṃ smaranty adyāpi pāṇḍavāḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:004.017b-0035_01: kṛṣṇaḥ pratyaham evedaṃ vakti nāśe mamoditaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:004.017b-0035_02: teṣu jīvatsu pārtheṣu tasmiñ jīvati keśave
GE07mbh_09_u:004.017c: na nivārayituṃ śakyāḥ saṃgrāmāt te paraṃtapāḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:004.018a: yadā ca draupadī kṛṣṇā madvināśāya duḥkhitā
GE07mbh_09_u:004.018c: ugraṃ tepe tapaḥ kṛṣṇā bhartṝṇām arthasiddhaye
GE07mbh_09_u:004.018e: sthaṇḍile nityadā śete yāvad vairasya yātanā
GE07mbh_09_u:004.019c: kṛṣṇāyāḥ preṣyavad bhūtvā śuśrūṣāṃ kurute sadā
GE07mbh_09_u:004.020a: iti sarvaṃ samunnaddhaṃ na nirvāti kathaṃ cana
GE07mbh_09_u:004.020c: abhimanyor vināśena sa saṃdheyaḥ kathaṃ mayā
GE07mbh_09_u:004.021a: kathaṃ ca nāma bhuktvemāṃ pṛthivīṃ sāgarāmbarām
GE07mbh_09_u:004.022a: upary upari rājñāṃ vai jvalito bhāskaro yathā
GE07mbh_09_u:004.023a: kathaṃ bhuktvā svayaṃ bhogān dattvā dāyāṃś ca puṣkalān
GE07mbh_09_u:004.024a: nābhyasūyāmi te vākyam uktaṃ snigdhaṃ hitaṃ tvayā
GE07mbh_09_u:004.024c: na tu saṃdhim ahaṃ manye prāptakālaṃ kathaṃ cana
GE07mbh_09_u:004.025c: nāyaṃ klībayituṃ kālaḥ saṃyoddhuṃ kāla eva naḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:004.026a: iṣṭaṃ me bahubhir yajñair dattā vipreṣu dakṣiṇāḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:004.026c: prāptāḥ kramaśrutā vedāḥ śatrūṇāṃ mūrdhni ca sthitam
GE07mbh_09_u:004.027a: bhṛtyā me subhṛtās tāta dīnaś cābhyuddhṛto janaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:004.028a: bhuktāś ca vividhā bhogās trivargaḥ sevito mayā
GE07mbh_09_u:004.029a: na dhruvaṃ sukham astīha kuto rājyaṃ kuto yaśaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:004.029c: iha kīrtir vidhātavyā sā ca yuddhena nānyathā
GE07mbh_09_u:004.030a: gṛhe yat kṣatriyasyāpi nidhanaṃ tad vigarhitam
GE07mbh_09_u:004.030c: adharmaḥ sumahān eṣa yac chayyāmaraṇaṃ gṛhe
GE07mbh_09_u:004.031a: araṇye yo vimuñceta saṃgrāme vā tanuṃ naraḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:004.031c: kratūn āhṛtya mahato mahimānaṃ sa gacchati
GE07mbh_09_u:004.032c: mriyate rudatāṃ madhye jñātīnāṃ na sa pūruṣaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:004.033a: tyaktvā tu vividhān bhogān prāptānāṃ paramāṃ gatim
GE07mbh_09_u:004.035c: mudā nūnaṃ prapaśyanti śubhrā hy apsarasāṃ gaṇāḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:004.035d-0037_01: mṛdhe tanutyajo yodhān prekṣanty apsarasāṃ gaṇāḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:004.037c: api taiḥ saṃgataṃ mārgaṃ vayam apy āruhemahi
GE07mbh_09_u:004.041a: tais tv ayaṃ racitaḥ panthā durgamo hi punar bhavet
GE07mbh_09_u:004.041c: saṃpatadbhir mahāvegair ito yādbhiś ca sadgatim
GE07mbh_09_u:004.042a: ye madarthe hatāḥ śūrās teṣāṃ kṛtam anusmaran
GE07mbh_09_u:004.042c: ṛṇaṃ tat pratimuñcāno na rājye mana ādadhe
GE07mbh_09_u:004.043a: pātayitvā vayasyāṃś ca bhrātṝn atha pitāmahān
GE07mbh_09_u:004.043c: jīvitaṃ yadi rakṣeyaṃ loko māṃ garhayed dhruvam
GE07mbh_09_u:004.044a: kīdṛśaṃ ca bhaved rājyaṃ mama hīnasya bandhubhiḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:004.044c: sakhibhiś ca suhṛdbhiś ca praṇipatya ca pāṇḍavam
GE07mbh_09_u:004.045c: suyuddhena tataḥ svargaṃ prāpsyāmi na tad anyathā
GE07mbh_09_u:004.046a: evaṃ duryodhanenoktaṃ sarve saṃpūjya tad vacaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:004.046b-0040_01: tac chrutvā tava putrasya sattvayuktasya bhāṣitam
GE07mbh_09_u:004.046c: sādhu sādhv iti rājānaṃ kṣatriyāḥ saṃbabhāṣire
GE07mbh_09_u:004.049a: ākāśe vidrume puṇye prasthe himavataḥ śubhe
GE07mbh_09_u:004.049c: aruṇāṃ sarasvatīṃ prāpya papuḥ sasnuś ca tajjalam
GE07mbh_09_u:004.050a: tava putrāḥ kṛtotsāhāḥ paryavartanta te tataḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:005.001c: sarva eva mahārāja yodhās tatra samāgatāḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:005.002a: śalyaś ca citrasenaś ca śakuniś ca mahārathaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:005.002c: aśvatthāmā kṛpaś caiva kṛtavarmā ca sātvataḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:005.003c: jayatsenaś ca rājānas te rātrim uṣitās tataḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:005.004a: raṇe karṇe hate vīre trāsitā jitakāśibhiḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:005.004c: nālabhañ śarma te putrā himavantam ṛte girim
GE07mbh_09_u:005.005c: kṛtayatnā raṇe rājan saṃpūjya vidhivat tadā
GE07mbh_09_u:005.006a: kṛtvā senāpraṇetāraṃ parāṃs tvaṃ yoddhum arhasi
GE07mbh_09_u:005.010c: ādityasya tviṣā tulyaṃ buddhyā cośanasā samam
GE07mbh_09_u:005.012c: smṛtvā smṛtvaiva ca guṇān dhātrā yatnād vinirmitam
GE07mbh_09_u:005.013d-0041_02: prayogaviniyogau ca smṛtiṃ yasya guṇān viduḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:005.014a: daśāṅgaṃ yaś catuṣpādam iṣvastraṃ veda tattvataḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:005.014c: sāṅgāṃś ca caturo vedān samyag ākhyānapañcamān
GE07mbh_09_u:005.015a: ārādhya tryambakaṃ yatnād vratair ugrair mahātapāḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:005.017a: yaṃ puraskṛtya sahitā yudhi jeṣyāma pāṇḍavān
GE07mbh_09_u:005.017e: bhavāṃs tasmān niyogāt te ko 'stu senāpatir mama
GE07mbh_09_u:005.018a: ayaṃ kulena vīryeṇa tejasā yaśasā śriyā
GE07mbh_09_u:005.018c: sarvair guṇaiḥ samuditaḥ śalyo no 'stu camūpatiḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:005.020c: śakyaḥ prāptuṃ jayo 'smābhir devaiḥ skandam ivājitam
GE07mbh_09_u:005.021c: parivārya sthitāḥ śalyaṃ jayaśabdāṃś ca cakrire
GE07mbh_09_u:005.021e: yuddhāya ca matiṃ cakrūr āveśaṃ ca paraṃ yayuḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:005.022a: tato duryodhanaḥ śalyaṃ bhūmau sthitvā rathe sthitam
GE07mbh_09_u:005.023a: ayaṃ sa kālaḥ saṃprāpto mitrāṇāṃ mitravatsala
GE07mbh_09_u:005.023c: yatra mitram amitraṃ vā parīkṣante budhā janāḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:005.024a: sa bhavān astu naḥ śūraḥ praṇetā vāhinīmukhe
GE07mbh_09_u:005.024c: raṇaṃ ca yāte bhavati pāṇḍavā mandacetasaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:005.025a: yat tu māṃ manyase rājan kururāja karomi tat
GE07mbh_09_u:005.025c: tvatpriyārthaṃ hi me sarvaṃ prāṇā rājyaṃ dhanāni ca
GE07mbh_09_u:005.026c: so 'smān pāhi yudhāṃ śreṣṭha skando devān ivāhave
GE07mbh_09_u:005.027c: jahi śatrūn raṇe vīra mahendro dānavān iva
GE07mbh_09_u:006.001a: etac chrutvā vaco rājño madrarājaḥ pratāpavān
GE07mbh_09_u:006.001c: duryodhanaṃ tadā rājan vākyam etad uvāca ha
GE07mbh_09_u:006.002c: yāv etau manyase kṛṣṇau rathasthau rathināṃ varau
GE07mbh_09_u:006.002e: na me tulyāv ubhāv etau bāhuvīrye kathaṃ cana
GE07mbh_09_u:006.003c: yodhayeyaṃ raṇamukhe saṃkruddhaḥ kim u pāṇḍavān
GE07mbh_09_u:006.003e: vijeṣye ca raṇe pārthān somakāṃś ca samāgatān
GE07mbh_09_u:006.004a: ahaṃ senāpraṇetā te bhaviṣyāmi na saṃśayaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:006.004c: taṃ ca vyūhaṃ vidhāsyāmi na tariṣyanti yaṃ pare
GE07mbh_09_u:006.004e: iti satyaṃ bravīmy eṣa duryodhana na saṃśayaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:006.005a: evam uktas tato rājā madrādhipatim añjasā
GE07mbh_09_u:006.006a: abhiṣikte tatas tasmin siṃhanādo mahān abhūt
GE07mbh_09_u:006.006c: tava sainyeṣv avādyanta vāditrāṇi ca bhārata
GE07mbh_09_u:006.007a: hṛṣṭāś cāsaṃs tadā yodhā madrakāś ca mahārathāḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:006.008a: jaya rājaṃś ciraṃ jīva jahi śatrūn samāgatān
GE07mbh_09_u:006.009a: tvaṃ hi śakto raṇe jetuṃ sasurāsuramānavān
GE07mbh_09_u:006.009c: martyadharmāṇa iha tu kim u somakasṛñjayān
GE07mbh_09_u:006.010a: evaṃ saṃstūyamānas tu madrāṇām adhipo balī
GE07mbh_09_u:006.010c: harṣaṃ prāpa tadā vīro durāpam akṛtātmabhiḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:006.011a: adyaivāhaṃ raṇe sarvān pāñcālān saha pāṇḍavaiḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:006.011c: nihaniṣyāmi rājendra svargaṃ yāsyāmi vā hataḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:006.012a: adya paśyantu māṃ lokā vicarantam abhītavat
GE07mbh_09_u:006.013a: pāñcālāś cedayaś caiva draupadeyāś ca sarvaśaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:006.013c: dhṛṣṭadyumnaḥ śikhaṇḍī ca sarve cāpi prabhadrakāḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:006.014a: vikramaṃ mama paśyantu dhanuṣaś ca mahad balam
GE07mbh_09_u:006.014c: lāghavaṃ cāstravīryaṃ ca bhujayoś ca balaṃ yudhi
GE07mbh_09_u:006.015a: adya paśyantu me pārthāḥ siddhāś ca saha cāraṇaiḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:006.015c: yādṛśaṃ me balaṃ bāhvoḥ saṃpad astreṣu yā ca me
GE07mbh_09_u:006.016a: adya me vikramaṃ dṛṣṭvā pāṇḍavānāṃ mahārathāḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:006.017c: droṇabhīṣmāv ati vibho sūtaputraṃ ca saṃyuge
GE07mbh_09_u:006.017e: vicariṣye raṇe yudhyan priyārthaṃ tava kaurava
GE07mbh_09_u:006.018a: abhiṣikte tadā śalye tava sainyeṣu mānada
GE07mbh_09_u:006.018c: na karṇavyasanaṃ kiṃ cin menire tatra bhārata
GE07mbh_09_u:006.019a: hṛṣṭāḥ sumanasaś caiva babhūvus tatra sainikāḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:006.020a: praharṣaṃ prāpya senā tu tāvakī bharatarṣabha
GE07mbh_09_u:006.020c: tāṃ rātriṃ sukhinī suptā svasthacitteva sābhavat
GE07mbh_09_u:006.021a: sainyasya tava taṃ śabdaṃ śrutvā rājā yudhiṣṭhiraḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:006.023a: etac chrutvā yathābhūtaṃ kuru mādhava yat kṣamam
GE07mbh_09_u:006.023c: bhavān netā ca goptā ca vidhatsva yad anantaram
GE07mbh_09_u:006.025a: vīryavāṃś ca mahātejā mahātmā ca viśeṣataḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:006.025c: kṛtī ca citrayodhī ca saṃyukto lāghavena ca
GE07mbh_09_u:006.026a: yādṛg bhīṣmas tathā droṇo yādṛk karṇaś ca saṃyuge
GE07mbh_09_u:006.026c: tādṛśas tad viśiṣṭo vā madrarājo mato mama
GE07mbh_09_u:006.026d-0043_01: evam ukte tu kṛṣṇena dharmarājo viśāṃ patiḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:006.026d-0043_04: ninādair ubhayos tatra sainyayor vyāptam ambaram
GE07mbh_09_u:006.029c: vicariṣyaty abhīḥ kāle kālaḥ kruddhaḥ prajāsv iva
GE07mbh_09_u:006.031a: sadevaloke kṛtsne 'smin nānyas tvattaḥ pumān bhavet
GE07mbh_09_u:006.031c: madrarājaṃ raṇe kruddhaṃ yo hanyāt kurunandana
GE07mbh_09_u:006.031e: ahany ahani yudhyantaṃ kṣobhayantaṃ balaṃ tava
GE07mbh_09_u:006.032a: tasmāj jahi raṇe śalyaṃ maghavān iva śambaram
GE07mbh_09_u:006.033a: tavaiva hi jayo nūnaṃ hate madreśvare yudhi
GE07mbh_09_u:006.033c: tasmin hate hataṃ sarvaṃ dhārtarāṣṭrabalaṃ mahat
GE07mbh_09_u:006.034a: etac chrutvā mahārāja vacanaṃ mama sāṃpratam
GE07mbh_09_u:006.034e: jahi cainaṃ mahābāho vāsavo namuciṃ yathā
GE07mbh_09_u:006.035a: na caivātra dayā kāryā mātulo 'yaṃ mameti vai
GE07mbh_09_u:006.036c: mā nimajjasva sagaṇaḥ śalyam āsādya goṣpadam
GE07mbh_09_u:006.037a: yac ca te tapaso vīryaṃ yac ca kṣātraṃ balaṃ tava
GE07mbh_09_u:006.037b-0044_01: cakṣur dharmeti yal loke kathyase tvaṃ janādhipa
GE07mbh_09_u:006.037c: tad darśaya raṇe sarvaṃ jahi cainaṃ mahāratham
GE07mbh_09_u:006.039a: keśave tu tadā yāte dharmarājo yudhiṣṭhiraḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:006.039c: visṛjya sarvān bhrātṝṃś ca pāñcālān atha somakān
GE07mbh_09_u:006.039e: suṣvāpa rajanīṃ tāṃ tu viśalya iva kuñjaraḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:006.040a: te ca sarve maheṣvāsāḥ pāñcālāḥ pāṇḍavās tathā
GE07mbh_09_u:006.040b-0045_01: abravīt tāvakān sarvān karṇasya nidhanena vai
GE07mbh_09_u:006.040c: karṇasya nidhane hṛṣṭāḥ suṣupus tāṃ niśāṃ tadā
GE07mbh_09_u:006.041e: sūtaputrasya nidhane jayaṃ labdhvā ca māriṣa
GE07mbh_09_u:007.001a: vyatītāyāṃ rajanyāṃ tu rājā duryodhanas tadā
GE07mbh_09_u:007.002a: rājñas tu matam ājñāya samanahyata sā camūḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:007.004a: vāditrāṇāṃ ca ninadaḥ prādurāsīd viśāṃ pate
GE07mbh_09_u:007.004c: bodhanārthaṃ hi yodhānāṃ sainyānāṃ cāpy udīryatām
GE07mbh_09_u:007.005c: saṃnaddhāny eva dadṛśur mṛtyuṃ kṛtvā nivartanam
GE07mbh_09_u:007.007a: tataḥ sarve samāgamya putreṇa tava sainikāḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:007.007c: kṛpaś ca kṛtavarmā ca drauṇiḥ śalyo 'tha saubalaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:007.008a: anye ca pārthivāḥ śeṣāḥ samayaṃ cakrire tadā
GE07mbh_09_u:007.008c: na na ekena yoddhavyaṃ kathaṃ cid api pāṇḍavaiḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:007.009a: yo hy ekaḥ pāṇḍavair yudhyed yo vā yudhyantam utsṛjet
GE07mbh_09_u:007.009c: sa pañcabhir bhaved yuktaḥ pātakaiḥ sopapātakaiḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:007.009e: anyonyaṃ parirakṣadbhir yoddhavyaṃ sahitaiś ca naḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:007.010a: evaṃ te samayaṃ kṛtvā sarve tatra mahārathāḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:007.011a: tathaiva pāṇḍavā rājan vyūhya sainyaṃ mahāraṇe
GE07mbh_09_u:007.013a: droṇasya bhīṣmasya ca vai rādheyasya ca me śrutam
GE07mbh_09_u:007.013c: pātanaṃ śaṃsa me bhūyaḥ śalyasyātha sutasya me
GE07mbh_09_u:007.014a: kathaṃ raṇe hataḥ śalyo dharmarājena saṃjaya
GE07mbh_09_u:007.014c: bhīmena ca mahābāhuḥ putro duryodhano mama
GE07mbh_09_u:007.015c: śṛṇu rājan sthiro bhūtvā saṃgrāmaṃ śaṃsato mama
GE07mbh_09_u:007.016a: āśā balavatī rājan putrāṇāṃ te 'bhavat tadā
GE07mbh_09_u:007.016c: hate bhīṣme ca droṇe ca sūtaputre ca pātite
GE07mbh_09_u:007.016e: śalyaḥ pārthān raṇe sarvān nihaniṣyati māriṣa
GE07mbh_09_u:007.017a: tām āśāṃ hṛdaye kṛtvā samāśvāsya ca bhārata
GE07mbh_09_u:007.018a: yadā karṇe hate pārthāḥ siṃhanādaṃ pracakrire
GE07mbh_09_u:007.018c: tadā rājan dhārtarāṣṭrān āviveśa mahad bhayam
GE07mbh_09_u:007.019a: tān samāśvāsya tu tadā madrarājaḥ pratāpavān
GE07mbh_09_u:007.021d-0050_01: tasya sthitvā mahārāja mukhe vyūhasya daṃśitaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:007.022c: tasthau śūro mahārāja putrāṇāṃ te bhayapraṇut
GE07mbh_09_u:007.023c: madrakaiḥ sahito vīraiḥ karṇaputraiś ca durjayaiḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:007.024c: gautamo dakṣiṇe pārśve śakaiś ca yavanaiḥ saha
GE07mbh_09_u:007.027a: pāṇḍavāś ca maheṣvāsā vyūhya sainyam ariṃdamāḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:007.027c: tridhā bhūtvā mahārāja tava sainyam upādravan
GE07mbh_09_u:007.028a: dhṛṣṭadyumnaḥ śikhaṇḍī ca sātyakiś ca mahārathaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:007.031a: gautamaṃ bhīmaseno vai somakāś ca mahārathāḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:007.032a: mādrīputrau tu śakunim ulūkaṃ ca mahārathau
GE07mbh_09_u:007.034a: hate bhīṣme maheṣvāse droṇe karṇe mahārathe
GE07mbh_09_u:007.035c: māmakānāṃ pareṣāṃ ca kiṃ śiṣṭam abhavad balam
GE07mbh_09_u:007.036a: yathā vayaṃ pare rājan yuddhāya samavasthitāḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:007.036c: yāvac cāsīd balaṃ śiṣṭaṃ saṃgrāme tan nibodha me
GE07mbh_09_u:007.037c: daśa dantisahasrāṇi sapta caiva śatāni ca
GE07mbh_09_u:007.038c: narakoṭyas tathā tisro balam etat tavābhavat
GE07mbh_09_u:007.040a: etad balaṃ pāṇḍavānām abhavac cheṣam āhave
GE07mbh_09_u:007.040b-0051_01: svalpam apy etad eveha balavat parirakṣitam
GE07mbh_09_u:007.040d-0052_02: bhrāntyāśvāḥ śataśas tatra netrāṇy uccair avarṣayan
GE07mbh_09_u:007.043c: upayātā naravyāghrāḥ pūrvāṃ saṃdhyāṃ prati prabho
GE07mbh_09_u:008.002a: narā rathā gajaughāś ca sādinaś ca sahasraśaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:008.004a: nāgair abhyāhatāḥ ke cit sarathā rathino 'patan
GE07mbh_09_u:008.005a: hayaughān pādarakṣāṃś ca rathinas tatra śikṣitāḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:008.007a: dhanvinaḥ puruṣāḥ ke cit saṃnivārya mahārathān
GE07mbh_09_u:008.009a: tathā ca rathinaṃ kruddhaṃ vikirantaṃ śarān bahūn
GE07mbh_09_u:008.010a: nāgo nāgam abhidrutya rathī ca rathinaṃ raṇe
GE07mbh_09_u:008.012c: haṃsā himavataḥ prasthe pibanta iva medinīm
GE07mbh_09_u:008.013a: teṣāṃ tu vājināṃ bhūmiḥ khuraiś citrā viśāṃ pate
GE07mbh_09_u:008.014c: pattīnāṃ cāpi śabdena nāgānāṃ bṛṃhitena ca
GE07mbh_09_u:008.015a: vāditrāṇāṃ ca ghoṣeṇa śaṅkhānāṃ nisvanena ca
GE07mbh_09_u:008.015c: abhavan nāditā bhūmir nirghātair iva bhārata
GE07mbh_09_u:008.016c: kavacānāṃ prabhābhiś ca na prājñāyata kiṃ cana
GE07mbh_09_u:008.018c: cyutānām iva tālebhyaḥ phalānāṃ śrūyate svanaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:008.021c: patitair bhāti rājendra mahī śakradhvajair iva
GE07mbh_09_u:008.023c: senāvanaṃ tac chuśubhe vanaṃ puṣpācitaṃ yathā
GE07mbh_09_u:008.024a: tatra yodhā mahārāja vicaranto hy abhītavat
GE07mbh_09_u:008.026c: vyadīryata diśaḥ sarvā vātanunnā ghanā iva
GE07mbh_09_u:008.027a: te gajā ghanasaṃkāśāḥ petur urvyāṃ samantataḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:008.034a: vartamāne tathā yuddhe nirmaryāde viśāṃ pate
GE07mbh_09_u:008.035a: akrośan bāndhavān anye tatra tatra paraṃtapa
GE07mbh_09_u:008.035c: krośadbhir bāndhavaiś cānye bhayārtā na nivartire
GE07mbh_09_u:008.036c: arjuno bhīmasenaś ca mohayāṃ cakratuḥ parān
GE07mbh_09_u:008.037a: sā vadhyamānā mahatī senā tava janādhipa
GE07mbh_09_u:008.037c: amuhyat tatra tatraiva yoṣin madavaśād iva
GE07mbh_09_u:008.038c: dadhmatur vārijau tatra siṃhanādaṃ ca nedatuḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:008.040c: śalyena saṃgatāḥ śūrā yad ayudhyanta bhāgaśaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:008.043a: vadhyamānā camūḥ sā tu putrāṇāṃ prekṣatāṃ tava
GE07mbh_09_u:008.043e: hāhākāro mahāñ jajñe yodhānāṃ tava bhārata
GE07mbh_09_u:008.044a: tiṣṭha tiṣṭheti vāg āsīd drāvitānāṃ mahātmanām
GE07mbh_09_u:008.044e: ādravann eva bhagnās te pāṇḍavais tava sainikāḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:008.045a: tyaktvā yuddhe priyān putrān bhrātṝn atha pitāmahān
GE07mbh_09_u:008.046a: hayān dvipāṃs tvarayanto yodhā jagmuḥ samantataḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:009.001a: tat prabhagnaṃ balaṃ dṛṣṭvā madrarājaḥ pratāpavān
GE07mbh_09_u:009.002a: eṣa tiṣṭhati vai rājā pāṇḍuputro yudhiṣṭhiraḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:009.003a: atra māṃ prāpaya kṣipraṃ paśya me sārathe balam
GE07mbh_09_u:009.003c: na samarthā hi me pārthāḥ sthātum adya puro yudhi
GE07mbh_09_u:009.004a: evam uktas tataḥ prāyān madrarājasya sārathiḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:009.005a: āpatantaṃ ca sahasā pāṇḍavānāṃ mahad balam
GE07mbh_09_u:009.006a: pāṇḍavānāṃ balaughas tu śalyam āsādya māriṣa
GE07mbh_09_u:009.006c: vyatiṣṭhata tadā yuddhe sindhor vega ivācalam
GE07mbh_09_u:009.007a: madrarājaṃ tu samare dṛṣṭvā yuddhāya viṣṭhitam
GE07mbh_09_u:009.008f-0053_01: nātheva ca mahārāja citrasenas tu pāṇḍavam
GE07mbh_09_u:009.012a: citrasenas tu bhallena pītena niśitena ca
GE07mbh_09_u:009.013c: tribhiḥ śarair asaṃbhrānto lalāṭe vai samarpayat
GE07mbh_09_u:009.014a: hayāṃś cāsya śarais tīkṣṇaiḥ preṣayām āsa mṛtyave
GE07mbh_09_u:009.014c: tathā dhvajaṃ sārathiṃ ca tribhis tribhir apātayat
GE07mbh_09_u:009.015c: nakulaḥ śuśubhe rājaṃs triśṛṅga iva parvataḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:009.016a: sa chinnadhanvā virathaḥ khaḍgam ādāya carma ca
GE07mbh_09_u:009.016c: rathād avātarad vīraḥ śailāgrād iva kesarī
GE07mbh_09_u:009.017c: nakulo 'py agrasat tāṃ vai carmaṇā laghuvikramaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:009.020a: citrasenaṃ viśastaṃ tu dṛṣṭvā tatra mahārathāḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:009.021c: suṣeṇaḥ satyasenaś ca muñcantau niśitāñ śarān
GE07mbh_09_u:009.022c: jighāṃsantau yathā nāgaṃ vyāghrau rājan mahāvane
GE07mbh_09_u:009.023a: tāv abhyadhāvatāṃ tīkṣṇau dvāv apy enaṃ mahāratham
GE07mbh_09_u:009.023c: śaraughān samyag asyantau jīmūtau salilaṃ yathā
GE07mbh_09_u:009.024a: sa śaraiḥ sarvato viddhaḥ prahṛṣṭa iva pāṇḍavaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:009.024c: anyat kārmukam ādāya ratham āruhya vīryavān

GE07mbh_09_u:013.009a: sa rathaḥ sarvato bhāti citrapuṅkhaiḥ śitaiḥ śaraiḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:013.010c: avākirat tāṃ pṛtanāṃ megho vṛṣṭyā yathācalam
GE07mbh_09_u:013.013a: cakrāṇāṃ patatāṃ caiva yugānāṃ ca dharātale
GE07mbh_09_u:013.013c: tūṇīrāṇāṃ patākānāṃ dhvajānāṃ ca rathaiḥ saha
GE07mbh_09_u:013.013d-0079_01: īṣāṇāṃ cāpi yoktrāṇāṃ veṇūnāṃ cāpi sarvaśaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:013.013d-0079_02: bhujānāṃ śirasāṃ caiva chattrāṇāṃ vyajanaiḥ saha
GE07mbh_09_u:013.013d-0079_03: tatra kruddhasya pārthasya agamyā samabhūd dharā
GE07mbh_09_u:013.014c: akṣāṇām atha yoktrāṇāṃ pratodānāṃ ca sarvaśaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:013.015c: bhujānāṃ ca mahārāja skandhānāṃ ca samantataḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:013.015d-0080_01: sarveṣāṃ patatāṃ caiva chattrāṇāṃ ca samantataḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:013.016a: chatrāṇāṃ vyajanaiḥ sārdhaṃ mukuṭānāṃ ca rāśayaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:013.016d-0081_01: tataḥ kruddhasya pārthasya rathamārge viśāṃ pate
GE07mbh_09_u:013.018a: hatvā tu samare pārthaḥ sahasre dve paraṃtapa
GE07mbh_09_u:013.019a: yathā hi bhagavān agnir jagad dagdhvā carācaram
GE07mbh_09_u:013.019c: vidhūmo dṛśyate rājaṃs tathā pārtho mahārathaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:013.020a: drauṇis tu samare dṛṣṭvā pāṇḍavasya parākramam
GE07mbh_09_u:013.021a: tāv ubhau puruṣavyāghrau śvetāśvau dhanvināṃ varau
GE07mbh_09_u:013.024a: tayor yuddhaṃ mahārāja ciraṃ samam ivābhavat
GE07mbh_09_u:013.024c: astrāṇāṃ saṃgamaś caiva ghoras tatrābhavan mahān
GE07mbh_09_u:013.025c: vāsudevaṃ ca daśabhir drauṇir vivyādha bhārata
GE07mbh_09_u:013.026a: tataḥ prahasya bībhatsur vyākṣipad gāṇḍivaṃ dhanuḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:013.026d-0082_02: so 'sṛjat sāyakān saṃkhye arjuno jayatāṃ varaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:013.026d-0082_03: caturbhiḥ sāyakaiś caiva tāḍayām āsa ghoṭakān
GE07mbh_09_u:013.027c: mṛdupūrvaṃ tataś cainaṃ tribhir vivyādha sāyakaiḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:013.028a: hatāśve tu rathe tiṣṭhan droṇaputras tv ayasmayam
GE07mbh_09_u:013.030a: sa cchinnaṃ musalaṃ dṛṣṭvā drauṇiḥ paramakopanaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:013.031a: tam antakam iva kruddhaṃ parighaṃ prekṣya pāṇḍavaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:013.032a: sa cchinnaḥ patito bhūmau pārthabāṇair mahāhave
GE07mbh_09_u:013.033a: tato 'parais tribhir bāṇair drauṇiṃ vivyādha pāṇḍavaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:013.033e: na saṃbhrāntas tadā drauṇiḥ pauruṣe sve vyavasthitaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:013.034a: sudharmā tu tato rājan bhāradvājaṃ mahāratham
GE07mbh_09_u:013.035a: tatas tu suratho 'py ājau pāñcālānāṃ mahārathaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:013.036a: vikarṣan vai dhanuḥ śreṣṭhaṃ sarvabhārasahaṃ dṛḍham
GE07mbh_09_u:013.037a: surathaṃ tu tataḥ kruddham āpatantaṃ mahāratham
GE07mbh_09_u:013.038c: udvīkṣya surathaṃ roṣād dhanurjyām avamṛjya ca
GE07mbh_09_u:013.040a: tatas taṃ patitaṃ bhūmau nārācena samāhatam
GE07mbh_09_u:013.041a: tasmiṃs tu nihate vīre droṇaputraḥ pratāpavān
GE07mbh_09_u:013.041c: āruroha rathaṃ tūrṇaṃ tam eva rathināṃ varaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:013.043a: tatra yuddhaṃ mahac cāsīd arjunasya paraiḥ saha
GE07mbh_09_u:013.044c: yad eko yugapad vīrān samayodhayad arjunaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:013.045a: vimardas tu mahān āsīd arjunasya paraiḥ saha
GE07mbh_09_u:014.003a: rājā tu pārṣataṃ viddhvā śaraiḥ pañcabhir āyasaiḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:014.005c: mahatyā senayā sārdhaṃ parivavruḥ sma pārṣatam
GE07mbh_09_u:014.006a: sa taiḥ parivṛtaḥ śūraiḥ sarvato 'tirathair bhṛśam
GE07mbh_09_u:014.008a: tatrāpi sumahad yuddhaṃ ghorarūpaṃ viśāṃ pate
GE07mbh_09_u:014.010c: yodhayām āsa rājendra vīryeṇa ca balena ca
GE07mbh_09_u:014.011c: trātāraṃ nādhyagacchanta ke cit tatra mahārathāḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:014.012a: tatas tu nakulaḥ śūro dharmarāje prapīḍite
GE07mbh_09_u:014.015a: śalyas tu pīḍitas tena svasrīyeṇa mahātmanā
GE07mbh_09_u:014.017c: diśaś ca pradiśaś caiva kampayānāṃś ca medinīm
GE07mbh_09_u:014.018a: yudhiṣṭhiraṃ tribhir viddhvā bhīmasenaṃ ca saptabhiḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:014.018c: sātyakiṃ ca śatenājau sahadevaṃ tribhiḥ śaraiḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:014.019a: tatas tu saśaraṃ cāpaṃ nakulasya mahātmanaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:014.019e: tad aśīryata vicchinnaṃ dhanuḥ śalyasya sāyakaiḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:014.021a: yudhiṣṭhiras tu madreśaṃ sahadevaś ca māriṣa
GE07mbh_09_u:014.021c: daśabhir daśabhir bāṇair urasy enam avidhyatām
GE07mbh_09_u:014.022a: bhīmasenas tataḥ ṣaṣṭyā sātyakir navabhiḥ śaraiḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:014.023a: madrarājas tataḥ kruddhaḥ sātyakiṃ navabhiḥ śaraiḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:014.024a: athāsya saśaraṃ cāpaṃ muṣṭau ciccheda māriṣa
GE07mbh_09_u:014.024c: hayāṃś ca caturaḥ saṃkhye preṣayām āsa mṛtyave
GE07mbh_09_u:014.026a: mādrīputrau tu saṃrabdhau bhīmasenaṃ ca pāṇḍavam
GE07mbh_09_u:014.026c: yudhiṣṭhiraṃ ca kauravya vivyādha daśabhiḥ śaraiḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:014.027c: yad enaṃ sahitāḥ pārthā nābhyavartanta saṃyuge
GE07mbh_09_u:014.029c: pratyudyayau rathenaiva matto mattam iva dvipam
GE07mbh_09_u:014.030c: sātyakeś caiva śūrasya madrāṇām adhipasya ca
GE07mbh_09_u:014.031c: vivyādha daśabhir bāṇais tiṣṭha tiṣṭheti cābravīt
GE07mbh_09_u:014.032a: madrarājas tu subhṛśaṃ viddhas tena mahātmanā
GE07mbh_09_u:014.036c: antarikṣaṃ ca sahasā bāṇabhūtam abhūt tadā
GE07mbh_09_u:014.038a: tatra rājañ śarair muktair nirmuktair iva pannagaiḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:014.039c: yad ekaḥ samare śūro yodhayām āsa vai bahūn
GE07mbh_09_u:015.001c: punar abhyadravan pārthān vegena mahatā raṇe
GE07mbh_09_u:015.002c: kṣaṇenaiva ca pārthāṃs te bahutvāt samaloḍayan
GE07mbh_09_u:015.004a: tato dhanaṃjayaḥ kruddhaḥ kṛpaṃ saha padānugaiḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:015.007c: śalyaṃ tu saha sainyena kuntīputro yudhiṣṭhiraḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:015.008a: tataḥ samabhavad yuddhaṃ saṃsaktaṃ tatra tatra ha
GE07mbh_09_u:015.012a: tasya tal lāghavaṃ dṛṣṭvā tathaiva ca kṛtāstratām
GE07mbh_09_u:015.015a: jayo vāstu vadho veti kṛtabuddhir mahārathaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:015.015c: samāhūyābravīt sarvān bhrātṝn kṛṣṇaṃ ca mādhavam
GE07mbh_09_u:015.016a: bhīṣmo droṇaś ca karṇaś ca ye cānye pṛthivīkṣitaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:015.018a: so 'ham adya yudhā jetum āśaṃse madrakeśvaram
GE07mbh_09_u:015.018c: tatra yan mānasaṃ mahyaṃ tat sarvaṃ nigadāmi vaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:015.020d-0084_01: kiṃ vā pralapitenātha vyarthenānena kiṃ cana
GE07mbh_09_u:015.021a: māṃ vā śalyo raṇe hantā taṃ vāhaṃ bhadram astu vaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:015.021c: iti satyām imāṃ vāṇīṃ lokavīrā nibodhata
GE07mbh_09_u:015.024c: pṛṣṭhagopo bhavatv adya mama pārtho dhanaṃjayaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:015.026a: evam uktās tathā cakruḥ sarve rājñaḥ priyaiṣiṇaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:015.026c: tataḥ praharṣaḥ sainyānāṃ punar āsīt tadā nṛpa
GE07mbh_09_u:015.027c: pratijñāṃ tāṃ ca saṃgrāme dharmarājasya pūrayan
GE07mbh_09_u:015.027d-0085_01: pratijñāṃ tāṃ tadā rājā kṛtvā madreśam abhyayāt
GE07mbh_09_u:015.028a: tataḥ śaṅkhāṃś ca bherīś ca śataśaś caiva puṣkarān
GE07mbh_09_u:015.031a: tān pratyagṛhṇāt putras te madrarājaś ca vīryavān
GE07mbh_09_u:015.031c: mahāmeghān iva bahūñ śailāv astodayāv ubhau
GE07mbh_09_u:015.034a: vavarṣa śaravarṣāṇi citraṃ laghu ca suṣṭhu ca
GE07mbh_09_u:015.034c: na cāsya vivaraṃ kaś cid dadarśa carato raṇe
GE07mbh_09_u:015.035a: tāv ubhau vividhair bāṇais tatakṣāte parasparam
GE07mbh_09_u:015.036a: bhīmas tu tava putreṇa raṇaśauṇḍena saṃgataḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:015.036c: pāñcālyaḥ sātyakiś caiva mādrīputrau ca pāṇḍavau
GE07mbh_09_u:015.037a: tadāsīt tumulaṃ yuddhaṃ punar eva jayaiṣiṇām
GE07mbh_09_u:015.037c: tāvakānāṃ pareṣāṃ ca rājan durmantrite tava
GE07mbh_09_u:015.041a: sa cchinnadhanvā tejasvī rathaśaktyā sutaṃ tava
GE07mbh_09_u:015.042a: tasmin moham anuprāpte punar eva vṛkodaraḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:015.042c: yantur eva śiraḥ kāyāt kṣurapreṇāharat tadā
GE07mbh_09_u:015.043a: hatasūtā hayās tasya ratham ādāya bhārata
GE07mbh_09_u:015.044c: kṛpaś ca kṛtavarmā ca putraṃ te 'bhiparīpsavaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:015.045a: tasmin vilulite sainye trastās tasya padānugāḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:015.045c: gāṇḍīvadhanvā visphārya dhanus tān ahanac charaiḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:015.047c: purā bhūtvā mṛdur dānto yat tadā dāruṇo 'bhavat
GE07mbh_09_u:015.048a: vivṛtākṣaś ca kaunteyo vepamānaś ca manyunā
GE07mbh_09_u:015.049a: yāṃ yāṃ pratyudyayau senāṃ tāṃ tāṃ jyeṣṭhaḥ sa pāṇḍavaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:015.049c: śarair apātayad rājan girīn vajrair ivottamaiḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:015.050c: ākrīḍad eko balavān pavanas toyadān iva
GE07mbh_09_u:015.051a: sāśvārohāṃś ca turagān pattīṃś caiva sahasraśaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:015.051c: vyapothayata saṃgrāme kruddho rudraḥ paśūn iva
GE07mbh_09_u:015.053a: tasya tac caritaṃ dṛṣṭvā saṃgrāme bhīmakarmaṇaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:015.053c: vitresus tāvakāḥ sarve śalyas tv enaṃ samabhyayāt
GE07mbh_09_u:015.054a: tatas tau tu susaṃrabdhau pradhmāpya salilodbhavau
GE07mbh_09_u:015.057b-0087_01: puṣpitau śuśubhāte tau vasante kiṃśukau yathā
GE07mbh_09_u:015.058a: dṛṣṭvā sarvāṇi sainyāni nādhyavasyaṃs tayor jayam
GE07mbh_09_u:015.059a: śalyo vā pāṇḍavaṃ hatvā dadyād duryodhanāya gām
GE07mbh_09_u:015.059c: itīva niścayo nābhūd yodhānāṃ tatra bhārata
GE07mbh_09_u:015.062a: so 'nyat kārmukam ādāya śalyaṃ śaraśatais tribhiḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:015.063c: dvābhyām atha śitāgrābhyām ubhau ca pārṣṇisārathī
GE07mbh_09_u:015.064e: tataḥ prabhagnaṃ tat sainyaṃ dauryodhanam ariṃdama
GE07mbh_09_u:015.066a: muhūrtam iva tau gatvā nardamāne yudhiṣṭhire
GE07mbh_09_u:015.066c: sthitvā tato madrapatir anyaṃ syandanam āsthitaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:016.002a: tataḥ sa śaravarṣeṇa parjanya iva vṛṣṭimān
GE07mbh_09_u:016.003a: sātyakiṃ daśabhir viddhvā bhīmasenaṃ tribhiḥ śaraiḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:016.004a: tāṃs tān anyān maheṣvāsān sāśvān sarathakuñjarān
GE07mbh_09_u:016.004b-0089_01: ardayām āsa viśikhair ulkābhir iva kuñjarān
GE07mbh_09_u:016.004e: rathāṃś ca rathibhiḥ sārdhaṃ jaghāna rathināṃ varaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:016.005a: bāhūṃś ciccheda ca tathā sāyudhān ketanāni ca
GE07mbh_09_u:016.005c: cakāra ca mahīṃ yodhais tīrṇāṃ vedīṃ kuśair iva
GE07mbh_09_u:016.006a: tathā tam arisainyāni ghnantaṃ mṛtyum ivāntakam
GE07mbh_09_u:016.007a: taṃ bhīmasenaś ca śineś ca naptā; mādryāś ca putrau puruṣapravīrau
GE07mbh_09_u:016.007c: samāgataṃ bhīmabalena rājñā; paryāpur anyonyam athāhvayantaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:016.008a: tatas tu śūrāḥ samare narendraṃ; madreśvaraṃ prāpya yudhāṃ variṣṭham
GE07mbh_09_u:016.008c: āvārya cainaṃ samare nṛvīrā; jaghnuḥ śaraiḥ patribhir ugravegaiḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:016.009a: saṃrakṣito bhīmasenena rājā; mādrīsutābhyām atha mādhavena
GE07mbh_09_u:016.009c: madrādhipaṃ patribhir ugravegaiḥ; stanāntare dharmasuto nijaghne
GE07mbh_09_u:016.010a: tato raṇe tāvakānāṃ rathaughāḥ; samīkṣya madrādhipatiṃ śarārtam
GE07mbh_09_u:016.010c: paryāvavruḥ pravarāḥ sarvaśaś ca; duryodhanasyānumate samantāt
GE07mbh_09_u:016.011a: tato drutaṃ madrajanādhipo raṇe; yudhiṣṭhiraṃ saptabhir abhyavidhyat
GE07mbh_09_u:016.011c: taṃ cāpi pārtho navabhiḥ pṛṣatkair; vivyādha rājaṃs tumule mahātmā
GE07mbh_09_u:016.012c: anyonyam ācchādayatāṃ mahārathau; madrādhipaś cāpi yudhiṣṭhiraś ca
GE07mbh_09_u:016.013a: tatas tu tūrṇaṃ samare mahārathau; parasparasyāntaram īkṣamāṇau
GE07mbh_09_u:016.013c: śarair bhṛśaṃ vivyadhatur nṛpottamau; mahābalau śatrubhir apradhṛṣyau
GE07mbh_09_u:016.015a: tau ceratur vyāghraśiśuprakāśau; mahāvaneṣv āmiṣagṛddhināv iva
GE07mbh_09_u:016.016a: tatas tu madrādhipatir mahātmā; yudhiṣṭhiraṃ bhīmabalaṃ prasahya
GE07mbh_09_u:016.017c: jaghāna madrādhipatiṃ mahātmā; mudaṃ ca lebhe ṛṣabhaḥ kurūṇām
GE07mbh_09_u:016.018a: tato muhūrtād iva pārthivendro; labdhvā saṃjñāṃ krodhasaṃraktanetraḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:016.019a: tvaraṃs tato dharmasuto mahātmā; śalyasya kruddho navabhiḥ pṛṣatkaiḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:016.019c: bhittvā hy uras tapanīyaṃ ca varma; jaghāna ṣaḍbhis tv aparaiḥ pṛṣatkaiḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:016.020a: tatas tu madrādhipatiḥ prahṛṣṭo; dhanur vikṛṣya vyasṛjat pṛṣatkān
GE07mbh_09_u:016.020c: dvābhyāṃ kṣurābhyāṃ ca tathaiva rājñaś; ciccheda cāpaṃ kurupuṃgavasya
GE07mbh_09_u:016.021a: navaṃ tato 'nyat samare pragṛhya; rājā dhanur ghorataraṃ mahātmā
GE07mbh_09_u:016.021c: śalyaṃ tu viddhvā niśitaiḥ samantād; yathā mahendro namuciṃ śitāgraiḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:016.022a: tatas tu śalyo navabhiḥ pṛṣatkair; bhīmasya rājñaś ca yudhiṣṭhirasya
GE07mbh_09_u:016.022c: nikṛtya raukme paṭuvarmaṇī tayor; vidārayām āsa bhujau mahātmā
GE07mbh_09_u:016.023a: tato 'pareṇa jvalitārkatejasā; kṣureṇa rājño dhanur unmamātha
GE07mbh_09_u:016.023c: kṛpaś ca tasyaiva jaghāna sūtaṃ; ṣaḍbhiḥ śaraiḥ so 'bhimukhaṃ papāta
GE07mbh_09_u:016.024a: madrādhipaś cāpi yudhiṣṭhirasya; śaraiś caturbhir nijaghāna vāhān
GE07mbh_09_u:016.024c: vāhāṃś ca hatvā vyakaron mahātmā; yodhakṣayaṃ dharmasutasya rājñaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:016.024d-0091_01: yad adbhutaṃ karma na śakyam anyaiḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:016.025a: tathā kṛte rājani bhīmaseno; madrādhipasyāśu tato mahātmā
GE07mbh_09_u:016.025c: chittvā dhanur vegavatā śareṇa; dvābhyām avidhyat subhṛśaṃ narendram
GE07mbh_09_u:016.026a: athāpareṇāsya jahāra yantuḥ; kāyāc chiraḥ saṃnahanīyamadhyāt
GE07mbh_09_u:016.026c: jaghāna cāśvāṃś caturaḥ sa śīghraṃ; tathā bhṛśaṃ kupito bhīmasenaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:016.027a: tam agraṇīḥ sarvadhanurdharāṇām; ekaṃ carantaṃ samare 'tivegam
GE07mbh_09_u:016.027c: bhīmaḥ śatena vyakirac charāṇāṃ; mādrīputraḥ sahadevas tathaiva
GE07mbh_09_u:016.028a: taiḥ sāyakair mohitaṃ vīkṣya śalyaṃ; bhīmaḥ śarair asya cakarta varma
GE07mbh_09_u:016.028c: sa bhīmasenena nikṛttavarmā; madrādhipaś carma sahasratāram
GE07mbh_09_u:016.029a: pragṛhya khaḍgaṃ ca rathān mahātmā; praskandya kuntīsutam abhyadhāvat
GE07mbh_09_u:016.029c: chittvā ratheṣāṃ nakulasya so 'tha; yudhiṣṭhiraṃ bhīmabalo 'bhyadhāvat
GE07mbh_09_u:016.030a: taṃ cāpi rājānam athotpatantaṃ; kruddhaṃ yathaivāntakam āpatantam
GE07mbh_09_u:016.030c: dhṛṣṭadyumno draupadeyāḥ śikhaṇḍī; śineś ca naptā sahasā parīyuḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:016.031a: athāsya carmāpratimaṃ nyakṛntad; bhīmo mahātmā daśabhiḥ pṛṣatkaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:016.031c: khaḍgaṃ ca bhallair nicakarta muṣṭau; nadan prahṛṣṭas tava sainyamadhye
GE07mbh_09_u:016.032a: tat karma bhīmasya samīkṣya hṛṣṭās; te pāṇḍavānāṃ pravarā rathaughāḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:016.032c: nādaṃ ca cakrur bhṛśam utsmayantaḥ; śaṅkhāṃś ca dadhmuḥ śaśisaṃnikāśān
GE07mbh_09_u:016.033a: tenātha śabdena vibhīṣaṇena; tavābhitaptaṃ balam aprahṛṣṭam
GE07mbh_09_u:016.033c: svedābhibhūtaṃ rudhirokṣitāṅgaṃ; visaṃjñakalpaṃ ca tathā viṣaṇṇam
GE07mbh_09_u:016.034c: yudhiṣṭhirasyābhimukhaṃ javena; siṃho yathā mṛgahetoḥ prayātaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:016.035c: dṛṣṭvā tu madrādhipatiṃ sa tūrṇaṃ; samabhyadhāvat tam ariṃ balena
GE07mbh_09_u:016.036a: govindavākyaṃ tvaritaṃ vicintya; dadhre matiṃ śalyavināśanāya
GE07mbh_09_u:016.036c: sa dharmarājo nihatāśvasūte; rathe tiṣṭhañ śaktim evābhikāṅkṣan
GE07mbh_09_u:016.037a: tac cāpi śalyasya niśamya karma; mahātmano bhāgam athāvaśiṣṭam
GE07mbh_09_u:016.037c: smṛtvā manaḥ śalyavadhe yatātmā; yathoktam indrāvarajasya cakre
GE07mbh_09_u:016.038a: sa dharmarājo maṇihemadaṇḍāṃ; jagrāha śaktiṃ kanakaprakāśām
GE07mbh_09_u:016.038c: netre ca dīpte sahasā vivṛtya; madrādhipaṃ kruddhamanā niraikṣat
GE07mbh_09_u:016.039a: nirīkṣito vai naradeva rājñā; pūtātmanā nirhṛtakalmaṣeṇa
GE07mbh_09_u:016.039c: abhūn na yad bhasmasān madrarājas; tad adbhutaṃ me pratibhāti rājan
GE07mbh_09_u:016.040a: tatas tu śaktiṃ rucirogradaṇḍāṃ; maṇipravālojjvalitāṃ pradīptām
GE07mbh_09_u:016.040c: cikṣepa vegāt subhṛśaṃ mahātmā; madrādhipāya pravaraḥ kurūṇām
GE07mbh_09_u:016.041a: dīptām athaināṃ mahatā balena; savisphuliṅgāṃ sahasā patantīm
GE07mbh_09_u:016.041c: praikṣanta sarve kuravaḥ sametā; yathā yugānte mahatīm ivolkām
GE07mbh_09_u:016.042a: tāṃ kālarātrīm iva pāśahastāṃ; yamasya dhātrīm iva cograrūpām
GE07mbh_09_u:016.042c: sabrahmadaṇḍapratimām amoghāṃ; sasarja yatto yudhi dharmarājaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:016.044a: īśānahetoḥ pratinirmitāṃ tāṃ; tvaṣṭrā ripūṇām asudehabhakṣām
GE07mbh_09_u:016.045c: tvaṣṭrā prayatnān niyamena kḷptāṃ; brahmadviṣām antakarīm amoghām
GE07mbh_09_u:016.046a: balaprayatnād adhirūḍhavegāṃ; mantraiś ca ghorair abhimantrayitvā
GE07mbh_09_u:016.046c: sasarja mārgeṇa ca tāṃ pareṇa; vadhāya madrādhipates tadānīm
GE07mbh_09_u:016.047a: hato 'sy asāv ity abhigarjamāno; rudro 'ntakāyāntakaraṃ yatheṣum
GE07mbh_09_u:016.047c: prasārya bāhuṃ sudṛḍhaṃ supāṇiṃ; krodhena nṛtyann iva dharmarājaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:016.048a: tāṃ sarvaśaktyā prahitāṃ sa śaktiṃ; yudhiṣṭhireṇāprativāryavīryām
GE07mbh_09_u:016.048c: pratigrahāyābhinanarda śalyaḥ; samyag ghutām agnir ivājyadhārām
GE07mbh_09_u:016.049a: sā tasya marmāṇi vidārya śubhram; uro viśālaṃ ca tathaiva varma
GE07mbh_09_u:016.049c: viveśa gāṃ toyam ivāprasaktā; yaśo viśālaṃ nṛpater dahantī
GE07mbh_09_u:016.050c: saṃsiktagātro rudhireṇa so 'bhūt; krauñco yathā skandahato mahādriḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:016.051a: prasārya bāhū sa rathād gato gāṃ; saṃchinnavarmā kurunandanena
GE07mbh_09_u:016.053c: pratyudgata iva premṇā bhūmyā sa narapuṃgavaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:016.054c: ciraṃ bhuktvā vasumatīṃ priyāṃ kāntām iva prabhuḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:016.054e: sarvair aṅgaiḥ samāśliṣya prasupta iva so 'bhavat
GE07mbh_09_u:016.055c: samyag ghuta iva sviṣṭaḥ praśānto 'gnir ivādhvare
GE07mbh_09_u:016.056c: saṃśāntam api madreśaṃ lakṣmīr naiva vyamuñcata
GE07mbh_09_u:016.057c: vyadhamad dviṣataḥ saṃkhye khagarāḍ iva pannagān
GE07mbh_09_u:016.057e: dehāsūn niśitair bhallai ripūṇāṃ nāśayan kṣaṇāt
GE07mbh_09_u:016.058a: tataḥ pārthasya bāṇaughair āvṛtāḥ sainikās tava
GE07mbh_09_u:016.059c: bhrātuḥ sarvair guṇais tulyo rathī pāṇḍavam abhyayāt
GE07mbh_09_u:016.060a: vivyādha ca naraśreṣṭho nārācair bahubhis tvaran
GE07mbh_09_u:016.061a: taṃ vivyādhāśugaiḥ ṣaḍbhir dharmarājas tvarann iva
GE07mbh_09_u:016.061c: kārmukaṃ cāsya ciccheda kṣurābhyāṃ dhvajam eva ca
GE07mbh_09_u:016.063a: sakuṇḍalaṃ tad dadṛśe patamānaṃ śiro rathāt
GE07mbh_09_u:016.067a: tāṃs tathā bhajyatas trastān kauravān bharatarṣabha
GE07mbh_09_u:016.067b-0096_01: tat sainyaṃ tava putrasya vidrutaṃ sarvato bhayāt
GE07mbh_09_u:016.067c: śiner naptā kiran bāṇair abhyavartata sātyakiḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:016.069c: hārdikyaḥ sātyakiś caiva siṃhāv iva madotkaṭau
GE07mbh_09_u:016.072a: sātyakiṃ daśabhir viddhvā hayāṃś cāsya tribhiḥ śaraiḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:016.073a: tan nikṛttaṃ dhanuḥ śreṣṭham apāsya śinipuṃgavaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:016.074a: tad ādāya dhanuḥ śreṣṭhaṃ variṣṭhaḥ sarvadhanvinām
GE07mbh_09_u:016.075a: tato rathaṃ yugeṣāṃ ca chittvā bhallaiḥ susaṃyataiḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:016.075c: aśvāṃs tasyāvadhīt tūrṇam ubhau ca pārṣṇisārathī
GE07mbh_09_u:016.075d-0097_01: hārdikyaṃ virathaṃ dṛṣṭvā kṛpaḥ śāradvataḥ prabho
GE07mbh_09_u:016.075d-0097_02: apovāha tataḥ kṣipraṃ ratham āropya vīryavān
GE07mbh_09_u:016.077c: balaṃ tu hatabhūyiṣṭhaṃ tat tadāsīt parāṅmukham
GE07mbh_09_u:016.078a: tato muhūrtāt te 'paśyan rajo bhaumaṃ samutthitam
GE07mbh_09_u:016.078d-0098_01: vividhān saritaś coghāñ śoṇitasya viśāṃ pate
GE07mbh_09_u:016.079a: tato duryodhano dṛṣṭvā bhagnaṃ svabalam antikāt
GE07mbh_09_u:016.080a: pāṇḍavān sarathān dṛṣṭvā dhṛṣṭadyumnaṃ ca pārṣatam
GE07mbh_09_u:016.080c: ānartaṃ ca durādharṣaṃ śitair bāṇair avākirat
GE07mbh_09_u:016.081a: taṃ pare nābhyavartanta martyā mṛtyum ivāgatam
GE07mbh_09_u:016.081d-0099_01: pragṛhya ca dhanur ghoram abhyadhāvad yudhiṣṭhiram
GE07mbh_09_u:016.082e: vivyādha gautamaṃ cāpi ṣaḍbhir bhallaiḥ sutejanaiḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:016.086c: pārthāḥ sametāḥ paramaprahṛṣṭāḥ; śaṅkhān pradadhmur hatam īkṣya śalyam
GE07mbh_09_u:016.087a: yudhiṣṭhiraṃ ca praśaśaṃsur ājau; purā surā vṛtravadhe yathendram
GE07mbh_09_u:016.087c: cakruś ca nānāvidhavādyaśabdān; ninādayanto vasudhāṃ samantāt
GE07mbh_09_u:017.001c: rathāḥ saptaśatā vīrā niryayur mahato balāt
GE07mbh_09_u:017.002e: na gantavyaṃ na gantavyam iti madrān avārayat
GE07mbh_09_u:017.003a: duryodhanena te vīrā vāryamāṇāḥ punaḥ punaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:017.004a: te tu śūrā mahārāja kṛtacittāḥ sma yodhane
GE07mbh_09_u:017.005a: śrutvā tu nihataṃ śalyaṃ dharmaputraṃ ca pīḍitam
GE07mbh_09_u:017.006a: ājagāma tataḥ pārtho gāṇḍīvaṃ vikṣipan dhanuḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:017.007a: tato 'rjunaś ca bhīmaś ca mādrīputrau ca pāṇḍavau
GE07mbh_09_u:017.007c: sātyakiś ca naravyāghro draupadeyāś ca sarvaśaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:017.008a: dhṛṣṭadyumnaḥ śikhaṇḍī ca pāñcālāḥ saha somakaiḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:017.009c: kṣobhayanti sma tāṃ senāṃ makarāḥ sāgaraṃ yathā
GE07mbh_09_u:017.010c: akṣobhyata tadā rājan pāṇḍūnāṃ dhvajinī punaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:017.011c: vṛkṣān iva mahāvātāḥ kampayanti sma tāvakāḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:017.012a: bahavaś cukruśus tatra kva sa rājā yudhiṣṭhiraḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:017.012c: bhrātaro vāsya te śūrā dṛśyante neha ke cana
GE07mbh_09_u:017.014a: evaṃ tān vādinaḥ śūrān draupadeyā mahārathāḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:017.015a: cakrair vimathitaiḥ ke cit ke cic chinnair mahādhvajaiḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:017.016a: ālokya pāṇḍavān yuddhe yodhā rājan samantataḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:017.016c: vāryamāṇā yayur vegāt tava putreṇa bhārata
GE07mbh_09_u:017.017a: duryodhanas tu tān vīrān vārayām āsa sāntvayan
GE07mbh_09_u:017.017c: na cāsya śāsanaṃ kaś cit tatra cakre mahārathaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:017.019a: kiṃ naḥ saṃprekṣamāṇānāṃ madrāṇāṃ hanyate balam
GE07mbh_09_u:017.019c: na yuktam etat samare tvayi tiṣṭhati bhārata
GE07mbh_09_u:017.020a: sahitair nāma yoddhavyam ity eṣa samayaḥ kṛtaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:017.020c: atha kasmāt parān eva ghnato marṣayase nṛpa
GE07mbh_09_u:017.021a: vāryamāṇā mayā pūrvaṃ naite cakrur vaco mama
GE07mbh_09_u:017.021c: ete hi nihatāḥ sarve praskannāḥ pāṇḍuvāhinīm śakunir uvāca
GE07mbh_09_u:017.022-0100_01: vāryamāṇo (sic) mayā pūrvaṃ na kṛtaṃ vacanaṃ
GE07mbh_09_u:017.022a: na bhartuḥ śāsanaṃ vīrā raṇe kurvanty amarṣitāḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:017.022c: alaṃ kroddhuṃ tathaiteṣāṃ nāyaṃ kāla upekṣitum
GE07mbh_09_u:017.025a: evam uktas tato rājā balena mahatā vṛtaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:017.026c: ity āsīt tumulaḥ śabdas tava sainyasya bhārata
GE07mbh_09_u:017.028a: te muhūrtād raṇe vīrā hastāhastaṃ viśāṃ pate
GE07mbh_09_u:017.031a: rathair bhagnair yugākṣaiś ca nihataiś ca mahārathaiḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:017.033a: bhagnacakrān rathān ke cid avahaṃs turagā raṇe
GE07mbh_09_u:017.033c: rathārdhaṃ ke cid ādāya diśo daśa vibabhramuḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:017.033e: tatra tatra ca dṛśyante yoktraiḥ śliṣṭāḥ sma vājinaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:017.034c: gaganāt pracyutāḥ siddhāḥ puṇyānām iva saṃkṣaye
GE07mbh_09_u:017.035c: asmān āpatataś cāpi dṛṣṭvā pārthā mahārathāḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:017.037a: asmāṃs tu punar āsādya labdhalakṣāḥ prahāriṇaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:017.038c: madrarājaṃ ca samare dṛṣṭvā śūraṃ nipātitam
GE07mbh_09_u:018.001c: tāvakās tava putrāś ca prāyaśo vimukhābhavan
GE07mbh_09_u:018.002c: apāre pāram icchanto hate śūre mahātmani
GE07mbh_09_u:018.003c: anāthā nātham icchanto mṛgāḥ siṃhārditā iva
GE07mbh_09_u:018.004a: vṛṣā yathā bhagnaśṛṅgāḥ śīrṇadantā gajā iva
GE07mbh_09_u:018.005a: na saṃdhātum anīkāni na ca rājan parākrame
GE07mbh_09_u:018.005c: āsīd buddhir hate śalye tava yodhasya kasya cit
GE07mbh_09_u:018.006a: bhīṣme droṇe ca nihate sūtaputre ca bhārata
GE07mbh_09_u:018.006c: yad duḥkhaṃ tava yodhānāṃ bhayaṃ cāsīd viśāṃ pate
GE07mbh_09_u:018.006e: tad bhayaṃ sa ca naḥ śoko bhūya evābhyavartata
GE07mbh_09_u:018.007a: nirāśāś ca jaye tasmin hate śalye mahārathe
GE07mbh_09_u:018.007b-0102_01: nirāśaś ca hate śalye rājā rājan mahāyaśāḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:018.007c: hatapravīrā vidhvastā vikṛttāś ca śitaiḥ śaraiḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:018.007e: madrarāje hate rājan yodhās te prādravan bhayāt
GE07mbh_09_u:018.008a: aśvān anye gajān anye rathān anye mahārathāḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:018.010a: te raṇād bharataśreṣṭha tāvakāḥ prādravan diśaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:018.011a: tān prabhagnān drutān dṛṣṭvā hatotsāhān parājitān
GE07mbh_09_u:018.013a: dṛṣṭvā tu kauravaṃ sainyaṃ bhayatrastaṃ pravidrutam
GE07mbh_09_u:018.014d-0103_02: draupadyā yaś ca saṃkalpaḥ saṃsiddha iti ghuṣyatām
GE07mbh_09_u:018.015a: adya śrutvā hataṃ putraṃ dhṛtarāṣṭro janeśvaraḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:018.016e: adya kṣattur vacaḥ satyaṃ smaratāṃ bruvato hitam
GE07mbh_09_u:018.017b-0104_01: adyaiva ca hi pārthānāṃ yat kṛtaṃ pūrvakarmabhiḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:018.017c: vijānātu nṛpo duḥkhaṃ yat prāptaṃ pāṇḍunandanaiḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:018.018a: adya kṛṣṇasya māhātmyaṃ jānātu sa mahīpatiḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:018.018d-0105_01: putrāṇāṃ ca vadhaṃ ghoraṃ bhīmena śroṣyate nṛpaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:018.019a: astrāṇāṃ ca balaṃ sarvaṃ bāhvoś ca balam āhave
GE07mbh_09_u:018.019c: adya jñāsyati bhīmasya balaṃ ghoraṃ mahātmanaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:018.020e: nānyaḥ kartāsti loke tad ṛte bhīmaṃ mahābalam
GE07mbh_09_u:018.021c: madrarājaṃ hataṃ śrutvā devair api suduḥsaham
GE07mbh_09_u:018.022c: nihate saubale śūre gāndhāreṣu ca sarvaśaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:018.023a: kathaṃ teṣāṃ jayo na syād yeṣāṃ yoddhā dhanaṃjayaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:018.023c: sātyakir bhīmasenaś ca dhṛṣṭadyumnaś ca pārṣataḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:018.024a: draupadyās tanayāḥ pañca mādrīputrau ca pāṇḍavau
GE07mbh_09_u:018.024c: śikhaṇḍī ca maheṣvāso rājā caiva yudhiṣṭhiraḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:018.025a: yeṣāṃ ca jagatāṃ nātho nāthaḥ kṛṣṇo janārdanaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:018.025c: kathaṃ teṣāṃ jayo na syād yeṣāṃ dharmo vyapāśrayaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:018.025d-0106_01: lābhas teṣāṃ jayas teṣāṃ kutas teṣāṃ parābhavaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:018.026a: bhīṣmaṃ droṇaṃ ca karṇaṃ ca madrarājānam eva ca
GE07mbh_09_u:018.027a: ko 'nyaḥ śakto raṇe jetum ṛte pārthaṃ yudhiṣṭhiram
GE07mbh_09_u:018.028a: ity evaṃ vadamānās te harṣeṇa mahatā yutāḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:018.029c: mādrīputrau ca śakuniṃ sātyakiś ca mahārathaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:018.030c: duryodhanas tadā sūtam abravīd utsmayann iva
GE07mbh_09_u:018.032a: jaghane yudhyamānaṃ hi kaunteyo māṃ dhanaṃjayaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:018.033a: paśya sainyaṃ mahat sūta pāṇḍavaiḥ samabhidrutam
GE07mbh_09_u:018.034a: siṃhanādāṃś ca bahuśaḥ śṛṇu ghorān bhayānakān
GE07mbh_09_u:018.034c: tasmād yāhi śanaiḥ sūta jaghanaṃ paripālaya
GE07mbh_09_u:018.035a: mayi sthite ca samare niruddheṣu ca pāṇḍuṣu
GE07mbh_09_u:018.036a: tac chrutvā tava putrasya śūrāgryasadṛśaṃ vacaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:018.038c: avasthitās tadā yodhāḥ prārthayanto mahad yaśaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:018.040a: bhīmasenaṃ tadā rājan dhṛṣṭadyumnaṃ ca pārṣatam
GE07mbh_09_u:018.042c: dhārtarāṣṭrā vinedur hi nānyāṃ cākathayan kathām
GE07mbh_09_u:018.042e: parivārya raṇe bhīmaṃ nijaghnus te samantataḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:018.043c: na cacāla rathopasthe maināka iva parvataḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:018.044a: te tu kruddhā mahārāja pāṇḍavasya mahāratham
GE07mbh_09_u:018.044c: nigrahītuṃ pracakrur hi yodhāṃś cānyān avārayan
GE07mbh_09_u:018.045a: akrudhyata raṇe bhīmas tais tadā paryavasthitaiḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:018.047a: rathāśvadvipahīnāṃs tu tān bhīmo gadayā balī
GE07mbh_09_u:018.053a: te sarve tāvakān dṛṣṭvā maheṣvāsān parāṅmukhān
GE07mbh_09_u:018.054a: tad adbhutam apaśyāma tava putrasya pauruṣam
GE07mbh_09_u:018.054c: yad ekaṃ sahitāḥ pārthā na śekur ativartitum
GE07mbh_09_u:018.056a: na taṃ deśaṃ prapaśyāmi pṛthivyāṃ parvateṣu vā
GE07mbh_09_u:018.056c: yatra yātān na vo hanyuḥ pāṇḍavāḥ kiṃ sṛtena vaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:018.057a: alpaṃ ca balam eteṣāṃ kṛṣṇau ca bhṛśavikṣatau
GE07mbh_09_u:018.057c: yadi sarve 'tra tiṣṭhāmo dhruvo no vijayo bhavet
GE07mbh_09_u:018.058a: viprayātāṃs tu vo bhinnān pāṇḍavāḥ kṛtakilbiṣān
GE07mbh_09_u:018.058c: anusṛtya haniṣyanti śreyo naḥ samare sthitam
GE07mbh_09_u:018.059a: śṛṇudhvaṃ kṣatriyāḥ sarve yāvantaḥ stha samāgatāḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:018.059c: yadā śūraṃ ca bhīruṃ ca mārayaty antakaḥ sadā
GE07mbh_09_u:018.059e: ko nu mūḍho na yudhyeta puruṣaḥ kṣatriyabruvaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:018.060a: śreyo no bhīmasenasya kruddhasya pramukhe sthitam
GE07mbh_09_u:018.060e: jitveha sukham āpnoti hataḥ pretya mahat phalam
GE07mbh_09_u:018.061a: na yuddhadharmāc chreyān vai panthāḥ svargasya kauravāḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:018.061c: acireṇa jitāṃl lokān hato yuddhe samaśnute
GE07mbh_09_u:018.062a: śrutvā tu vacanaṃ tasya pūjayitvā ca pārthivāḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:018.064c: viśrutaṃ triṣu lokeṣu gāṇḍīvaṃ vikṣipan dhanuḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:018.065a: mādrīputrau ca śakuniṃ sātyakiś ca mahābalaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:018.065c: javenābhyapatan hṛṣṭā yato vai tāvakaṃ balam
GE07mbh_09_u:019.004a: tam āsthito rājavaro babhūva; yathodayasthaḥ savitā kṣapānte
GE07mbh_09_u:019.004c: sa tena nāgapravareṇa rājann; abhyudyayau pāṇḍusutān samantāt
GE07mbh_09_u:019.004e: śitaiḥ pṛṣatkair vidadāra cāpi; mahendravajrapratimaiḥ sughoraiḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:019.005a: tataḥ śarān vai sṛjato mahāraṇe; yodhāṃś ca rājan nayato yamāya
GE07mbh_09_u:019.005c: nāsyāntaraṃ dadṛśuḥ sve pare vā; yathā purā vajradharasya daityāḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:019.006a: te pāṇḍavāḥ somakāḥ sṛñjayāś ca; tam eva nāgaṃ dadṛśuḥ samantāt
GE07mbh_09_u:019.006c: sahasraśo vai vicarantam ekaṃ; yathā mahendrasya gajaṃ samīpe
GE07mbh_09_u:019.007a: saṃdrāvyamāṇaṃ tu balaṃ pareṣāṃ; parītakalpaṃ vibabhau samantāt
GE07mbh_09_u:019.007c: naivāvatasthe samare bhṛśaṃ bhayād; vimardamānaṃ tu parasparaṃ tadā
GE07mbh_09_u:019.008a: tataḥ prabhagnā sahasā mahācamūḥ; sā pāṇḍavī tena narādhipena
GE07mbh_09_u:019.008c: diśaś catasraḥ sahasā pradhāvitā; gajendravegaṃ tam apārayantī
GE07mbh_09_u:019.009a: dṛṣṭvā ca tāṃ vegavatā prabhagnāṃ; sarve tvadīyā yudhi yodhamukhyāḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:019.009c: apūjayaṃs tatra narādhipaṃ taṃ; dadhmuś ca śaṅkhāñ śaśisaṃnikāśān
GE07mbh_09_u:019.010a: śrutvā ninādaṃ tv atha kauravāṇāṃ; harṣād vimuktaṃ saha śaṅkhaśabdaiḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:019.010c: senāpatiḥ pāṇḍavasṛñjayānāṃ; pāñcālaputro na mamarṣa roṣāt
GE07mbh_09_u:019.011a: tatas tu taṃ vai dviradaṃ mahātmā; pratyudyayau tvaramāṇo jayāya
GE07mbh_09_u:019.011c: jambho yathā śakrasamāgame vai; nāgendram airāvaṇam indravāhyam
GE07mbh_09_u:019.012a: tam āpatantaṃ sahasā tu dṛṣṭvā; pāñcālarājaṃ yudhi rājasiṃhaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:019.012c: taṃ vai dvipaṃ preṣayām āsa tūrṇaṃ; vadhāya rājan drupadātmajasya
GE07mbh_09_u:019.013a: sa taṃ dvipaṃ sahasābhyāpatantam; avidhyad arkapratimaiḥ pṛṣatkaiḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:019.013c: karmāradhautair niśitair jvaladbhir; nārācamukhyais tribhir ugravegaiḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:019.014a: tato 'parān pañca śitān mahātmā; nārācamukhyān visasarja kumbhe
GE07mbh_09_u:019.014c: sa tais tu viddhaḥ paramadvipo raṇe; tadā parāvṛtya bhṛśaṃ pradudruve
GE07mbh_09_u:019.015a: taṃ nāgarājaṃ sahasā praṇunnaṃ; vidrāvyamāṇaṃ ca nigṛhya śālvaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:019.015c: tottrāṅkuśaiḥ preṣayām āsa tūrṇaṃ; pāñcālarājasya rathaṃ pradiśya
GE07mbh_09_u:019.016a: dṛṣṭvāpatantaṃ sahasā tu nāgaṃ; dhṛṣṭadyumnaḥ svarathāc chīghram eva
GE07mbh_09_u:019.016c: gadāṃ pragṛhyāśu javena vīro; bhūmiṃ prapanno bhayavihvalāṅgaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:019.017a: sa taṃ rathaṃ hemavibhūṣitāṅgaṃ; sāśvaṃ sasūtaṃ sahasā vimṛdya
GE07mbh_09_u:019.017c: utkṣipya hastena tadā mahādvipo; vipothayām āsa vasuṃdharātale
GE07mbh_09_u:019.018a: pāñcālarājasya sutaṃ sa dṛṣṭvā; tadārditaṃ nāgavareṇa tena
GE07mbh_09_u:019.018c: tam abhyadhāvat sahasā javena; bhīmaḥ śikhaṇḍī ca śineś ca naptā
GE07mbh_09_u:019.019a: śaraiś ca vegaṃ sahasā nigṛhya; tasyābhito 'bhyāpatato gajasya
GE07mbh_09_u:019.019c: sa saṃgṛhīto rathibhir gajo vai; cacāla tair vāryamāṇaś ca saṃkhye
GE07mbh_09_u:019.020a: tataḥ pṛṣatkān pravavarṣa rājā; sūryo yathā raśmijālaṃ samantāt
GE07mbh_09_u:019.020c: tenāśugair vadhyamānā rathaughāḥ; pradudruvus tatra tatas tu sarve
GE07mbh_09_u:019.021a: tat karma śālvasya samīkṣya sarve; pāñcālamatsyā nṛpa sṛñjayāś ca
GE07mbh_09_u:019.021c: hāhākārair nādayantaḥ sma yuddhe; dvipaṃ samantād rurudhur narāgryāḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:019.022a: pāñcālarājas tvaritas tu śūro; gadāṃ pragṛhyācalaśṛṅgakalpām
GE07mbh_09_u:019.022c: asaṃbhramaṃ bhārata śatrughātī; javena vīro 'nusasāra nāgam
GE07mbh_09_u:019.023a: tato 'tha nāgaṃ dharaṇīdharābhaṃ; madaṃ sravantaṃ jaladaprakāśam
GE07mbh_09_u:019.023c: gadāṃ samāvidhya bhṛśaṃ jaghāna; pāñcālarājasya sutas tarasvī
GE07mbh_09_u:019.024a: sa bhinnakumbhaḥ sahasā vinadya; mukhāt prabhūtaṃ kṣatajaṃ vimuñcan
GE07mbh_09_u:019.024c: papāta nāgo dharaṇīdharābhaḥ; kṣitiprakampāc calito yathādriḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:019.025a: nipātyamāne tu tadā gajendre; hāhākṛte tava putrasya sainye
GE07mbh_09_u:019.025c: sa śālvarājasya śinipravīro; jahāra bhallena śiraḥ śitena
GE07mbh_09_u:019.026a: hṛtottamāṅgo yudhi sātvatena; papāta bhūmau saha nāgarājñā
GE07mbh_09_u:020.001a: tasmiṃs tu nihate śūre śālve samitiśobhane
GE07mbh_09_u:020.002a: tat prabhagnaṃ balaṃ dṛṣṭvā kṛtavarmā mahārathaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:020.003a: saṃnivṛttās tu te śūrā dṛṣṭvā sātvatam āhave
GE07mbh_09_u:020.003c: śailopamaṃ sthitaṃ rājan kīryamāṇaṃ śarair yudhi
GE07mbh_09_u:020.004a: tataḥ pravavṛte yuddhaṃ kurūṇāṃ pāṇḍavaiḥ saha
GE07mbh_09_u:020.005a: tatrāścaryam abhūd yuddhaṃ sātvatasya paraiḥ saha
GE07mbh_09_u:020.005c: yad eko vārayām āsa pāṇḍusenāṃ durāsadām
GE07mbh_09_u:020.009a: tam āyāntaṃ mahābāhuṃ pravapantaṃ śitāñ śarān
GE07mbh_09_u:020.010a: tau siṃhāv iva nardantau dhanvinau rathināṃ varau
GE07mbh_09_u:020.011a: pāṇḍavāḥ saha pāñcālair yodhāś cānye nṛpottamāḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:020.015c: avidhyan niśitair bāṇaiś caturbhiś caturo hayān
GE07mbh_09_u:020.016a: sa dīrghabāhuḥ saṃkruddhas tottrārdita iva dvipaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:020.017c: sātyakiṃ tribhir āhatya dhanur ekena cicchide
GE07mbh_09_u:020.018c: anyad ādatta vegena śaineyaḥ saśaraṃ dhanuḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:020.021c: jaghāna sūtam aśvāṃś ca dhvajaṃ ca kṛtavarmaṇaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:020.024a: tac chūlaṃ sātvato hy ājau nirbhidya niśitaiḥ śaraiḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:020.024c: cūrṇitaṃ pātayām āsa mohayann iva mādhavam
GE07mbh_09_u:020.031c: tāvakāḥ pradrutā rājan duryodhanam ṛte nṛpam
GE07mbh_09_u:020.032a: duryodhanas tu saṃprekṣya bhagnaṃ svabalam antikāt
GE07mbh_09_u:020.033a: pāṇḍūṃś ca sarvān saṃkruddho dhṛṣṭadyumnaṃ ca pārṣatam
GE07mbh_09_u:020.033c: śikhaṇḍinaṃ draupadeyān pāñcālānāṃ ca ye gaṇāḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:020.034a: kekayān somakāṃś caiva pāñcālāṃś caiva māriṣa
GE07mbh_09_u:020.035a: atiṣṭhad āhave yattaḥ putras tava mahābalaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:020.035c: yathā yajñe mahān agnir mantrapūtaḥ prakāśayan
GE07mbh_09_u:020.036a: taṃ pare nābhyavartanta martyā mṛtyum ivāhave
GE07mbh_09_u:021.001a: putras tu te mahārāja rathastho rathināṃ varaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:021.001b-0117_01: durdharaḥ sa pumān kaś cit pāṇḍavān prati bhārata
GE07mbh_09_u:021.001c: durutsaho babhau yuddhe yathā rudraḥ pratāpavān
GE07mbh_09_u:021.002a: tasya bāṇasahasrais tu pracchannā hy abhavan mahī
GE07mbh_09_u:021.002c: parāṃś ca siṣice bāṇair dhārābhir iva parvatān
GE07mbh_09_u:021.003a: na ca so 'sti pumān kaś cit pāṇḍavānāṃ mahāhave
GE07mbh_09_u:021.003c: hayo gajo ratho vāpi yo 'sya bāṇair avikṣataḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:021.004a: yaṃ yaṃ hi samare yodhaṃ prapaśyāmi viśāṃ pate
GE07mbh_09_u:021.004c: sa sa bāṇaiś cito 'bhūd vai putreṇa tava bhārata
GE07mbh_09_u:021.007c: eko duryodhano hy āsīt pumān iti matir mama
GE07mbh_09_u:021.008c: yad ekaṃ sahitāḥ pārthā nātyavartanta bhārata
GE07mbh_09_u:021.009c: bhīmasenaṃ ca saptatyā sahadevaṃ ca saptabhiḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:021.010a: nakulaṃ ca catuḥṣaṣṭyā dhṛṣṭadyumnaṃ ca pañcabhiḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:021.010c: saptabhir draupadeyāṃś ca tribhir vivyādha sātyakim
GE07mbh_09_u:021.011a: tad apāsya dhanuś chinnaṃ mādrīputraḥ pratāpavān
GE07mbh_09_u:021.011e: tato duryodhanaṃ saṃkhye vivyādha daśabhiḥ śaraiḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:021.012a: nakulaś ca tato vīro rājānaṃ navabhiḥ śaraiḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:021.012c: ghorarūpair maheṣvāso vivyādha ca nanāda ca
GE07mbh_09_u:021.013e: aśītyā bhīmasenaś ca śarai rājānam ārdayat
GE07mbh_09_u:021.015a: lāghavaṃ sauṣṭhavaṃ cāpi vīryaṃ caiva mahātmanaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:021.016a: dhārtarāṣṭrās tu rājendra yātvā tu svalpam antaram
GE07mbh_09_u:021.017c: kṣubdhasya hi samudrasya prāvṛṭkāle yathā niśi
GE07mbh_09_u:021.018a: samāsādya raṇe te tu rājānam aparājitam
GE07mbh_09_u:021.019e: nājñāyanta raṇe vīrā na diśaḥ pradiśas tathā
GE07mbh_09_u:021.020a: tāv ubhau krūrakarmāṇāv ubhau bhārata duḥsahau
GE07mbh_09_u:021.021a: śakunis tu raṇe vīro yudhiṣṭhiram apīḍayat
GE07mbh_09_u:021.021c: tasyāśvāṃś caturo hatvā subalasya suto vibhuḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:021.021d-0118_01: yantreṇa hanyamānau tu rathāṅgāv api cicchide
GE07mbh_09_u:021.021d-0118_02: maṇḍalāgraṃ dhanuś cāpi niśitāṃs tomarān api
GE07mbh_09_u:021.021d-0118_04: svarṇadaṇḍāṃ ca śaktiṃ ca bhiṇḍipālān parasvadhān
GE07mbh_09_u:021.023c: śakuniṃ navabhir viddhvā punar vivyādha pañcabhiḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:021.024a: tad yuddham abhavac citraṃ ghorarūpaṃ ca māriṣa
GE07mbh_09_u:021.026a: tathaiva nakulaḥ śūraḥ saubalasya sutaṃ raṇe
GE07mbh_09_u:021.027a: tau tatra samare vīrau kulaputrau mahārathau
GE07mbh_09_u:021.028c: yodhayañ śuśubhe rājan balaṃ śakra ivāhave
GE07mbh_09_u:021.029b-0119_01: pañcabhir niśitais tīkṣṇaiḥ śarair vivyādha marṣayan
GE07mbh_09_u:021.031a: tayor yuddhaṃ mahac cāsīt saṃgrāme bharatarṣabha
GE07mbh_09_u:021.032a: gautamas tu raṇe kruddho draupadeyān mahābalān
GE07mbh_09_u:021.033a: tasya tair abhavad yuddham indriyair iva dehinaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:021.034a: te ca taṃ pīḍayām āsur indriyāṇīva bāliśam
GE07mbh_09_u:021.034c: sa ca tān pratisaṃrabdhaḥ pratyayodhayad āhave
GE07mbh_09_u:021.035a: evaṃ citram abhūd yuddhaṃ tasya taiḥ saha bhārata
GE07mbh_09_u:021.035c: utthāyotthāya hi yathā dehinām indriyair vibho
GE07mbh_09_u:021.036a: narāś caiva naraiḥ sārdhaṃ dantino dantibhis tathā
GE07mbh_09_u:021.036c: hayā hayaiḥ samāsaktā rathino rathibhis tathā
GE07mbh_09_u:021.036e: saṃkulaṃ cābhavad bhūyo ghorarūpaṃ viśāṃ pate
GE07mbh_09_u:021.037a: idaṃ citram idaṃ ghoram idaṃ raudram iti prabho
GE07mbh_09_u:021.037c: yuddhāny āsan mahārāja ghorāṇi ca bahūni ca
GE07mbh_09_u:021.038c: vivyadhuś caiva jaghnuś ca samāsādya mahāhave
GE07mbh_09_u:021.041c: saṃchāditābhavad bhūmis te ca śūrā mahārathāḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:021.042e: upāśāmyat tatas tīvraṃ tad rajo ghoradarśanam
GE07mbh_09_u:021.044a: śabdaḥ sutumulaḥ saṃkhye śarāṇāṃ patatām abhūt
GE07mbh_09_u:022.001c: abhajyata balaṃ tatra tava putrasya pāṇḍavaiḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:022.002a: tāṃs tu yatnena mahatā saṃnivārya mahārathān
GE07mbh_09_u:022.002c: putras te yodhayām āsa pāṇḍavānām anīkinīm
GE07mbh_09_u:022.003c: saṃnivṛtteṣu teṣv evaṃ yuddham āsīt sudāruṇam
GE07mbh_09_u:022.004c: pareṣāṃ tava sainye ca nāsīt kaś cit parāṅmukhaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:022.005c: teṣāṃ kṣayo mahān āsīd yudhyatām itaretaram
GE07mbh_09_u:022.006a: tato yudhiṣṭhiro rājā krodhena mahatā yutaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:022.009a: tato duryodhano rājā rathān saptaśatān raṇe
GE07mbh_09_u:022.011c: adṛśyaṃ sāyakaiś cakrur meghā iva divākaram
GE07mbh_09_u:022.011d-0121_01: te dṛṣṭvā dharmarājānaṃ kauravais taṃ tathākṛtam
GE07mbh_09_u:022.015a: tatra yuddhaṃ mahac cāsīt tava putrasya pāṇḍavaiḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:022.015c: na ca nas tādṛśaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ naiva cāpi pariśrutam
GE07mbh_09_u:022.017a: ninadatsu ca yodheṣu śaṅkhavaryaiś ca pūritaiḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:022.017c: utkṛṣṭaiḥ siṃhanādaiś ca garjitena ca dhanvinām
GE07mbh_09_u:022.021c: ulkāḥ petur divo bhūmāv āhatya ravimaṇḍalam
GE07mbh_09_u:022.022c: aśrūṇi mumucur nāgā vepathuś cāspṛśad bhṛśam
GE07mbh_09_u:022.023c: punar yuddhāya saṃmantrya kṣatriyās tasthur avyathāḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:022.024b-0124_01: śakuniḥ paramayā śaktyā pāṇḍavaṃ balam ādravat
GE07mbh_09_u:022.024c: yudhyadhvam agrato yāvat pṛṣṭhato hanmi pāṇḍavān
GE07mbh_09_u:022.024d-0125_01: te yāvat pṛṣṭhato hanti pāṇḍavān raṇadurmadān
GE07mbh_09_u:022.026a: asmāṃs tu punar āsādya labdhalakṣā durāsadāḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:022.027a: tato hataṃ parais tatra madrarājabalaṃ tadā
GE07mbh_09_u:022.028a: gāndhārarājas tu punar vākyam āha tato balī
GE07mbh_09_u:022.028c: nivartadhvam adharmajñā yudhyadhvaṃ kiṃ sṛtena vaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:022.028d-0126_03: evam uktvā jagāmāśu śakunis tāṃ punaḥ punaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:022.031a: tad abhram iva vātena kṣipyamāṇaṃ samantataḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:022.032a: tato yudhiṣṭhiraḥ prekṣya bhagnaṃ svabalam antikāt
GE07mbh_09_u:022.033a: asau subalaputro no jaghanaṃ pīḍya daṃśitaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:022.033c: senāṃ nisūdayanty eṣa paśya pāṇḍava durmatim
GE07mbh_09_u:022.034a: gaccha tvaṃ draupadeyāś ca śakuniṃ saubalaṃ jahi
GE07mbh_09_u:022.035a: gacchantu kuñjarāḥ sarve vājinaś ca saha tvayā
GE07mbh_09_u:022.035c: pādātāś ca trisāhasrāḥ śakuniṃ saubalaṃ jahi
GE07mbh_09_u:022.035d-0127_03: na ca śāsanakartānyas tvattas tiṣṭhati kaś cana
GE07mbh_09_u:022.037a: pādātāś ca trisāhasrā draupadeyāś ca sarvaśaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:022.037c: raṇe hy abhyadravaṃs te tu śakuniṃ yuddhadurmadam
GE07mbh_09_u:022.038a: tatas tu saubalo rājann abhyatikramya pāṇḍavān
GE07mbh_09_u:022.040a: te tatra sādinaḥ śūrāḥ saubalasya mahad balam
GE07mbh_09_u:022.041c: prāvartata mahad yuddhaṃ rājan durmantrite tava
GE07mbh_09_u:022.042c: na hi sveṣāṃ pareṣāṃ vā viśeṣaḥ pratyadṛśyata
GE07mbh_09_u:022.044a: ṛṣṭibhir vimalābhiś ca tatra tatra viśāṃ pate
GE07mbh_09_u:022.045a: prāsānāṃ patatāṃ rājan rūpam āsīt samantataḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:022.047c: avikṣatāḥ sma dṛśyante vamanto rudhiraṃ mukhaiḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:022.048a: tato 'bhavat tamo ghoraṃ sainyena rajasā vṛte
GE07mbh_09_u:022.048e: aśvān rājan manuṣyāṃś ca rajasā saṃvṛte sati
GE07mbh_09_u:022.049a: bhūmau nipatitāś cānye vamanto rudhiraṃ bahu
GE07mbh_09_u:022.053a: dūraṃ na śakyaṃ tatrāsīd gantum aśvena kena cit
GE07mbh_09_u:022.055a: sa muhūrtaṃ tato yuddhvā saubalo 'tha viśāṃ pate
GE07mbh_09_u:022.055c: ṣaṭsahasrair hayaiḥ śiṣṭair apāyāc chakunis tataḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:022.058a: neha śakyaṃ rathair yoddhuṃ kuta eva mahāgajaiḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:022.058c: rathān eva rathā yāntu kuñjarāḥ kuñjarān api
GE07mbh_09_u:022.059a: pratiyāto hi śakuniḥ svam anīkam avasthitaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:022.059c: na punaḥ saubalo rājā yuddham abhyāgamiṣyati
GE07mbh_09_u:022.060a: tatas tu draupadeyāś ca te ca mattā mahādvipāḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:022.061c: ekākī prayayau tatra yatra rājā yudhiṣṭhiraḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:022.062a: tatas teṣu prayāteṣu śakuniḥ saubalaḥ punaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:022.063a: tat punas tumulaṃ yuddhaṃ prāṇāṃs tyaktvābhyavartata
