GE07mbh_09_u:022.064a: te hy anyonyam avekṣanta tasmin vīrasamāgame
GE07mbh_09_u:022.066c: sāyudhānāṃ ca bāhūnām urūṇāṃ ca viśāṃ pate
GE07mbh_09_u:022.067a: nighnanto niśitaiḥ śastrair bhrātṝn putrān sakhīn api
GE07mbh_09_u:022.068c: ahaṃ pūrvam ahaṃ pūrvam iti nyaghnan sahasraśaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:022.070c: stanatāṃ ca manuṣyāṇāṃ saṃnaddhānāṃ viśāṃ pate
GE07mbh_09_u:022.072c: vikṣatāś ca śitaiḥ śastrair abhyavartanta tāvakāḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:022.073c: jaghnuḥ parān svakāṃś caiva prāptān prāptān anantarān
GE07mbh_09_u:022.075c: āsīd balakṣayo ghoras tava putrasya paśyataḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:022.077a: asibhiḥ paṭṭiśaiḥ śūlais takṣamāṇāḥ punaḥ punaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:022.078c: yodhāḥ paripatanti sma vamanto rudhiraṃ vraṇaiḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:022.081a: mandībhūte tataḥ śabde pāṇḍavānāṃ mahad balam
GE07mbh_09_u:022.082c: padātayaś ca nāgāś ca sādinaś codyatāyudhāḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:022.083a: koṣṭakīkṛtya cāpy enaṃ parikṣipya ca sarvaśaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:022.083d-0131_01: drāvyamāṇaṃ balaṃ dṛṣṭvā tava putrasya paśyataḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:022.084a: tvadīyās tāṃs tu saṃprekṣya sarvataḥ samabhidrutān
GE07mbh_09_u:022.085a: ke cit padātayaḥ padbhir muṣṭibhiś ca parasparam
GE07mbh_09_u:022.086c: vimānebhya iva bhraṣṭāḥ siddhāḥ puṇyakṣayād yathā
GE07mbh_09_u:022.087a: evam anyonyam āyastā yodhā jaghnur mahāmṛdhe
GE07mbh_09_u:022.087c: pitṝn bhrātṝn vayasyāṃś ca putrān api tathāpare
GE07mbh_09_u:023.001a: tasmiñ śabde mṛdau jāte pāṇḍavair nihate bale
GE07mbh_09_u:023.002a: sa yātvā vāhinīṃ tūrṇam abravīt tvarayan yudhi
GE07mbh_09_u:023.002c: yudhyadhvam iti saṃhṛṣṭāḥ punaḥ punar ariṃdamaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:023.002e: apṛcchat kṣatriyāṃs tatra kva nu rājā mahārathaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:023.003a: śakunes tu vacaḥ śrutvā ta ūcur bharatarṣabha
GE07mbh_09_u:023.005c: tatra gaccha drutaṃ rājaṃs tato drakṣyasi kauravam
GE07mbh_09_u:023.006a: evam uktas tu taiḥ śūraiḥ śakuniḥ saubalas tadā
GE07mbh_09_u:023.006c: prayayau tatra yatrāsau putras tava narādhipa
GE07mbh_09_u:023.007c: sarathāṃs tāvakān sarvān harṣayañ śakunis tataḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:023.008a: duryodhanam idaṃ vākyaṃ hṛṣṭarūpo viśāṃ pate
GE07mbh_09_u:023.009a: jahi rājan rathānīkam aśvāḥ sarve jitā mayā
GE07mbh_09_u:023.009c: nātyaktvā jīvitaṃ saṃkhye śakyo jetuṃ yudhiṣṭhiraḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:023.010c: gajān etān haniṣyāmaḥ padātīṃś cetarāṃs tathā
GE07mbh_09_u:023.011a: śrutvā tu vacanaṃ tasya tāvakā jayagṛddhinaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:023.013a: tato jyātalanirghoṣaḥ punar āsīd viśāṃ pate
GE07mbh_09_u:023.015c: antam adya gamiṣyāmi śatrūṇāṃ niśitaiḥ śaraiḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:023.017a: anantakalpā dhvajinī bhūtvā hy eṣāṃ mahātmanām
GE07mbh_09_u:023.017c: kṣayam adya gatā yuddhe paśya daivaṃ yathāvidham
GE07mbh_09_u:023.019a: hate bhīṣme ca saṃdadhyāc chivaṃ syād iha mādhava
GE07mbh_09_u:023.019c: na ca tat kṛtavān mūḍho dhārtarāṣṭraḥ subāliśaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:023.020a: uktaṃ bhīṣmeṇa yad vākyaṃ hitaṃ pathyaṃ ca mādhava
GE07mbh_09_u:023.020c: tac cāpi nāsau kṛtavān vītabuddhiḥ suyodhanaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:023.021a: tasmiṃs tu patite bhīṣme pracyute pṛthivītale
GE07mbh_09_u:023.021c: na jāne kāraṇaṃ kiṃ nu yena yuddham avartata
GE07mbh_09_u:023.021d-0132_01: hate droṇe ca karṇe ca bhūriśravasi saṃgare
GE07mbh_09_u:023.021d-0132_02: duḥśāsane ca śālve ca śalye ca saparicchade
GE07mbh_09_u:023.021d-0132_03: bhagadatte ca vīrendre naivāśāmyata hā raṇaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:023.021d-0132_04: yena bhīṣmas tathā droṇaḥ kṛpo vidura eva ca
GE07mbh_09_u:023.021d-0132_05: pitā mātā śamasyārthe pratyākhyātās tu pāpinā
GE07mbh_09_u:023.022a: mūḍhāṃs tu sarvathā manye dhārtarāṣṭrān subāliśān
GE07mbh_09_u:023.022c: patite śaṃtanoḥ putre ye 'kārṣuḥ saṃyugaṃ punaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:023.023a: anantaraṃ ca nihate droṇe brahmavidāṃ vare
GE07mbh_09_u:023.023c: rādheye ca vikarṇe ca naivāśāmyata vaiśasam
GE07mbh_09_u:023.023d-0133_01: rādheye sūtaputre ca naiva śāmyati vaiśasam
GE07mbh_09_u:023.025a: śrutāyuṣi hate śūre jalasaṃdhe ca paurave
GE07mbh_09_u:023.026a: bhūriśravasi śalye ca śālve caiva janārdana
GE07mbh_09_u:023.027a: jayadrathe ca nihate rākṣase cāpy alāyudhe
GE07mbh_09_u:023.028a: bhagadatte hate śūre kāmboje ca sudakṣiṇe
GE07mbh_09_u:023.029a: dṛṣṭvā ca nihatāñ śūrān pṛthaṅ māṇḍalikān nṛpān
GE07mbh_09_u:023.029c: balinaś ca raṇe kṛṣṇa naivāśāmyata vaiśasam
GE07mbh_09_u:023.030c: mohād vā yadi vā lobhān naivāśāmyata vaiśasam
GE07mbh_09_u:023.030d-0135_01: hatapravīrāṃ vidhvastāṃ dṛṣṭvā cemāṃ camūṃ raṇe
GE07mbh_09_u:023.030d-0135_02: alambuse ca nihate naiva śāmyati vaiśasam
GE07mbh_09_u:023.030d-0135_03: bhrātṝn vinihatān dṛṣṭvā vayasyān mātulān api
GE07mbh_09_u:023.030d-0135_04: putrān vinihatān saṃkhye naiva śāmyati vaiśasam
GE07mbh_09_u:023.031a: ko nu rājakule jātaḥ kauraveyo viśeṣataḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:023.031c: nirarthakaṃ mahad vairaṃ kuryād anyaḥ suyodhanāt
GE07mbh_09_u:023.032c: amūḍhaḥ ko nu yudhyeta jānan prājño hitāhitam
GE07mbh_09_u:023.033a: yan na tasya mano hy āsīt tvayoktasya hitaṃ vacaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:023.033c: praśame pāṇḍavaiḥ sārdhaṃ so 'nyasya śṛṇuyāt katham
GE07mbh_09_u:023.034a: yena śāṃtanavo bhīṣmo droṇo vidura eva ca
GE07mbh_09_u:023.034c: pratyākhyātāḥ śamasyārthe kiṃ nu tasyādya bheṣajam
GE07mbh_09_u:023.035a: maurkhyād yena pitā vṛddhaḥ pratyākhyāto janārdana
GE07mbh_09_u:023.035c: tathā mātā hitaṃ vākyaṃ bhāṣamāṇā hitaiṣiṇī
GE07mbh_09_u:023.035e: pratyākhyātā hy asatkṛtya sa kasmai rocayed vacaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:023.036c: tathāsya dṛśyate ceṣṭā nītiś caiva viśāṃ pate
GE07mbh_09_u:023.036e: naiṣa dāsyati no rājyam iti me matir acyuta
GE07mbh_09_u:023.037c: na jīvan dāsyate bhāgaṃ dhārtarāṣṭraḥ kathaṃ cana
GE07mbh_09_u:023.039a: na sa yukto 'nyathā jetum ṛte yuddhena mādhava
GE07mbh_09_u:023.039c: ity abravīt sadā māṃ hi viduraḥ satyadarśanaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:023.040a: tat sarvam adya jānāmi vyavasāyaṃ durātmanaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:023.040c: yad uktaṃ vacanaṃ tena vidureṇa mahātmanā
GE07mbh_09_u:023.041a: yo hi śrutvā vacaḥ pathyaṃ jāmadagnyād yathātatham
GE07mbh_09_u:023.042a: uktaṃ hi bahubhiḥ siddhair jātamātre suyodhane
GE07mbh_09_u:023.042c: enaṃ prāpya durātmānaṃ kṣayaṃ kṣatraṃ gamiṣyati
GE07mbh_09_u:023.043a: tad idaṃ vacanaṃ teṣāṃ niruktaṃ vai janārdana
GE07mbh_09_u:023.043c: kṣayaṃ yātā hi rājāno duryodhanakṛte bhṛśam
GE07mbh_09_u:023.044a: so 'dya sarvān raṇe yodhān nihaniṣyāmi mādhava
GE07mbh_09_u:023.044c: kṣatriyeṣu hateṣv āśu śūnye ca śibire kṛte
GE07mbh_09_u:023.045c: tad antaṃ hi bhaved vairam anumānena mādhava
GE07mbh_09_u:023.046a: evaṃ paśyāmi vārṣṇeya cintayan prajñayā svayā
GE07mbh_09_u:023.046c: vidurasya ca vākyena ceṣṭayā ca durātmanaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:023.047a: saṃyāhi bhāratīṃ vīra yāvad dhanmi śitaiḥ śaraiḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:023.049c: tad balaugham amitrāṇām abhītaḥ prāviśad raṇe
GE07mbh_09_u:023.052a: te hayāḥ pāṇḍurā rājan vahanto 'rjunam āhave
GE07mbh_09_u:023.056a: narān nāgān samāhatya hayāṃś cāpi viśāṃ pate
GE07mbh_09_u:023.056c: apatanta raṇe bāṇāḥ pataṃgā iva ghoṣiṇaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:023.057c: na prājñāyanta samare diśo vā pradiśo 'pi vā
GE07mbh_09_u:023.058a: sarvam āsīj jagat pūrṇaṃ pārthanāmāṅkitaiḥ śaraiḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:023.060c: dadāha samare yodhān kakṣam agnir iva jvalan
GE07mbh_09_u:023.061a: yathā vanānte vanapair visṛṣṭaḥ; kakṣaṃ dahet kṛṣṇagatiḥ saghoṣaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:023.061c: bhūridrumaṃ śuṣkalatāvitānaṃ; bhṛśaṃ samṛddho jvalanaḥ pratāpī
GE07mbh_09_u:023.062c: dadāha sarvāṃ tava putrasenām; amṛṣyamāṇas tarasā tarasvī
GE07mbh_09_u:023.063a: tasyeṣavaḥ prāṇaharāḥ sumuktā; nāsajjan vai varmasu rukmapuṅkhāḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:023.063c: na ca dvitīyaṃ pramumoca bāṇaṃ; nare haye vā paramadvipe vā
GE07mbh_09_u:023.064c: sa eva ekas tava putrasenāṃ; jaghāna daityān iva vajrapāṇiḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:024.002c: visṛjan dṛśyate bāṇān dhārā muñcann ivāmbudaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:024.003d-0138_01: pitṝn bhrātṝn parityajya vayasyān api cāpare
GE07mbh_09_u:024.004a: hatadhuryā rathāḥ ke cid dhatasūtās tathāpare
GE07mbh_09_u:024.004c: bhagnākṣayugacakreṣāḥ ke cid āsan viśāṃ pate
GE07mbh_09_u:024.005c: akṣatā yugapat ke cit prādravan bhayapīḍitāḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:024.006c: vicukruśuḥ pitṝn anye sahāyān apare punaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:024.007a: bāndhavāṃś ca naravyāghra bhrātṝn saṃbandhinas tathā
GE07mbh_09_u:024.007c: dudruvuḥ ke cid utsṛjya tatra tatra viśāṃ pate
GE07mbh_09_u:024.009a: tān anye ratham āropya samāśvāsya muhūrtakam
GE07mbh_09_u:024.009c: viśrāntāś ca vitṛṣṇāś ca punar yuddhāya jagmire
GE07mbh_09_u:024.010a: tān apāsya gatāḥ ke cit punar eva yuyutsavaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:024.011a: pānīyam apare pītvā paryāśvāsya ca vāhanam
GE07mbh_09_u:024.011c: varmāṇi ca samāropya ke cid bharatasattama
GE07mbh_09_u:024.012c: putrān anye pitṝn anye punar yuddham arocayan
GE07mbh_09_u:024.013a: sajjayitvā rathān ke cid yathāmukhyaṃ viśāṃ pate
GE07mbh_09_u:024.015a: āgamya sahasā ke cid rathaiḥ svarṇavibhūṣitaiḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:024.017a: pāñcālyas tu tataḥ kruddhaḥ sainyena mahatā vṛtaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:024.018a: tatas tv āpatatas tasya tava putro janādhipa
GE07mbh_09_u:024.018c: bāṇasaṃghān anekān vai preṣayām āsa bhārata
GE07mbh_09_u:024.019a: dhṛṣṭadyumnas tato rājaṃs tava putreṇa dhanvinā
GE07mbh_09_u:024.019c: nārācair bahubhiḥ kṣipraṃ bāhvor urasi cārpitaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:024.020c: tasyāśvāṃś caturo bāṇaiḥ preṣayām āsa mṛtyave
GE07mbh_09_u:024.020e: sāratheś cāsya bhallena śiraḥ kāyād apāharat
GE07mbh_09_u:024.021a: tato duryodhano rājā pṛṣṭham āruhya vājinaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:024.022a: dṛṣṭvā tu hatavikrāntaṃ svam anīkaṃ mahābalaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:024.022c: tava putro mahārāja prayayau yatra saubalaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:024.024a: te vṛtāḥ samare pañca gajānīkena bhārata
GE07mbh_09_u:024.024c: aśobhanta naravyāghrā grahā vyāptā ghanair iva
GE07mbh_09_u:024.028a: bhīmasenas tu tān dṛṣṭvā nāgān mattagajopamaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:024.028c: kareṇa gṛhya mahatīṃ gadām abhyapatad balī
GE07mbh_09_u:024.029e: āvignaṃ ca balaṃ sarvaṃ gadāhaste vṛkodare
GE07mbh_09_u:024.032a: tān bhinnakumbhān subahūn dravamāṇān itas tataḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:024.032c: patamānāṃś ca saṃprekṣya vitresus tava sainikāḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:024.033c: gṛdhrapakṣaiḥ śitair bāṇair jaghnur vai gajayodhinaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:024.035a: dṛṣṭvā ca pāṇḍavān sarvān kuñjaraiḥ parivāritān
GE07mbh_09_u:024.036c: aśvatthāmā kṛpaś caiva kṛtavarmā ca sātvataḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:024.036e: apṛcchan kṣatriyāṃs tatra kva nu duryodhano gataḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:024.037c: manvānā nihataṃ tatra tava putraṃ mahārathāḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:024.038a: āhuḥ ke cid dhate sūte prayāto yatra saubalaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:024.038c: apare tv abruvaṃs tatra kṣatriyā bhṛśavikṣatāḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:024.039a: duryodhanena kiṃ kāryaṃ drakṣyadhvaṃ yadi jīvati
GE07mbh_09_u:024.039c: yudhyadhvaṃ sahitāḥ sarve kiṃ vo rājā kariṣyati
GE07mbh_09_u:024.039d-0144_01: tatas te kṣatriyāḥ sarve svadharmeṣu vyavasthitāḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:024.041a: idaṃ sarvaṃ balaṃ hanmo yena sma parivāritāḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:024.041c: ete sarve gajān hatvā upayānti sma pāṇḍavāḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:024.042a: śrutvā tu vacanaṃ teṣām aśvatthāmā mahābalaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:024.043a: kṛpaś ca kṛtavarmā ca prayayur yatra saubalaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:024.044c: āyayuḥ pāṇḍavā rājan vinighnantaḥ sma tāvakān
GE07mbh_09_u:024.045a: dṛṣṭvā tu tān āpatataḥ saṃprahṛṣṭān mahārathān
GE07mbh_09_u:024.045c: parākrāntāṃs tato vīrān nirāśāñ jīvite tadā
GE07mbh_09_u:024.046c: rājan balena dvyaṅgena tyaktvā jīvitam ātmanaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:024.047c: tasmin deśe vyavasthāpya yatra śāradvataḥ sthitaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:024.048c: dhṛṣṭadyumnaṃ mahānīkaṃ tatra no 'bhūd raṇo mahān
GE07mbh_09_u:024.048e: jitās tena vayaṃ sarve vyapayāma raṇāt tataḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:024.049c: rathaiś catuḥśatair vīro māṃ cābhyadravad āhave
GE07mbh_09_u:024.050a: dhṛṣṭadyumnād ahaṃ muktaḥ kathaṃ cic chrāntavāhanaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:024.050e: tatra yuddham abhūd ghoraṃ muhūrtam atidāruṇam
GE07mbh_09_u:024.051a: sātyakis tu mahābāhur mama hatvā paricchadam
GE07mbh_09_u:024.051c: jīvagrāham agṛhṇān māṃ mūrchitaṃ patitaṃ bhuvi
GE07mbh_09_u:024.051d-0145_01: sarve jayāya dhāvanti mayā labdho 'dya saṃjayaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:024.051d-0145_02: iti bruvāṇaḥ śaineyo rājan mām agrahīt tadā
GE07mbh_09_u:024.052a: tato muhūrtād iva tad gajānīkam avadhyata
GE07mbh_09_u:024.055a: aśvatthāmā kṛpaś caiva kṛtavarmā ca sātvataḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:024.055e: rājānaṃ mṛgayām āsus tava putraṃ mahāratham
GE07mbh_09_u:024.056a: parityajya ca pāñcālaṃ prayātā yatra saubalaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:025.002a: carantaṃ ca tathā dṛṣṭvā bhīmasenam ariṃdamam
GE07mbh_09_u:025.003a: sametya samare rājan hataśeṣāḥ sutās tava
GE07mbh_09_u:025.004c: ity ete sahitā bhūtvā tava putrāḥ samantataḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:025.005a: tato bhīmo mahārāja svarathaṃ punar āsthitaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:025.005c: mumoca niśitān bāṇān putrāṇāṃ tava marmasu
GE07mbh_09_u:025.006a: te kīryamāṇā bhīmena putrās tava mahāraṇe
GE07mbh_09_u:025.007a: tataḥ kruddho raṇe bhīmaḥ śiro durmarṣaṇasya ha
GE07mbh_09_u:025.008c: śrutāntam avadhīd bhīmas tava putraṃ mahārathaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:025.009a: jayatsenaṃ tato viddhvā nārācena hasann iva
GE07mbh_09_u:025.009e: sa papāta rathād rājan bhūmau tūrṇaṃ mamāra ca
GE07mbh_09_u:025.010a: śrutarvā tu tato bhīmaṃ kruddho vivyādha māriṣa
GE07mbh_09_u:025.011a: tataḥ kruddho raṇe bhīmo jaitraṃ bhūribalaṃ ravim
GE07mbh_09_u:025.011c: trīn etāṃs tribhir ānarchad viṣāgnipratimaiḥ śaraiḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:025.012a: te hatā nyapatan bhūmau syandanebhyo mahārathāḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:025.014a: sa hataḥ prāpatad bhūmau svarathād rathināṃ varaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:025.014c: gires tu kūṭajo bhagno māruteneva pādapaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:025.015a: duṣpradharṣaṃ tataś caiva sujātaṃ ca sutau tava
GE07mbh_09_u:025.015c: ekaikaṃ nyavadhīt saṃkhye dvābhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ camūmukhe
GE07mbh_09_u:025.016a: tato yatantam aparam abhivīkṣya sutaṃ tava
GE07mbh_09_u:025.016c: bhallena yudhi vivyādha bhīmo durviṣahaṃ raṇe
GE07mbh_09_u:025.016e: sa papāta hato vāhāt paśyatāṃ sarvadhanvinām
GE07mbh_09_u:025.017a: dṛṣṭvā tu nihatān bhrātṝn bahūn ekena saṃyuge
GE07mbh_09_u:025.019a: sa tu rājan dhanuś chittvā pāṇḍavasya mahāmṛdhe
GE07mbh_09_u:025.020c: avākirat tava sutaṃ tiṣṭha tiṣṭheti cābravīt
GE07mbh_09_u:025.021a: mahad āsīt tayor yuddhaṃ citrarūpaṃ bhayānakam
GE07mbh_09_u:025.022a: tayos tatra śarair muktair yamadaṇḍanibhaiḥ śubhaiḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:025.022c: samācchannā dharā sarvā khaṃ ca sarvā diśas tathā
GE07mbh_09_u:025.023a: tataḥ śrutarvā saṃkruddho dhanur āyamya sāyakaiḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:025.023c: bhīmasenaṃ raṇe rājan bāhvor urasi cārpayat
GE07mbh_09_u:025.025a: tato bhīmo ruṣāviṣṭaḥ putrasya tava māriṣa
GE07mbh_09_u:025.025c: sārathiṃ caturaś cāśvān bāṇair ninye yamakṣayam
GE07mbh_09_u:025.027e: kṣurapreṇa śiraḥ kāyāt pātayām āsa pāṇḍavaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:025.028c: papāta kāyaḥ sa rathād vasudhām anunādayan
GE07mbh_09_u:025.030e: te tu taṃ vai samāsādya parivavruḥ samantataḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:025.031a: tatas tu saṃvṛto bhīmas tāvakair niśitaiḥ śaraiḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:025.031c: pīḍayām āsa tān sarvān sahasrākṣa ivāsurān
GE07mbh_09_u:025.033c: vājināṃ ca śatāny aṣṭau pāṇḍavaḥ sma virājate
GE07mbh_09_u:025.034a: bhīmasenas tu kaunteyo hatvā yuddhe sutāṃs tava
GE07mbh_09_u:025.034c: mene kṛtārtham ātmānaṃ saphalaṃ janma ca prabho
GE07mbh_09_u:025.035a: taṃ tathā yudhyamānaṃ ca vinighnantaṃ ca tāvakān
GE07mbh_09_u:025.035c: īkṣituṃ notsahante sma tava sainyāni bhārata
GE07mbh_09_u:025.036a: vidrāvya tu kurūn sarvāṃs tāṃś ca hatvā padānugān
GE07mbh_09_u:025.036c: dorbhyāṃ śabdaṃ tataś cakre trāsayāno mahādvipān
GE07mbh_09_u:025.037a: hatabhūyiṣṭhayodhā tu tava senā viśāṃ pate
GE07mbh_09_u:026.001a: duryodhano mahārāja sudarśaś cāpi te sutaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:026.004a: pariśrāntaś ca nakulaḥ sahadevaś ca bhārata
GE07mbh_09_u:026.005c: kṛpaś ca kṛtavarmā ca drauṇiś caiva mahārathaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:026.006a: asau tiṣṭhati pāñcālyaḥ śriyā paramayā yutaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:026.008c: enaṃ hatvā śitair bāṇaiḥ kṛtakṛtyo bhaviṣyasi
GE07mbh_09_u:026.009a: gajānīkaṃ hataṃ dṛṣṭvā tvāṃ ca prāptam ariṃdama
GE07mbh_09_u:026.009c: yāvan na vidravanty ete tāvaj jahi suyodhanam
GE07mbh_09_u:026.010a: yātu kaś cit tu pāñcālyaṃ kṣipram āgamyatām iti
GE07mbh_09_u:026.011a: tava hatvā balaṃ sarvaṃ saṃgrāme dhṛtarāṣṭrajaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:026.011c: jitān pāṇḍusutān matvā rūpaṃ dhārayate mahat
GE07mbh_09_u:026.011d-0153_01: yathā daityacamūṃ hatvā purā śakro mahābalaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:026.012a: nihataṃ svabalaṃ dṛṣṭvā pīḍitaṃ cāpi pāṇḍavaiḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:026.013a: evam uktaḥ phalgunas tu kṛṣṇaṃ vacanam abravīt
GE07mbh_09_u:026.013e: yāv etāv āsthitau kṛṣṇa tāv adya na bhaviṣyataḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:026.014a: hato bhīṣmo hato droṇaḥ karṇo vaikartano hataḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:026.014c: madrarājo hataḥ śalyo hataḥ kṛṣṇa jayadrathaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:026.015a: hayāḥ pañcaśatāḥ śiṣṭāḥ śakuneḥ saubalasya ca
GE07mbh_09_u:026.015c: rathānāṃ tu śate śiṣṭe dve eva tu janārdana
GE07mbh_09_u:026.015e: dantināṃ ca śataṃ sāgraṃ trisāhasrāḥ padātayaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:026.016c: ulūkaḥ śakuniś caiva kṛtavarmā ca sātvataḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:026.017a: etad balam abhūc cheṣaṃ dhārtarāṣṭrasya mādhava
GE07mbh_09_u:026.017c: mokṣo na nūnaṃ kālād dhi vidyate bhuvi kasya cit
GE07mbh_09_u:026.018a: tathā vinihate sainye paśya duryodhanaṃ sthitam
GE07mbh_09_u:026.019a: na hi me mokṣyate kaś cit pareṣām iti cintaye
GE07mbh_09_u:026.019c: ye tv adya samaraṃ kṛṣṇa na hāsyanti raṇotkaṭāḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:026.019e: tān vai sarvān haniṣyāmi yady api syur amānuṣāḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:026.020a: adya yuddhe susaṃkruddho dīrghaṃ rājñaḥ prajāgaram
GE07mbh_09_u:026.021a: nikṛtyā vai durācāro yāni ratnāni saubalaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:026.021c: sabhāyām aharad dyūte punas tāny āharāmy aham
GE07mbh_09_u:026.022a: adya tā api vetsyanti sarvā nāgapurastriyaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:026.022c: śrutvā patīṃś ca putrāṃś ca pāṇḍavair nihatān yudhi
GE07mbh_09_u:026.023a: samāptam adya vai karma sarvaṃ kṛṣṇa bhaviṣyati
GE07mbh_09_u:026.023c: adya duryodhano dīptāṃ śriyaṃ prāṇāṃś ca tyakṣyati
GE07mbh_09_u:026.024a: nāpayāti bhayāt kṛṣṇa saṃgrāmād yadi cen mama
GE07mbh_09_u:026.025a: mama hy etad aśaktaṃ vai vājivṛndam ariṃdama
GE07mbh_09_u:026.025c: soḍhuṃ jyātalanirghoṣaṃ yāhi yāvan nihanmy aham
GE07mbh_09_u:026.026a: evam uktas tu dāśārhaḥ pāṇḍavena yaśasvinā
GE07mbh_09_u:026.027a: tad anīkam abhiprekṣya trayaḥ sajjā mahārathāḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:026.030a: tato hy ayatnataḥ kṣipraṃ tava putro janādhipa
GE07mbh_09_u:026.032a: pratilabhya tataḥ saṃjñāṃ sahadevo viśāṃ pate
GE07mbh_09_u:026.034a: tad anīkaṃ tadā pārtho vyadhamad bahubhiḥ śaraiḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:026.034c: pātayitvā hayān sarvāṃs trigartānāṃ rathān yayau
GE07mbh_09_u:026.035a: tatas te sahitā bhūtvā trigartānāṃ mahārathāḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:026.037d-0154_01: hāhākāras tato jāto hate vīre suśarmaṇi
GE07mbh_09_u:026.038a: satyeṣum atha cādatta yodhānāṃ miṣatāṃ tataḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:026.038c: yathā siṃho vane rājan mṛgaṃ paribubhukṣitaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:026.039a: taṃ nihatya tataḥ pārthaḥ suśarmāṇaṃ tribhiḥ śaraiḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:026.039c: viddhvā tān ahanat sarvān rathān rukmavibhūṣitān
GE07mbh_09_u:026.040a: tatas tu pratvaran pārtho dīrghakālaṃ susaṃbhṛtam
GE07mbh_09_u:026.041c: pūrayitvā tato vāhān nyahanat tasya dhanvinaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:026.043a: sa śaraḥ preṣitas tena krodhadīptena dhanvinā
GE07mbh_09_u:026.044c: nandayan pāṇḍavān sarvān vyathayaṃś cāpi tāvakān
GE07mbh_09_u:026.045a: suśarmāṇaṃ raṇe hatvā putrān asya mahārathān
GE07mbh_09_u:026.045c: sapta cāṣṭau ca triṃśac ca sāyakair anayat kṣayam
GE07mbh_09_u:026.046a: tato 'sya niśitair bāṇaiḥ sarvān hatvā padānugān
GE07mbh_09_u:026.047a: bhīmas tu samare kruddhaḥ putraṃ tava janādhipa
GE07mbh_09_u:026.047c: sudarśanam adṛśyaṃ taṃ śaraiś cakre hasann iva
GE07mbh_09_u:026.048a: tato 'sya prahasan kruddhaḥ śiraḥ kāyād apāharat
GE07mbh_09_u:026.048c: kṣurapreṇa sutīkṣṇena sa hataḥ prāpatad bhuvi
GE07mbh_09_u:026.049a: tasmiṃs tu nihate vīre tatas tasya padānugāḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:026.049c: parivavrū raṇe bhīmaṃ kiranto viśikhāñ śitān
GE07mbh_09_u:026.050a: tatas tu niśitair bāṇais tad anīkaṃ vṛkodaraḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:026.050e: tataḥ kṣaṇena tad bhīmo nyahanad bharatarṣabha
GE07mbh_09_u:026.051e: tāṃs tu sarvāñ śarair ghorair avākirata pāṇḍavaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:026.053a: vyākulaṃ tad abhūt sarvaṃ pāṇḍavānāṃ paraiḥ saha
GE07mbh_09_u:026.054c: ubhayoḥ senayo rājan saṃśocantaḥ sma bāndhavān
GE07mbh_09_u:027.002c: śaraughān preṣayām āsa pataṃgān iva śīghragān
GE07mbh_09_u:027.002e: ulūkaś ca raṇe bhīmaṃ vivyādha daśabhiḥ śaraiḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:027.003a: śakunis tu mahārāja bhīmaṃ viddhvā tribhiḥ śaraiḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:027.004a: te śūrāḥ samare rājan samāsādya parasparam
GE07mbh_09_u:027.004e: svarṇapuṅkhaiḥ śilādhautair ā karṇāt prahitaiḥ śaraiḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:027.005c: ācchādayad diśaḥ sarvā dhārābhir iva toyadaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:027.006a: tataḥ kruddho raṇe bhīmaḥ sahadevaś ca bhārata
GE07mbh_09_u:027.007a: tābhyāṃ śaraśataiś channaṃ tad balaṃ tava bhārata
GE07mbh_09_u:027.007c: andhakāram ivākāśam abhavat tatra tatra ha
GE07mbh_09_u:027.008c: tatra tatra kṛto mārgo vikarṣadbhir hatān bahūn
GE07mbh_09_u:027.009c: varmabhir vinikṛttaiś ca prāsaiś chinnaiś ca māriṣa
GE07mbh_09_u:027.009d-0156_01: ṛṣṭibhiḥ śaktibhiś caiva tomaraiś ca paraṃtapa
GE07mbh_09_u:027.009e: saṃchannā pṛthivī jajñe kusumaiḥ śabalā iva
GE07mbh_09_u:027.013a: kabandhair utthitaiś chinnair nṛtyadbhiś cāparair yudhi
GE07mbh_09_u:027.018c: prādravan sahasā bhītāḥ śakuneś ca padānugāḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:027.019a: prabhagnān atha tān dṛṣṭvā rājā duryodhano 'bravīt
GE07mbh_09_u:027.019c: nivartadhvam adharmajñā yudhyadhvaṃ kiṃ sṛtena vaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:027.020a: iha kīrtiṃ samādhāya pretya lokān samaśnute
GE07mbh_09_u:027.020c: prāṇāñ jahāti yo vīro yudhi pṛṣṭham adarśayan
GE07mbh_09_u:027.021a: evam uktās tu te rājñā saubalasya padānugāḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:027.024a: pratyāśvasya ca durdharṣaḥ sahadevo viśāṃ pate
GE07mbh_09_u:027.024c: śakuniṃ daśabhir viddhvā hayāṃś cāsya tribhiḥ śaraiḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:027.024e: dhanuś ciccheda ca śaraiḥ saubalasya hasann iva
GE07mbh_09_u:027.025b-0158_02: ulūkaś ca tato rājan krodhena mahatā yutaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:027.025c: vivyādha nakulaṃ ṣaṣṭyā bhīmasenaṃ ca saptabhiḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:027.026c: sahadevaṃ ca saptatyā parīpsan pitaraṃ raṇe
GE07mbh_09_u:027.027a: taṃ bhīmasenaḥ samare vivyādha niśitaiḥ śaraiḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:027.027c: śakuniṃ ca catuḥṣaṣṭyā pārśvasthāṃś ca tribhis tribhiḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:027.028b-0159_02: ulūkas tu tataḥ kruddho dhanur udyamya māriṣa
GE07mbh_09_u:027.028b-0160_02: ulūkas tu śitair bāṇaiḥ sahadevam avidhyata
GE07mbh_09_u:027.030a: sa jagāma rathād bhūmiṃ sahadevena pātitaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:027.031a: putraṃ tu nihataṃ dṛṣṭvā śakunis tatra bhārata
GE07mbh_09_u:027.033a: tān apāsya śarān muktāñ śarasaṃghaiḥ pratāpavān
GE07mbh_09_u:027.034a: chinne dhanuṣi rājendra śakuniḥ saubalas tadā
GE07mbh_09_u:027.035a: tam āpatantaṃ sahasā ghorarūpaṃ viśāṃ pate
GE07mbh_09_u:027.035c: dvidhā ciccheda samare saubalasya hasann iva
GE07mbh_09_u:027.036a: asiṃ dṛṣṭvā dvidhā chinnaṃ pragṛhya mahatīṃ gadām
GE07mbh_09_u:027.036c: prāhiṇot sahadevāya sā moghā nyapatad bhuvi
GE07mbh_09_u:027.037c: preṣayām āsa saṃkruddhaḥ pāṇḍavaṃ prati saubalaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:027.038c: tridhā ciccheda samare sahadevo hasann iva
GE07mbh_09_u:027.039a: sā papāta tridhā chinnā bhūmau kanakabhūṣaṇā
GE07mbh_09_u:027.039c: śīryamāṇā yathā dīptā gaganād vai śatahradā
GE07mbh_09_u:027.040a: śaktiṃ vinihatāṃ dṛṣṭvā saubalaṃ ca bhayārditam
GE07mbh_09_u:027.040c: dudruvus tāvakāḥ sarve bhaye jāte sasaubalāḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:027.041a: athotkruṣṭaṃ mahad dhy āsīt pāṇḍavair jitakāśibhiḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:027.042a: tān vai vimanaso dṛṣṭvā mādrīputraḥ pratāpavān
GE07mbh_09_u:027.043a: tato gāndhārakair guptaṃ pṛṣṭhair aśvair jaye dhṛtam
GE07mbh_09_u:027.044a: svam aṃśam avaśiṣṭaṃ sa saṃsmṛtya śakuniṃ nṛpa
GE07mbh_09_u:027.044e: adhijyaṃ balavat kṛtvā vyākṣipan sumahad dhanuḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:027.045c: bhṛśam abhyahanat kruddhas tottrair iva mahādvipam
GE07mbh_09_u:027.046a: uvāca cainaṃ medhāvī nigṛhya smārayann iva
GE07mbh_09_u:027.046c: kṣatradharme sthito bhūtvā yudhyasva puruṣo bhava
GE07mbh_09_u:027.047a: yat tadā hṛṣyase mūḍha glahann akṣaiḥ sabhātale
GE07mbh_09_u:027.047c: phalam adya prapadyasva karmaṇas tasya durmate
GE07mbh_09_u:027.048a: nihatās te durātmāno ye 'smān avahasan purā
GE07mbh_09_u:027.048c: duryodhanaḥ kulāṅgāraḥ śiṣṭas tvaṃ tasya mātulaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:027.051a: abhigamya tu durdharṣaḥ sahadevo yudhāṃ patiḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:027.051c: vikṛṣya balavac cāpaṃ krodhena prahasann iva
GE07mbh_09_u:027.052a: śakuniṃ daśabhir viddhvā caturbhiś cāsya vājinaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:027.052c: chatraṃ dhvajaṃ dhanuś cāsya chittvā siṃha ivānadat
GE07mbh_09_u:027.053c: tato viddhaś ca bahubhiḥ sarvamarmasu sāyakaiḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:027.055a: tatas tu kruddhaḥ subalasya putro; mādrīsutaṃ sahadevaṃ vimarde
GE07mbh_09_u:027.056a: mādrīsutas tasya samudyataṃ taṃ; prāsaṃ suvṛttau ca bhujau raṇāgre
GE07mbh_09_u:027.056c: bhallais tribhir yugapat saṃcakarta; nanāda coccais tarasājimadhye
GE07mbh_09_u:027.057c: bhallena sarvāvaraṇātigena; śiraḥ śarīrāt pramamātha bhūyaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:027.058c: hṛtottamāṅgo yudhi pāṇḍavena; papāta bhūmau subalasya putraḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:027.059a: sa tacchiro vegavatā śareṇa; suvarṇapuṅkhena śilāśitena
GE07mbh_09_u:027.059c: prāverayat kupitaḥ pāṇḍuputro; yat tat kurūṇām anayasya mūlam
GE07mbh_09_u:027.060a: hṛtottamāṅgaṃ śakuniṃ samīkṣya; bhūmau śayānaṃ rudhirārdragātram
GE07mbh_09_u:027.060c: yodhās tvadīyā bhayanaṣṭasattvā; diśaḥ prajagmuḥ pragṛhītaśastrāḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:027.061a: vipradrutāḥ śuṣkamukhā visaṃjñā; gāṇḍīvaghoṣeṇa samāhatāś ca
GE07mbh_09_u:027.062a: tato rathāc chakuniṃ pātayitvā; mudānvitā bhārata pāṇḍaveyāḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:027.062c: śaṅkhān pradadhmuḥ samare prahṛṣṭāḥ; sakeśavāḥ sainikān harṣayantaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:027.063a: taṃ cāpi sarve pratipūjayanto; hṛṣṭā bruvāṇāḥ sahadevam ājau
GE07mbh_09_u:027.063c: diṣṭyā hato naikṛtiko durātmā; sahātmajo vīra raṇe tvayeti
GE07mbh_09_u:028.004c: bhallaiś ciccheda bībhatsuḥ śirāṃsy api hayān api
GE07mbh_09_u:028.007a: kuñjarāṃś ca hayāṃś caiva pādātāṃś ca paraṃtapa
GE07mbh_09_u:028.007c: uvāca sahitān sarvān dhārtarāṣṭra idaṃ vacaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:028.008c: pāñcālyaṃ cāpi sabalaṃ hatvā śīghraṃ nivartata
GE07mbh_09_u:028.009a: tasya te śirasā gṛhya vacanaṃ yuddhadurmadāḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:028.009c: pratyudyayū raṇe pārthāṃs tava putrasya śāsanāt
GE07mbh_09_u:028.012c: na prājñāyanta samare diśaś ca pradiśas tathā
GE07mbh_09_u:028.013a: tatas tu pāṇḍavānīkān niḥsṛtya bahavo janāḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:028.013c: abhyaghnaṃs tāvakān yuddhe muhūrtād iva bhārata
GE07mbh_09_u:028.013e: tato niḥśeṣam abhavat tat sainyaṃ tava bhārata
GE07mbh_09_u:028.014a: akṣauhiṇyaḥ sametās tu tava putrasya bhārata
GE07mbh_09_u:028.014c: ekādaśa hatā yuddhe tāḥ prabho pāṇḍusṛñjayaiḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:028.015c: eko duryodhano rājann adṛśyata bhṛśaṃ kṣataḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:028.016a: tato vīkṣya diśaḥ sarvā dṛṣṭvā śūnyāṃ ca medinīm
GE07mbh_09_u:028.016c: vihīnaḥ sarvayodhaiś ca pāṇḍavān vīkṣya saṃyuge
GE07mbh_09_u:028.019a: nihate māmake sainye niḥśeṣe śibire kṛte
GE07mbh_09_u:028.019c: pāṇḍavānāṃ balaṃ sūta kiṃ nu śeṣam abhūt tadā
GE07mbh_09_u:028.019e: etan me pṛcchato brūhi kuśalo hy asi saṃjaya
GE07mbh_09_u:028.020a: yac ca duryodhano mandaḥ kṛtavāṃs tanayo mama
GE07mbh_09_u:028.020c: balakṣayaṃ tathā dṛṣṭvā sa ekaḥ pṛthivīpatiḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:028.021a: rathānāṃ dve sahasre tu sapta nāgaśatāni ca
GE07mbh_09_u:028.021c: pañca cāśvasahasrāṇi pattīnāṃ ca śataṃ śatāḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:028.022a: etac cheṣam abhūd rājan pāṇḍavānāṃ mahad balam
GE07mbh_09_u:028.022c: parigṛhya hi yad yuddhe dhṛṣṭadyumno vyavasthitaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:028.023c: nāpaśyat samare kaṃ cit sahāyaṃ rathināṃ varaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:028.024a: nardamānān parāṃś caiva svabalasya ca saṃkṣayam
GE07mbh_09_u:028.024b-0170_01: tathā dṛṣṭvā mahārāja ekaḥ sa pṛthivīpatiḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:028.024c: hataṃ svahayam utsṛjya prāṅmukhaḥ prādravad bhayāt
GE07mbh_09_u:028.025c: gadām ādāya tejasvī padātiḥ prasthito hradam
GE07mbh_09_u:028.026a: nātidūraṃ tato gatvā padbhyām eva narādhipaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:028.027a: idaṃ nūnaṃ mahāprājño viduro dṛṣṭavān purā
GE07mbh_09_u:028.027c: mahad vaiśasam asmākaṃ kṣatriyāṇāṃ ca saṃyuge
GE07mbh_09_u:028.028a: evaṃ vicintayānas tu pravivikṣur hradaṃ nṛpaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:028.028d-0172_02: prāptavān vyasanaṃ tīvraṃ daivaṃ hi balavattaram
GE07mbh_09_u:028.029c: abhyadhāvanta saṃkruddhās tava rājan balaṃ prati
GE07mbh_09_u:028.031a: tān hatvā niśitair bāṇaiḥ sāmātyān saha bandhubhiḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:028.031c: rathe śvetahaye tiṣṭhann arjuno bahv aśobhata
GE07mbh_09_u:028.032c: mahāvanam iva chinnam abhavat tāvakaṃ balam
GE07mbh_09_u:028.034c: kṛpāc ca gautamād rājan pārthivāc ca tavātmajāt
GE07mbh_09_u:028.035a: dhṛṣṭadyumnas tu māṃ dṛṣṭvā hasan sātyakim abravīt
GE07mbh_09_u:028.036c: udyamya niśitaṃ khaḍgaṃ hantuṃ mām udyatas tadā
GE07mbh_09_u:028.037c: mucyatāṃ saṃjayo jīvan na hantavyaḥ kathaṃ cana
GE07mbh_09_u:028.038c: tato mām abravīn muktvā svasti saṃjaya sādhaya
GE07mbh_09_u:028.039a: anujñātas tv ahaṃ tena nyastavarmā nirāyudhaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:028.041a: sa tu mām aśrupūrṇākṣo nāśaknod abhivīkṣitum
GE07mbh_09_u:028.041c: upapraikṣata māṃ dṛṣṭvā tadā dīnam avasthitam
GE07mbh_09_u:028.042a: taṃ cāham api śocantaṃ dṛṣṭvaikākinam āhave
GE07mbh_09_u:028.042c: muhūrtaṃ nāśakaṃ vaktuṃ kiṃ cid duḥkhapariplutaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:028.042d-0173_02: āhṛtya ca karaṃ sarvaṃ svasya vai vaśam āgatam
GE07mbh_09_u:028.042d-0173_06: nābhavad yasya śastreṣu khedo rājñaḥ praśāsataḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:028.042d-0173_10: devālayapraveśe ca panthā yasya hiraṇmayaḥ patākāvṛtasūryāṃśutoraṇocchritaśobhinaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:028.042d-0173_15: taṃ bhṛśaṃ kṣatam indrābhaṃ padbhyām eva dharātale
GE07mbh_09_u:028.042d-0173_16: tiṣṭhantam ekaṃ dṛṣṭvā tu mamābhūt kleśa uttamaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:028.043a: tato 'smai tad ahaṃ sarvam uktavān grahaṇaṃ tadā
GE07mbh_09_u:028.044a: muhūrtam iva ca dhyātvā pratilabhya ca cetanām
GE07mbh_09_u:028.044c: bhrātṝṃś ca sarvasainyāni paryapṛcchata māṃ tataḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:028.045a: tasmai tad aham ācakṣaṃ sarvaṃ pratyakṣadarśivān
GE07mbh_09_u:028.045c: bhrātṝṃś ca nihatān sarvān sainyaṃ ca vinipātitam
GE07mbh_09_u:028.046a: trayaḥ kila rathāḥ śiṣṭās tāvakānāṃ narādhipa
GE07mbh_09_u:028.047a: sa dīrgham iva niḥśvasya viprekṣya ca punaḥ punaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:028.047c: aṃse māṃ pāṇinā spṛṣṭvā putras te paryabhāṣata
GE07mbh_09_u:028.048a: tvad anyo neha saṃgrāme kaś cij jīvati saṃjaya
GE07mbh_09_u:028.048c: dvitīyaṃ neha paśyāmi sasahāyāś ca pāṇḍavāḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:028.049c: duryodhanas tava sutaḥ praviṣṭo hradam ity uta
GE07mbh_09_u:028.050a: suhṛdbhis tādṛśair hīnaḥ putrair bhrātṛbhir eva ca
GE07mbh_09_u:028.050c: pāṇḍavaiś ca hṛte rājye ko nu jīvati mādṛśaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:028.051a: ācakṣethāḥ sarvam idaṃ māṃ ca muktaṃ mahāhavāt
GE07mbh_09_u:028.052a: evam uktvā mahārāja prāviśat taṃ hradaṃ nṛpaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:028.053a: tasmin hradaṃ praviṣṭe tu trīn rathāñ śrāntavāhanān
GE07mbh_09_u:028.053c: apaśyaṃ sahitān ekas taṃ deśaṃ samupeyuṣaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:028.054a: kṛpaṃ śāradvataṃ vīraṃ drauṇiṃ ca rathināṃ varam
GE07mbh_09_u:028.055a: te sarve mām abhiprekṣya tūrṇam aśvān acodayan
GE07mbh_09_u:028.055c: upayāya ca mām ūcur diṣṭyā jīvasi saṃjaya
GE07mbh_09_u:028.056a: apṛcchaṃś caiva māṃ sarve putraṃ tava janādhipam
GE07mbh_09_u:028.056c: kaccid duryodhano rājā sa no jīvati saṃjaya
GE07mbh_09_u:028.057a: ākhyātavān ahaṃ tebhyas tadā kuśalinaṃ nṛpam
GE07mbh_09_u:028.057c: tac caiva sarvam ācakṣaṃ yan māṃ duryodhano 'bravīt
GE07mbh_09_u:028.057e: hradaṃ caivāham ācaṣṭa yaṃ praviṣṭo narādhipaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:028.058a: aśvatthāmā tu tad rājan niśamya vacanaṃ mama
GE07mbh_09_u:028.058c: taṃ hradaṃ vipulaṃ prekṣya karuṇaṃ paryadevayat
GE07mbh_09_u:028.059a: aho dhiṅ na sa jānāti jīvato 'smān narādhipaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:028.059c: paryāptā hi vayaṃ tena saha yodhayituṃ parān
GE07mbh_09_u:028.060a: te tu tatra ciraṃ kālaṃ vilapya ca mahārathāḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:028.060c: prādravan rathināṃ śreṣṭhā dṛṣṭvā pāṇḍusutān raṇe
GE07mbh_09_u:028.061a: te tu māṃ ratham āropya kṛpasya supariṣkṛtam
GE07mbh_09_u:028.062a: tatra gulmāḥ paritrastāḥ sūrye cāstam ite sati
GE07mbh_09_u:028.062c: sarve vicukruśuḥ śrutvā putrāṇāṃ tava saṃkṣayam
GE07mbh_09_u:028.063a: tato vṛddhā mahārāja yoṣitāṃ rakṣaṇo narāḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:028.064a: tatra vikrośatīnāṃ ca rudatīnāṃ ca sarvaśaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:028.064c: prādurāsīn mahāñ śabdaḥ śrutvā tad balasaṃkṣayam
GE07mbh_09_u:028.065a: tatas tā yoṣito rājan krandantyo vai muhur muhuḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:028.066a: ājaghnuḥ karajaiś cāpi pāṇibhiś ca śirāṃsy uta
GE07mbh_09_u:028.066c: luluvuś ca tadā keśān krośantyas tatra tatra ha
GE07mbh_09_u:028.067c: krośantyas tatra ruruduḥ krandamānā viśāṃ pate
GE07mbh_09_u:028.070c: svān svān dārān upādāya prayayur nagaraṃ prati
GE07mbh_09_u:028.071c: dadṛśus tā mahārāja janā yāntīḥ puraṃ prati
GE07mbh_09_u:028.074a: api caiṣāṃ bhayaṃ tīvraṃ pārthebhyo 'bhūt sudāruṇam
GE07mbh_09_u:028.077a: aham eko vimuktas tu bhāgyayogād yadṛcchayā
GE07mbh_09_u:028.077d-0174_03: hariṇā iva vitrastāḥ prekṣyamāṇā diśo daśa
GE07mbh_09_u:028.078a: duryodhanasya sacivā ye ke cid avaśeṣitāḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:028.079a: prāptakālam ahaṃ manye praveśaṃ taiḥ sahābhibho
GE07mbh_09_u:028.080a: etam arthaṃ mahābāhur ubhayoḥ sa nyavedayat
GE07mbh_09_u:028.081a: tataḥ sa ratham āsthāya drutam aśvān acodayat
GE07mbh_09_u:028.082a: taiś caiva sahitaḥ kṣipram astaṃ gacchati bhāskare
GE07mbh_09_u:028.084a: tam abravīt satyadhṛtiḥ praṇataṃ tv agrataḥ sthitam
GE07mbh_09_u:028.084c: asmin kurukṣaye vṛtte diṣṭyā tvaṃ putra jīvasi
GE07mbh_09_u:028.085a: vinā rājñaḥ praveśād vai kim asi tvam ihāgataḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:028.085c: etan me kāraṇaṃ sarvaṃ vistareṇa nivedaya
GE07mbh_09_u:028.086e: svakaṃ sa hayam utsṛjya prāṅmukhaḥ prādravad bhayāt
GE07mbh_09_u:028.088a: tato rājñaḥ kalatrāṇi bhrātṝṇāṃ cāsya sarvaśaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:028.089c: praviṣṭo hāstinapuraṃ rakṣaṃl lokād dhi vācyatām
GE07mbh_09_u:028.090a: etac chrutvā tu vacanaṃ vaiśyāputreṇa bhāṣitam
GE07mbh_09_u:028.091b-0175_02: diṣṭyā tvāṃ tāta saṃgrāmād asmād vīrakṣayāt puram
GE07mbh_09_u:028.091b-0175_03: samāgatam apaśyāma hy aṃśumantam iva prajāḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:028.091b-0175_06: tvam eko vyasanārtasya dhriyase putra sarvadā
GE07mbh_09_u:028.091c: adya tvam iha viśrāntaḥ śvo 'bhigantā yudhiṣṭhiram
GE07mbh_09_u:028.092b-0176_01: yuyutsuṃ preṣayām āsa svagṛhaṃ yāhi putraka
GE07mbh_09_u:028.092b-0176_02: yuyutsur api kṣattāraṃ natvā svagṛham āyayau
GE07mbh_09_u:028.092d-0177_05: viveśa nṛpate rājan niśaśvāsa śanaiḥ śanaiḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:028.092e: yuyutsur api tāṃ rātriṃ svagṛhe nyavasat tadā
GE07mbh_09_u:029.000-0179_02: devīṃ sarasvatīṃ caiva tato jayam udīrayet saṃjaya uvāca
GE07mbh_09_u:029.000-0180_04: tatra śabdaṃ na śṛṇumo manuṣyasyāpi kasya cit
GE07mbh_09_u:029.001c: mama sainyāvaśiṣṭās te kim akurvata saṃjaya
GE07mbh_09_u:029.002a: kṛtavarmā kṛpaś caiva droṇaputraś ca vīryavān
GE07mbh_09_u:029.002c: duryodhanaś ca mandātmā rājā kim akarot tadā
GE07mbh_09_u:029.003c: vidrute śibire śūnye bhṛśodvignās trayo rathāḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:029.004e: sthānaṃ nārocayaṃs tatra tatas te hradam abhyayuḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:029.006a: mārgamāṇās tu saṃkruddhās tava putraṃ jayaiṣiṇaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:029.007a: sa hi tīvreṇa vegena gadāpāṇir apākramat
GE07mbh_09_u:029.007b-0181_01: yadā duryodhano yuddhaṃ tyaktvā pattir apākramat
GE07mbh_09_u:029.007c: taṃ hradaṃ prāviśac cāpi viṣṭabhyāpaḥ svamāyayā
GE07mbh_09_u:029.009a: tataḥ kṛpaś ca drauṇiś ca kṛtavarmā ca sātvataḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:029.009c: saṃniviṣṭeṣu pārtheṣu prayātās taṃ hradaṃ śanaiḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:029.010a: te taṃ hradaṃ samāsādya yatra śete janādhipaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:029.011c: jitvā vā pṛthivīṃ bhuṅkṣva hato vā svargam āpnuhi
GE07mbh_09_u:029.012a: teṣām api balaṃ sarvaṃ hataṃ duryodhana tvayā
GE07mbh_09_u:029.012c: pratirabdhāś ca bhūyiṣṭhaṃ ye śiṣṭās tatra sainikāḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:029.013a: na te vegaṃ viṣahituṃ śaktās tava viśāṃ pate
GE07mbh_09_u:029.013d-0182_01: evam uktaḥ pratyuvāca tān sa tatra mahārathān
GE07mbh_09_u:029.014a: diṣṭyā paśyāmi vo muktān īdṛśāt puruṣakṣayāt
GE07mbh_09_u:029.015c: bhavantaś ca pariśrāntā vayaṃ ca bhṛśavikṣatāḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:029.015e: udīrṇaṃ ca balaṃ teṣāṃ tena yuddhaṃ na rocaye
GE07mbh_09_u:029.016a: na tv etad adbhutaṃ vīrā yad vo mahad idaṃ manaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:029.016c: asmāsu ca parā bhaktir na tu kālaḥ parākrame
GE07mbh_09_u:029.017a: viśramyaikāṃ niśām adya bhavadbhiḥ sahito raṇe
GE07mbh_09_u:029.017c: pratiyotsyāmy ahaṃ śatrūñ śvo na me 'sty atra saṃśayaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:029.018c: uttiṣṭha rājan bhadraṃ te vijeṣyāmo raṇe parān
GE07mbh_09_u:029.019a: iṣṭāpūrtena dānena satyena ca japena ca
GE07mbh_09_u:029.019c: śape rājan yathā hy adya nihaniṣyāmi somakān
GE07mbh_09_u:029.020a: mā sma yajñakṛtāṃ prītiṃ prāpnuyāṃ sajjanocitām
GE07mbh_09_u:029.020c: yadīmāṃ rajanīṃ vyuṣṭāṃ na nihanmi parān raṇe
GE07mbh_09_u:029.021c: iti satyaṃ bravīmy etat tan me śṛṇu janādhipa
GE07mbh_09_u:029.022a: teṣu saṃbhāṣamāṇeṣu vyādhās taṃ deśam āyayuḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:029.023a: te hi nityaṃ mahārāja bhīmasenasya lubdhakāḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:029.024a: te tatra viṣṭhitās teṣāṃ sarvaṃ tad vacanaṃ rahaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:029.025c: nirbandhaṃ paramaṃ cakrus tadā vai yuddhakāṅkṣiṇaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:029.027a: teṣāṃ śrutvā ca saṃvādaṃ rājñaś ca salile sataḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:029.028a: te pūrvaṃ pāṇḍuputreṇa pṛṣṭā hy āsan sutaṃ tava
GE07mbh_09_u:029.029a: tatas te pāṇḍuputrasya smṛtvā tad bhāṣitaṃ tadā
GE07mbh_09_u:029.029c: anyonyam abruvan rājan mṛgavyādhāḥ śanair idam
GE07mbh_09_u:029.030c: suvyaktam iti naḥ khyāto hrade duryodhano nṛpaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:029.031a: tasmād gacchāmahe sarve yatra rājā yudhiṣṭhiraḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:029.033a: sa no dāsyati suprīto dhanāni bahulāny uta
GE07mbh_09_u:029.033c: kiṃ no māṃsena śuṣkeṇa parikliṣṭena śoṣiṇā
GE07mbh_09_u:029.034a: evam uktvā tato vyādhāḥ saṃprahṛṣṭā dhanārthinaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:029.036a: nikṛtes tasya pāpasya te pāraṃ gamanepsavaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:029.036c: cārān saṃpreṣayām āsuḥ samantāt tad raṇājiram
GE07mbh_09_u:029.037a: āgamya tu tataḥ sarve naṣṭaṃ duryodhanaṃ nṛpam
GE07mbh_09_u:029.038a: teṣāṃ tad vacanaṃ śrutvā cārāṇāṃ bharatarṣabha
GE07mbh_09_u:029.038c: cintām abhyagamat tīvrāṃ niśaśvāsa ca pārthivaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:029.038d-0183_01: ariśeṣe bhavati tu saṃdigdho vijayo bhavet
GE07mbh_09_u:029.038d-0183_02: rājyaṃ labhe kathaṃ tad dhi pūjitaṃ vijayādibhiḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:029.039c: tasmād deśād apakramya tvaritā lubdhakā vibho
GE07mbh_09_u:029.040a: ājagmuḥ śibiraṃ hṛṣṭā dṛṣṭvā duryodhanaṃ nṛpam
GE07mbh_09_u:029.041a: te tu pāṇḍavam āsādya bhīmasenaṃ mahābalam
GE07mbh_09_u:029.041c: tasmai tat sarvam ācakhyur yad vṛttaṃ yac ca vai śrutam
GE07mbh_09_u:029.042a: tato vṛkodaro rājan dattvā teṣāṃ dhanaṃ bahu
GE07mbh_09_u:029.043a: asau duryodhano rājan vijñāto mama lubdhakaiḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:029.044a: tad vaco bhīmasenasya priyaṃ śrutvā viśāṃ pate
GE07mbh_09_u:029.045a: taṃ ca śrutvā maheṣvāsaṃ praviṣṭaṃ salilahradam
GE07mbh_09_u:029.047a: siṃhanādāṃs tataś cakruḥ kṣveḍāṃś ca bharatarṣabha
GE07mbh_09_u:029.047c: tvaritāḥ kṣatriyā rājañ jagmur dvaipāyanaṃ hradam
GE07mbh_09_u:029.048a: jñātaḥ pāpo dhārtarāṣṭro dṛṣṭaś cety asakṛd raṇe
GE07mbh_09_u:029.049a: teṣām āśu prayātānāṃ rathānāṃ tatra veginām
GE07mbh_09_u:029.050c: anvayus tvaritās te vai rājānaṃ śrāntavāhanāḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:029.051a: arjuno bhīmasenaś ca mādrīputrau ca pāṇḍavau
GE07mbh_09_u:029.052c: pāñcālānāṃ ca ye śiṣṭā draupadeyāś ca bhārata
GE07mbh_09_u:029.052e: hayāś ca sarve nāgāś ca śataśaś ca padātayaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:029.054c: māyayā salilaṃ stabhya yatrābhūt te sutaḥ sthitaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:029.055c: salilāntargataḥ śete durdarśaḥ kasya cit prabho
GE07mbh_09_u:029.057a: yudhiṣṭhiras tu rājendra hradaṃ taṃ saha sodaraiḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:029.058c: uddhunvaṃś ca mahāreṇuṃ kampayaṃś cāpi medinīm
GE07mbh_09_u:029.059c: kṛtavarmā kṛpo drauṇī rājānam idam abruvan
GE07mbh_09_u:029.060a: ime hy āyānti saṃhṛṣṭāḥ pāṇḍavā jitakāśinaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:029.061a: duryodhanas tu tac chrutvā teṣāṃ tatra yaśasvinām
GE07mbh_09_u:029.061c: tathety uktvā hradaṃ taṃ vai māyayāstambhayat prabho
GE07mbh_09_u:029.062a: te tv anujñāpya rājānaṃ bhṛśaṃ śokaparāyaṇāḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:029.063a: te gatvā dūram adhvānaṃ nyagrodhaṃ prekṣya māriṣa
GE07mbh_09_u:029.063c: nyaviśanta bhṛśaṃ śrāntāś cintayanto nṛpaṃ prati
GE07mbh_09_u:029.064c: pāṇḍavāś cāpi saṃprāptās taṃ deśaṃ yuddham īpsavaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:029.065a: kathaṃ nu yuddhaṃ bhavitā kathaṃ rājā bhaviṣyati
GE07mbh_09_u:029.065c: kathaṃ nu pāṇḍavā rājan pratipatsyanti kauravam
GE07mbh_09_u:029.066a: ity evaṃ cintayantas te rathebhyo 'śvān vimucya ha
GE07mbh_09_u:030.001a: tatas teṣv apayāteṣu ratheṣu triṣu pāṇḍavāḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:030.003c: viṣṭabhya salilaṃ śete nāsya mānuṣato bhayam
GE07mbh_09_u:030.004a: daivīṃ māyām imāṃ kṛtvā salilāntargato hy ayam
GE07mbh_09_u:030.004c: nikṛtyā nikṛtiprajño na me jīvan vimokṣyate
GE07mbh_09_u:030.005a: yady asya samare sāhyaṃ kurute vajrabhṛt svayam
GE07mbh_09_u:030.005c: tathāpy enaṃ hataṃ yuddhe loko drakṣyati mādhava
GE07mbh_09_u:030.006a: māyāvina imāṃ māyāṃ māyayā jahi bhārata
GE07mbh_09_u:030.006c: māyāvī māyayā vadhyaḥ satyam etad yudhiṣṭhira
GE07mbh_09_u:030.007a: kriyābhyupāyair bahulair māyām apsu prayojya ha
GE07mbh_09_u:030.009e: vṛtraś ca nihato rājan kriyayaiva na saṃśayaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:030.010e: kriyayā yogam āsthāya tathā tvam api vikrama
GE07mbh_09_u:030.011c: tārakaś ca mahādaityo vipracittiś ca vīryavān
GE07mbh_09_u:030.012a: vātāpir ilvalaś caiva triśirāś ca tathā vibho
GE07mbh_09_u:030.012d-0184_01: tārakaś ca mahādaityo hy andhakaś ca niṣūditaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:030.013c: kriyā balavatī rājan nānyat kiṃ cid yudhiṣṭhira
GE07mbh_09_u:030.014a: daityāś ca dānavāś caiva rākṣasāḥ pārthivās tathā
GE07mbh_09_u:030.015c: jalasthaṃ taṃ mahārāja tava putraṃ mahābalam
GE07mbh_09_u:030.016c: sarvaṃ kṣatraṃ ghātayitvā svakulaṃ ca viśāṃ pate
GE07mbh_09_u:030.018a: sa ca darpo naraśreṣṭha sa ca mānaḥ kva te gataḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:030.018c: yas tvaṃ saṃstabhya salilaṃ bhīto rājan vyavasthitaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:030.019a: sarve tvāṃ śūra ity eva janā jalpanti saṃsadi
GE07mbh_09_u:030.019c: vyarthaṃ tad bhavato manye śauryaṃ salilaśāyinaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:030.020c: kauraveyo viśeṣeṇa kule janma ca saṃsmara
GE07mbh_09_u:030.021a: sa kathaṃ kaurave vaṃśe praśaṃsañ janma cātmanaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:030.021c: yuddhād bhītas tatas toyaṃ praviśya pratitiṣṭhasi
GE07mbh_09_u:030.023a: kathaṃ pāram agatvā hi yuddhe tvaṃ vai jijīviṣuḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:030.023c: imān nipatitān dṛṣṭvā putrān bhrātṝn pitṝṃs tathā
GE07mbh_09_u:030.024a: saṃbandhino vayasyāṃś ca mātulān bāndhavāṃs tathā
GE07mbh_09_u:030.024c: ghātayitvā kathaṃ tāta hrade tiṣṭhasi sāṃpratam
GE07mbh_09_u:030.025a: śūramānī na śūras tvaṃ mithyā vadasi bhārata
GE07mbh_09_u:030.026a: na hi śūrāḥ palāyante śatrūn dṛṣṭvā kathaṃ cana
GE07mbh_09_u:030.026c: brūhi vā tvaṃ yayā dhṛtyā śūra tyajasi saṃgaram
GE07mbh_09_u:030.027a: sa tvam uttiṣṭha yudhyasva vinīya bhayam ātmanaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:030.029a: yat tat karṇam upāśritya śakuniṃ cāpi saubalam
GE07mbh_09_u:030.029c: amartya iva saṃmohāt tvam ātmānaṃ na buddhavān
GE07mbh_09_u:030.030a: tat pāpaṃ sumahat kṛtvā pratiyudhyasva bhārata
GE07mbh_09_u:030.030c: kathaṃ hi tvadvidho mohād rocayeta palāyanam
GE07mbh_09_u:030.031a: kva te tat pauruṣaṃ yātaṃ kva ca mānaḥ suyodhana
GE07mbh_09_u:030.031c: kva ca vikrāntatā yātā kva ca visphūrjitaṃ mahat
GE07mbh_09_u:030.032a: kva te kṛtāstratā yātā kiṃ ca śeṣe jalāśaye
GE07mbh_09_u:030.032c: sa tvam uttiṣṭha yudhyasva kṣatradharmeṇa bhārata
GE07mbh_09_u:030.033a: asmān vā tvaṃ parājitya praśādhi pṛthivīm imām
GE07mbh_09_u:030.033c: atha vā nihato 'smābhir bhūmau svapsyasi bhārata
GE07mbh_09_u:030.034a: eṣa te prathamo dharmaḥ sṛṣṭo dhātrā mahātmanā
GE07mbh_09_u:030.034c: taṃ kuruṣva yathātathyaṃ rājā bhava mahāratha saṃjaya uvāca
GE07mbh_09_u:030.034d-0185_02: salilasthas tava suta idaṃ vacanam abravīt
GE07mbh_09_u:030.035a: naitac citraṃ mahārāja yad bhīḥ prāṇinam āviśet
GE07mbh_09_u:030.035c: na ca prāṇabhayād bhīto vyapayāto 'smi bhārata
GE07mbh_09_u:030.036c: ekaś cāpy agaṇaḥ saṃkhye pratyāśvāsam arocayam
GE07mbh_09_u:030.037a: na prāṇahetor na bhayān na viṣādād viśāṃ pate
GE07mbh_09_u:030.037c: idam ambhaḥ praviṣṭo 'smi śramāt tv idam anuṣṭhitam
GE07mbh_09_u:030.038a: tvaṃ cāśvasihi kaunteya ye cāpy anugatās tava
GE07mbh_09_u:030.038c: aham utthāya vaḥ sarvān pratiyotsyāmi saṃyuge
GE07mbh_09_u:030.039a: āśvastā eva sarve sma ciraṃ tvāṃ mṛgayāmahe
GE07mbh_09_u:030.040a: hatvā vā samare pārthān sphītaṃ rājyam avāpnuhi
GE07mbh_09_u:030.041c: ta ime nihatāḥ sarve bhrātaro me janeśvara
GE07mbh_09_u:030.042c: nābhyutsahāmy ahaṃ bhoktuṃ vidhavām iva yoṣitam
GE07mbh_09_u:030.043a: adyāpi tv aham āśaṃse tvāṃ vijetuṃ yudhiṣṭhira
GE07mbh_09_u:030.044a: na tv idānīm ahaṃ manye kāryaṃ yuddhena karhi cit
GE07mbh_09_u:030.044c: droṇe karṇe ca saṃśānte nihate ca pitāmahe
GE07mbh_09_u:030.045a: astv idānīm iyaṃ rājan kevalā pṛthivī tava
GE07mbh_09_u:030.045c: asahāyo hi ko rājā rājyam icchet praśāsitum
GE07mbh_09_u:030.046a: suhṛdas tādṛśān hitvā putrān bhrātṝn pitṝn api
GE07mbh_09_u:030.046c: bhavadbhiś ca hṛte rājye ko nu jīveta mādṛśaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:030.047a: ahaṃ vanaṃ gamiṣyāmi hy ajinaiḥ prativāsitaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:030.047c: ratir hi nāsti me rājye hatapakṣasya bhārata
GE07mbh_09_u:030.048c: eṣā te pṛthivī rājan bhuṅkṣvaināṃ vigatajvaraḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:030.049c: na hi me nirjitasyāsti jīvite 'dya spṛhā vibho
GE07mbh_09_u:030.050a: gaccha tvaṃ bhuṅkṣva rājendra pṛthivīṃ nihateśvarām
GE07mbh_09_u:030.050c: hatayodhāṃ naṣṭaratnāṃ kṣīṇavaprāṃ yathāsukham saṃjaya uvāca
GE07mbh_09_u:030.050d-0186_02: śrutvā tu karuṇaṃ vākyam abhāṣata yudhiṣṭhiraḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:030.051c: naitan manasi me rājan vāśitaṃ śakuner iva
GE07mbh_09_u:030.052a: yadi cāpi samarthaḥ syās tvaṃ dānāya suyodhana
GE07mbh_09_u:030.052c: nāham iccheyam avaniṃ tvayā dattāṃ praśāsitum
GE07mbh_09_u:030.053a: adharmeṇa na gṛhṇīyāṃ tvayā dattāṃ mahīm imām
GE07mbh_09_u:030.053c: na hi dharmaḥ smṛto rājan kṣatriyasya pratigrahaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:030.054a: tvayā dattāṃ na ceccheyaṃ pṛthivīm akhilām aham
GE07mbh_09_u:030.054c: tvāṃ tu yuddhe vinirjitya bhoktāsmi vasudhām imām
GE07mbh_09_u:030.055a: anīśvaraś ca pṛthivīṃ kathaṃ tvaṃ dātum icchasi
GE07mbh_09_u:030.055c: tvayeyaṃ pṛthivī rājan kiṃ na dattā tadaiva hi
GE07mbh_09_u:030.056a: dharmato yācamānānāṃ śamārthaṃ ca kulasya naḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:030.057a: kim idānīṃ dadāsi tvaṃ ko hi te cittavibhramaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:030.057c: abhiyuktas tu ko rājā dātum icched dhi medinīm
GE07mbh_09_u:030.058a: na tvam adya mahīṃ dātum īśaḥ kauravanandana
GE07mbh_09_u:030.058c: ācchettuṃ vā balād rājan sa kathaṃ dātum icchasi
GE07mbh_09_u:030.058e: māṃ tu nirjitya saṃgrāme pālayemāṃ vasuṃdharām
GE07mbh_09_u:030.059a: sūcyagreṇāpi yad bhūmer api dhrīyeta bhārata
GE07mbh_09_u:030.059c: tanmātram api no mahyaṃ na dadāti purā bhavān
GE07mbh_09_u:030.060a: sa kathaṃ pṛthivīm etāṃ pradadāsi viśāṃ pate
GE07mbh_09_u:030.060c: sūcyagraṃ nātyajaḥ pūrvaṃ sa kathaṃ tyajasi kṣitim
GE07mbh_09_u:030.061a: evam aiśvaryam āsādya praśāsya pṛthivīm imām
GE07mbh_09_u:030.061c: ko hi mūḍho vyavasyeta śatror dātuṃ vasuṃdharām
GE07mbh_09_u:030.063a: asmān vā tvaṃ parājitya praśādhi pṛthivīm imām
GE07mbh_09_u:030.063c: atha vā nihato 'smābhir vraja lokān anuttamān
GE07mbh_09_u:030.064a: āvayor jīvato rājan mayi ca tvayi ca dhruvam
GE07mbh_09_u:030.065a: jīvitaṃ tava duṣprajña mayi saṃprati vartate
GE07mbh_09_u:030.065c: jīvayeyaṃ tv ahaṃ kāmaṃ na tu tvaṃ jīvituṃ kṣamaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:030.066a: dahane hi kṛto yatnas tvayāsmāsu viśeṣataḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:030.066c: āśīviṣair viṣaiś cāpi jale cāpi praveśanaiḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:030.066e: tvayā vinikṛtā rājan rājyasya haraṇena ca
GE07mbh_09_u:030.066f-0187_01: apriyāṇāṃ ca vacanair draupadyāḥ karṣaṇena ca
GE07mbh_09_u:030.066f-0189_01: hradān niṣkramya yudhyasva tataḥ śreyo bhaviṣyati
GE07mbh_09_u:030.067a: etasmāt kāraṇāt pāpa jīvitaṃ te na vidyate
GE07mbh_09_u:030.067c: uttiṣṭhottiṣṭha yudhyasva tat te śreyo bhaviṣyati
GE07mbh_09_u:030.068a: evaṃ tu vividhā vāco jayayuktāḥ punaḥ punaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:030.068c: kīrtayanti sma te vīrās tatra tatra janādhipa
GE07mbh_09_u:031.001a: evaṃ saṃtarjyamānas tu mama putro mahīpatiḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:031.001c: prakṛtyā manyumān vīraḥ katham āsīt paraṃtapaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:031.002a: na hi saṃtarjanā tena śrutapūrvā kadā cana
GE07mbh_09_u:031.003a: iyaṃ ca pṛthivī sarvā samlecchāṭavikā bhṛśam
GE07mbh_09_u:031.003c: prasādād dhriyate yasya pratyakṣaṃ tava saṃjaya
GE07mbh_09_u:031.004a: sa tathā tarjyamānas tu pāṇḍuputrair viśeṣataḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:031.004c: vihīnaś ca svakair bhṛtyair nirjane cāvṛto bhṛśam
GE07mbh_09_u:031.005a: śrutvā sa kaṭukā vāco jayayuktāḥ punaḥ punaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:031.005c: kim abravīt pāṇḍaveyāṃs tan mamācakṣva saṃjaya
GE07mbh_09_u:031.007a: śrutvā sa kaṭukā vāco viṣamastho janādhipaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:031.007c: dīrgham uṣṇaṃ ca niḥśvasya salilasthaḥ punaḥ punaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:031.008a: salilāntargato rājā dhunvan hastau punaḥ punaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:031.010c: katham ekaḥ padātiḥ sann aśastro yoddhum utsahe
GE07mbh_09_u:031.011a: ekaikena tu māṃ yūyaṃ yodhayadhvaṃ yudhiṣṭhira
GE07mbh_09_u:031.011c: na hy eko bahubhir vīrair nyāyyaṃ yodhayituṃ yudhi
GE07mbh_09_u:031.013a: na me tvatto bhayaṃ rājan na ca pārthād vṛkodarāt
GE07mbh_09_u:031.013c: phalgunād vāsudevād vā pāñcālebhyo 'tha vā punaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:031.014a: yamābhyāṃ yuyudhānād vā ye cānye tava sainikāḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:031.014c: ekaḥ sarvān ahaṃ kruddho na tān yoddhum ihotsahe
GE07mbh_09_u:031.015c: dharmaṃ caiveha kīrtiṃ ca pālayan prabravīmy aham
GE07mbh_09_u:031.016a: aham utthāya vaḥ sarvān pratiyotsyāmi saṃyuge
GE07mbh_09_u:031.017a: adya vaḥ sarathān sāśvān aśastro viratho 'pi san
GE07mbh_09_u:031.020c: mitrāṇāṃ suhṛdāṃ caiva bāndhavānāṃ tathaiva ca
GE07mbh_09_u:031.021a: ānṛṇyam adya gacchāmi hatvā tvāṃ bhrātṛbhiḥ saha
GE07mbh_09_u:031.022a: diṣṭyā tvam api jānīṣe kṣatradharmaṃ suyodhana
GE07mbh_09_u:031.022c: diṣṭyā te vartate buddhir yuddhāyaiva mahābhuja
GE07mbh_09_u:031.023a: diṣṭyā śūro 'si kauravya diṣṭyā jānāsi saṃgaram
GE07mbh_09_u:031.023c: yas tvam eko hi naḥ sarvān saṃyuge yoddhum icchasi
GE07mbh_09_u:031.024a: eka ekena saṃgamya yat te saṃmatam āyudham
GE07mbh_09_u:031.024c: tat tvam ādāya yudhyasva prekṣakās te vayaṃ sthitāḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:031.025a: ayam iṣṭaṃ ca te kāmaṃ vīra bhūyo dadāmy aham
GE07mbh_09_u:031.025c: hatvaikaṃ bhavato rājyaṃ hato vā svargam āpnuhi
GE07mbh_09_u:031.025d-0192_01: tatroccaiś cukruśuḥ siddhās tasya vākyāntare nṛpa
GE07mbh_09_u:031.026a: ekaś ced yoddhum ākrande varo 'dya mama dīyate
GE07mbh_09_u:031.026c: āyudhānām iyaṃ cāpi vṛtā tvatsaṃmate gadā
GE07mbh_09_u:031.027a: bhrātṝṇāṃ bhavatām ekaḥ śakyaṃ māṃ yo 'bhimanyate
GE07mbh_09_u:031.027c: padātir gadayā saṃkhye sa yudhyatu mayā saha
GE07mbh_09_u:031.028c: idam ekaṃ gadāyuddhaṃ bhavatv adyādbhutaṃ mahat
GE07mbh_09_u:031.029a: annānām api paryāyaṃ kartum icchanti mānavāḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:031.029c: yuddhānām api paryāyo bhavatv anumate tava
GE07mbh_09_u:031.030c: pāñcālān sṛñjayāṃś caiva ye cānye tava sainikāḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:031.030d-0193_01: na hi me saṃbhramo jātu śakrād api yudhiṣṭhira
GE07mbh_09_u:031.031c: eka ekena saṃgamya saṃyuge gadayā balī
GE07mbh_09_u:031.032c: adya te jīvitaṃ nāsti yady api tvaṃ manojavaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:031.034c: vācaṃ na mamṛṣe dhīmān uttamāśvaḥ kaśām iva
GE07mbh_09_u:031.035a: saṃkṣobhya salilaṃ vegād gadām ādāya vīryavān
GE07mbh_09_u:031.036a: sa bhittvā stambhitaṃ toyaṃ skandhe kṛtvāyasīṃ gadām
GE07mbh_09_u:031.036c: udatiṣṭhata putras te pratapan raśmimān iva
GE07mbh_09_u:031.038a: gadāhastaṃ tu taṃ dṛṣṭvā saśṛṅgam iva parvatam
GE07mbh_09_u:031.038e: sagado bhārato bhāti pratapan bhāskaro yathā
GE07mbh_09_u:031.040a: vajrahastaṃ yathā śakraṃ śūlahastaṃ yathā haram
GE07mbh_09_u:031.041a: tam uttīrṇaṃ tu saṃprekṣya samahṛṣyanta sarvaśaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:031.041c: pāñcālāḥ pāṇḍaveyāś ca te 'nyonyasya talān daduḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:031.042a: avahāsaṃ tu taṃ matvā putro duryodhanas tava
GE07mbh_09_u:031.042c: udvṛtya nayane kruddho didhakṣur iva pāṇḍavān
GE07mbh_09_u:031.043c: pratyuvāca tatas tān vai pāṇḍavān sahakeśavān
GE07mbh_09_u:031.045a: utthitas tu jalāt tasmāt putro duryodhanas tava
GE07mbh_09_u:031.046c: śarīraṃ sma tadā bhāti sravann iva mahīdharaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:031.047a: tam udyatagadaṃ vīraṃ menire tatra pāṇḍavāḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:031.048a: sa meghaninado harṣān nadann iva ca govṛṣaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:031.048c: ājuhāva tataḥ pārthān gadayā yudhi vīryavān
GE07mbh_09_u:031.049a: ekaikena ca māṃ yūyam āsīdata yudhiṣṭhira
GE07mbh_09_u:031.049c: na hy eko bahubhir nyāyyo vīra yodhayituṃ yudhi
GE07mbh_09_u:031.050d-0195_01: avaśyam eva yoddhavyaṃ sarvair eva mayā saha
GE07mbh_09_u:031.050d-0195_02: yuktaṃ tv ayuktam ity etad vetsi tvaṃ caiva sarvadā
GE07mbh_09_u:031.051a: nābhūd iyaṃ tava prajñā katham evaṃ suyodhana
GE07mbh_09_u:031.051d-0196_02: anyathā tu kathaṃ hanyur abhimanyuṃ tathāgatam
GE07mbh_09_u:031.051d-0196_03: sarve bhavanto dharmajñāḥ sarve śūrās tanutyajaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:031.051d-0196_05: yady ekas tu na hantavyo bahubhir dharma eva tu
GE07mbh_09_u:031.052a: āmuñca kavacaṃ vīra mūrdhajān yamayasva ca
GE07mbh_09_u:031.052c: yac cānyad api te nāsti tad apy ādatsva bhārata
GE07mbh_09_u:031.052d-0197_01: iṣuṃ prāsaṃ gadāṃ vāpi varaṃ bhūyo dadāmy aham
GE07mbh_09_u:031.052e: imam ekaṃ ca te kāmaṃ vīra bhūyo dadāmy aham
GE07mbh_09_u:031.053c: taṃ hatvā vai bhavān rājā hato vā svargam āpnuhi
GE07mbh_09_u:031.053e: ṛte ca jīvitād vīra yuddhe kiṃ kurma te priyam
GE07mbh_09_u:031.054a: tatas tava suto rājan varma jagrāha kāñcanam
GE07mbh_09_u:031.055c: rarāja rājan putras te kāñcanaḥ śailarāḍ iva
GE07mbh_09_u:031.056a: saṃnaddhaḥ sa gadī rājan sajjaḥ saṃgrāmamūrdhani
GE07mbh_09_u:031.056c: abravīt pāṇḍavān sarvān putro duryodhanas tava
GE07mbh_09_u:031.057a: bhrātṝṇāṃ bhavatām eko yudhyatāṃ gadayā mayā
GE07mbh_09_u:031.057c: sahadevena vā yotsye bhīmena nakulena vā
GE07mbh_09_u:031.058a: atha vā phalgunenādya tvayā vā bharatarṣabha
GE07mbh_09_u:031.058c: yotsye 'haṃ saṃgaraṃ prāpya vijeṣye ca raṇājire
GE07mbh_09_u:031.060a: gadāyuddhe na me kaś cit sadṛśo 'stīti cintaya
GE07mbh_09_u:031.060c: gadayā vo haniṣyāmi sarvān eva samāgatān
GE07mbh_09_u:031.060d-0198_01: na me samarthāḥ sarve vai yoddhuṃ nyāyena ke cana
GE07mbh_09_u:031.060d-0198_02: na yuktam ātmanā vaktum evaṃ garvoddhataṃ vacaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:031.060d-0198_03: atha vā saphalaṃ hy etat kariṣye bhavatāṃ puraḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:031.060d-0198_04: asmin muhūrte satyaṃ vā mithyā vaitad bhaviṣyati
GE07mbh_09_u:031.060e: gṛhṇātu sa gadāṃ yo vai yudhyate 'dya mayā saha
GE07mbh_09_u:032.001a: evaṃ duryodhane rājan garjamāne muhur muhuḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:032.002a: yadi nāma hy ayaṃ yuddhe varayet tvāṃ yudhiṣṭhira
GE07mbh_09_u:032.002c: arjunaṃ nakulaṃ vāpi sahadevam athāpi vā
GE07mbh_09_u:032.003a: kim idaṃ sāhasaṃ rājaṃs tvayā vyāhṛtam īdṛśam
GE07mbh_09_u:032.003c: ekam eva nihatyājau bhava rājā kuruṣv iti
GE07mbh_09_u:032.004a: etena hi kṛtā yogyā varṣāṇīha trayodaśa
GE07mbh_09_u:032.004b-0199_01: yat tvayā hi kṛtaṃ pūrvaṃ bhīmasenajighāṃsayā
GE07mbh_09_u:032.005a: kathaṃ nāma bhavet kāryam asmābhir bharatarṣabha
GE07mbh_09_u:032.005c: sāhasaṃ kṛtavāṃs tvaṃ tu hy anukrośān nṛpottama
GE07mbh_09_u:032.006c: ṛte vṛkodarāt pārthāt sa ca nātikṛtaśramaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:032.007a: tad idaṃ dyūtam ārabdhaṃ punar eva yathā purā
GE07mbh_09_u:032.007c: viṣamaṃ śakuneś caiva tava caiva viśāṃ pate
GE07mbh_09_u:032.008a: balī bhīmaḥ samarthaś ca kṛtī rājā suyodhanaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:032.008c: balavān vā kṛtī veti kṛtī rājan viśiṣyate
GE07mbh_09_u:032.009a: so 'yaṃ rājaṃs tvayā śatruḥ same pathi niveśitaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:032.009c: nyastaś cātmā suviṣame kṛcchram āpāditā vayam
GE07mbh_09_u:032.010a: ko nu sarvān vinirjitya śatrūn ekena vairiṇā
GE07mbh_09_u:032.010d-0200_01: kṛcchraprāptena ca tathā hārayed rājyam āgatam
GE07mbh_09_u:032.011a: na hi paśyāmi taṃ loke gadāhastaṃ narottamam
GE07mbh_09_u:032.011c: yudhyed duryodhanaṃ saṃkhye kṛtitvād dhi viśeṣayet
GE07mbh_09_u:032.011d-0201_02: gadāhastaṃ vijetuṃ vai śaktaḥ syād amaro 'pi hi
GE07mbh_09_u:032.012a: phalgunaṃ vā bhavantaṃ vā mādrīputrāv athāpi vā
GE07mbh_09_u:032.012b-0201_03: na tvaṃ bhīmo na nakulaḥ sahadevo 'tha phalgunaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:032.012c: na samarthān ahaṃ manye gadāhastasya saṃyuge
GE07mbh_09_u:032.012d-0201_04: jetuṃ nyāyena śakto vai kṛtī rājā suyodhanaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:032.013a: sa kathaṃ vadase śatruṃ yudhyasva gadayeti ha
GE07mbh_09_u:032.013c: ekaṃ ca no nihatyājau bhava rājeti bhārata
GE07mbh_09_u:032.014a: vṛkodaraṃ samāsādya saṃśayo vijaye hi naḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:032.014c: nyāyato yudhyamānānāṃ kṛtī hy eṣa mahābalaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:032.014d-0202_01: ekaṃ vāsmān nihatya tvaṃ bhava rājeti vai punaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:032.014d-0202_02: nūnaṃ na rājyabhāgeṣā pāṇḍoḥ kuntyāś ca saṃtatiḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:032.016a: ahaṃ suyodhanaṃ saṃkhye haniṣyāmi na saṃśayaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:032.016c: vijayo vai dhruvaṃ kṛṣṇa dharmarājasya dṛśyate
GE07mbh_09_u:032.017c: na tathā dhārtarāṣṭrasya mā kārṣīr mādhava vyathām
GE07mbh_09_u:032.017d-0203_01: anayā gadayā cāhaṃ saṃyuge yoddhum utsahe
GE07mbh_09_u:032.017d-0203_02: bhavantaḥ prekṣakāḥ sarve mama santu janārdana
GE07mbh_09_u:032.018a: sāmarān api lokāṃs trīn nānāśastradharān yudhi
GE07mbh_09_u:032.018c: yodhayeyaṃ raṇe hṛṣṭaḥ kim utādya suyodhanam saṃjaya uvāca
GE07mbh_09_u:032.019-002_0003: muhur muhur balāmāne kṣveḍāṃ muñcati cāsakṛt
GE07mbh_09_u:032.019-002_0007: naitac citraṃ mahābāho hanyās tvaṃ yat suyodhanam
GE07mbh_09_u:032.019-002_0008: yena vaiśravaṇo yuddhe maṇibhadraś ca yakṣarāṭ
GE07mbh_09_u:032.019-002_0010: tasya te gaṇanāṃ yuddhe kaḥ kuryād dhṛtarāṣṭraje
GE07mbh_09_u:032.019-002_0012: bakaṃ taddviguṇaṃ saṃkhye kirmīraṃ ca caturguṇam
GE07mbh_09_u:032.019-002_0014: sa tvaṃ nihantā kauravyam atra kasyāsti saṃśayaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:032.019-002_0018: vipriyaṃ bhīmasenasya kṛtvā ko 'sti sukhī naraḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:032.019-002_0019: sātyakiḥ prāha kṛṣṇātmā bhīmaṃ saṃvīkṣya keśavam
GE07mbh_09_u:032.019-002_0021: girīn aśeṣān saṃkruddhaś cūrṇayed yaḥ kṣaṇena ha
GE07mbh_09_u:032.019-002_0023: gajair gajān hayair aśvān rathāṃś caiva rathais tathā
GE07mbh_09_u:032.019-002_0024: apātayat samakṣaṃ te mama prītyartham eva ca
GE07mbh_09_u:032.019-002_0025: tathā saṃpūjayām āsa śauryaṃ bhīmasya phalgunaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:032.019-002_0026: nakulaḥ sahadevaś ca praśaśaṃsuḥ punaḥ punaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:032.019-002_0029: vividhābhiś ca vāgbhiś ca pūjayām āsur ādṛtāḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:032.019-002_0032: pāṇḍavaḥ saha pāñcālaiḥ saṃstutaḥ karmabhis tathā
GE07mbh_09_u:032.019-002_0033: pūjitaś ca maheṣvāsas tadaiva tejito bhṛśam
GE07mbh_09_u:032.019-002_0036: keśavaṃ dharmarājaṃ ca samastān anujāṃs tathā
GE07mbh_09_u:032.019c: hṛṣṭaḥ saṃpūjayām āsa vacanaṃ cedam abravīt
GE07mbh_09_u:032.020c: nihatāriḥ svakāṃ dīptāṃ śriyaṃ prāpto na saṃśayaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:032.021c: rājāno rājaputrāś ca nāgāś ca vinipātitāḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:032.022a: kaliṅgā māgadhāḥ prācyā gāndhārāḥ kuravas tathā
GE07mbh_09_u:032.024a: tvāṃ ca prāpya raṇe pāpo dhārtarāṣṭro vinaṅkṣyati
GE07mbh_09_u:032.024c: tvam asya sakthinī bhaṅktvā pratijñāṃ pārayiṣyasi
GE07mbh_09_u:032.025a: yatnena tu sadā pārtha yoddhavyo dhṛtarāṣṭrajaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:032.025c: kṛtī ca balavāṃś caiva yuddhaśauṇḍaś ca nityadā
GE07mbh_09_u:032.026a: tatas tu sātyakī rājan pūjayām āsa pāṇḍavam
GE07mbh_09_u:032.026c: vividhābhiś ca tāṃ vāgbhiḥ pūjayām āsa mādhavaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:032.028c: sṛñjayaiḥ saha tiṣṭhantaṃ tapantam iva bhāskaram
GE07mbh_09_u:032.029a: aham etena saṃgamya saṃyuge yoddhum utsahe
GE07mbh_09_u:032.029c: na hi śakto raṇe jetuṃ mām eṣa puruṣādhamaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:032.030a: adya krodhaṃ vimokṣyāmi nihitaṃ hṛdaye bhṛśam
GE07mbh_09_u:032.031c: nihatya gadayā pāpam adya rājan sukhī bhava
GE07mbh_09_u:032.032c: prāṇāñ śriyaṃ ca rājyaṃ ca mokṣyate 'dya suyodhanaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:032.033a: rājā ca dhṛtarāṣṭro 'dya śrutvā putraṃ mayā hatam
GE07mbh_09_u:032.033c: smariṣyaty aśubhaṃ karma yat tac chakunibuddhijam
GE07mbh_09_u:032.034a: ity uktvā bharataśreṣṭho gadām udyamya vīryavān
GE07mbh_09_u:032.034d-0204_01: tad āhvānam amṛṣyan vai tava putro 'tivīryavān
GE07mbh_09_u:032.034d-0204_02: pratyupasthita evāśu matto mattam iva dvipam
GE07mbh_09_u:032.034d-0204_04: dadṛśuḥ pāṇḍavāḥ sarve kailāsam iva śṛṅgiṇam
GE07mbh_09_u:032.035d-0205_01: na saṃbhramo na ca bhayaṃ na ca glānir na ca vyathā
GE07mbh_09_u:032.036a: tam udyatagadaṃ dṛṣṭvā kailāsam iva śṛṅgiṇam
GE07mbh_09_u:032.037a: rājñāpi dhṛtarāṣṭreṇa tvayā cāsmāsu yat kṛtam
GE07mbh_09_u:032.037c: smara tad duṣkṛtaṃ karma yad vṛttaṃ vāraṇāvate
GE07mbh_09_u:032.038c: dyūte yad vijito rājā śakuner buddhiniścayāt
GE07mbh_09_u:032.039a: yāni cānyāni duṣṭātman pāpāni kṛtavān asi
GE07mbh_09_u:032.039c: anāgaḥsu ca pārtheṣu tasya paśya mahat phalam
GE07mbh_09_u:032.041a: hato droṇaś ca karṇaś ca hataḥ śalyaḥ pratāpavān
GE07mbh_09_u:032.042a: bhrātaras te hatāḥ śūrāḥ putrāś ca sahasainikāḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:032.042c: rājānaś ca hatāḥ śūrāḥ samareṣv anivartinaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:032.043a: ete cānye ca nihatā bahavaḥ kṣatriyarṣabhāḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:032.043c: prātikāmī tathā pāpo draupadyāḥ kleśakṛd dhataḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:032.044c: tvām apy adya haniṣyāmi gadayā nātra saṃśayaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:032.045a: adya te 'haṃ raṇe darpaṃ sarvaṃ nāśayitā nṛpa
GE07mbh_09_u:032.045c: rājyāśāṃ vipulāṃ rājan pāṇḍaveṣu ca duṣkṛtam
GE07mbh_09_u:032.046a: kiṃ katthitena bahudhā yudhyasvādya mayā saha
GE07mbh_09_u:032.047a: kiṃ na paśyasi māṃ pāpa gadāyuddhe vyavasthitam
GE07mbh_09_u:032.048a: gadinaṃ ko 'dya māṃ pāpa jetum utsahate ripuḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:032.048d-0206_01: yad etat kathitaṃ pūrvaṃ madīyaṃ durviceṣṭitam
GE07mbh_09_u:032.048d-0206_02: sarvaṃ tan na ca me kiṃ cic chaṅkitaṃ kartum eva hi
GE07mbh_09_u:032.048d-0206_03: araṇye cāpi vasatiṃ dāsyaṃ ca paraveśmasu
GE07mbh_09_u:032.048d-0206_05: hatāś ca bāndhavās tubhyaṃ kṣayas tulyo 'yam āvayoḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:032.048d-0206_06: patanaṃ saṃprati tu me yadi nāma bhaved yudhi
GE07mbh_09_u:032.048d-0206_07: tad atiślāghyam eva syāt kālo vā tatra kāraṇam
GE07mbh_09_u:032.048d-0206_08: adyāpi hi na me jetā dharmeṇāsti raṇājire
GE07mbh_09_u:032.048d-0206_09: chadmanā yadi jeṣyadhvam akīrtiḥ sthāsyati dhruvam
GE07mbh_09_u:032.048d-0206_10: adharmyā vāyaśasyā ca paścāt tapsyatha vai dhruvam
GE07mbh_09_u:032.049a: mā vṛthā garja kaunteya śāradābhram ivājalam
GE07mbh_09_u:032.049c: darśayasva balaṃ yuddhe yāvat tat te 'dya vidyate
GE07mbh_09_u:032.050a: tasya tad vacanaṃ śrutvā pāñcālāḥ sahasṛñjayāḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:032.050c: sarve saṃpūjayām āsus tad vaco vijigīṣavaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:032.051a: taṃ mattam iva mātaṅgaṃ talaśabdena mānavāḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:032.051c: bhūyaḥ saṃharṣayām āsū rājan duryodhanaṃ nṛpam
GE07mbh_09_u:032.052a: bṛṃhanti kuñjarās tatra hayā heṣanti cāsakṛt
GE07mbh_09_u:033.002a: tatas tāladhvajo rāmas tayor yuddha upasthite
GE07mbh_09_u:033.002c: śrutvā tac chiṣyayo rājann ājagāma halāyudhaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:033.003b-0207_02: pūjayitvā tataḥ paścād idaṃ vacanam abruvan
GE07mbh_09_u:033.003c: śiṣyayoḥ kauśalaṃ yuddhe paśya rāmeti cābruvan
GE07mbh_09_u:033.004a: abravīc ca tadā rāmo dṛṣṭvā kṛṣṇaṃ ca pāṇḍavam
GE07mbh_09_u:033.005a: catvāriṃśad ahāny adya dve ca me niḥsṛtasya vai
GE07mbh_09_u:033.008a: mādrīputrau tathā śūrau draupadyāḥ pañca cātmajāḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:033.009d-0209_01: abhivādya tatas tau tu sasvajāte halāyudham
GE07mbh_09_u:033.010a: svāgatena ca te tatra pratipūjya punaḥ punaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:033.010c: paśya yuddhaṃ mahābāho iti te rāmam abruvan
GE07mbh_09_u:033.011a: pariṣvajya tadā rāmaḥ pāṇḍavān sṛñjayān api
GE07mbh_09_u:033.011e: tathaiva te samāsādya papracchus tam anāmayam
GE07mbh_09_u:033.012a: pratyabhyarcya halī sarvān kṣatriyāṃś ca mahāmanāḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:033.013a: janārdanaṃ sātyakiṃ ca premṇā sa pariṣasvaje
GE07mbh_09_u:033.014a: tau cainaṃ vidhivad rājan pūjayām āsatur gurum
GE07mbh_09_u:033.014c: brahmāṇam iva deveśam indropendrau mudā yutau
GE07mbh_09_u:033.015c: idaṃ bhrātror mahāyuddhaṃ paśya rāmeti bhārata
GE07mbh_09_u:033.018c: āsīd antakaro rājan vairasya tava putrayoḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:034.001a: pūrvam eva yadā rāmas tasmin yuddha upasthite
GE07mbh_09_u:034.001c: āmantrya keśavaṃ yāto vṛṣṇibhiḥ sahitaḥ prabhuḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:034.002a: sāhāyyaṃ dhārtarāṣṭrasya na ca kartāsmi keśava
GE07mbh_09_u:034.003a: evam uktvā tadā rāmo yātaḥ śatrunibarhaṇaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:034.003c: tasya cāgamanaṃ bhūyo brahmañ śaṃsitum arhasi
GE07mbh_09_u:034.004a: ākhyāhi me vistarataḥ kathaṃ rāma upasthitaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:034.004c: kathaṃ ca dṛṣṭavān yuddhaṃ kuśalo hy asi sattama
GE07mbh_09_u:034.006a: sa gatvā hāstinapuraṃ dhṛtarāṣṭraṃ sametya ca
GE07mbh_09_u:034.006c: uktavān vacanaṃ tathyaṃ hitaṃ caiva viśeṣataḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:034.006e: na ca tat kṛtavān rājā yathākhyātaṃ hi te purā
GE07mbh_09_u:034.008d-0211_01: yathoktaṃ ca yathāvṛttam uktvā pāṇḍavam abravīt
GE07mbh_09_u:034.009a: na kurvanti vaco mahyaṃ kuravaḥ kālacoditāḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:034.011c: kriyatām iti tat kṛṣṇo nāsya cakre vacas tadā
GE07mbh_09_u:034.011d-0212_01: dhīmān arivināśāya kṛtaṃ sarvaṃ sadā hariḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:034.011d-0212_02: sasmāra sa tadā tatra idaṃ tatra punaḥ punaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:034.013a: āśrayām āsa bhojas tu duryodhanam ariṃdamaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:034.015a: gacchann eva pathisthas tu rāmaḥ preṣyān uvāca ha
GE07mbh_09_u:034.015e: ānayadhvaṃ dvārakāyā agnīn vai yājakāṃs tathā
GE07mbh_09_u:034.016a: suvarṇaṃ rajataṃ caiva dhenūr vāsāṃsi vājinaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:034.016c: kuñjarāṃś ca rathāṃś caiva kharoṣṭraṃ vāhanāni ca
GE07mbh_09_u:034.017c: ṛtvijaś cānayadhvaṃ vai śataśaś ca dvijarṣabhān
GE07mbh_09_u:034.018a: evaṃ saṃdiśya tu preṣyān baladevo mahābalaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:034.018c: tīrthayātrāṃ yayau rājan kurūṇāṃ vaiśase tadā
GE07mbh_09_u:034.019a: ṛtvigbhiś ca suhṛdbhiś ca tathānyair dvijasattamaiḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:034.019c: rathair gajais tathāśvaiś ca preṣyaiś ca bharatarṣabha
GE07mbh_09_u:034.019e: gokharoṣṭraprayuktaiś ca yānaiś ca bahubhir vṛtaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:034.020c: tāni yānāni deśeṣu pratīkṣyante sma bhārata
GE07mbh_09_u:034.020f-0214_01: deśe deśe tu deyāni dānāni vividhāni ca
GE07mbh_09_u:034.020f-0214_02: arcāyai cārthināṃ rājan klṛptāni bahuśas tathā
GE07mbh_09_u:034.021a: yo yo yatra dvijo bhoktuṃ kāmaṃ kāmayate tadā
GE07mbh_09_u:034.021c: tasya tasya tu tatraivam upajahrus tadā nṛpa
GE07mbh_09_u:034.022a: tatra sthitā narā rājan rauhiṇeyasya śāsanāt
GE07mbh_09_u:034.023c: pūjārthaṃ tatra kḷptāni viprāṇāṃ sukham icchatām
GE07mbh_09_u:034.024a: yatra yaḥ svapate vipraḥ kṣatriyo vāpi bhārata
GE07mbh_09_u:034.024c: tatra tatra tu tasyaiva sarvaṃ kḷptam adṛśyata
GE07mbh_09_u:034.025a: yathāsukhaṃ janaḥ sarvas tiṣṭhate yāti vā tadā
GE07mbh_09_u:034.026c: upajahrur narās tatra vastrāṇy ābharaṇāni ca
GE07mbh_09_u:034.027a: sa panthāḥ prababhau rājan sarvasyaiva sukhāvahaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:034.027c: svargopamas tadā vīra narāṇāṃ tatra gacchatām
GE07mbh_09_u:034.029a: tato mahātmā niyame sthitātmā; puṇyeṣu tīrtheṣu vasūni rājan
GE07mbh_09_u:034.029c: dadau dvijebhyaḥ kratudakṣiṇāś ca; yadupravīro halabhṛt pratītaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:034.030a: dogdhrīś ca dhenūś ca sahasraśo vai; suvāsasaḥ kāñcanabaddhaśṛṅgīḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:034.030c: hayāṃś ca nānāvidhadeśajātān; yānāni dāsīś ca tathā dvijebhyaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:034.031a: ratnāni muktāmaṇividrumaṃ ca; śṛṅgīsuvarṇaṃ rajataṃ ca śubhram
GE07mbh_09_u:034.031c: ayasmayaṃ tāmramayaṃ ca bhāṇḍaṃ; dadau dvijātipravareṣu rāmaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:034.032a: evaṃ sa vittaṃ pradadau mahātmā; sarasvatītīrthavareṣu bhūri
GE07mbh_09_u:034.033c: phalaṃ ca dvipadāṃ śreṣṭha karmanirvṛttim eva ca
GE07mbh_09_u:034.034c: brahman brahmavidāṃ śreṣṭha paraṃ kautūhalaṃ hi me
GE07mbh_09_u:034.035a: tīrthānāṃ vistaraṃ rājan guṇotpattiṃ ca sarvaśaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:034.035c: mayocyamānāṃ śṛṇu vai puṇyāṃ rājendra kṛtsnaśaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:034.036a: pūrvaṃ mahārāja yadupravīra; ṛtviksuhṛdvipragaṇaiś ca sārdham
GE07mbh_09_u:034.036c: puṇyaṃ prabhāsaṃ samupājagāma; yatroḍurāḍ yakṣmaṇā kliśyamānaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:034.037a: vimuktaśāpaḥ punar āpya tejaḥ; sarvaṃ jagad bhāsayate narendra
GE07mbh_09_u:034.037c: evaṃ tu tīrthapravaraṃ pṛthivyāṃ; prabhāsanāt tasya tataḥ prabhāsaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:034.038c: kathaṃ ca tīrthapravare tasmiṃś candro nyamajjata
GE07mbh_09_u:034.039a: katham āplutya tasmiṃs tu punar āpyāyitaḥ śaśī
GE07mbh_09_u:034.039c: etan me sarvam ācakṣva vistareṇa mahāmune
GE07mbh_09_u:034.040a: dakṣasya tanayā yās tāḥ prādurāsan viśāṃ pate
GE07mbh_09_u:034.040c: sa saptaviṃśatiṃ kanyā dakṣaḥ somāya vai dadau
GE07mbh_09_u:034.041c: patnyo vai tasya rājendra somasya śubhalakṣaṇāḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:034.042a: tās tu sarvā viśālākṣyo rūpeṇāpratimā bhuvi
GE07mbh_09_u:034.043a: tatas tasyāṃ sa bhagavān prītiṃ cakre niśākaraḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:034.043c: sāsya hṛdyā babhūvātha tasmāt tāṃ bubhuje sadā
GE07mbh_09_u:034.044a: purā hi somo rājendra rohiṇyām avasac ciram
GE07mbh_09_u:034.045a: tā gatvā pitaraṃ prāhuḥ prajāpatim atandritāḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:034.045c: somo vasati nāsmāsu rohiṇīṃ bhajate sadā
GE07mbh_09_u:034.046a: tā vayaṃ sahitāḥ sarvās tvatsakāśe prajeśvara
GE07mbh_09_u:034.046b-0215_01: saṃprāptāḥ paribhūtāḥ smo gatir bhava pitaḥ svayam
GE07mbh_09_u:034.047a: śrutvā tāsāṃ tu vacanaṃ dakṣaḥ somam athābravīt
GE07mbh_09_u:034.047c: samaṃ vartasva bhāryāsu mā tvādharmo mahān spṛśet
GE07mbh_09_u:034.048a: tāś ca sarvābravīd dakṣo gacchadhvaṃ somam antikāt
GE07mbh_09_u:034.048c: samaṃ vatsyati sarvāsu candramā mama śāsanāt
GE07mbh_09_u:034.049a: visṛṣṭās tās tadā jagmuḥ śītāṃśubhavanaṃ tadā
GE07mbh_09_u:034.049c: tathāpi somo bhagavān punar eva mahīpate
GE07mbh_09_u:034.049e: rohiṇīṃ nivasaty eva prīyamāṇo muhur muhuḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:034.050a: tatas tāḥ sahitāḥ sarvā bhūyaḥ pitaram abruvan
GE07mbh_09_u:034.050c: tava śuśrūṣaṇe yuktā vatsyāmo hi tavāśrame
GE07mbh_09_u:034.050e: somo vasati nāsmāsu nākarod vacanaṃ tava
GE07mbh_09_u:034.051a: tāsāṃ tad vacanaṃ śrutvā dakṣaḥ somam athābravīt
GE07mbh_09_u:034.051c: samaṃ vartasva bhāryāsu mā tvāṃ śapsye virocana
GE07mbh_09_u:034.052a: anādṛtya tu tad vākyaṃ dakṣasya bhagavāñ śaśī
GE07mbh_09_u:034.052c: rohiṇyā sārdham avasat tatas tāḥ kupitāḥ punaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:034.053a: gatvā ca pitaraṃ prāhuḥ praṇamya śirasā tadā
GE07mbh_09_u:034.053c: somo vasati nāsmāsu tasmān naḥ śaraṇaṃ bhava
GE07mbh_09_u:034.054a: rohiṇyām eva bhagavan sadā vasati candramāḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:034.054b-0216_01: na tvadvaco gaṇayati nāsmāsu sneham icchati
GE07mbh_09_u:034.054c: tasmān nas trāhi sarvā vai yathā naḥ soma āviśet
GE07mbh_09_u:034.055a: tac chrutvā bhagavān kruddho yakṣmāṇaṃ pṛthivīpate
GE07mbh_09_u:034.055c: sasarja roṣāt somāya sa coḍupatim āviśat
GE07mbh_09_u:034.056c: yatnaṃ cāpy akarod rājan mokṣārthaṃ tasya yakṣmaṇaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:034.057c: na cāmucyata śāpād vai kṣayaṃ caivābhyagacchata
GE07mbh_09_u:034.058a: kṣīyamāṇe tataḥ some oṣadhyo na prajajñire
GE07mbh_09_u:034.059a: oṣadhīnāṃ kṣaye jāte prāṇinām api saṃkṣayaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:034.059c: kṛśāś cāsan prajāḥ sarvāḥ kṣīyamāṇe niśākare
GE07mbh_09_u:034.060a: tato devāḥ samāgamya somam ūcur mahīpate
GE07mbh_09_u:034.060c: kim idaṃ bhavato rūpam īdṛśaṃ na prakāśate
GE07mbh_09_u:034.061a: kāraṇaṃ brūhi naḥ sarvaṃ yenedaṃ te mahad bhayam
GE07mbh_09_u:034.061c: śrutvā tu vacanaṃ tvatto vidhāsyāmas tato vayam
GE07mbh_09_u:034.062a: evam uktaḥ pratyuvāca sarvāṃs tāñ śaśalakṣaṇaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:034.062c: śāpaṃ ca kāraṇaṃ caiva yakṣmāṇaṃ ca tathātmanaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:034.063a: devās tasya vacaḥ śrutvā gatvā dakṣam athābruvan
GE07mbh_09_u:034.063c: prasīda bhagavan some śāpaś caiṣa nivartyatām
GE07mbh_09_u:034.064a: asau hi candramāḥ kṣīṇaḥ kiṃciccheṣo hi lakṣyate
GE07mbh_09_u:034.064c: kṣayāc caivāsya deveśa prajāś cāpi gatāḥ kṣayam
GE07mbh_09_u:034.065b-0217_01: teṣāṃ kṣaye kṣayo 'smākaṃ vināsmābhir jagac ca kim
GE07mbh_09_u:034.065c: tathā vayaṃ lokaguro prasādaṃ kartum arhasi
GE07mbh_09_u:034.066a: evam uktas tadā cintya prāha vākyaṃ prajāpatiḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:034.066c: naitac chakyaṃ mama vaco vyāvartayitum anyathā
GE07mbh_09_u:034.066e: hetunā tu mahābhāgā nivartiṣyati kena cit
GE07mbh_09_u:034.067a: samaṃ vartatu sarvāsu śaśī bhāryāsu nityaśaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:034.067e: punar vardhiṣyate devās tad vai satyaṃ vaco mama
GE07mbh_09_u:034.068a: māsārdhaṃ ca kṣayaṃ somo nityam eva gamiṣyati
GE07mbh_09_u:034.068c: māsārdhaṃ ca sadā vṛddhiṃ satyam etad vaco mama
GE07mbh_09_u:034.069c: prabhāsaṃ paramaṃ tīrthaṃ sarasvatyā jagāma ha
GE07mbh_09_u:034.070c: lokān prabhāsayām āsa śītāṃśutvam avāpa ca
GE07mbh_09_u:034.071a: devāś ca sarve rājendra prabhāsaṃ prāpya puṣkalam
GE07mbh_09_u:034.072c: somaṃ ca bhagavān prīto bhūyo vacanam abravīt
GE07mbh_09_u:034.073a: māvamaṃsthāḥ striyaḥ putra mā ca viprān kadā cana
GE07mbh_09_u:034.073c: gaccha yuktaḥ sadā bhūtvā kuru vai śāsanaṃ mama
GE07mbh_09_u:034.074a: sa visṛṣṭo mahārāja jagāmātha svam ālayam
GE07mbh_09_u:034.074c: prajāś ca muditā bhūtvā bhojane ca yathā purā
GE07mbh_09_u:034.075a: etat te sarvam ākhyātaṃ yathā śapto niśākaraḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:034.075c: prabhāsaṃ ca yathā tīrthaṃ tīrthānāṃ pravaraṃ hy abhūt
GE07mbh_09_u:034.076c: snātvā hy āpyāyate śrīmān prabhāse tīrtha uttame
GE07mbh_09_u:034.077a: ataś cainaṃ prajānanti prabhāsam iti bhūmipa
GE07mbh_09_u:034.077c: prabhāṃ hi paramāṃ lebhe tasminn unmajjya candramāḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:034.077d-0219_01: lokān prabhāsayām āsa pupoṣa ca vapus tathā
GE07mbh_09_u:034.077d-0219_02: tatra snātvā halī rāmo dattvā prīto 'tha dakṣiṇām
GE07mbh_09_u:034.078a: tatas tu camasodbhedam acyutas tv agamad balī
GE07mbh_09_u:034.078c: camasodbheda ity evaṃ yaṃ janāḥ kathayanty uta
GE07mbh_09_u:034.079a: tatra dattvā ca dānāni viśiṣṭāni halāyudhaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:034.079c: uṣitvā rajanīm ekāṃ snātvā ca vidhivat tadā
GE07mbh_09_u:034.080c: ādyaṃ svastyayanaṃ caiva tatrāvāpya mahat phalam
GE07mbh_09_u:034.081a: snigdhatvād oṣadhīnāṃ ca bhūmeś ca janamejaya
GE07mbh_09_u:034.081c: jānanti siddhā rājendra naṣṭām api sarasvatīm
GE07mbh_09_u:035.002a: tatra dattvā bahu dravyaṃ pūjayitvā tathā dvijān
GE07mbh_09_u:035.003a: tatra dharmaparo hy āsīt tritaḥ sa sumahātapāḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:035.003c: kūpe ca vasatā tena somaḥ pīto mahātmanā
GE07mbh_09_u:035.004a: tatra cainaṃ samutsṛjya bhrātarau jagmatur gṛhān
GE07mbh_09_u:035.004c: tatas tau vai śaśāpātha trito brāhmaṇasattamaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:035.005a: udapānaṃ kathaṃ brahman kathaṃ ca sumahātapāḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:035.005c: patitaḥ kiṃ ca saṃtyakto bhrātṛbhyāṃ dvijasattamaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:035.006a: kūpe kathaṃ ca hitvainaṃ bhrātarau jagmatur gṛhān
GE07mbh_09_u:035.006b-0220_01: kathaṃ ca yājayām āsa papau somaṃ ca vai katham
GE07mbh_09_u:035.006c: etad ācakṣva me brahman yadi śrāvyaṃ hi manyase
GE07mbh_09_u:035.007a: āsan pūrvayuge rājan munayo bhrātaras trayaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:035.007c: ekataś ca dvitaś caiva tritaś cādityasaṃnibhāḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:035.009a: teṣāṃ tu tapasā prīto niyamena damena ca
GE07mbh_09_u:035.009c: abhavad gautamo nityaṃ pitā dharmarataḥ sadā
GE07mbh_09_u:035.010a: sa tu dīrgheṇa kālena teṣāṃ prītim avāpya ca
GE07mbh_09_u:035.011a: rājānas tasya ye pūrve yājyā hy āsan mahātmanaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:035.011c: te sarve svargate tasmiṃs tasya putrān apūjayan
GE07mbh_09_u:035.012a: teṣāṃ tu karmaṇā rājaṃs tathaivādhyayanena ca
GE07mbh_09_u:035.012c: tritaḥ sa śreṣṭhatāṃ prāpa yathaivāsya pitā tathā
GE07mbh_09_u:035.013a: taṃ sma sarve mahābhāgā munayaḥ puṇyalakṣaṇāḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:035.014a: kadā cid dhi tato rājan bhrātarāv ekatadvitau
GE07mbh_09_u:035.014c: yajñārthaṃ cakratuś cittaṃ dhanārthaṃ ca viśeṣataḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:035.015a: tayoś cintā samabhavat tritaṃ gṛhya paraṃtapa
GE07mbh_09_u:035.015c: yājyān sarvān upādāya pratigṛhya paśūṃs tataḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:035.016a: somaṃ pāsyāmahe hṛṣṭāḥ prāpya yajñaṃ mahāphalam
GE07mbh_09_u:035.016c: cakruś caiva mahārāja bhrātaras traya eva ha
GE07mbh_09_u:035.016d-0221_01: tathā te samayaṃ kṛtvā gṛhān niṣkramya pārthiva
GE07mbh_09_u:035.017a: tathā tu te parikramya yājyān sarvān paśūn prati
GE07mbh_09_u:035.017c: yājayitvā tato yājyāṃl labdhvā ca subahūn paśūn
GE07mbh_09_u:035.018c: prācīṃ diśaṃ mahātmāna ājagmus te maharṣayaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:035.019a: tritas teṣāṃ mahārāja purastād yāti hṛṣṭavat
GE07mbh_09_u:035.019c: ekataś ca dvitaś caiva pṛṣṭhataḥ kālayan paśūn
GE07mbh_09_u:035.020a: tayoś cintā samabhavad dṛṣṭvā paśugaṇaṃ mahat
GE07mbh_09_u:035.020c: kathaṃ na syur imā gāva āvābhyāṃ vai vinā tritam
GE07mbh_09_u:035.021a: tāv anyonyaṃ samābhāṣya ekataś ca dvitaś ca ha
GE07mbh_09_u:035.021c: yad ūcatur mithaḥ pāpau tan nibodha janeśvara
GE07mbh_09_u:035.022a: trito yajñeṣu kuśalas trito vedeṣu niṣṭhitaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:035.023a: tad āvāṃ sahitau bhūtvā gāḥ prakālya vrajāvahe
GE07mbh_09_u:035.023c: trito 'pi gacchatāṃ kāmam āvābhyāṃ vai vinākṛtaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:035.025a: atha trito vṛkaṃ dṛṣṭvā pathi tiṣṭhantam agrataḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:035.025c: tadbhayād apasarpan vai tasmin kūpe papāta ha
GE07mbh_09_u:035.026c: ārtanādaṃ tataś cakre tau tu śuśruvatur munī
GE07mbh_09_u:035.027a: taṃ jñātvā patitaṃ kūpe bhrātarāv ekatadvitau
GE07mbh_09_u:035.027c: vṛkatrāsāc ca lobhāc ca samutsṛjya prajagmatuḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:035.030a: buddhyā hy agaṇayat prājño mṛtyor bhīto hy asomapaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:035.030c: somaḥ kathaṃ nu pātavya ihasthena mayā bhavet
GE07mbh_09_u:035.031a: sa evam anusaṃcintya tasmin kūpe mahātapāḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:035.032a: pāṃsugraste tataḥ kūpe vicintya salilaṃ muniḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:035.032c: agnīn saṃkalpayām āsa hotre cātmānam eva ca
GE07mbh_09_u:035.033a: tatas tāṃ vīrudhaṃ somaṃ saṃkalpya sumahātapāḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:035.033c: ṛco yajūṃṣi sāmāni manasā cintayan muniḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:035.034a: ājyaṃ ca salilaṃ cakre bhāgāṃś ca tridivaukasām
GE07mbh_09_u:035.035a: sa cāviśad divaṃ rājan svaraḥ śaikṣas tritasya vai
GE07mbh_09_u:035.035c: samavāpa ca taṃ yajñaṃ yathoktaṃ brahmavādibhiḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:035.036c: āvignaṃ tridivaṃ sarvaṃ kāraṇaṃ ca na budhyate
GE07mbh_09_u:035.038a: tritasya vartate yajñas tatra gacchāmahe surāḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:035.038c: sa hi kruddhaḥ sṛjed anyān devān api mahātapāḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:035.039a: tac chrutvā vacanaṃ tasya sahitāḥ sarvadevatāḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:035.040a: te tatra gatvā vibudhās taṃ kūpaṃ yatra sa tritaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:035.041a: dṛṣṭvā cainaṃ mahātmānaṃ śriyā paramayā yutam
GE07mbh_09_u:035.041c: ūcuś cātha mahābhāgaṃ prāptā bhāgārthino vayam
GE07mbh_09_u:035.042a: athābravīd ṛṣir devān paśyadhvaṃ māṃ divaukasaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:035.043a: tatas trito mahārāja bhāgāṃs teṣāṃ yathāvidhi
GE07mbh_09_u:035.043c: mantrayuktān samadadāt te ca prītās tadābhavan
GE07mbh_09_u:035.044a: tato yathāvidhi prāptān bhāgān prāpya divaukasaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:035.044c: prītātmāno dadus tasmai varān yān manasecchati
GE07mbh_09_u:035.045a: sa tu vavre varaṃ devāṃs trātum arhatha mām itaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:035.045c: yaś cehopaspṛśet kūpe sa somapagatiṃ labhet
GE07mbh_09_u:035.046b-0222_01: ājagāma drutaṃ prītā tasmin kūpe sarasvatī
GE07mbh_09_u:035.047a: tatheti coktvā vibudhā jagmū rājan yathāgatam
GE07mbh_09_u:035.047c: tritaś cāpy agamat prītaḥ svam eva nilayaṃ tadā
GE07mbh_09_u:035.048a: kruddhaḥ sa tu samāsādya tāv ṛṣī bhrātarau tadā
GE07mbh_09_u:035.048c: uvāca paruṣaṃ vākyaṃ śaśāpa ca mahātapāḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:035.049a: paśulubdhau yuvāṃ yasmān mām utsṛjya pradhāvitau
GE07mbh_09_u:035.049c: tasmād rūpeṇa teṣāṃ vai daṃṣṭriṇām abhitaś carau
GE07mbh_09_u:035.051a: ity ukte tu tadā tena kṣaṇād eva viśāṃ pate
GE07mbh_09_u:035.052c: dattvā ca vividhān dāyān pūjayitvā ca vai dvijān
GE07mbh_09_u:035.053a: udapānaṃ ca taṃ dṛṣṭvā praśasya ca punaḥ punaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:036.001c: śūdrābhīrān prati dveṣād yatra naṣṭā sarasvatī
GE07mbh_09_u:036.002a: yasmāt sā bharataśreṣṭha dveṣān naṣṭā sarasvatī
GE07mbh_09_u:036.002c: tasmāt tad ṛṣayo nityaṃ prāhur vinaśaneti ha
GE07mbh_09_u:036.003a: tac cāpy upaspṛśya balaḥ sarasvatyāṃ mahābalaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:036.005a: tatra devāḥ sagandharvā māsi māsi janeśvara
GE07mbh_09_u:036.007a: tatra modanti devāś ca pitaraś ca savīrudhaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:036.007c: puṇyaiḥ puṣpaiḥ sadā divyaiḥ kīryamāṇāḥ punaḥ punaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:036.008a: ākrīḍabhūmiḥ sā rājaṃs tāsām apsarasāṃ śubhā
GE07mbh_09_u:036.009a: tatra snātvā ca dattvā ca vasu vipreṣu mādhavaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:036.009c: śrutvā gītaṃ ca tad divyaṃ vāditrāṇāṃ ca niḥsvanam
GE07mbh_09_u:036.012a: tatra dattvā haladharo viprebhyo vividhaṃ vasu
GE07mbh_09_u:036.013a: bhojayitvā dvijān kāmaiḥ saṃtarpya ca mahādhanaiḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:036.013c: prayayau sahito vipraiḥ stūyamānaś ca mādhavaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:036.016a: utpātā dāruṇāś caiva śubhāś ca janamejaya
GE07mbh_09_u:036.016c: sarasvatyāḥ śubhe tīrthe vihitā vai mahātmanā
GE07mbh_09_u:036.016e: tasya nāmnā ca tat tīrthaṃ gargasrota iti smṛtam
GE07mbh_09_u:036.017a: tatra gargaṃ mahābhāgam ṛṣayaḥ suvratā nṛpa
GE07mbh_09_u:036.017c: upāsāṃ cakrire nityaṃ kālajñānaṃ prati prabho
GE07mbh_09_u:036.018c: vidhivad dhi dhanaṃ dattvā munīnāṃ bhāvitātmanām
GE07mbh_09_u:036.019a: uccāvacāṃs tathā bhakṣyān dvijebhyo vipradāya saḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:036.020e: sarasvatyās taṭe jātaṃ nagaṃ tāladhvajo balī
GE07mbh_09_u:036.022a: te sarve hy aśanaṃ tyaktvā phalaṃ tasya vanaspateḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:036.022c: vrataiś ca niyamaiś caiva kāle kāle sma bhuñjate
GE07mbh_09_u:036.023a: prāptaiś ca niyamais tais tair vicarantaḥ pṛthak pṛthak
GE07mbh_09_u:036.024a: evaṃ khyāto narapate loke 'smin sa vanaspatiḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:036.025a: tasmiṃś ca yaduśārdūlo dattvā tīrthe yaśasvinām
GE07mbh_09_u:036.026a: pūjayitvā dvijāṃś caiva pūjitaś ca tapodhanaiḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:036.027a: tatra gatvā munīn dṛṣṭvā nānāveṣadharān balaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:036.027c: āplutya salile cāpi pūjayām āsa vai dvijān
