GE07mbh_09_u:036.028c: tataḥ prāyād balo rājan dakṣiṇena sarasvatīm
GE07mbh_09_u:036.031e: pannagebhyo bhayaṃ tatra vidyate na sma kaurava
GE07mbh_09_u:036.032c: prāyāt prācīṃ diśaṃ rājan dīpyamānaḥ svatejasā
GE07mbh_09_u:036.032d-0223_01: tasyāṃ diśi vicitrāṇi tīrthāni paramāṇi ca
GE07mbh_09_u:036.033a: āplutya bahuśo hṛṣṭas teṣu tīrtheṣu lāṅgalī
GE07mbh_09_u:036.034c: tato rāmo 'gamat tīrtham ṛṣibhiḥ sevitaṃ mahat
GE07mbh_09_u:036.035a: yatra bhūyo nivavṛte prāṅmukhā vai sarasvatī
GE07mbh_09_u:036.035b-0224_03: āplutya teṣu tīrtheṣu yathoktaṃ tatra carṣibhiḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:036.035b-0224_05: abhivādya munīṃs tāṃs tu tatra tīrthanivāsinaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:036.035b-0224_07: prāṅmukhaṃ vai nivavṛte vṛṣṭir vātahatā yathā
GE07mbh_09_u:036.036a: nivṛttāṃ tāṃ saricchreṣṭhāṃ tatra dṛṣṭvā tu lāṅgalī
GE07mbh_09_u:036.037a: kasmāt sarasvatī brahman nivṛttā prāṅmukhī tataḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:036.038a: kasmiṃś ca kāraṇe tatra vismito yadunandanaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:036.039b-0226_03: tṛṇāśinas tathā cānye mārgaśāyina eva ca
GE07mbh_09_u:036.040a: uṣitvā ca mahābhāgās tasmin satre yathāvidhi
GE07mbh_09_u:036.041a: ṛṣīṇāṃ bahulatvāt tu sarasvatyā viśāṃ pate
GE07mbh_09_u:036.041c: tīrthāni nagarāyante kūle vai dakṣiṇe tadā
GE07mbh_09_u:036.043a: juhvatāṃ tatra teṣāṃ tu munīnāṃ bhāvitātmanām
GE07mbh_09_u:036.046b-0227_02: sarvatithyupavāsāś ca tathā hy anye sahasraśaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:036.047a: āsan vai munayas tatra sarasvatyāḥ samīpataḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:036.049a: tato yajñopavītais te tat tīrthaṃ nirmimāya vai
GE07mbh_09_u:036.049c: juhuvuś cāgnihotrāṇi cakruś ca vividhāḥ kriyāḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:036.050c: darśayām āsa rājendra teṣām arthe sarasvatī
GE07mbh_09_u:036.051a: tataḥ kuñjān bahūn kṛtvā saṃnivṛttā saridvarā
GE07mbh_09_u:036.052a: tato nivṛtya rājendra teṣām arthe sarasvatī
GE07mbh_09_u:036.053a: amoghā gamanaṃ kṛtvā teṣāṃ bhūyo vrajāmy aham
GE07mbh_09_u:036.053c: ity adbhutaṃ mahac cakre tato rājan mahānadī
GE07mbh_09_u:036.053d-0228_01: tatraiva kuñjamadhye tu sā jagāma sarasvatī
GE07mbh_09_u:036.054a: evaṃ sa kuñjo rājendra naimiṣeya iti smṛtaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:036.055a: tatra kuñjān bahūn dṛṣṭvā saṃnivṛttāṃ ca tāṃ nadīm
GE07mbh_09_u:036.056c: dattvā dāyān dvijātibhyo bhāṇḍāni vividhāni ca
GE07mbh_09_u:036.056e: bhakṣyaṃ peyaṃ ca vividhaṃ brāhmaṇān pratyapādayat
GE07mbh_09_u:036.057a: tataḥ prāyād balo rājan pūjyamāno dvijātibhiḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:036.058c: panasaiś ca palāśaiś ca karīraiḥ pīlubhis tathā
GE07mbh_09_u:036.058d-0231_01: sālais tālais tamālaiś ca kakubhaiś ca saketakaiḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:036.063c: yatra maṅkaṇakaḥ siddhas tapas tepe mahāmuniḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:037.001a: saptasārasvataṃ kasmāt kaś ca maṅkaṇako muniḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:037.001c: kathaṃ siddhaś ca bhagavān kaś cāsya niyamo 'bhavat
GE07mbh_09_u:037.002a: kasya vaṃśe samutpannaḥ kiṃ cādhītaṃ dvijottama
GE07mbh_09_u:037.002c: etad icchāmy ahaṃ śrotuṃ vidhivad dvijasattama
GE07mbh_09_u:037.003a: rājan sapta sarasvatyo yābhir vyāptam idaṃ jagat
GE07mbh_09_u:037.003c: āhūtā balavadbhir hi tatra tatra sarasvatī
GE07mbh_09_u:037.006c: deveṣu caiva vyagreṣu tasmin yajñavidhau tadā
GE07mbh_09_u:037.008a: manasā cintitā hy arthā dharmārthakuśalais tadā
GE07mbh_09_u:037.008c: upatiṣṭhanti rājendra dvijātīṃs tatra tatra ha
GE07mbh_09_u:037.009a: jaguś ca tatra gandharvā nanṛtuś cāpsarogaṇāḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:037.009c: vāditrāṇi ca divyāni vādayām āsur añjasā
GE07mbh_09_u:037.010a: tasya yajñasya saṃpattyā tutuṣur devatā api
GE07mbh_09_u:037.010c: vismayaṃ paramaṃ jagmuḥ kim u mānuṣayonayaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:037.011c: abruvann ṛṣayo rājan nāyaṃ yajño mahāphalaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:037.011e: na dṛśyate saricchreṣṭhā yasmād iha sarasvatī
GE07mbh_09_u:037.012a: tac chrutvā bhagavān prītaḥ sasmārātha sarasvatīm
GE07mbh_09_u:037.012e: suprabhā nāma rājendra nāmnā tatra sarasvatī
GE07mbh_09_u:037.013a: tāṃ dṛṣṭvā munayas tuṣṭā vegayuktāṃ sarasvatīm
GE07mbh_09_u:037.013c: pitāmahaṃ mānayantīṃ kratuṃ te bahu menire
GE07mbh_09_u:037.015c: tatra citrāḥ kathā hy āsan vedaṃ prati janeśvara
GE07mbh_09_u:037.016a: tatra te munayo hy āsan nānāsvādhyāyavedinaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:037.016c: te samāgamya munayaḥ sasmarur vai sarasvatīm
GE07mbh_09_u:037.017a: sā tu dhyātā mahārāja ṛṣibhiḥ satrayājibhiḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:037.018c: āgatā saritāṃ śreṣṭhā tatra bhārata pūjitā
GE07mbh_09_u:037.020a: viśālāṃ tu gayeṣv āhur ṛṣayaḥ saṃśitavratāḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:037.021a: auddālakes tathā yajñe yajatas tatra bhārata
GE07mbh_09_u:037.021c: samete sarvataḥ sphīte munīnāṃ maṇḍale tadā
GE07mbh_09_u:037.023e: manohradeti vikhyātā sā hi tair manasā hṛtā
GE07mbh_09_u:037.026e: samāhūtā yayau tatra puṇye haimavate girau
GE07mbh_09_u:037.027a: ekībhūtās tatas tās tu tasmiṃs tīrthe samāgatāḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:037.027c: saptasārasvataṃ tīrthaṃ tatas tat prathitaṃ bhuvi
GE07mbh_09_u:037.028c: saptasārasvataṃ caiva tīrthaṃ puṇyaṃ tathā smṛtam
GE07mbh_09_u:037.030a: dṛṣṭvā yadṛcchayā tatra striyam ambhasi bhārata
GE07mbh_09_u:037.031a: tad retaḥ sa tu jagrāha kalaśe vai mahātapāḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:037.031c: saptadhā pravibhāgaṃ tu kalaśasthaṃ jagāma ha
GE07mbh_09_u:037.031e: tatrarṣayaḥ sapta jātā jajñire marutāṃ gaṇāḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:037.033a: idam anyac ca rājendra śṛṇv āścaryataraṃ bhuvi
GE07mbh_09_u:037.033c: maharṣeś caritaṃ yādṛk triṣu lokeṣu viśrutam
GE07mbh_09_u:037.034a: purā maṅkaṇakaḥ siddhaḥ kuśāgreṇeti naḥ śrutam
GE07mbh_09_u:037.034c: kṣataḥ kila kare rājaṃs tasya śākaraso 'sravat
GE07mbh_09_u:037.034e: sa vi śākarasaṃ dṛṣṭvā harṣāviṣṭaḥ pranṛttavān
GE07mbh_09_u:037.035a: tatas tasmin pranṛtte vai sthāvaraṃ jaṅgamaṃ ca yat
GE07mbh_09_u:037.035c: pranṛttam ubhayaṃ vīra tejasā tasya mohitam
GE07mbh_09_u:037.036a: brahmādibhiḥ surai rājann ṛṣibhiś ca tapodhanaiḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:037.036c: vijñapto vai mahādeva ṛṣer arthe narādhipa
GE07mbh_09_u:037.036e: nāyaṃ nṛtyed yathā deva tathā tvaṃ kartum arhasi
GE07mbh_09_u:037.037a: tato devo muniṃ dṛṣṭvā harṣāviṣṭam atīva ha
GE07mbh_09_u:037.038a: bho bho brāhmaṇa dharmajña kimarthaṃ narinartsi vai
GE07mbh_09_u:037.039a: kiṃ na paśyasi me brahman karāc chākarasaṃ srutam
GE07mbh_09_u:037.039c: yaṃ dṛṣṭvā vai pranṛtto 'haṃ harṣeṇa mahatā vibho
GE07mbh_09_u:037.040a: taṃ prahasyābravīd devo muniṃ rāgeṇa mohitam
GE07mbh_09_u:037.040c: ahaṃ na vismayaṃ vipra gacchāmīti prapaśya mām
GE07mbh_09_u:037.042a: tato bhasma kṣatād rājan nirgataṃ himasaṃnibham
GE07mbh_09_u:037.042c: tad dṛṣṭvā vrīḍito rājan sa muniḥ pādayor gataḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:037.042d-0234_01: mene devaṃ mahādevam idaṃ covāca vismitaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:037.043a: nānyaṃ devād ahaṃ manye rudrāt parataraṃ mahat
GE07mbh_09_u:037.043c: surāsurasya jagato gatis tvam asi śūladhṛk
GE07mbh_09_u:037.044a: tvayā sṛṣṭam idaṃ viśvaṃ vadantīha manīṣiṇaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:037.044c: tvām eva sarvaṃ viśati punar eva yugakṣaye
GE07mbh_09_u:037.045a: devair api na śakyas tvaṃ parijñātuṃ kuto mayā
GE07mbh_09_u:037.045c: tvayi sarve sma dṛśyante surā brahmādayo 'nagha
GE07mbh_09_u:037.046a: sarvas tvam asi devānāṃ kartā kārayitā ca ha
GE07mbh_09_u:037.046d-0237_01: tvaṃ prabhuḥ paramaiśvaryād adhikaṃ bhāsi śaṃkara
GE07mbh_09_u:037.046d-0237_02: tvayi brahmā ca viṣṇuś ca lokān saṃdhārya tiṣṭhataḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:037.046d-0237_03: tvanmūlaṃ ca jagat sarvaṃ tvadantaṃ ca maheśvara
GE07mbh_09_u:037.046d-0237_04: tvayā hi vitatā lokā sapteme sarvasaṃbhava
GE07mbh_09_u:037.046d-0237_06: tvanmayaṃ hi jagat sarvaṃ bhūtaṃ sthāvarajaṅgamam
GE07mbh_09_u:037.046d-0237_08: dadāsi ca prasannas tvaṃ bhaktānāṃ parameśvara
GE07mbh_09_u:037.046d-0237_11: na vṛthāsti mahādeva prasādas te maheśvara
GE07mbh_09_u:037.046d-0237_13: prapadye śaraṇaṃ śaṃbhuṃ sarvadā sarvataḥ sthitam
GE07mbh_09_u:037.046d-0237_14: karmaṇā manasā vācā tam evābhijagāma ha
GE07mbh_09_u:037.047a: evaṃ stutvā mahādevaṃ sa ṛṣiḥ praṇato 'bravīt
GE07mbh_09_u:037.047b-0238_01: yad idaṃ cāpalaṃ deva kṛtam etat smayādikam
GE07mbh_09_u:037.047c: bhagavaṃs tvatprasādād vai tapo me na kṣared iti
GE07mbh_09_u:037.048a: tato devaḥ prītamanās tam ṛṣiṃ punar abravīt
GE07mbh_09_u:037.048c: tapas te vardhatāṃ vipra matprasādāt sahasradhā
GE07mbh_09_u:037.048e: āśrame ceha vatsyāmi tvayā sārdham ahaṃ sadā
GE07mbh_09_u:037.049a: saptasārasvate cāsmin yo mām arciṣyate naraḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:037.049c: na tasya durlabhaṃ kiṃ cid bhaviteha paratra ca
GE07mbh_09_u:037.049e: sārasvataṃ ca lokaṃ te gamiṣyanti na saṃśayaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:037.050b-0239_01: kathitaṃ ca nṛpatiśreṣṭha kiṃ bhūyaḥ kathayāmi te
GE07mbh_09_u:037.050c: sa hi putraḥ sajanyāyām utpanno mātariśvanā
GE07mbh_09_u:038.001c: tathā maṅkaṇake prītiṃ śubhāṃ cakre halāyudhaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:038.002a: dattvā dānaṃ dvijātibhyo rajanīṃ tām upoṣya ca
GE07mbh_09_u:038.002c: pūjito munisaṃghaiś ca prātar utthāya lāṅgalī
GE07mbh_09_u:038.003a: anujñāpya munīn sarvān spṛṣṭvā toyaṃ ca bhārata
GE07mbh_09_u:038.006a: tatra pūrvaṃ tapas taptaṃ kāvyena sumahātmanā
GE07mbh_09_u:038.007a: tat prāpya ca balo rājaṃs tīrthapravaram uttamam
GE07mbh_09_u:038.007c: vidhivad dhi dadau vittaṃ brāhmaṇānāṃ mahātmanām
GE07mbh_09_u:038.008c: muktaḥ kathaṃ cāsya śiro lagnaṃ kena ca hetunā
GE07mbh_09_u:038.011a: mahodarasya tal lagnaṃ jaṅghāyāṃ vai yadṛcchayā
GE07mbh_09_u:038.011c: vane vicarato rājann asthi bhittvāsphurat tadā
GE07mbh_09_u:038.012a: sa tena lagnena tadā dvijātir na śaśāka ha
GE07mbh_09_u:038.013c: jagāma sarvatīrthāni pṛthivyām iti naḥ śrutam
GE07mbh_09_u:038.014a: sa gatvā saritaḥ sarvāḥ samudrāṃś ca mahātapāḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:038.014c: kathayām āsa tat sarvam ṛṣīṇāṃ bhāvitātmanām
GE07mbh_09_u:038.015a: āplutaḥ sarvatīrtheṣu na ca mokṣam avāptavān
GE07mbh_09_u:038.015c: sa tu śuśrāva viprendro munīnāṃ vacanaṃ mahat
GE07mbh_09_u:038.017a: sa tu gatvā tatas tatra tīrtham auśanasaṃ dvijaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:038.017f-0241_01: vimuktas tena śirasā paraṃ sukham avāpa ha
GE07mbh_09_u:038.017f-0241_02: sa cāpy antarjale mūrdhā jagāmādarśanaṃ vibho
GE07mbh_09_u:038.018a: tataḥ sa virujo rājan pūtātmā vītakalmaṣaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:038.019c: kathayām āsa tat sarvam ṛṣīṇāṃ bhāvitātmanām
GE07mbh_09_u:038.020a: te śrutvā vacanaṃ tasya tatas tīrthasya mānada
GE07mbh_09_u:038.020d-0242_01: sa cāpi tīrthapravaraṃ punar gatvā mahān ṛṣiḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:038.020d-0242_02: pītvā payaḥ suvipulaṃ siddhim āyāt tadā muniḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:038.021a: tatra dattvā bahūn dāyān viprān saṃpūjya mādhavaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:038.022a: yatra taptaṃ tapo ghoram ārṣṭiṣeṇena bhārata
GE07mbh_09_u:038.022d-0243_02: munibhir brāhmaṇaiś caiva sevitaṃ sarvadā vibho
GE07mbh_09_u:038.023c: jagāma yatra rājendra ruṣaṅgus tanum atyajat
GE07mbh_09_u:038.024a: ruṣaṅgur brāhmaṇo vṛddhas taponityaś ca bhārata
GE07mbh_09_u:038.025a: tataḥ sarvān upādāya tanayān vai mahātapāḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:038.025c: ruṣaṅgur abravīt tatra nayadhvaṃ mā pṛthūdakam
GE07mbh_09_u:038.026c: taṃ vai tīrtham upāninyuḥ sarasvatyās tapodhanam
GE07mbh_09_u:038.027a: sa taiḥ putrais tadā dhīmān ānīto vai sarasvatīm
GE07mbh_09_u:038.028a: sa tatra vidhinā rājann āplutaḥ sumahātapāḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:038.028f-0244_01: provāca karma tattvajñaḥ prītas tīrthasya darśanāt
GE07mbh_09_u:038.029a: sarasvaty uttare tīre yas tyajed ātmanas tanum
GE07mbh_09_u:038.030c: dattvā caiva bahūn dāyān viprāṇāṃ vipravatsalaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:038.032a: sindhudvīpaś ca rājarṣir devāpiś ca mahātapāḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:039.001a: katham ārṣṭiṣeṇo bhagavān vipulaṃ taptavāṃs tapaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:039.001c: sindhudvīpaḥ kathaṃ cāpi brāhmaṇyaṃ labdhavāṃs tadā
GE07mbh_09_u:039.002a: devāpiś ca kathaṃ brahman viśvāmitraś ca sattama
GE07mbh_09_u:039.002c: tan mamācakṣva bhagavan paraṃ kautūhalaṃ hi me
GE07mbh_09_u:039.003c: vasan gurukule nityaṃ nityam adhyayane rataḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:039.004a: tasya rājan gurukule vasato nityam eva ha
GE07mbh_09_u:039.004c: samāptiṃ nāgamad vidyā nāpi vedā viśāṃ pate
GE07mbh_09_u:039.005a: sa nirviṇṇas tato rājaṃs tapas tepe mahātapāḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:039.005c: tato vai tapasā tena prāpya vedān anuttamān
GE07mbh_09_u:039.006a: sa vidvān vedayuktaś ca siddhaś cāpy ṛṣisattamaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:039.006b-0245_01: tatāpa rājan saṃprāpya tīrthaṃ vai sumahātapāḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:039.006c: tatra tīrthe varān prādāt trīn eva sumahātapāḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:039.008c: api cālpena yatnena phalaṃ prāpsyati puṣkalam
GE07mbh_09_u:039.009a: evam uktvā mahātejā jagāma tridivaṃ muniḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:039.009c: evaṃ siddhaḥ sa bhagavān ārṣṭiṣeṇaḥ pratāpavān
GE07mbh_09_u:039.010a: tasminn eva tadā tīrthe sindhudvīpaḥ pratāpavān
GE07mbh_09_u:039.010c: devāpiś ca mahārāja brāhmaṇyaṃ prāpatur mahat
GE07mbh_09_u:039.011a: tathā ca kauśikas tāta taponityo jitendriyaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:039.012a: gādhir nāma mahān āsīt kṣatriyaḥ prathito bhuvi
GE07mbh_09_u:039.013a: sa rājā kauśikas tāta mahāyogy abhavat kila
GE07mbh_09_u:039.014a: dehanyāse manaś cakre tam ūcuḥ praṇatāḥ prajāḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:039.014c: na gantavyaṃ mahāprājña trāhi cāsmān mahābhayāt
GE07mbh_09_u:039.015a: evam uktaḥ pratyuvāca tato gādhiḥ prajās tadā
GE07mbh_09_u:039.015c: viśvasya jagato goptā bhaviṣyati suto mama
GE07mbh_09_u:039.016a: ity uktvā tu tato gādhir viśvāmitraṃ niveśya ca
GE07mbh_09_u:039.016e: na ca śaknoti pṛthivīṃ yatnavān api rakṣitum
GE07mbh_09_u:039.017a: tataḥ śuśrāva rājā sa rākṣasebhyo mahābhayam
GE07mbh_09_u:039.018a: sa gatvā dūram adhvānaṃ vasiṣṭhāśramam abhyayāt
GE07mbh_09_u:039.018c: tasya te sainikā rājaṃś cakrus tatrānayān bahūn
GE07mbh_09_u:039.019a: tatas tu bhagavān vipro vasiṣṭho ''śramam abhyayāt
GE07mbh_09_u:039.019c: dadṛśe ca tataḥ sarvaṃ bhajyamānaṃ mahāvanam
GE07mbh_09_u:039.020c: sṛjasva śabarān ghorān iti svāṃ gām uvāca ha
GE07mbh_09_u:039.021c: te ca tad balam āsādya babhañjuḥ sarvatodiśam
GE07mbh_09_u:039.022a: tad dṛṣṭvā vidrutaṃ sainyaṃ viśvāmitras tu gādhijaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:039.022c: tapaḥ paraṃ manyamānas tapasy eva mano dadhe
GE07mbh_09_u:039.023c: niyamaiś copavāsaiś ca karśayan deham ātmanaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:039.024c: tathā sthaṇḍilaśāyī ca ye cānye niyamāḥ pṛthak
GE07mbh_09_u:039.025a: asakṛt tasya devās tu vratavighnaṃ pracakrire
GE07mbh_09_u:039.025c: na cāsya niyamād buddhir apayāti mahātmanaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:039.026a: tataḥ pareṇa yatnena taptvā bahuvidhaṃ tapaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:039.027a: tapasā tu tathā yuktaṃ viśvāmitraṃ pitāmahaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:039.027c: amanyata mahātejā varado varam asya tat
GE07mbh_09_u:039.028a: sa tu vavre varaṃ rājan syām ahaṃ brāhmaṇas tv iti
GE07mbh_09_u:039.030a: tasmiṃs tīrthavare rāmaḥ pradāya vividhaṃ vasu
GE07mbh_09_u:039.030c: payasvinīs tathā dhenūr yānāni śayanāni ca
GE07mbh_09_u:039.031a: tathā vastrāṇy alaṃkāraṃ bhakṣyaṃ peyaṃ ca śobhanam
GE07mbh_09_u:039.032a: yayau rājaṃs tato rāmo bakasyāśramam antikāt
GE07mbh_09_u:039.032c: yatra tepe tapas tīvraṃ dālbhyo baka iti śrutiḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:040.001c: yatra dālbhyo bako rājan paśvarthaṃ sumahātapāḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:040.004b-0248_01: tatra te lebhire rājan pāñcālebhyo maharṣayaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:040.004d-0249_01: teṣāṃ vipradadau rājā brāhmaṇānāṃ vṛṣāṃs tadā
GE07mbh_09_u:040.005a: tān abravīd bako vṛddho vibhajadhvaṃ paśūn iti
GE07mbh_09_u:040.005c: paśūn etān ahaṃ tyaktvā bhikṣiṣye rājasattamam
GE07mbh_09_u:040.006a: evam uktvā tato rājann ṛṣīn sarvān pratāpavān
GE07mbh_09_u:040.007c: ayācata paśūn dālbhyaḥ sa cainaṃ ruṣito 'bravīt
GE07mbh_09_u:040.008a: yadṛcchayā mṛtā dṛṣṭvā gās tadā nṛpasattama
GE07mbh_09_u:040.008c: etān paśūn naya kṣipraṃ brahmabandho yadīcchasi
GE07mbh_09_u:040.009a: ṛṣis tv atha vacaḥ śrutvā cintayām āsa dharmavit
GE07mbh_09_u:040.009c: aho bata nṛśaṃsaṃ vai vākyam ukto 'smi saṃsadi
GE07mbh_09_u:040.011a: sa utkṛtya mṛtānāṃ vai māṃsāni dvijasattamaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:040.012c: bako dālbhyo mahārāja niyamaṃ param āsthitaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:040.012e: sa tair eva juhāvāsya rāṣṭraṃ māṃsair mahātapāḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:040.013a: tasmiṃs tu vidhivat satre saṃpravṛtte sudāruṇe
GE07mbh_09_u:040.013d-0250_01: tataḥ prakṣīyamāṇaṃ tad rāṣṭraṃ tasya mahīpateḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:040.015a: dṛṣṭvā tad avakīrṇaṃ tu rāṣṭraṃ sa manujādhipaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:040.015c: babhūva durmanā rājaṃś cintayām āsa ca prabhuḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:040.016a: mokṣārtham akarod yatnaṃ brāhmaṇaiḥ sahitaḥ purā
GE07mbh_09_u:040.016b-0251_01: na ca śreyo 'dhyagacchat tu kṣīyate rāṣṭram eva ca
GE07mbh_09_u:040.016c: athāsau pārthivaḥ khinnas te ca viprās tadā nṛpa
GE07mbh_09_u:040.017a: yadā cāpi na śaknoti rāṣṭraṃ mocayituṃ nṛpa
GE07mbh_09_u:040.018c: māṃsair abhijuhotīti tava rāṣṭraṃ munir bakaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:040.019a: tena te hūyamānasya rāṣṭrasyāsya kṣayo mahān
GE07mbh_09_u:040.019c: tasyaitat tapasaḥ karma yena te hy anayo mahān
GE07mbh_09_u:040.019e: apāṃ kuñje sarasvatyās taṃ prasādaya pārthiva
GE07mbh_09_u:040.020a: sarasvatīṃ tato gatvā sa rājā bakam abravīt
GE07mbh_09_u:040.021a: prasādaye tvā bhagavann aparādhaṃ kṣamasva me
GE07mbh_09_u:040.021e: tvaṃ gatis tvaṃ ca me nāthaḥ prasādaṃ kartum arhasi
GE07mbh_09_u:040.022c: dṛṣṭvā tasya kṛpā jajñe rāṣṭraṃ tac ca vyamocayat
GE07mbh_09_u:040.023a: ṛṣiḥ prasannas tasyābhūt saṃrambhaṃ ca vihāya saḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:040.023c: mokṣārthaṃ tasya rāṣṭrasya juhāva punar āhutim
GE07mbh_09_u:040.024a: mokṣayitvā tato rāṣṭraṃ pratigṛhya paśūn bahūn
GE07mbh_09_u:040.024c: hṛṣṭātmā naimiṣāraṇyaṃ jagāma punar eva hi
GE07mbh_09_u:040.025c: svam eva nagaraṃ rājā pratipede maharddhimat
GE07mbh_09_u:040.029a: ratnāni ca mahārhāṇi dhanaṃ dhānyaṃ ca puṣkalam
GE07mbh_09_u:040.030a: yatra yajñe yayātes tu mahārāja sarasvatī
GE07mbh_09_u:040.030c: sarpiḥ payaś ca susrāva nāhuṣasya mahātmanaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:040.031c: ākrāmad ūrdhvaṃ mudito lebhe lokāṃś ca puṣkalān
GE07mbh_09_u:040.031d-0253_01: punas tatra ca rājñas tu yayāter yajataḥ prabhoḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:040.031d-0253_02: audāryaṃ paramaṃ kṛtvā bhaktiṃ cātmani śāśvatīm
GE07mbh_09_u:040.031d-0253_03: dadau kāmān brāhmaṇebhyo yān yān yo manasecchati
GE07mbh_09_u:040.031d-0253_04: yo yatra sthita eveha āhūto yajñasaṃstare
GE07mbh_09_u:040.031d-0253_06: yatra saṃbhojanaṃ caiva dānaṃ nānāvidhaṃ bahu
GE07mbh_09_u:040.031d-0253_07: te manyamānā rājñas tu saṃpradānam anuttamam
GE07mbh_09_u:040.031d-0253_08: rājānaṃ tuṣṭuvuḥ prītā dattvā caivāśiṣaḥ śubhāḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:040.033a: yatra yatra hi yo vipro yān yān kāmān abhīpsati
GE07mbh_09_u:040.033c: tatra tatra saricchreṣṭhā sasarja subahūn rasān
GE07mbh_09_u:040.034a: tatra devāḥ sagandharvāḥ prītā yajñasya saṃpadā
GE07mbh_09_u:040.034c: vismitā mānuṣāś cāsan dṛṣṭvā tāṃ yajñasaṃpadam
GE07mbh_09_u:040.035a: tatas tālaketur mahādharmasetur; mahātmā kṛtātmā mahādānanityaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:041.001a: vasiṣṭhasyāpavāho vai bhīmavegaḥ kathaṃ nu saḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:041.001c: kimarthaṃ ca saricchreṣṭhā tam ṛṣiṃ pratyavāhayat
GE07mbh_09_u:041.002a: kena cāsyābhavad vairaṃ kāraṇaṃ kiṃ ca tat prabho
GE07mbh_09_u:041.002c: śaṃsa pṛṣṭo mahāprājña na hi tṛpyāmi kathyatām
GE07mbh_09_u:041.003c: bhṛśaṃ vairam abhūd rājaṃs tapaḥspardhākṛtaṃ mahat
GE07mbh_09_u:041.005a: yatra sthāṇur mahārāja taptavān sumahat tapaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:041.005c: yatrāsya karma tad ghoraṃ pravadanti manīṣiṇaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:041.006c: sthāpayām āsa tat tīrthaṃ sthāṇutīrtham iti prabho
GE07mbh_09_u:041.007a: tatra sarve surāḥ skandam abhyaṣiñcan narādhipa
GE07mbh_09_u:041.008c: vasiṣṭhaṃ cālayām āsa tapasogreṇa tac chṛṇu
GE07mbh_09_u:041.009c: spardhāṃ tapaḥkṛtāṃ tīvrāṃ cakratus tau tapodhanau
GE07mbh_09_u:041.010c: dṛṣṭvā tejo vasiṣṭhasya cintām abhijagāma ha
GE07mbh_09_u:041.010e: tasya buddhir iyaṃ hy āsīd dharmanityasya bhārata
GE07mbh_09_u:041.013a: sā dhyātā muninā tena vyākulatvaṃ jagāma ha
GE07mbh_09_u:041.013c: jajñe cainaṃ mahāvīryaṃ mahākopaṃ ca bhāminī
GE07mbh_09_u:041.014a: tata enaṃ vepamānā vivarṇā prāñjalis tadā
GE07mbh_09_u:041.015a: hatavīrā yathā nārī sābhavad duḥkhitā bhṛśam
GE07mbh_09_u:041.016a: tām uvāca muniḥ kruddho vasiṣṭhaṃ śīghram ānaya
GE07mbh_09_u:041.016c: yāvad enaṃ nihanmy adya tac chrutvā vyathitā nadī
GE07mbh_09_u:041.018a: tathāgatāṃ tu tāṃ dṛṣṭvā vepamānāṃ kṛtāñjalim
GE07mbh_09_u:041.019a: tato bhītā saricchreṣṭhā cintayām āsa bhārata
GE07mbh_09_u:041.019c: ubhayoḥ śāpayor bhītā katham etad bhaviṣyati
GE07mbh_09_u:041.019d-0254_02: tathārūpāṃ tu tāṃ dṛṣṭvā munir āha mahānadīm
GE07mbh_09_u:041.019d-0254_04: sā tasya vacanaṃ śrutvā jñātvā pāpaṃ cikīrṣitam
GE07mbh_09_u:041.019d-0254_05: vasiṣṭhasya prabhāvaṃ ca jānanty apratimaṃ bhuvi
GE07mbh_09_u:041.020a: sābhigamya vasiṣṭhaṃ tu imam artham acodayat
GE07mbh_09_u:041.020c: yad uktā saritāṃ śreṣṭhā viśvāmitreṇa dhīmatā
GE07mbh_09_u:041.021a: ubhayoḥ śāpayor bhītā vepamānā punaḥ punaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:041.022a: tāṃ kṛśāṃ ca vivarṇāṃ ca dṛṣṭvā cintāsamanvitām
GE07mbh_09_u:041.022c: uvāca rājan dharmātmā vasiṣṭho dvipadāṃ varaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:041.023a: trāhy ātmānaṃ saricchreṣṭhe vaha māṃ śīghragāminī
GE07mbh_09_u:041.023c: viśvāmitraḥ śaped dhi tvāṃ mā kṛthās tvaṃ vicāraṇām
GE07mbh_09_u:041.024a: tasya tad vacanaṃ śrutvā kṛpāśīlasya sā sarit
GE07mbh_09_u:041.024c: cintayām āsa kauravya kiṃ kṛtaṃ sukṛtaṃ bhavet
GE07mbh_09_u:041.025a: tasyāś cintā samutpannā vasiṣṭho mayy atīva hi
GE07mbh_09_u:041.025c: kṛtavān hi dayāṃ nityaṃ tasya kāryaṃ hitaṃ mayā
GE07mbh_09_u:041.026a: atha kūle svake rājañ japantam ṛṣisattamam
GE07mbh_09_u:041.027a: idam antaram ity eva tataḥ sā saritāṃ varā
GE07mbh_09_u:041.027c: kūlāpahāram akarot svena vegena sā sarit
GE07mbh_09_u:041.028c: uhyamānaś ca tuṣṭāva tadā rājan sarasvatīm
GE07mbh_09_u:041.029c: vyāptaṃ cedaṃ jagat sarvaṃ tavaivāmbhobhir uttamaiḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:041.030c: sarvāś cāpas tvam eveti tvatto vayam adhīmahe
GE07mbh_09_u:041.031a: puṣṭir dyutis tathā kīrtiḥ siddhir vṛddhir umā tathā
GE07mbh_09_u:041.031c: tvam eva vāṇī svāhā tvaṃ tvayy āyattam idaṃ jagat
GE07mbh_09_u:041.034a: taṃ tu kruddham abhiprekṣya brahmahatyābhayān nadī
GE07mbh_09_u:041.034c: apovāha vasiṣṭhaṃ tu prācīṃ diśam atandritā
GE07mbh_09_u:041.034e: ubhayoḥ kurvatī vākyaṃ vañcayitvā tu gādhijam
GE07mbh_09_u:041.035c: abravīd atha saṃkruddho viśvāmitro hy amarṣaṇaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:041.036a: yasmān mā tvaṃ saricchreṣṭhe vañcayitvā punar gatā
GE07mbh_09_u:041.038a: atharṣayaś ca devāś ca gandharvāpsarasas tathā
GE07mbh_09_u:041.039c: āgacchac ca punar mārgaṃ svam eva saritāṃ varā
GE07mbh_09_u:042.001a: sā śaptā tena kruddhena viśvāmitreṇa dhīmatā
GE07mbh_09_u:042.002a: athājagmus tato rājan rākṣasās tatra bhārata
GE07mbh_09_u:042.002c: tatra te śoṇitaṃ sarve pibantaḥ sukham āsate
GE07mbh_09_u:042.003a: tṛptāś ca subhṛśaṃ tena sukhitā vigatajvarāḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:042.003c: nṛtyantaś ca hasantaś ca yathā svargajitas tathā
GE07mbh_09_u:042.004a: kasya cit tv atha kālasya ṛṣayaḥ satapodhanāḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:042.005c: prāpya prītiṃ parāṃ cāpi tapolubdhā viśāradāḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:042.005e: prayayur hi tato rājan yena tīrthaṃ hi tat tathā
GE07mbh_09_u:042.006a: athāgamya mahābhāgās tat tīrthaṃ dāruṇaṃ tadā
GE07mbh_09_u:042.007a: tān dṛṣṭvā rākṣasān rājan munayaḥ saṃśitavratāḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:042.008a: te tu sarve mahābhāgāḥ samāgamya mahāvratāḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:042.008c: āhūya saritāṃ śreṣṭhām idaṃ vacanam abruvan
GE07mbh_09_u:042.009a: kāraṇaṃ brūhi kalyāṇi kimarthaṃ te hrado hy ayam
GE07mbh_09_u:042.009c: evam ākulatāṃ yātaḥ śrutvā pāsyāmahe vayam
GE07mbh_09_u:042.010a: tataḥ sā sarvam ācaṣṭa yathāvṛttaṃ pravepatī
GE07mbh_09_u:042.010c: duḥkhitām atha tāṃ dṛṣṭvā ta ūcur vai tapodhanāḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:042.011a: kāraṇaṃ śrutam asmābhiḥ śāpaś caiva śruto 'naghe
GE07mbh_09_u:042.011c: kariṣyanti tu yat prāptaṃ sarva eva tapodhanāḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:042.012a: evam uktvā saricchreṣṭhām ūcus te 'tha parasparam
GE07mbh_09_u:042.012d-0256_01: te sarve brāhmaṇā rājaṃs tapobhir niyamais tathā
GE07mbh_09_u:042.012d-0256_02: upavāsaiś ca vividhair yamaiḥ kaṣṭavratais tathā
GE07mbh_09_u:042.012d-0256_04: mokṣayām āsus tāṃ devīṃ saricchreṣṭhāṃ sarasvatīm
GE07mbh_09_u:042.013a: teṣāṃ tu vacanād eva prakṛtisthā sarasvatī
GE07mbh_09_u:042.013c: prasannasalilā jajñe yathā pūrvaṃ tathaiva hi
GE07mbh_09_u:042.013d-0257_01: evam uktvā ca munayo duḥkhāc caināṃ vyamocayan
GE07mbh_09_u:042.013e: vimuktā ca saricchreṣṭhā vibabhau sā yathā purā
GE07mbh_09_u:042.014a: dṛṣṭvā toyaṃ sarasvatyā munibhis tais tathā kṛtam
GE07mbh_09_u:042.014b-0258_01: tān eva śaraṇaṃ jagmū rākṣasāḥ kṣudhitās tathā
GE07mbh_09_u:042.014e: ūcus tān vai munīn sarvān kṛpāyuktān punaḥ punaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:042.015a: vayaṃ hi kṣudhitāś caiva dharmād dhīnāś ca śāśvatāt
GE07mbh_09_u:042.015c: na ca naḥ kāmakāro 'yaṃ yad vayaṃ pāpakāriṇaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:042.017a: evaṃ hi vaiśyaśūdrāṇāṃ kṣatriyāṇāṃ tathaiva ca
GE07mbh_09_u:042.017c: ye brāhmaṇān pradviṣanti te bhavantīha rākṣasāḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:042.018a: ācāryam ṛtvijaṃ caiva guruṃ vṛddhajanaṃ tathā
GE07mbh_09_u:042.019c: śaktā bhavantaḥ sarveṣāṃ lokānām api tāraṇe
GE07mbh_09_u:042.020a: teṣāṃ te munayaḥ śrutvā tuṣṭuvus tāṃ mahānadīm
GE07mbh_09_u:042.021c: keśāvapannam ādhūtam ārugṇam api yad bhavet
GE07mbh_09_u:042.021d-0260_01: avadhūtam avijñātam atiśītaṃ ca yad bhavet
GE07mbh_09_u:042.021d-0260_02: patitānnaṃ sūtikānnaṃ puṃścalyānnaṃ ca yad bhavet
GE07mbh_09_u:042.021e: śvabhiḥ saṃspṛṣṭam annaṃ ca bhāgo 'sau rakṣasām iha
GE07mbh_09_u:042.022a: tasmāj jñātvā sadā vidvān etāny annāni varjayet
GE07mbh_09_u:042.022c: rākṣasānnam asau bhuṅkte yo bhuṅkte hy annam īdṛśam
GE07mbh_09_u:042.023a: śodhayitvā tatas tīrtham ṛṣayas te tapodhanāḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:042.023c: mokṣārthaṃ rākṣasānāṃ ca nadīṃ tāṃ pratyacodayan
GE07mbh_09_u:042.024a: maharṣīṇāṃ mataṃ jñātvā tataḥ sā saritāṃ varā
GE07mbh_09_u:042.024c: aruṇām ānayām āsa svāṃ tanuṃ puruṣarṣabha
GE07mbh_09_u:042.025a: tasyāṃ te rākṣasāḥ snātvā tanūs tyaktvā divaṃ gatāḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:042.026c: tasmiṃs tīrthavare snātvā vimuktaḥ pāpmanā kila
GE07mbh_09_u:042.027c: katham asmiṃś ca tīrthe vai āplutyākalmaṣo 'bhavat
GE07mbh_09_u:042.028c: yathā bibheda samayaṃ namucer vāsavaḥ purā
GE07mbh_09_u:042.029c: tenendraḥ sakhyam akarot samayaṃ cedam abravīt
GE07mbh_09_u:042.030a: nārdreṇa tvā na śuṣkeṇa na rātrau nāpi vāhani
GE07mbh_09_u:042.030c: vadhiṣyāmy asuraśreṣṭha sakhe satyena te śape
GE07mbh_09_u:042.031a: evaṃ sa kṛtvā samayaṃ sṛṣṭvā nīhāram īśvaraḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:042.031c: cicchedāsya śiro rājann apāṃ phenena vāsavaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:042.032a: tac chiro namuceś chinnaṃ pṛṣṭhataḥ śakram anvayāt
GE07mbh_09_u:042.032c: he mitrahan pāpa iti bruvāṇaṃ śakram antikāt
GE07mbh_09_u:042.033a: evaṃ sa śirasā tena codyamānaḥ punaḥ punaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:042.034d-0261_01: eṣā puṇyajalā śakra kṛtā munibhir eva tu
GE07mbh_09_u:042.034d-0261_02: nigūḍham asyā gamanam ihāsīt pūrvam eva tu
GE07mbh_09_u:042.034d-0261_05: iha tvaṃ yaja devendra dada dānāny anekaśaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:042.035a: ity uktaḥ sa sarasvatyāḥ kuñje vai janamejaya
GE07mbh_09_u:042.036a: sa muktaḥ pāpmanā tena brahmahatyākṛtena ha
GE07mbh_09_u:042.036b-0262_02: dattvā dānāny anekāni snātvā tīrthe śatakratuḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:042.036b-0262_03: vipāpmā virajāḥ śrīmān brahmavadhyāṃ vidhūya saḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:042.037a: śiras tac cāpi namuces tatraivāplutya bhārata
GE07mbh_09_u:042.038a: tatrāpy upaspṛśya balo mahātmā; dattvā ca dānāni pṛthagvidhāni
GE07mbh_09_u:042.038c: avāpya dharmaṃ param āryakarmā; jagāma somasya mahat sa tīrtham
GE07mbh_09_u:042.039a: yatrāyajad rājasūyena somaḥ; sākṣāt purā vidhivat pārthivendra
GE07mbh_09_u:042.039c: atrir dhīmān vipramukhyo babhūva; hotā yasmin kratumukhye mahātmā
GE07mbh_09_u:042.040a: yasyānte 'bhūt sumahān dānavānāṃ; daiteyānāṃ rākṣasānāṃ ca devaiḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:042.040c: sa saṃgrāmas tārakākhyaḥ sutīvro; yatra skandas tārakākhyaṃ jaghāna
GE07mbh_09_u:042.041a: senāpatyaṃ labdhavān devatānāṃ; mahāseno yatra daityāntakartā
GE07mbh_09_u:042.041c: sākṣāc cātra nyavasat kārttikeyaḥ; sadā kumāro yatra sa plakṣarājaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:043.002a: yasmin kāle ca deśe ca yathā ca vadatāṃ vara
GE07mbh_09_u:043.002c: yaiś cābhiṣikto bhagavān vidhinā yena ca prabhuḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:043.003a: skando yathā ca daityānām akarot kadanaṃ mahat
GE07mbh_09_u:043.003c: tathā me sarvam ācakṣva paraṃ kautūhalaṃ hi me
GE07mbh_09_u:043.004c: harṣam utpādayaty etad vaco me janamejaya
GE07mbh_09_u:043.006a: tejo māheśvaraṃ skannam agnau prapatitaṃ purā
GE07mbh_09_u:043.006c: tat sarvabhakṣo bhagavān nāśakad dagdhum akṣayam
GE07mbh_09_u:043.007c: na caiva dhārayām āsa garbhaṃ tejomayaṃ tadā
GE07mbh_09_u:043.008a: sa gaṅgām abhisaṃgamya niyogād brahmaṇaḥ prabhuḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:043.009a: atha gaṅgāpi taṃ garbham asahantī vidhāraṇe
GE07mbh_09_u:043.010a: sa tatra vavṛdhe lokān āvṛtya jvalanātmajaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:043.010c: dadṛśur jvalanākāraṃ taṃ garbham atha kṛttikāḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:043.012a: tāsāṃ viditvā bhāvaṃ taṃ mātṝṇāṃ bhagavān prabhuḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:043.012c: prasnutānāṃ payaḥ ṣaḍbhir vadanair apibat tadā
GE07mbh_09_u:043.013a: taṃ prabhāvaṃ samālakṣya tasya bālasya kṛttikāḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:043.014c: sa śailaḥ kāñcanaḥ sarvaḥ saṃbabhau kurusattama
GE07mbh_09_u:043.015a: vardhatā caiva garbheṇa pṛthivī tena rañjitā
GE07mbh_09_u:043.015c: ataś ca sarve saṃvṛttā girayaḥ kāñcanākarāḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:043.016a: kumāraś ca mahāvīryaḥ kārttikeya iti smṛtaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:043.017a: sa devas tapasā caiva vīryeṇa ca samanvitaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:043.018a: sa tasmin kāñcane divye śarastambe śriyā vṛtaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:043.018c: stūyamānas tadā śete gandharvair munibhis tathā
GE07mbh_09_u:043.020a: anvāste ca nadī devaṃ gaṅgā vai saritāṃ varā
GE07mbh_09_u:043.020c: dadhāra pṛthivī cainaṃ bibhratī rūpam uttamam
GE07mbh_09_u:043.022c: tatrainaṃ samupātiṣṭhat sākṣād vāṇī ca kevalā
GE07mbh_09_u:043.027c: sadṛśāni vapūṃṣy anye tatra tatra vyadhārayan
GE07mbh_09_u:043.028c: ke cid añjanapuñjābhāḥ ke cic chvetācalaprabhāḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:043.029c: sādhyā viśve 'tha maruto vasavaḥ pitaras tathā
GE07mbh_09_u:043.030a: rudrādityās tathā siddhā bhujagā dānavāḥ khagāḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:043.030c: brahmā svayaṃbhūr bhagavān saputraḥ saha viṣṇunā
GE07mbh_09_u:043.032c: ṛbhavo nāma varadā devānām api devatāḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:043.032e: te 'pi tatra samājagmur yāmā dhāmāś ca sarvaśaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:043.034c: yugapac chailaputryāś ca gaṅgāyāḥ pāvakasya ca
GE07mbh_09_u:043.035a: kiṃ nu pūrvam ayaṃ bālo gauravād abhyupaiṣyati
GE07mbh_09_u:043.035c: api mām iti sarveṣāṃ teṣām āsīn manogatam
GE07mbh_09_u:043.036a: teṣām etam abhiprāyaṃ caturṇām upalakṣya saḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:043.036c: yugapad yogam āsthāya sasarja vividhās tanūḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:043.037c: skandaḥ śākho viśākhaś ca naigameṣaś ca pṛṣṭhataḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:043.038a: evaṃ sa kṛtvā hy ātmānaṃ caturdhā bhagavān prabhuḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:043.039a: viśākhas tu yayau yena devī girivarātmajā
GE07mbh_09_u:043.039c: śākho yayau ca bhagavān vāyumūrtir vibhāvasum
GE07mbh_09_u:043.040c: tān samabhyayur avyagrās tad adbhutam ivābhavat
GE07mbh_09_u:043.041c: tad dṛṣṭvā mahad āścaryam adbhutaṃ romaharṣaṇam
GE07mbh_09_u:043.042a: tato rudraś ca devī ca pāvakaś ca pitāmaham
GE07mbh_09_u:043.043a: praṇipatya tatas te tu vidhivad rājapuṃgava
GE07mbh_09_u:043.045c: manasā cintayām āsa kim ayaṃ labhatām iti
GE07mbh_09_u:043.047c: samarthaṃ ca tam aiśvarye mahāmatir amanyata
GE07mbh_09_u:043.048a: tato muhūrtaṃ sa dhyātvā devānāṃ śreyasi sthitaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:043.051c: samantapañcake yā vai triṣu lokeṣu viśrutā
GE07mbh_09_u:044.004c: dhātā caiva vidhātā ca tathā caivānilānalau
GE07mbh_09_u:044.005a: pūṣṇā bhagenāryamṇā ca aṃśena ca vivasvatā
GE07mbh_09_u:044.005c: rudraś ca sahito dhīmān mitreṇa varuṇena ca
GE07mbh_09_u:044.006a: rudrair vasubhir ādityair aśvibhyāṃ ca vṛtaḥ prabhuḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:044.006c: viśvedevair marudbhiś ca sādhyaiś ca pitṛbhiḥ saha
GE07mbh_09_u:044.008c: bhṛgubhiś cāṅgirobhiś ca yatibhiś ca mahātmabhiḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:044.008e: sarvair vidyādharaiḥ puṇyair yogasiddhais tathā vṛtaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:044.009a: pitāmahaḥ pulastyaś ca pulahaś ca mahātapāḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:044.009c: aṅgirāḥ kaśyapo 'triś ca marīcir bhṛgur eva ca
GE07mbh_09_u:044.010a: kratur haraḥ pracetāś ca manur dakṣas tathaiva ca
GE07mbh_09_u:044.010c: ṛtavaś ca grahāś caiva jyotīṃṣi ca viśāṃ pate
GE07mbh_09_u:044.011a: mūrtimatyaś ca sarito vedāś caiva sanātanāḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:044.011c: samudrāś ca hradāś caiva tīrthāni vividhāni ca
GE07mbh_09_u:044.011e: pṛthivī dyaur diśaś caiva pādapāś ca janādhipa
GE07mbh_09_u:044.012a: aditir devamātā ca hrīḥ śrīḥ svāhā sarasvatī
GE07mbh_09_u:044.012c: umā śacī sinīvālī tathā cānumatiḥ kuhūḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:044.012e: rākā ca dhiṣaṇā caiva patnyaś cānyā divaukasām
GE07mbh_09_u:044.013a: himavāṃś caiva vindhyaś ca meruś cānekaśṛṅgavān
GE07mbh_09_u:044.013c: airāvataḥ sānucaraḥ kalāḥ kāṣṭhās tathaiva ca
GE07mbh_09_u:044.014c: aruṇo garuḍaś caiva vṛkṣāś cauṣadhibhiḥ saha
GE07mbh_09_u:044.015a: dharmaś ca bhagavān devaḥ samājagmur hi saṃgatāḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:044.015c: kālo yamaś ca mṛtyuś ca yamasyānucarāś ca ye
GE07mbh_09_u:044.016a: bahulatvāc ca noktā ye vividhā devatāgaṇāḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:044.017a: jagṛhus te tadā rājan sarva eva divaukasaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:044.020a: purā yathā mahārāja varuṇaṃ vai jaleśvaram
GE07mbh_09_u:044.020e: kaśyapaś ca mahātejā ye cānye nānukīrtitāḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:044.021a: tasmai brahmā dadau prīto balino vātaraṃhasaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:044.024a: sa hi devāsure yuddhe daityānāṃ bhīmakarmaṇām
GE07mbh_09_u:044.025a: tathā devā dadus tasmai senāṃ nairṛtasaṃkulām
GE07mbh_09_u:044.026a: jayaśabdaṃ tataś cakrur devāḥ sarve savāsavāḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:044.027c: unmāthaṃ ca pramāthaṃ ca mahāvīryau mahādyutī
GE07mbh_09_u:044.028a: subhrājo bhāskaraś caiva yau tau sūryānuyāyinau
GE07mbh_09_u:044.028c: tau sūryaḥ kārttikeyāya dadau prītaḥ pratāpavān
GE07mbh_09_u:044.029c: somo 'py anucarau prādān maṇiṃ sumaṇim eva ca
GE07mbh_09_u:044.031a: parighaṃ ca vaṭaṃ caiva bhīmaṃ ca sumahābalam
GE07mbh_09_u:044.031e: aṃśo 'py anucarān pañca dadau skandāya dhīmate
GE07mbh_09_u:044.032e: tau hi śatrūn mahendrasya jaghnatuḥ samare bahūn
GE07mbh_09_u:044.033a: cakraṃ vikramakaṃ caiva saṃkramaṃ ca mahābalam
GE07mbh_09_u:044.033c: skandāya trīn anucarān dadau viṣṇur mahāyaśāḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:044.035a: kundanaṃ kusumaṃ caiva kumudaṃ ca mahāyaśāḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:044.037a: suvrataṃ satyasaṃdhaṃ ca dadau mitro mahātmane
GE07mbh_09_u:044.038c: suprabhaṃ ca mahātmānaṃ śubhakarmāṇam eva ca
GE07mbh_09_u:044.039c: pūṣā ca pārṣadau prādāt kārttikeyāya bhārata
GE07mbh_09_u:044.043a: kāñcanaṃ ca mahātmānaṃ meghamālinam eva ca
GE07mbh_09_u:044.044a: sthiraṃ cātisthiraṃ caiva merur evāparau dadau
GE07mbh_09_u:044.047a: unmādaṃ puṣpadantaṃ ca śaṅkukarṇaṃ tathaiva ca
GE07mbh_09_u:044.049a: evaṃ sādhyāś ca rudrāś ca vasavaḥ pitaras tathā
GE07mbh_09_u:044.049c: sāgarāḥ saritaś caiva girayaś ca mahābalāḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:044.051a: śṛṇu nāmāni cānyeṣāṃ ye 'nye skandasya sainikāḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:044.052a: śaṅkukarṇo nikumbhaś ca padmaḥ kumuda eva ca
GE07mbh_09_u:044.056c: jvālājihvaḥ karālaś ca sitakeśo jaṭī hariḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:044.059c: dhūmraḥ śvetaḥ kaliṅgaś ca siddhārtho varadas tathā
GE07mbh_09_u:044.060a: priyakaś caiva nandaś ca gonandaś ca pratāpavān
GE07mbh_09_u:044.060c: ānandaś ca pramodaś ca svastiko dhruvakas tathā
GE07mbh_09_u:044.061a: kṣemavāpaḥ sujātaś ca siddhayātraś ca bhārata
GE07mbh_09_u:044.062a: gāyano hasanaś caiva bāṇaḥ khaḍgaś ca vīryavān
GE07mbh_09_u:044.063c: raṇotkaṭaḥ prahāsaś ca śvetaśīrṣaś ca nandakaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:044.064d-0264_03: ete cānye ca bahavo mahāśālī raṇotkaṭaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:044.065a: yajñavāhaḥ pravāhaś ca devayājī ca somapaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:044.065c: sajālaś ca mahātejāḥ krathakrāthau ca bhārata
GE07mbh_09_u:044.066a: tuhanaś ca tuhānaś ca citradevaś ca vīryavān
GE07mbh_09_u:044.066c: madhuraḥ suprasādaś ca kirīṭī ca mahābalaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:044.067a: vasano madhuvarṇaś ca kalaśodara eva ca
GE07mbh_09_u:044.068a: śvetavaktraḥ suvaktraś ca cāruvaktraś ca pāṇḍuraḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:044.068c: daṇḍabāhuḥ subāhuś ca rajaḥ kokilakas tathā
GE07mbh_09_u:044.069a: acalaḥ kanakākṣaś ca bālānām ayikaḥ prabhuḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:044.070c: madgugrīvaś ca kṛṣṇaujā haṃsavaktraś ca candrabhāḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:044.070d-0265_01: candramāḥ pāṇikarmā ca uḍukaś ca mahābalaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:044.071a: pāṇikūrmā ca śambūkaḥ pañcavaktraś ca śikṣakaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:044.071c: cāṣavaktraś ca jambūkaḥ śākavaktraś ca kuṇḍakaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:044.072e: yauvanasthāś ca bālāś ca vṛddhāś ca janamejaya
GE07mbh_09_u:044.073c: vaktrair nānāvidhair ye tu śṛṇu tāñ janamejaya
GE07mbh_09_u:044.078c: bhīmā gajānanāś caiva tathā nakramukhāḥ pare
GE07mbh_09_u:044.083a: sthūlodarāḥ kṛśāṅgāś ca sthūlāṅgāś ca kṛśodarāḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:044.090a: triśikhā dviśikhāś caiva tathā saptaśikhāḥ pare
GE07mbh_09_u:044.090c: śikhaṇḍino mukuṭino muṇḍāś ca jaṭilās tathā
GE07mbh_09_u:044.091a: citramālyadharāḥ ke cit ke cid romānanās tathā
GE07mbh_09_u:044.094c: dīrghoṣṭhā dīrghajihvāś ca vikarālā hy adhomukhāḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:044.096c: piṅgākṣāḥ śaṅkukarṇāś ca vakranāsāś ca bhārata
GE07mbh_09_u:044.099c: piṅgākṣā nīlakaṇṭhāś ca lambakarṇāś ca bhārata
GE07mbh_09_u:044.100e: kalmāṣā bahavo rājaṃś citravarṇāś ca bhārata
GE07mbh_09_u:044.102a: punaḥ praharaṇāny eṣāṃ kīrtyamānāni me śṛṇu
GE07mbh_09_u:044.108a: ete cānye ca bahavo mahāpāriṣadā nṛpa
GE07mbh_09_u:044.109a: divyāś cāpy āntarikṣāś ca pārthivāś cānilopamāḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:045.002c: yābhir vyāptās trayo lokāḥ kalyāṇībhiś carācarāḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:045.005a: vasudāmā sudāmā ca viśokā nandinī tathā
GE07mbh_09_u:045.006c: śatruṃjayā tathā caiva krodhanā śalabhī kharī
GE07mbh_09_u:045.007a: mādhavī śubhavaktrā ca tīrthanemiś ca bhārata
GE07mbh_09_u:045.009c: saṃtānikā ca kauravya kamalā ca mahābalā
GE07mbh_09_u:045.010a: sudāmā bahudāmā ca suprabhā ca yaśasvinī
GE07mbh_09_u:045.013a: dhanadā suprasādā ca bhavadā ca jaleśvarī
GE07mbh_09_u:045.013c: eḍī bheḍī sameḍī ca vetālajananī tathā
GE07mbh_09_u:045.013e: kaṇḍūtiḥ kālikā caiva devamitrā ca bhārata
GE07mbh_09_u:045.014a: lambasī ketakī caiva citrasenā tathā balā
GE07mbh_09_u:045.015c: utkrāthinī jareṇā ca mahāvegā ca kaṅkaṇā
GE07mbh_09_u:045.017a: maṇḍodarī ca tuṇḍā ca koṭarā meghavāsinī
GE07mbh_09_u:045.019c: khyātā dahadahā caiva tathā dhamadhamā nṛpa
GE07mbh_09_u:045.026c: gaṇā ca sugaṇā caiva tathābhīty atha kāmadā
GE07mbh_09_u:045.027c: paśudā vittadā caiva sukhadā ca mahāyaśāḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:045.028c: gokarṇī ca sukarṇī ca sasirā stherikā tathā
GE07mbh_09_u:045.029a: etāś cānyāś ca bahavo mātaro bharatarṣabha
GE07mbh_09_u:045.034a: tāmrākṣyas tāmravarṇāś ca haryakṣyaś ca tathāparāḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:045.035a: yāmyo raudryas tathā saumyāḥ kauberyo 'tha mahābalāḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:045.036a: vāyavyaś cātha kaumāryo brāhmyaś ca bharatarṣabha
GE07mbh_09_u:045.036b-0271_01: vaiṣṇavyaś ca tathā sauryo vārāhyaś ca mahābalāḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:045.037d-0273_01: śatrūṇāṃ vigrahe nityaṃ bhayadās tā bhavanty uta
GE07mbh_09_u:045.040a: ete cānye ca bahavo gaṇāḥ śatrubhayaṃkarāḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:045.043d-0276_01: ajeyāṃ svaguṇair yuktāṃ nāmnā senāṃ dhanaṃjayām
GE07mbh_09_u:045.043d-0276_03: na sā vijānāti raṇāt kadā cid vinivartitum
GE07mbh_09_u:045.045c: dadau prītyā kumārāya daṇḍaṃ caiva bṛhaspatiḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:045.047c: kṛṣṇājinaṃ tathā brahmā brahmaṇyāya dadau prabhuḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:045.048e: tataḥ pāriṣadaiś caiva mātṛbhiś ca samanvitaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:045.050c: vādayām āsur avyagrā bherīśaṅkhāṃś ca puṣkalān
GE07mbh_09_u:045.051c: āḍambarān gomukhāṃś ca ḍiṇḍimāṃś ca mahāsvanān
GE07mbh_09_u:045.052a: tuṣṭuvus te kumāraṃ ca sarve devāḥ savāsavāḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:045.053a: tataḥ prīto mahāsenas tridaśebhyo varaṃ dadau
GE07mbh_09_u:045.053c: ripūn hantāsmi samare ye vo vadhacikīrṣavaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:045.055c: apūrayata lokāṃs trīn vare datte mahātmanā
GE07mbh_09_u:045.056a: sa niryayau mahāseno mahatyā senayā vṛtaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:045.056c: vadhāya yudhi daityānāṃ rakṣārthaṃ ca divaukasām
GE07mbh_09_u:045.057a: vyavasāyo jayo dharmaḥ siddhir lakṣmīr dhṛtiḥ smṛtiḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:045.059a: taṃ dṛṣṭvā sarvadaiteyā rākṣasā dānavās tathā
GE07mbh_09_u:045.060a: dṛṣṭvā ca sa tataḥ kruddhaḥ skandas tejobalānvitaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:045.060c: śaktyastraṃ bhagavān bhīmaṃ punaḥ punar avāsṛjat
GE07mbh_09_u:045.062a: saṃhrādayantaś ca tathā nirghātāś cāpatan kṣitau
GE07mbh_09_u:045.063a: kṣiptā hy ekā tathā śaktiḥ sughorānalasūnunā
GE07mbh_09_u:045.064a: sa śaktyastreṇa saṃgrāme jaghāna bhagavān prabhuḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:045.064e: vṛtaṃ daityāyutair vīrair balibhir daśabhir nṛpa
GE07mbh_09_u:045.065a: mahiṣaṃ cāṣṭabhiḥ padmair vṛtaṃ saṃkhye nijaghnivān
GE07mbh_09_u:045.066a: hradodaraṃ nikharvaiś ca vṛtaṃ daśabhir īśvaraḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:045.067d-0279_01: nanṛtuś ca vavalguś ca jahasuś ca mudānvitāḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:045.068b-0280_01: trailokyaṃ trāsitaṃ sarvaṃ jṛmbhamāṇābhir eva ca
GE07mbh_09_u:045.068c: dagdhāḥ sahasraśo daityā nādaiḥ skandasya cāpare
GE07mbh_09_u:045.069a: patākayāvadhūtāś ca hatāḥ ke cit suradviṣaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:045.069e: ke cit praharaṇaiś chinnā vinipetur gatāsavaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:045.071a: bāṇo nāmātha daiteyo baleḥ putro mahābalaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:045.072c: sa kārttikeyasya bhayāt krauñcaṃ śaraṇam eyivān
GE07mbh_09_u:045.076a: viniṣpatadbhiḥ śarabhaiḥ siṃhaiś ca sahasā drutaiḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:045.076c: śocyām api daśāṃ prāpto rarājaiva sa parvataḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:045.079b-0281_01: sa caiva bhagavān kruddho daityendrasya sutaṃ tadā
GE07mbh_09_u:045.079c: bibheda śaktyā krauñcaṃ ca pāvakiḥ paravīrahā
GE07mbh_09_u:045.080c: śaktiḥ kṣiptā raṇe tasya pāṇim eti punaḥ punaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:045.081a: evaṃprabhāvo bhagavān ato bhūyaś ca pāvakiḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:045.081c: krauñcas tena vinirbhinno daityāś ca śataśo hatāḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:045.082a: tataḥ sa bhagavān devo nihatya vibudhadviṣaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:045.082c: sabhājyamāno vibudhaiḥ paraṃ harṣam avāpa ha
GE07mbh_09_u:045.082d-0283_01: bhinne krauñce girivare caṇḍaputre ca pātite
GE07mbh_09_u:045.083a: tato dundubhayo rājan neduḥ śaṅkhāś ca bhārata
GE07mbh_09_u:045.084a: divyagandham upādāya vavau puṇyaś ca mārutaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:045.084c: gandharvās tuṣṭuvuś cainaṃ yajvānaś ca maharṣayaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:045.085a: ke cid enaṃ vyavasyanti pitāmahasutaṃ prabhum
GE07mbh_09_u:045.086a: ke cin maheśvarasutaṃ ke cit putraṃ vibhāvasoḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:045.086c: umāyāḥ kṛttikānāṃ ca gaṅgāyāś ca vadanty uta
GE07mbh_09_u:045.087a: ekadhā ca dvidhā caiva caturdhā ca mahābalam
GE07mbh_09_u:045.090a: aiśvaryāṇi ca tatrastho dadāv īśaḥ pṛthak pṛthak
GE07mbh_09_u:045.091a: evaṃ sa bhagavāṃs tasmiṃs tīrthe daityakulāntakaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:045.092a: aujasaṃ nāma tat tīrthaṃ yatra pūrvam apāṃ patiḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:045.093a: tasmiṃs tīrthavare snātvā skandaṃ cābhyarcya lāṅgalī
GE07mbh_09_u:045.093c: brāhmaṇebhyo dadau rukmaṃ vāsāṃsy ābharaṇāni ca
GE07mbh_09_u:045.094c: pūjya tīrthavaraṃ tac ca spṛṣṭvā toyaṃ ca lāṅgalī
GE07mbh_09_u:045.094e: hṛṣṭaḥ prītamanāś caiva hy abhavan mādhavottamaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:045.095a: etat te sarvam ākhyātaṃ yan māṃ tvaṃ paripṛcchasi
GE07mbh_09_u:045.095d-0284_01: senānīś ca kṛto rājan bāla eva mahābalaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:046.001a: atyadbhutam idaṃ brahmañ śrutavān asmi tattvataḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:046.002a: yac chrutvā pūtam ātmānaṃ vijānāmi tapodhana
GE07mbh_09_u:046.002c: prahṛṣṭāni ca romāṇi prasannaṃ ca mano mama
GE07mbh_09_u:046.003a: abhiṣekaṃ kumārasya daityānāṃ ca vadhaṃ tathā
GE07mbh_09_u:046.003c: śrutvā me paramā prītir bhūyaḥ kautūhalaṃ hi me
GE07mbh_09_u:046.004a: apāṃ patiḥ kathaṃ hy asminn abhiṣiktaḥ surāsuraiḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:046.004c: tan me brūhi mahāprājña kuśalo hy asi sattama
GE07mbh_09_u:046.005a: śṛṇu rājann idaṃ citraṃ pūrvakalpe yathātatham
GE07mbh_09_u:046.006a: yathāsmān surarāṭ śakro bhayebhyaḥ pāti sarvadā
GE07mbh_09_u:046.006c: tathā tvam api sarvāsāṃ saritāṃ vai patir bhava
GE07mbh_09_u:046.007a: vāsaś ca te sadā deva sāgare makarālaye
GE07mbh_09_u:046.008a: somena sārdhaṃ ca tava hānivṛddhī bhaviṣyataḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:046.008c: evam astv iti tān devān varuṇo vākyam abravīt
GE07mbh_09_u:046.009c: apāṃ patiṃ pracakrur hi vidhidṛṣṭena karmaṇā
GE07mbh_09_u:046.010a: abhiṣicya tato devā varuṇaṃ yādasāṃ patim
GE07mbh_09_u:046.010c: jagmuḥ svāny eva sthānāni pūjayitvā jaleśvaram
GE07mbh_09_u:046.011c: saritaḥ sāgarāṃś caiva nadāṃś caiva sarāṃsi ca
GE07mbh_09_u:046.011e: pālayām āsa vidhinā yathā devāñ śatakratuḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:046.012a: tatas tatrāpy upaspṛśya dattvā ca vividhaṃ vasu
GE07mbh_09_u:046.012e: naṣṭo na dṛśyate yatra śamīgarbhe hutāśanaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:046.014a: agniḥ pranaṣṭo bhagavān kāraṇaṃ ca na vidmahe
GE07mbh_09_u:046.015c: vijñātaś ca kathaṃ devais tan mamācakṣva tattvataḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:046.016a: bhṛgoḥ śāpād bhṛśaṃ bhīto jātavedāḥ pratāpavān
GE07mbh_09_u:046.017a: pranaṣṭe tu tadā vahnau devāḥ sarve savāsavāḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:046.019e: punar yathāgataṃ jagmuḥ sarvabhakṣaś ca so 'bhavat
GE07mbh_09_u:046.020a: bhṛgoḥ śāpān mahīpāla yad uktaṃ brahmavādinā
GE07mbh_09_u:046.020c: tatrāpy āplutya matimān brahmayoniṃ jagāma ha
GE07mbh_09_u:046.021c: tatrāplutya tato brahmā saha devaiḥ prabhuḥ purā
GE07mbh_09_u:046.022a: tatra snātvā ca dattvā ca vasūni vividhāni ca
GE07mbh_09_u:046.022c: kauberaṃ prayayau tīrthaṃ tatra taptvā mahat tapaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:046.023a: tatrastham eva taṃ rājan dhanāni nidhayas tathā
GE07mbh_09_u:046.023c: upatasthur naraśreṣṭha tat tīrthaṃ lāṅgalī tataḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:046.023e: gatvā snātvā ca vidhivad brāhmaṇebhyo dhanaṃ dadau
GE07mbh_09_u:046.024a: dadṛśe tatra tat sthānaṃ kaubere kānanottame
GE07mbh_09_u:046.024c: purā yatra tapas taptaṃ vipulaṃ sumahātmanā
GE07mbh_09_u:046.025a: yatra rājñā kubereṇa varā labdhāś ca puṣkalāḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:046.027c: vāhanaṃ cāsya tad dattaṃ haṃsayuktaṃ manoramam
GE07mbh_09_u:046.027e: vimānaṃ puṣpakaṃ divyaṃ nairṛtaiśvaryam eva ca
GE07mbh_09_u:046.028a: tatrāplutya balo rājan dattvā dāyāṃś ca puṣkalān
GE07mbh_09_u:047.003a: tapaś cacāra sātyugraṃ niyamair bahubhir nṛpa
GE07mbh_09_u:047.003c: bhartā me devarājaḥ syād iti niścitya bhāminī
GE07mbh_09_u:047.004c: carantyā niyamāṃs tāṃs tān strībhis tīvrān suduścarān
GE07mbh_09_u:047.005a: tasyās tu tena vṛttena tapasā ca viśāṃ pate
GE07mbh_09_u:047.005c: bhaktyā ca bhagavān prītaḥ parayā pākaśāsanaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:047.007a: sā taṃ dṛṣṭvogratapasaṃ vasiṣṭhaṃ tapatāṃ varam
GE07mbh_09_u:047.007c: ācārair munibhir dṛṣṭaiḥ pūjayām āsa bhārata
GE07mbh_09_u:047.008a: uvāca niyamajñā ca kalyāṇī sā priyaṃvadā
GE07mbh_09_u:047.009a: sarvam adya yathāśakti tava dāsyāmi suvrata
GE07mbh_09_u:047.009c: śakrabhaktyā tu te pāṇiṃ na dāsyāmi kathaṃ cana
GE07mbh_09_u:047.010a: vrataiś ca niyamaiś caiva tapasā ca tapodhana
GE07mbh_09_u:047.011a: ity ukto bhagavān devaḥ smayann iva nirīkṣya tām
GE07mbh_09_u:047.011c: uvāca niyamajñāṃ tāṃ sāntvayann iva bhārata
GE07mbh_09_u:047.012a: ugraṃ tapaś carasi vai viditā me 'si suvrate
GE07mbh_09_u:047.012c: yadartham ayam ārambhas tava kalyāṇi hṛdgataḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:047.013a: tac ca sarvaṃ yathābhūtaṃ bhaviṣyati varānane
GE07mbh_09_u:047.013c: tapasā labhyate sarvaṃ sarvaṃ tapasi tiṣṭhati
GE07mbh_09_u:047.014c: tapasā tāni prāpyāni tapomūlaṃ mahat sukham
GE07mbh_09_u:047.015a: iha kṛtvā tapo ghoraṃ dehaṃ saṃnyasya mānavāḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:047.015c: devatvaṃ yānti kalyāṇi śṛṇu cedaṃ vaco mama
GE07mbh_09_u:047.016c: pacety uktvā sa bhagavāñ jagāma balasūdanaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:047.017a: āmantrya tāṃ tu kalyāṇīṃ tato japyaṃ jajāpa saḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:047.017c: avidūre tatas tasmād āśramāt tīrtha uttame
GE07mbh_09_u:047.017d-0285_01: tac ca tīrthaṃ mahārāja yatra japyaṃ jajāpa saḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:047.019a: tataḥ sa prayatā rājan vāgyatā vigataklamā
GE07mbh_09_u:047.020c: na ca sma tāny apacyanta dinaṃ ca kṣayam abhyagāt
GE07mbh_09_u:047.021a: hutāśanena dagdhaś ca yas tasyāḥ kāṣṭhasaṃcayaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:047.021c: akāṣṭham agniṃ sā dṛṣṭvā svaśarīram athādahat
GE07mbh_09_u:047.022a: pādau prakṣipya sā pūrvaṃ pāvake cārudarśanā
GE07mbh_09_u:047.023d-0286_03: tac cāsyā vacanaṃ nityam avartad dhṛdi bhārata
GE07mbh_09_u:047.023d-0286_05: sā tan manasi kṛtvaiva maharṣer vacanaṃ śubhā
GE07mbh_09_u:047.023d-0286_06: apacad badarāṇy eva na cāpacyanta bhārata
GE07mbh_09_u:047.023d-0286_07: tasyāstu caraṇau vahnir dadāha bhagavān svayam
GE07mbh_09_u:047.023d-0286_08: na ca tasyā manoduḥkhaṃ svalpam apy abhavat tadā
GE07mbh_09_u:047.024a: atha tat karma dṛṣṭvāsyāḥ prītas tribhuvaneśvaraḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:047.024c: tataḥ saṃdarśayām āsa kanyāyai rūpam ātmanaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:047.025a: uvāca ca suraśreṣṭhas tāṃ kanyāṃ sudṛḍhavratām
GE07mbh_09_u:047.025c: prīto 'smi te śubhe bhaktyā tapasā niyamena ca
GE07mbh_09_u:047.026a: tasmād yo 'bhimataḥ kāmaḥ sa te saṃpatsyate śubhe
GE07mbh_09_u:047.026c: dehaṃ tyaktvā mahābhāge tridive mayi vatsyasi
GE07mbh_09_u:047.027a: idaṃ ca te tīrthavaraṃ sthiraṃ loke bhaviṣyati
GE07mbh_09_u:047.028a: asmin khalu mahābhāge śubhe tīrthavare purā
GE07mbh_09_u:047.029a: tatas te vai mahābhāgā gatvā tatra susaṃśitāḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:047.031a: te kṛtvā cāśramaṃ tatra nyavasanta tapasvinaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:047.032a: arundhatīṃ tato dṛṣṭvā tīvraṃ niyamam āsthitām
GE07mbh_09_u:047.033a: brāhmaṃ rūpaṃ tataḥ kṛtvā mahādevo mahāyaśāḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:047.033c: tām abhyetyābravīd devo bhikṣām icchāmy ahaṃ śubhe
GE07mbh_09_u:047.034a: pratyuvāca tataḥ sā taṃ brāhmaṇaṃ cārudarśanā
GE07mbh_09_u:047.036a: divyā manoramāḥ puṇyāḥ kathāḥ śuśrāva sā tadā
GE07mbh_09_u:047.036c: atītā sā tv anāvṛṣṭir ghorā dvādaśavārṣikī
GE07mbh_09_u:047.037a: anaśnantyāḥ pacantyāś ca śṛṇvantyāś ca kathāḥ śubhāḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:047.037c: ahaḥsamaḥ sa tasyās tu kālo 'tītaḥ sudāruṇaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:047.038a: tatas te munayaḥ prāptāḥ phalāny ādāya parvatāt
GE07mbh_09_u:047.038c: tataḥ sa bhagavān prītaḥ provācārundhatīṃ tadā
GE07mbh_09_u:047.039c: prīto 'smi tava dharmajñe tapasā niyamena ca
GE07mbh_09_u:047.040a: tataḥ saṃdarśayām āsa svarūpaṃ bhagavān haraḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:047.040c: tato 'bravīt tadā tebhyas tasyās tac caritaṃ mahat
GE07mbh_09_u:047.041c: asyāś ca yat tapo viprā na samaṃ tan mataṃ mama
GE07mbh_09_u:047.042a: anayā hi tapasvinyā tapas taptaṃ suduścaram
GE07mbh_09_u:047.042c: anaśnantyā pacantyā ca samā dvādaśa pāritāḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:047.043a: tataḥ provāca bhagavāṃs tām evārundhatīṃ punaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:047.043c: varaṃ vṛṇīṣva kalyāṇi yat te 'bhilaṣitaṃ hṛdi
GE07mbh_09_u:047.044c: bhagavān yadi me prītas tīrthaṃ syād idam uttamam
GE07mbh_09_u:047.045e: evam astv iti tāṃ coktvā haro yātas tadā divam
GE07mbh_09_u:047.046a: ṛṣayo vismayaṃ jagmus tāṃ dṛṣṭvā cāpy arundhatīm
GE07mbh_09_u:047.047a: evaṃ siddhiḥ parā prāptā arundhatyā viśuddhayā
GE07mbh_09_u:047.048a: viśeṣo hi tvayā bhadre vrate hy asmin samarpitaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:047.048c: tathā cedaṃ dadāmy adya niyamena sutoṣitaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:047.049a: viśeṣaṃ tava kalyāṇi prayacchāmi varaṃ vare
GE07mbh_09_u:047.049c: arundhatyā varas tasyā yo datto vai mahātmanā
GE07mbh_09_u:047.050a: tasya cāhaṃ prasādena tava kalyāṇi tejasā
GE07mbh_09_u:047.050c: pravakṣyāmy aparaṃ bhūyo varam atra yathāvidhi
GE07mbh_09_u:047.051a: yas tv ekāṃ rajanīṃ tīrthe vatsyate susamāhitaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:047.051c: sa snātvā prāpsyate lokān dehanyāsāc ca durlabhān
GE07mbh_09_u:047.052a: ity uktvā bhagavān devaḥ sahasrākṣaḥ pratāpavān
GE07mbh_09_u:047.052c: srucāvatīṃ tataḥ puṇyāṃ jagāma tridivaṃ punaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:047.053a: gate vajradhare rājaṃs tatra varṣaṃ papāta ha
GE07mbh_09_u:047.054c: mārutaś ca vavau yuktyā puṇyagandho viśāṃ pate
GE07mbh_09_u:047.055a: utsṛjya tu śubhaṃ dehaṃ jagāmendrasya bhāryatām
GE07mbh_09_u:047.055c: tapasogreṇa sā labdhvā tena reme sahācyuta
GE07mbh_09_u:047.056a: kā tasyā bhagavan mātā kva saṃvṛddhā ca śobhanā
GE07mbh_09_u:047.056c: śrotum icchāmy ahaṃ brahman paraṃ kautūhalaṃ hi me
GE07mbh_09_u:047.058a: sa tu jagrāha tad retaḥ kareṇa japatāṃ varaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:047.058c: tadāvapat parṇapuṭe tatra sā saṃbhavac chubhā
GE07mbh_09_u:047.059a: tasyās tu jātakarmādi kṛtvā sarvaṃ tapodhanaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:047.059c: nāma cāsyāḥ sa kṛtavān bhāradvājo mahāmuniḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:047.060c: sa ca tām āśrame nyasya jagāma himavadvanam
GE07mbh_09_u:047.061a: tatrāpy upaspṛśya mahānubhāvo; vasūni dattvā ca mahādvijebhyaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:047.061c: jagāma tīrthaṃ susamāhitātmā; śakrasya vṛṣṇipravaras tadānīm
GE07mbh_09_u:048.001a: indratīrthaṃ tato gatvā yadūnāṃ pravaro balī
GE07mbh_09_u:048.002a: tatra hy amararājo 'sāv īje kratuśatena ha
GE07mbh_09_u:048.002c: bṛhaspateś ca deveśaḥ pradadau vipulaṃ dhanam
GE07mbh_09_u:048.003d-0288_01: yatra pūrvaṃ surapatiḥ kratūnāṃ śatam eva hi
GE07mbh_09_u:048.004c: pūrayām āsa vidhivat tataḥ khyātaḥ śatakratuḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:048.005a: tasya nāmnā ca tat tīrthaṃ śivaṃ puṇyaṃ sanātanam
GE07mbh_09_u:048.006e: śubhaṃ tīrthavaraṃ tasmād rāmatīrthaṃ jagāma ha
GE07mbh_09_u:048.008e: pradadau dakṣiṇārthaṃ ca pṛthivīṃ vai sasāgarām
GE07mbh_09_u:048.009a: rāmo dattvā dhanaṃ tatra dvijebhyo janamejaya
GE07mbh_09_u:048.010a: puṇye tīrthe śubhe deśe vasu dattvā śubhānanaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:048.012a: tatra nirjitya saṃgrāme mānuṣān daivatāṃs tathā
GE07mbh_09_u:048.015a: sīrāyudhas tadā rāmas tasmiṃs tīrthavare tadā
GE07mbh_09_u:048.015c: tatra snātvā ca dattvā ca dvijebhyo vasu mādhavaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:048.015d-0290_01: tatrāpi lāṅgalī deva ṛṣīn abhyarcya pūjayā
GE07mbh_09_u:048.015d-0290_02: itarebhyo 'py adād dānam arthibhyaḥ kāmado vibhuḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:048.018a: tasyā nadyās tu tīre vai sarve devāḥ savāsavāḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:048.019a: dvaipāyanaḥ śukaś caiva kṛṣṇaś ca madhusūdanaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:048.019c: yakṣāś ca rākṣasāś caiva piśācāś ca viśāṃ pate
GE07mbh_09_u:048.020a: ete cānye ca bahavo yogasiddhāḥ sahasraśaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:048.020c: tasmiṃs tīrthe sarasvatyāḥ śive puṇye paraṃtapa
GE07mbh_09_u:048.021a: tatra hatvā purā viṣṇur asurau madhukaiṭabhau
GE07mbh_09_u:048.022c: saṃprāptaḥ paramaṃ yogaṃ siddhiṃ ca paramāṃ gataḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:048.023a: asito devalaś caiva tasminn eva mahātapāḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:048.023c: paramaṃ yogam āsthāya ṛṣir yogam avāptavān
GE07mbh_09_u:049.001a: tasminn eva tu dharmātmā vasati sma tapodhanaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:049.001c: gārhasthyaṃ dharmam āsthāya asito devalaḥ purā
GE07mbh_09_u:049.002c: karmaṇā manasā vācā samaḥ sarveṣu jantuṣu
GE07mbh_09_u:049.004a: devatāḥ pūjayan nityam atithīṃś ca dvijaiḥ saha
GE07mbh_09_u:049.005c: jaigīṣavyo munir dhīmāṃs tasmiṃs tīrthe samāhitaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:049.007a: taṃ tatra vasamānaṃ tu jaigīṣavyaṃ mahāmunim
GE07mbh_09_u:049.007d-0292_01: na jñātas tena muninā devalena mahātmanā
GE07mbh_09_u:049.008c: jaigīṣavyaṃ muniṃ caiva na dadarśātha devalaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:049.008d-0293_01: jaigīṣavyaḥ kadā cit sa darśayām āsa devalam
GE07mbh_09_u:049.010a: sa dṛṣṭvā bhikṣurūpeṇa prāptaṃ tatra mahāmunim
GE07mbh_09_u:049.010c: gauravaṃ paramaṃ cakre prītiṃ ca vipulāṃ tathā
GE07mbh_09_u:049.011a: devalas tu yathāśakti pūjayām āsa bhārata
GE07mbh_09_u:049.012a: kadā cit tasya nṛpate devalasya mahātmanaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:049.012c: cintā sumahatī jātā muniṃ dṛṣṭvā mahādyutim
GE07mbh_09_u:049.013a: samās tu samatikrāntā bahvyaḥ pūjayato mama
GE07mbh_09_u:049.013c: na cāyam alaso bhikṣur abhyabhāṣata kiṃ cana
GE07mbh_09_u:049.014a: evaṃ vigaṇayann eva sa jagāma mahodadhim
GE07mbh_09_u:049.015a: gacchann eva sa dharmātmā samudraṃ saritāṃ patim
GE07mbh_09_u:049.015c: jaigīṣavyaṃ tato 'paśyad gataṃ prāg eva bhārata
GE07mbh_09_u:049.016c: kathaṃ bhikṣur ayaṃ prāptaḥ samudre snāta eva ca
GE07mbh_09_u:049.017a: ity evaṃ cintayām āsa maharṣir asitas tadā
GE07mbh_09_u:049.017c: snātvā samudre vidhivac chucir japyaṃ jajāpa ha
GE07mbh_09_u:049.018a: kṛtajapyāhnikaḥ śrīmān āśramaṃ ca jagāma ha
GE07mbh_09_u:049.019a: tataḥ sa praviśann eva svam āśramapadaṃ muniḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:049.020a: na vyāharati caivainaṃ jaigīṣavyaḥ kathaṃ cana
GE07mbh_09_u:049.021a: taṃ dṛṣṭvā cāplutaṃ toye sāgare sāgaropamam
GE07mbh_09_u:049.021c: praviṣṭam āśramaṃ cāpi pūrvam eva dadarśa saḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:049.022a: asito devalo rājaṃś cintayām āsa buddhimān
GE07mbh_09_u:049.023a: cintayām āsa rājendra tadā sa munisattamaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:049.023c: mayā dṛṣṭaḥ samudre ca āśrame ca kathaṃ tv ayam
GE07mbh_09_u:049.024a: evaṃ vigaṇayann eva sa munir mantrapāragaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:049.025c: jaigīṣavyaṃ ca taiḥ siddhaiḥ pūjyamānam apaśyata
GE07mbh_09_u:049.026c: apaśyad vai divaṃ yāntaṃ jaigīṣavyaṃ sa devalaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:049.027a: tasmāc ca pitṛlokaṃ taṃ vrajantaṃ so 'nvapaśyata
GE07mbh_09_u:049.027c: pitṛlokāc ca taṃ yāntaṃ yāmyaṃ lokam apaśyata
GE07mbh_09_u:049.029c: tato 'gnihotriṇāṃ lokāṃs tebhyaś cāpy utpapāta ha
GE07mbh_09_u:049.030a: darśaṃ ca paurṇamāsaṃ ca ye yajanti tapodhanāḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:049.030c: tebhyaḥ sa dadṛśe dhīmāṃl lokebhyaḥ paśuyājinām
GE07mbh_09_u:049.032a: agniṣṭutena ca tathā ye yajanti tapodhanāḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:049.034c: teṣāṃ lokeṣv apaśyac ca jaigīṣavyaṃ sa devalaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:049.036a: sarvamedhaṃ ca duṣprāpaṃ tathā sautrāmaṇiṃ ca ye
GE07mbh_09_u:049.036c: teṣāṃ lokeṣv apaśyac ca jaigīṣavyaṃ sa devalaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:049.037a: dvādaśāhaiś ca satrair ye yajante vividhair nṛpa
GE07mbh_09_u:049.037c: teṣāṃ lokeṣv apaśyac ca jaigīṣavyaṃ sa devalaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:049.039a: rudrāṇāṃ ca vasūnāṃ ca sthānaṃ yac ca bṛhaspateḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:049.039c: tāni sarvāṇy atītaṃ ca samapaśyat tato 'sitaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:049.040a: āruhya ca gavāṃ lokaṃ prayāntaṃ brahmasatriṇām
GE07mbh_09_u:049.041a: trīṃl lokān aparān vipram utpatantaṃ svatejasā
GE07mbh_09_u:049.043c: prabhāvaṃ suvratatvaṃ ca siddhiṃ yogasya cātulām
GE07mbh_09_u:049.044c: prayataḥ prāñjalir bhūtvā dhīras tān brahmasatriṇaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:049.045a: jaigīṣavyaṃ na paśyāmi taṃ śaṃsata mahaujasam
GE07mbh_09_u:049.045c: etad icchāmy ahaṃ śrotuṃ paraṃ kautūhalaṃ hi me
GE07mbh_09_u:049.045d-0295_01: so 'py apṛcchad yadā siddhān abruvan pṛcchate tadā
GE07mbh_09_u:049.046a: śṛṇu devala bhūtārthaṃ śaṃsatāṃ no dṛḍhavrata
GE07mbh_09_u:049.047a: sa śrutvā vacanaṃ teṣāṃ siddhānāṃ brahmasatriṇām
GE07mbh_09_u:049.047c: asito devalas tūrṇam utpapāta papāta ca
GE07mbh_09_u:049.048a: tataḥ siddhās ta ūcur hi devalaṃ punar eva ha
GE07mbh_09_u:049.048c: na devala gatis tatra tava gantuṃ tapodhana
GE07mbh_09_u:049.049a: teṣāṃ tad vacanaṃ śrutvā siddhānāṃ devalaḥ punaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:049.049c: ānupūrvyeṇa lokāṃs tān sarvān avatatāra ha
GE07mbh_09_u:049.050c: praviśann eva cāpaśyaj jaigīṣavyaṃ sa devalaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:049.053a: tasya tad vacanaṃ śrutvā upadeśaṃ cakāra saḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:049.053c: vidhiṃ ca yogasya paraṃ kāryākāryaṃ ca śāstrataḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:049.054c: sarvāś cāsya kriyāś cakre vidhidṛṣṭena karmaṇā
GE07mbh_09_u:049.056a: devalas tu vacaḥ śrutvā bhūtānāṃ karuṇaṃ tathā
GE07mbh_09_u:049.056c: diśo daśa vyāharatāṃ mokṣaṃ tyaktuṃ mano dadhe
GE07mbh_09_u:049.057a: tatas tu phalamūlāni pavitrāṇi ca bhārata
GE07mbh_09_u:049.058a: punar no devalaḥ kṣudro nūnaṃ chetsyati durmatiḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:049.059c: mokṣe gārhasthyadharme vā kiṃ nu śreyaskaraṃ bhavet
GE07mbh_09_u:049.061c: prāptavān paramāṃ siddhiṃ paraṃ yogaṃ ca bhārata
GE07mbh_09_u:049.063a: athābravīd ṛṣivaro devān vai nāradas tadā
GE07mbh_09_u:049.064a: tam evaṃvādinaṃ dhīraṃ pratyūcus te divaukasaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:049.064c: maivam ity eva śaṃsanto jaigīṣavyaṃ mahāmunim
GE07mbh_09_u:049.064d-0296_01: nātaḥ parataraṃ kiṃ cit tulyam asti prabhāvataḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:049.064d-0296_02: tejasas tapasaś cāsya yogasya ca mahātmanaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:049.064d-0296_04: tayor idaṃ sthānavaraṃ tīrthaṃ caiva mahātmanoḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:049.065a: tatrāpy upaspṛśya tato mahātmā; dattvā ca vittaṃ halabhṛd dvijebhyaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:049.065c: avāpya dharmaṃ param āryakarmā; jagāma somasya mahat sa tīrtham
GE07mbh_09_u:050.001c: tasmin vṛtte mahān āsīt saṃgrāmas tārakāmayaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:050.002a: tatrāpy upaspṛśya balo dattvā dānāni cātmavān
GE07mbh_09_u:050.002c: sārasvatasya dharmātmā munes tīrthaṃ jagāma ha
GE07mbh_09_u:050.003c: vedān adhyāpayām āsa purā sārasvato muniḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:050.004c: vedān adhyāpayām āsa purā sārasvato muniḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:050.005a: āsīt pūrvaṃ mahārāja munir dhīmān mahātapāḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:050.006c: na sa lobhayituṃ śakyaḥ phalair bahuvidhair api
GE07mbh_09_u:050.009c: retaḥ skannaṃ sarasvatyāṃ tat sā jagrāha nimnagā
GE07mbh_09_u:050.010a: kukṣau cāpy adadhad dṛṣṭvā tad retaḥ puruṣarṣabha
GE07mbh_09_u:050.010c: sā dadhāra ca taṃ garbhaṃ putrahetor mahānadī
GE07mbh_09_u:050.011a: suṣuve cāpi samaye putraṃ sā saritāṃ varā
GE07mbh_09_u:050.011c: jagāma putram ādāya tam ṛṣiṃ prati ca prabho
GE07mbh_09_u:050.012a: ṛṣisaṃsadi taṃ dṛṣṭvā sā nadī munisattamam
GE07mbh_09_u:050.012c: tataḥ provāca rājendra dadatī putram asya tam
GE07mbh_09_u:050.012e: brahmarṣe tava putro 'yaṃ tvadbhaktyā dhārito mayā
GE07mbh_09_u:050.013a: dṛṣṭvā te 'psarasaṃ reto yat skannaṃ prāg alambusām
GE07mbh_09_u:050.013c: tat kukṣiṇā vai brahmarṣe tvadbhaktyā dhṛtavaty aham
GE07mbh_09_u:050.014a: na vināśam idaṃ gacchet tvatteja iti niścayāt
GE07mbh_09_u:050.014c: pratigṛhṇīṣva putraṃ svaṃ mayā dattam aninditam
GE07mbh_09_u:050.015a: ity uktaḥ pratijagrāha prītiṃ cāvāpa uttamām
GE07mbh_09_u:050.015c: mantravac copajighrat taṃ mūrdhni premṇā dvijottamaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:050.018a: ity uktvā sa tu tuṣṭāva vacobhir vai mahānadīm
GE07mbh_09_u:050.020c: tasmāt sārasvataḥ putro mahāṃs te varavarṇini
GE07mbh_09_u:050.021a: tavaiva nāmnā prathitaḥ putras te lokabhāvanaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:050.023a: puṇyābhyaś ca saridbhyas tvaṃ sadā puṇyatamā śubhe
GE07mbh_09_u:050.024a: evaṃ sā saṃstutā tena varaṃ labdhvā mahānadī
GE07mbh_09_u:050.025c: śakraḥ praharaṇānveṣī lokāṃs trīn vicacāra ha
GE07mbh_09_u:050.026a: na copalebhe bhagavāñ śakraḥ praharaṇaṃ tadā
GE07mbh_09_u:050.026c: yad vai teṣāṃ bhaved yogyaṃ vadhāya vibudhadviṣām
GE07mbh_09_u:050.027a: tato 'bravīt surāñ śakro na me śakyā mahāsurāḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:050.029a: sa devair yācito 'sthīni yatnād ṛṣivaras tadā
GE07mbh_09_u:050.029e: sa lokān akṣayān prāpto devapriyakaras tadā
GE07mbh_09_u:050.030e: vajrāṇi cakrāṇi gadā gurudaṇḍāṃś ca puṣkalān
GE07mbh_09_u:050.031a: sa hi tīvreṇa tapasā saṃbhṛtaḥ paramarṣiṇā
GE07mbh_09_u:050.032c: jajñe śailaguruḥ prāṃśur mahimnā prathitaḥ prabhuḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:050.036a: digbhyas tān pradrutān dṛṣṭvā muniḥ sārasvatas tadā
GE07mbh_09_u:050.036c: gamanāya matiṃ cakre taṃ provāca sarasvatī
GE07mbh_09_u:050.037a: na gantavyam itaḥ putra tavāhāram ahaṃ sadā
GE07mbh_09_u:050.038a: ity uktas tarpayām āsa sa pitṝn devatās tathā
GE07mbh_09_u:050.038c: āhāram akaron nityaṃ prāṇān vedāṃś ca dhārayan
GE07mbh_09_u:050.040c: sarveṣām eva rājendra na kaś cit pratibhānavān
GE07mbh_09_u:050.041a: atha kaś cid ṛṣis teṣāṃ sārasvatam upeyivān
GE07mbh_09_u:050.042a: sa gatvācaṣṭa tebhyaś ca sārasvatam atiprabham
GE07mbh_09_u:050.043a: tataḥ sarve samājagmus tatra rājan maharṣayaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:050.044a: asmān adhyāpayasveti tān uvāca tato muniḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:050.044c: śiṣyatvam upagacchadhvaṃ vidhivad bho mamety uta
GE07mbh_09_u:050.045a: tato 'bravīd ṛṣigaṇo bālas tvam asi putraka
GE07mbh_09_u:050.045c: sa tān āha na me dharmo naśyed iti punar munīn
GE07mbh_09_u:050.046a: yo hy adharmeṇa vibrūyād gṛhṇīyād vāpy adharmataḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:050.046c: mriyatāṃ tāv ubhau kṣipraṃ syātāṃ vā vairiṇāv ubhau
GE07mbh_09_u:050.047a: na hāyanair na palitair na vittena na bandhubhiḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:050.047c: ṛṣayaś cakrire dharmaṃ yo 'nūcānaḥ sa no mahān
GE07mbh_09_u:050.048a: etac chrutvā vacas tasya munayas te vidhānataḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:050.048c: tasmād vedān anuprāpya punar dharmaṃ pracakrire
GE07mbh_09_u:050.050a: muṣṭiṃ muṣṭiṃ tataḥ sarve darbhāṇāṃ te 'bhyupāharan
GE07mbh_09_u:050.051a: tatrāpi dattvā vasu rauhiṇeyo; mahābalaḥ keśavapūrvajo 'tha
GE07mbh_09_u:050.051c: jagāma tīrthaṃ muditaḥ krameṇa; khyātaṃ mahad vṛddhakanyā sma yatra
GE07mbh_09_u:051.001a: kathaṃ kumārī bhagavaṃs tapoyuktā hy abhūt purā
GE07mbh_09_u:051.001c: kimarthaṃ ca tapas tepe ko vāsyā niyamo 'bhavat
GE07mbh_09_u:051.002a: suduṣkaram idaṃ brahmaṃs tvattaḥ śrutam anuttamam
GE07mbh_09_u:051.002c: ākhyāhi tattvam akhilaṃ yathā tapasi sā sthitā
GE07mbh_09_u:051.003a: ṛṣir āsīn mahāvīryaḥ kuṇir gārgyo mahāyaśāḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:051.003c: sa taptvā vipulaṃ rājaṃs tapo vai tapatāṃ varaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:051.003e: mānasīṃ sa sutāṃ subhrūṃ samutpāditavān vibhuḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:051.004a: tāṃ ca dṛṣṭvā bhṛśaṃ prītaḥ kuṇir gārgyo mahāyaśāḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:051.005a: subhrūḥ sā hy atha kalyāṇī puṇḍarīkanibhekṣaṇā
GE07mbh_09_u:051.006a: upavāsaiḥ pūjayantī pitṝn devāṃś ca sā purā
GE07mbh_09_u:051.006c: tasyās tu tapasogreṇa mahān kālo 'tyagān nṛpa
GE07mbh_09_u:051.007a: sā pitrā dīyamānāpi bhartre naicchad aninditā
GE07mbh_09_u:051.007c: ātmanaḥ sadṛśaṃ sā tu bhartāraṃ nānvapaśyata
GE07mbh_09_u:051.009c: vārddhakena ca rājendra tapasā caiva karśitā
GE07mbh_09_u:051.010a: sā nāśakad yadā gantuṃ padāt padam api svayam
GE07mbh_09_u:051.010c: cakāra gamane buddhiṃ paralokāya vai tadā
GE07mbh_09_u:051.011a: moktukāmāṃ tu tāṃ dṛṣṭvā śarīraṃ nārado 'bravīt
GE07mbh_09_u:051.012a: evaṃ hi śrutam asmābhir devaloke mahāvrate
GE07mbh_09_u:051.012c: tapaḥ paramakaṃ prāptaṃ na tu lokās tvayā jitāḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:051.014a: ity ukte cāsyā jagrāha pāṇiṃ gālavasaṃbhavaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:051.014c: ṛṣiḥ prāk śṛṅgavān nāma samayaṃ cedam abravīt
GE07mbh_09_u:051.015c: yady ekarātraṃ vastavyaṃ tvayā saha mayeti ha
GE07mbh_09_u:051.016a: tatheti sā pratiśrutya tasmai pāṇiṃ dadau tadā
GE07mbh_09_u:051.016c: cakre ca pāṇigrahaṇaṃ tasyodvāhaṃ ca gālaviḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:051.017a: sā rātrāv abhavad rājaṃs taruṇī devavarṇinī
GE07mbh_09_u:051.018a: tāṃ dṛṣṭvā gālaviḥ prīto dīpayantīm ivātmanā
GE07mbh_09_u:051.018c: uvāsa ca kṣapām ekāṃ prabhāte sābravīc ca tam
GE07mbh_09_u:051.019a: yas tvayā samayo vipra kṛto me tapatāṃ vara
GE07mbh_09_u:051.019c: tenoṣitāsmi bhadraṃ te svasti te 'stu vrajāmy aham
