GE07mbh_09_u:055.026a: ity uktvā rājaśārdūla gadām ādāya vīryavān
GE07mbh_09_u:055.027a: tam udyatagadaṃ dṛṣṭvā kailāsam iva śṛṅgiṇam
GE07mbh_09_u:055.027c: bhīmasenaḥ punaḥ kruddho duryodhanam uvāca ha
GE07mbh_09_u:055.028a: rājñaś ca dhṛtarāṣṭrasya tathā tvam api cātmanaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:055.028a-0324_02: sarveṣām api cāsmākaṃ duḥkhaṃ prāptaṃ sudurmate
GE07mbh_09_u:055.028c: smara tad duṣkṛtaṃ karma yad vṛttaṃ vāraṇāvate
GE07mbh_09_u:055.029a: draupadī ca parikliṣṭā sabhāyāṃ yad rajasvalā
GE07mbh_09_u:055.029c: dyūte ca vañcito rājā yat tvayā saubalena ca
GE07mbh_09_u:055.030a: vane duḥkhaṃ ca yat prāptam asmābhis tvatkṛtaṃ mahat
GE07mbh_09_u:055.030e: tat sarvaṃ yātayāmy adya diṣṭyā dṛṣṭo 'si durmate
GE07mbh_09_u:055.032a: hato droṇaś ca karṇaś ca tathā śalyaḥ pratāpavān
GE07mbh_09_u:055.032c: vairāgner ādikartā ca śakuniḥ saubalo hataḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:055.033a: prātikāmī tathā pāpo draupadyāḥ kleśakṛd dhataḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:055.033c: bhrātaras te hatāḥ sarve śūrā vikrāntayodhinaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:055.034a: ete cānye ca bahavo nihatās tvatkṛte nṛpāḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:055.034c: tvām adya nihaniṣyāmi gadayā nātra saṃśayaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:055.035a: ity evam uccai rājendra bhāṣamāṇaṃ vṛkodaram
GE07mbh_09_u:055.035c: uvāca vītabhī rājan putras te satyavikramaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:055.036a: kiṃ katthitena bahudhā yudhyasva tvaṃ vṛkodara
GE07mbh_09_u:055.037a: naiva duryodhanaḥ kṣudra kena cit tvadvidhena vai
GE07mbh_09_u:055.037c: śakyas trāsayituṃ vācā yathānyaḥ prākṛto naraḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:055.039a: kiṃ vācā bahunoktena katthitena ca durmate
GE07mbh_09_u:055.039c: vāṇī saṃpadyatām eṣā karmaṇā mā ciraṃ kṛthāḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:055.040a: tasya tad vacanaṃ śrutvā sarva evābhyapūjayan
GE07mbh_09_u:055.040c: rājānaḥ somakāś caiva ye tatrāsan samāgatāḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:055.041c: bhūyo dhīraṃ manaś cakre yuddhāya kurunandanaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:055.042a: taṃ mattam iva mātaṅgaṃ talatālair narādhipāḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:055.043a: taṃ mahātmā mahātmānaṃ gadām udyamya pāṇḍavaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:055.044a: bṛṃhanti kuñjarās tatra hayā heṣanti cāsakṛt
GE07mbh_09_u:056.003a: abhavac ca tayor yuddhaṃ tumulaṃ romaharṣaṇam
GE07mbh_09_u:056.003d-003_0001: tau vṛṣāv iva garjantau maṇḍalāni viceratuḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:056.003d-003_0006: agnijvālair ivāvidhya pade bhīmasya sā gadā
GE07mbh_09_u:056.003d-003_0011: dantair iva mahānāgau śṛṅgair iva mahāvṛṣau
GE07mbh_09_u:056.003d-003_0012: tau tu rejatur anyonyaṃ gadābhyām aparikṣatau
GE07mbh_09_u:056.003d-003_0031: bhṛśaṃ marmasv abhihatāv ubhāv āstāṃ suvihvalau
GE07mbh_09_u:056.006a: tathā tasmin vartamāne saṃkule tumule bhṛśam
GE07mbh_09_u:056.007a: tau muhūrtaṃ samāśvasya punar eva paraṃtapau
GE07mbh_09_u:056.008a: tau tu dṛṣṭvā mahāvīryau samāśvastau nararṣabhau
GE07mbh_09_u:056.011a: samāgamya tato bhūyo bhrātarau balināṃ varau
GE07mbh_09_u:056.012c: dadṛśuḥ prekṣakā rājan raudrīṃ viśasanīṃ gadām
GE07mbh_09_u:056.014c: gadām alaghuvegāṃ tāṃ vismitaḥ saṃbabhūva ha
GE07mbh_09_u:056.015a: caraṃś ca vividhān mārgān maṇḍalāni ca bhārata
GE07mbh_09_u:056.015c: aśobhata tadā vīro bhūya eva vṛkodaraḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:056.016a: tau parasparam āsādya yat tāv anyonyarakṣaṇe
GE07mbh_09_u:056.016c: mārjārāv iva bhakṣārthe tatakṣāte muhur muhuḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:056.017a: acarad bhīmasenas tu mārgān bahuvidhāṃs tathā
GE07mbh_09_u:056.020a: evaṃ tau vicarantau tu nyaghnatāṃ vai parasparam
GE07mbh_09_u:056.021c: gadāhastau tatas tau tu maṇḍalāvasthitau balī
GE07mbh_09_u:056.023a: tathā tu caratas tasya bhīmasya raṇamūrdhani
GE07mbh_09_u:056.024a: āhatas tu tadā bhīmas tava putreṇa bhārata
GE07mbh_09_u:056.024c: āvidhyata gadāṃ gurvīṃ prahāraṃ tam acintayan
GE07mbh_09_u:056.025c: dadṛśus te mahārāja bhīmasenasya tāṃ gadām
GE07mbh_09_u:056.027c: śabda āsīt sutumulas tejaś ca samajāyata
GE07mbh_09_u:056.027d-0328_01: śabda āsīn mahāṃs tatra tumulo lomaharṣaṇaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:056.028a: sa caran vividhān mārgān maṇḍalāni ca bhāgaśaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:056.031c: bhayaṃ viveśa pāṇḍūn vai sarvān eva sasomakān
GE07mbh_09_u:056.033a: tau parasparam āsādya daṃṣṭrābhyāṃ dviradau yathā
GE07mbh_09_u:056.034a: evaṃ tad abhavad yuddhaṃ ghorarūpam asaṃvṛtam
GE07mbh_09_u:056.035a: dṛṣṭvā vyavasthitaṃ bhīmaṃ tava putro mahābalaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:056.036c: abhikruddhasya kruddhas tu tāḍayām āsa tāṃ gadām
GE07mbh_09_u:056.039a: tāṃ nāmṛṣyata kauravyo gadāṃ pratihatāṃ raṇe
GE07mbh_09_u:056.040a: sa savyaṃ maṇḍalaṃ rājann udbhrāmya kṛtaniścayaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:056.041a: tayā tv abhihato bhīmaḥ putreṇa tava pāṇḍavaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:056.042a: āścaryaṃ cāpi tad rājan sarvasainyāny apūjayan
GE07mbh_09_u:056.042c: yad gadābhihato bhīmo nākampata padāt padam
GE07mbh_09_u:056.044c: moghaṃ duryodhanaś cakre tatrābhūd vismayo mahān
GE07mbh_09_u:056.045a: sā tu moghā gadā rājan patantī bhīmacoditā
GE07mbh_09_u:056.046a: āsthāya kauśikān mārgān utpatan sa punaḥ punaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:056.046b-0330_01: gadānipātaṃ kriyayā moghaṃ cakre sutas tava
GE07mbh_09_u:056.050a: sa tu tena prahāreṇa mātaṅga iva roṣitaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:056.051a: tatas tu rabhaso bhīmo gadayā tanayaṃ tava
GE07mbh_09_u:056.052c: āvidhyata gadāṃ rājan samuddiśya sutaṃ tava
GE07mbh_09_u:056.053c: sa vihvalaḥ prahāreṇa jānubhyām agaman mahīm
GE07mbh_09_u:056.054a: tasmiṃs tu bharataśreṣṭhe jānubhyām avanīṃ gate
GE07mbh_09_u:056.055a: teṣāṃ tu ninadaṃ śrutvā sṛñjayānāṃ nararṣabhaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:056.056a: utthāya tu mahābāhuḥ kruddho nāga iva śvasan
GE07mbh_09_u:056.059a: sa bhūyaḥ śuśubhe pārthas tāḍito gadayā raṇe
GE07mbh_09_u:056.060a: tato gadāṃ vīrahaṇīm ayasmayīṃ; pragṛhya vajrāśanitulyanisvanām
GE07mbh_09_u:056.060c: atāḍayac chatrum amitrakarśano; balena vikramya dhanaṃjayāgrajaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:056.062a: tataḥ praṇedur jahṛṣuś ca pāṇḍavāḥ; samīkṣya putraṃ patitaṃ kṣitau tava
GE07mbh_09_u:056.062c: tataḥ sutas te pratilabhya cetanāṃ; samutpapāta dvirado yathā hradāt
GE07mbh_09_u:056.063a: sa pārthivo nityam amarṣitas tadā; mahārathaḥ śikṣitavat paribhraman
GE07mbh_09_u:056.063c: atāḍayat pāṇḍavam agrataḥ sthitaṃ; sa vihvalāṅgo jagatīm upāspṛśat
GE07mbh_09_u:056.064a: sa siṃhanādān vinanāda kauravo; nipātya bhūmau yudhi bhīmam ojasā
GE07mbh_09_u:056.065a: tato 'ntarikṣe ninado mahān abhūd; divaukasām apsarasāṃ ca neduṣām
GE07mbh_09_u:056.066a: tataḥ parān āviśad uttamaṃ bhayaṃ; samīkṣya bhūmau patitaṃ narottamam
GE07mbh_09_u:056.066c: ahīyamānaṃ ca balena kauravaṃ; niśamya bhedaṃ ca dṛḍhasya varmaṇaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:056.067a: tato muhūrtād upalabhya cetanāṃ; pramṛjya vaktraṃ rudhirārdram ātmanaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:056.067c: dhṛtiṃ samālambya vivṛttalocano; balena saṃstabhya vṛkodaraḥ sthitaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:056.067d-0332_05: nigṛhya tān punar api pāṇḍavo balī
GE07mbh_09_u:057.002a: anayor vīrayor yuddhe ko jyāyān bhavato mataḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:057.002c: kasya vā ko guṇo bhūyān etad vada janārdana
GE07mbh_09_u:057.004a: bhīmasenas tu dharmeṇa yudhyamāno na jeṣyati
GE07mbh_09_u:057.004c: anyāyena tu yudhyan vai hanyād eṣa suyodhanam
GE07mbh_09_u:057.005a: māyayā nirjitā devair asurā iti naḥ śrutam
GE07mbh_09_u:057.005c: virocanaś ca śakreṇa māyayā nirjitaḥ sakhe
GE07mbh_09_u:057.005f-0334_01: karotu bhīmaḥ samayaṃ balam āsthāya vīryavān
GE07mbh_09_u:057.006c: ūrū bhetsyāmi te saṃkhye gadayeti suyodhanam
GE07mbh_09_u:057.008a: yady eṣa balam āsthāya nyāyena prahariṣyati
GE07mbh_09_u:057.009a: punar eva ca vakṣyāmi pāṇḍavedaṃ nibodha me
GE07mbh_09_u:057.010a: kṛtvā hi sumahat karma hatvā bhīṣmamukhān kurūn
GE07mbh_09_u:057.010c: jayaḥ prāpto yaśaś cāgryaṃ vairaṃ ca pratiyātitam
GE07mbh_09_u:057.010e: tad evaṃ vijayaḥ prāptaḥ punaḥ saṃśayitaḥ kṛtaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:057.011c: yad ekavijaye yuddhaṃ paṇitaṃ kṛtam īdṛśam
GE07mbh_09_u:057.012c: ślokas tattvārthasahitas tan me nigadataḥ śṛṇu
GE07mbh_09_u:057.012d-0335_01: asminn arthe purāṇo 'yaṃ śloko 'pi niyataḥ kila
GE07mbh_09_u:057.012d-0335_02: śrutaś cośanasā gītaḥ satāṃ nītividāṃ mataḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:057.013d-0336_02: na śakyam agrataḥ sthātuṃ śakreṇāpi dhanaṃjaya
GE07mbh_09_u:057.014a: suyodhanam imaṃ bhagnaṃ hatasainyaṃ hradaṃ gatam
GE07mbh_09_u:057.015a: ko nv eṣa saṃyuge prājñaḥ punar dvaṃdve samāhvayet
GE07mbh_09_u:057.015c: api vo nirjitaṃ rājyaṃ na hareta suyodhanaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:057.016c: caraty ūrdhvaṃ ca tiryak ca bhīmasenajighāṃsayā
GE07mbh_09_u:057.017a: evaṃ cen na mahābāhur anyāyena haniṣyati
GE07mbh_09_u:057.017c: eṣa vaḥ kauravo rājā dhārtarāṣṭro bhaviṣyati
GE07mbh_09_u:057.019a: gṛhya saṃjñāṃ tato bhīmo gadayā vyacarad raṇe
GE07mbh_09_u:057.020a: dakṣiṇaṃ maṇḍalaṃ savyaṃ gomūtrakam athāpi ca
GE07mbh_09_u:057.020c: vyacarat pāṇḍavo rājann ariṃ saṃmohayann iva
GE07mbh_09_u:057.025a: samaṃ praharatos tatra śūrayor balinor mṛdhe
GE07mbh_09_u:057.025c: kṣubdhayor vāyunā rājan dvayor iva samudrayoḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:057.027a: tasmiṃs tadā saṃprahāre dāruṇe saṃkule bhṛśam
GE07mbh_09_u:057.028a: tau muhūrtaṃ samāśvasya punar eva paraṃtapau
GE07mbh_09_u:057.030c: anyonyaṃ jaghnatur vīrau paṅkasthau mahiṣāv iva
GE07mbh_09_u:057.032c: īṣad utsmayamānas tu sahasā prasasāra ha
GE07mbh_09_u:057.033a: tam abhyāśagataṃ prājño raṇe prekṣya vṛkodaraḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:057.033c: avākṣipad gadāṃ tasmai vegena mahatā balī
GE07mbh_09_u:057.034a: avakṣepaṃ tu taṃ dṛṣṭvā putras tava viśāṃ pate
GE07mbh_09_u:057.034c: apāsarpat tataḥ sthānāt sā moghā nyapatad bhuvi
GE07mbh_09_u:057.035a: mokṣayitvā prahāraṃ taṃ sutas tava sa saṃbhramāt
GE07mbh_09_u:057.037a: duryodhanas taṃ ca veda pīḍitaṃ pāṇḍavaṃ raṇe
GE07mbh_09_u:057.038a: amanyata sthitaṃ hy enaṃ prahariṣyantam āhave
GE07mbh_09_u:057.038c: ato na prāharat tasmai punar eva tavātmajaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:057.040c: mogham asya prahāraṃ taṃ cikīrṣur bharatarṣabha
GE07mbh_09_u:057.041a: avasthāne matiṃ kṛtvā putras tava mahāmanāḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:057.042a: abudhyad bhīmasenas tad rājñas tasya cikīrṣitam
GE07mbh_09_u:057.043c: ūrubhyāṃ prāhiṇod rājan gadāṃ vegena pāṇḍavaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:057.046a: vavur vātāḥ sanirghātāḥ pāṃsuvarṣaṃ papāta ca
GE07mbh_09_u:057.048a: tathā śoṇitavarṣaṃ ca pāṃsuvarṣaṃ ca bhārata
GE07mbh_09_u:057.048c: vavarṣa maghavāṃs tatra tava putre nipātite
GE07mbh_09_u:057.049a: yakṣāṇāṃ rākṣasānāṃ ca piśācānāṃ tathaiva ca
GE07mbh_09_u:057.050a: tena śabdena ghoreṇa mṛgāṇām atha pakṣiṇām
GE07mbh_09_u:057.051a: ye tatra vājinaḥ śeṣā gajāś ca manujaiḥ saha
GE07mbh_09_u:057.051c: mumucus te mahānādaṃ tava putre nipātite
GE07mbh_09_u:057.053c: nṛtyadbhir bhayadair vyāptā diśas tatrābhavan nṛpa
GE07mbh_09_u:057.054c: prākampanta tato rājaṃs tava putre nipātite
GE07mbh_09_u:057.055a: hradāḥ kūpāś ca rudhiram udvemur nṛpasattama
GE07mbh_09_u:057.056a: pulliṅgā iva nāryas tu strīliṅgāḥ puruṣābhavan
GE07mbh_09_u:057.056c: duryodhane tadā rājan patite tanaye tava
GE07mbh_09_u:057.057a: dṛṣṭvā tān adbhutotpātān pāñcālāḥ pāṇḍavaiḥ saha
GE07mbh_09_u:057.057b-0338_01: sṛñjayāś ca mahārāja sarva eva mahārathāḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:058.001a: taṃ pātitaṃ tato dṛṣṭvā mahāśālam ivodgatam
GE07mbh_09_u:058.002c: dadṛśur hṛṣṭaromāṇaḥ sarve te cāpi somakāḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:058.004a: gaur gaur iti purā manda draupadīm ekavāsasam
GE07mbh_09_u:058.004c: yat sabhāyāṃ hasann asmāṃs tadā vadasi durmate
GE07mbh_09_u:058.005a: evam uktvā sa vāmena padā maulim upāspṛśat
GE07mbh_09_u:058.006c: punar evābravīd vākyaṃ yat tac chṛṇu narādhipa
GE07mbh_09_u:058.007a: ye 'smān puro 'panṛtyanta punar gaur iti gaur iti
GE07mbh_09_u:058.007c: tān vayaṃ pratinṛtyāmaḥ punar gaur iti gaur iti
GE07mbh_09_u:058.008a: nāsmākaṃ nikṛtir vahnir nākṣadyūtaṃ na vañcanā
GE07mbh_09_u:058.008b-0341_01: na śāṭhyaṃ naiva no māyā yathāsya sudurātmanaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:058.009a: so 'vāpya vairasya parasya pāraṃ; vṛkodaraḥ prāha śanaiḥ prahasya
GE07mbh_09_u:058.009c: yudhiṣṭhiraṃ keśavasṛñjayāṃś ca; dhanaṃjayaṃ mādravatīsutau ca
GE07mbh_09_u:058.010a: rajasvalāṃ draupadīm ānayan ye; ye cāpy akurvanta sadasy avastrām
GE07mbh_09_u:058.010c: tān paśyadhvaṃ pāṇḍavair dhārtarāṣṭrān; raṇe hatāṃs tapasā yājñasenyāḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:058.011a: ye naḥ purā ṣaṇḍhatilān avocan; krūrā rājño dhṛtarāṣṭrasya putrāḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:058.011c: te no hatāḥ sagaṇāḥ sānubandhāḥ; kāmaṃ svargaṃ narakaṃ vā vrajāmaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:058.012a: punaś ca rājñaḥ patitasya bhūmau; sa tāṃ gadāṃ skandhagatāṃ nirīkṣya
GE07mbh_09_u:058.012c: vāmena pādena śiraḥ pramṛdya; duryodhanaṃ naikṛtikety avocat
GE07mbh_09_u:058.013a: hṛṣṭena rājan kurupārthivasya; kṣudrātmanā bhīmasenena pādam
GE07mbh_09_u:058.013c: dṛṣṭvā kṛtaṃ mūrdhani nābhyanandan; dharmātmānaḥ somakānāṃ prabarhāḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:058.014a: tava putraṃ tathā hatvā katthamānaṃ vṛkodaram
GE07mbh_09_u:058.015a: mā śiro 'sya padā mardīr mā dharmas te 'tyagān mahān
GE07mbh_09_u:058.015a-0343_02: pañcānām api yo bhartā na sā prakṛtir mānuṣī
GE07mbh_09_u:058.015c: rājā jñātir hataś cāyaṃ naitan nyāyyaṃ tavānagha
GE07mbh_09_u:058.015d-0344_03: na naśyetāṃ ca dharmasya tyāgāt kīrtir mahad yaśaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:058.015d-0345_02: mā sprākṣīr bhīma pādena rājānaṃ jñātim eva ca
GE07mbh_09_u:058.016c: utsannapiṇḍo bhrātā ca naitan nyāyyaṃ kṛtaṃ tvayā
GE07mbh_09_u:058.017a: dhārmiko bhīmaseno 'sāv ity āhus tvāṃ purā janāḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:058.017c: sa kasmād bhīmasena tvaṃ rājānam adhitiṣṭhasi
GE07mbh_09_u:058.018d-0346_01: ity uktvā bhīmasenaṃ tu sāśrukaṇṭho yudhiṣṭhiraḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:058.018d-0347_01: tāta manyur na te kāryo nātmā śocyas tvayā tathā
GE07mbh_09_u:058.019c: yad vayaṃ tvāṃ jighāṃsāmas tvaṃ cāsmān kurusattama
GE07mbh_09_u:058.020a: ātmano hy aparādhena mahad vyasanam īdṛśam
GE07mbh_09_u:058.020c: prāptavān asi yal lobhān madād bālyāc ca bhārata
GE07mbh_09_u:058.021a: ghātayitvā vayasyāṃś ca bhrātṝn atha pitṝṃs tathā
GE07mbh_09_u:058.021c: putrān pautrāṃs tathācāryāṃs tato 'si nidhanaṃ gataḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:058.022b-0348_01: ātmā na śocanīyas te ślāghyo mṛtyus tavānagha
GE07mbh_09_u:058.022b-0348_03: kṛpaṇaṃ vartayiṣyāmas tair hīnā bandhubhiḥ priyaiḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:058.022b-0348_04: bhrātṝṇāṃ caiva putrāṇāṃ tathā vai śokavihvalāḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:058.022b-0348_06: tvam ekaḥ susthito rājan svarge te nilayo dhruvaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:058.022b-0348_07: vayaṃ narakasaṃjñā vai duḥkhaṃ bhokṣyāma dāruṇam
GE07mbh_09_u:058.022c: nihatā jñātayaś cānye diṣṭaṃ manye duratyayam
GE07mbh_09_u:058.023a: snuṣāś ca prasnuṣāś caiva dhṛtarāṣṭrasya vihvalāḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:058.024a: evam uktvā suduḥkhārto niśaśvāsa sa pārthivaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:059.001c: kim abravīt tadā sūta baladevo mahābalaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:059.002c: kṛtavān rauhiṇeyo yat tan mamācakṣva saṃjaya
GE07mbh_09_u:059.003a: śirasy abhihataṃ dṛṣṭvā bhīmasenena te sutam
GE07mbh_09_u:059.003c: rāmaḥ praharatāṃ śreṣṭhaś cukrodha balavad balī
GE07mbh_09_u:059.004c: kurvann ārtasvaraṃ ghoraṃ dhig dhig bhīmety uvāca ha
GE07mbh_09_u:059.005a: aho dhig yad adho nābheḥ prahṛtaṃ śuddhavikrame
GE07mbh_09_u:059.005c: naitad dṛṣṭaṃ gadāyuddhe kṛtavān yad vṛkodaraḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:059.006a: adho nābhyā na hantavyam iti śāstrasya niścayaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:059.006c: ayaṃ tv aśāstravin mūḍhaḥ svacchandāt saṃpravartate
GE07mbh_09_u:059.007a: tasya tat tad bruvāṇasya roṣaḥ samabhavan mahān
GE07mbh_09_u:059.007b-0350_03: na caiṣa patitaḥ kṛṣṇa kevalaṃ matsamo 'samaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:059.007c: tato lāṅgalam udyamya bhīmam abhyadravad balī
GE07mbh_09_u:059.008d-0352_02: na vivyathe mahārāja dṛṣṭvā haladharaṃ balī
GE07mbh_09_u:059.011a: uvāca cainaṃ saṃrabdhaṃ śamayann iva keśavaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:059.011e: viparītaṃ dviṣatsv etat ṣaḍvidhā vṛddhir ātmanaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:059.012a: ātmany api ca mitreṣu viparītaṃ yadā bhavet
GE07mbh_09_u:059.012c: tadā vidyān manojyānim āśu śāntikaro bhavet
GE07mbh_09_u:059.013c: svakāḥ pitṛṣvasuḥ putrās te parair nikṛtā bhṛśam
GE07mbh_09_u:059.014e: iti pūrvaṃ pratijñātaṃ bhīmena hi sabhātale
GE07mbh_09_u:059.015c: ūrū bhetsyati te bhīmo gadayeti paraṃtapa
GE07mbh_09_u:059.015e: ato doṣaṃ na paśyāmi mā krudhas tvaṃ pralambahan
GE07mbh_09_u:059.015f-0354_01: ye jñātibāndhavebhyaś ca śreṣṭhā vai snehabāndhavāḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:059.015f-0354_02: pāṇḍavāś cābhavañ śreṣṭhāḥ snehāt saṃbandhatas tathā
GE07mbh_09_u:059.016a: yaunair hārdaiś ca saṃbandhaiḥ saṃbaddhāḥ smeha pāṇḍavaiḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:059.016c: teṣāṃ vṛddhyābhivṛddhir no mā krudhaḥ puruṣarṣabha
GE07mbh_09_u:059.017a: dharmaḥ sucaritaḥ sadbhiḥ saha dvābhyāṃ niyacchati
GE07mbh_09_u:059.018a: dharmārthau dharmakāmau ca kāmārthau cāpy apīḍayan
GE07mbh_09_u:059.019a: tad idaṃ vyākulaṃ sarvaṃ kṛtaṃ dharmasya pīḍanāt
GE07mbh_09_u:059.019c: bhīmasenena govinda kāmaṃ tvaṃ tu yathāttha mām
GE07mbh_09_u:059.020c: bhavān prakhyāyate loke tasmāt saṃśāmya mā krudhaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:059.021a: prāptaṃ kaliyugaṃ viddhi pratijñāṃ pāṇḍavasya ca
GE07mbh_09_u:059.021c: ānṛṇyaṃ yātu vairasya pratijñāyāś ca pāṇḍavaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:059.021d-0356_02: nikṛtyā nikṛtiprajñaṃ yo hanyād vairiṇaṃ raṇe
GE07mbh_09_u:059.021d-0356_03: adharmo vidyate nātra yad bhīmo hatavān ripum
GE07mbh_09_u:059.021d-0356_05: anena karṇaḥ saṃdiṣṭaḥ pratīto dhanur acchinat
GE07mbh_09_u:059.021d-0356_08: janmaprabhṛti lubdhaś ca pāpaś caiṣa durātmavān
GE07mbh_09_u:059.021d-0356_13: babhañja gadayā corū na ca sthāne ca maṇḍale
GE07mbh_09_u:059.022a: dharmacchalam api śrutvā keśavāt sa viśāṃ pate
GE07mbh_09_u:059.022c: naiva prītamanā rāmo vacanaṃ prāha saṃsadi
GE07mbh_09_u:059.026a: ity uktvā ratham āsthāya rauhiṇeyaḥ pratāpavān
GE07mbh_09_u:059.027a: pāñcālāś ca savārṣṇeyāḥ pāṇḍavāś ca viśāṃ pate
GE07mbh_09_u:059.030c: upaprekṣasi kasmāt tvaṃ dharmajñaḥ san narādhipa
GE07mbh_09_u:059.031a: na mamaitat priyaṃ kṛṣṇa yad rājānaṃ vṛkodaraḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:059.031c: padā mūrdhny aspṛśat krodhān na ca hṛṣye kulakṣaye
GE07mbh_09_u:059.032c: bahūni paruṣāṇy uktvā vanaṃ prasthāpitāḥ sma ha
GE07mbh_09_u:059.033a: bhīmasenasya tad duḥkham atīva hṛdi vartate
GE07mbh_09_u:059.034c: labhatāṃ pāṇḍavaḥ kāmaṃ dharme 'dharme 'pi vā kṛte
GE07mbh_09_u:059.035c: kāmam astv evam iti vai kṛcchrād yadukulodvahaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:059.036c: anvamodata tat sarvaṃ yad bhīmena kṛtaṃ yudhi
GE07mbh_09_u:059.036d-0360_02: novāca kiṃ cid vacanaṃ bhrātaraṃ sādhv asādhu vā
GE07mbh_09_u:059.040a: yas tu kartāsya vairasya nikṛtyā nikṛtipriyaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:059.041c: rādheyaḥ śakuniś cāpi nihatās tava śatravaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:059.043a: gataṃ vairasya nidhanaṃ hato rājā suyodhanaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:059.044a: diṣṭyā gatas tvam ānṛṇyaṃ mātuḥ kopasya cobhayoḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:059.044c: diṣṭyā jayasi durdharṣa diṣṭyā śatrur nipātitaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:060.001c: pāṇḍavāḥ sṛñjayāś caiva kim akurvata saṃjaya
GE07mbh_09_u:060.001d-0361_01: aśvatthāmā kṛpaś caiva kṛtavarmā ca sātvataḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:060.005a: dhanūṃṣy anye vyākṣipanta jyāś cāpy anye tathākṣipan
GE07mbh_09_u:060.005c: dadhmur anye mahāśaṅkhān anye jaghnuś ca dundubhīḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:060.006a: cikrīḍuś ca tathaivānye jahasuś ca tavāhitāḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:060.006c: abruvaṃś cāsakṛd vīrā bhīmasenam idaṃ vacaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:060.007a: duṣkaraṃ bhavatā karma raṇe 'dya sumahat kṛtam
GE07mbh_09_u:060.008c: tvayā kṛtam amanyanta śatror vadham imaṃ janāḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:060.009a: carantaṃ vividhān mārgān maṇḍalāni ca sarvaśaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:060.009c: duryodhanam imaṃ śūraṃ ko 'nyo hanyād vṛkodarāt
GE07mbh_09_u:060.010a: vairasya ca gataḥ pāraṃ tvam ihānyaiḥ sudurgamam
GE07mbh_09_u:060.013c: mūrdhni teṣāṃ kṛtaḥ pādo diṣṭyā te svena karmaṇā
GE07mbh_09_u:060.014c: bhīma diṣṭyā pṛthivyāṃ te prathitaṃ sumahad yaśaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:060.015a: evaṃ nūnaṃ hate vṛtre śakraṃ nandanti bandinaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:060.015c: tathā tvāṃ nihatāmitraṃ vayaṃ nandāma bhārata
GE07mbh_09_u:060.016c: adyāpi na vihṛṣyanti tāni tad viddhi bhārata
GE07mbh_09_u:060.016e: ity abruvan bhīmasenaṃ vātikās tatra saṃgatāḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:060.017a: tān hṛṣṭān puruṣavyāghrān pāñcālān pāṇḍavaiḥ saha
GE07mbh_09_u:060.018a: na nyāyyaṃ nihataḥ śatrur bhūyo hantuṃ janādhipāḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:060.018c: asakṛd vāgbhir ugrābhir nihato hy eṣa mandadhīḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:060.020b-0362_01: ity uktaḥ pāṇḍavebhyaś ca hy ardharājyaṃ dadasva vai
GE07mbh_09_u:060.020c: pāṇḍubhyaḥ procyamāno 'pi pitryam aṃśaṃ na dattavān
GE07mbh_09_u:060.020d-0363_01: nānena kāryaṃ dṛṣṭena śrutenaiva kathāsv api
GE07mbh_09_u:060.020d-0363_04: jvalann iva ca roṣeṇa sphurann iva ca bhūpatiḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:060.021a: naiṣa yogyo 'dya mitraṃ vā śatrur vā puruṣādhamaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:060.023a: iti śrutvā tv adhikṣepaṃ kṛṣṇād duryodhano nṛpaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:060.027a: kaṃsadāsasya dāyāda na te lajjāsty anena vai
GE07mbh_09_u:060.028a: ūrū bhindhīti bhīmasya smṛtiṃ mithyā prayacchatā
GE07mbh_09_u:060.028c: kiṃ na vijñātam etan me yad arjunam avocathāḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:060.029c: jihmair upāyair bahubhir na te lajjā na te ghṛṇā
GE07mbh_09_u:060.030a: ahany ahani śūrāṇāṃ kurvāṇaḥ kadanaṃ mahat
GE07mbh_09_u:060.031c: ācāryo nyāsitaḥ śastraṃ kiṃ tan na viditaṃ mama
GE07mbh_09_u:060.032c: pātyamānas tvayā dṛṣṭo na cainaṃ tvam avārayaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:060.033a: vadhārthaṃ pāṇḍuputrasya yācitāṃ śaktim eva ca
GE07mbh_09_u:060.036a: punaś ca patite cakre vyasanārtaḥ parājitaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:060.037a: yadi māṃ cāpi karṇaṃ ca bhīṣmadroṇau ca saṃyuge
GE07mbh_09_u:060.037c: ṛjunā pratiyudhyethā na te syād vijayo dhruvam
GE07mbh_09_u:060.038c: svadharmam anutiṣṭhanto vayaṃ cānye ca ghātitāḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:060.038d-0364_02: kṛtvā hataḥ sindhupatiḥ kiṃ tan na viditaṃ mama
GE07mbh_09_u:060.040c: karṇaś ca nihataḥ saṃkhye tava śīlānuvartakaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:060.041a: yācyamāno mayā mūḍha pitryam aṃśaṃ na ditsasi
GE07mbh_09_u:060.042a: viṣaṃ te bhīmasenāya dattaṃ sarve ca pāṇḍavāḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:060.042d-0365_01: pāṇḍavāḥ duḥkhitāś cāsan purā vai vāraṇāvate
GE07mbh_09_u:060.043a: sabhāyāṃ yājñasenī ca kṛṣṭā dyūte rajasvalā
GE07mbh_09_u:060.043c: tadaiva tāvad duṣṭātman vadhyas tvaṃ nirapatrapaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:060.044c: nikṛtyā yat parājaiṣīs tasmād asi hato raṇe
GE07mbh_09_u:060.045a: jayadrathena pāpena yat kṛṣṇā kleśitā vane
GE07mbh_09_u:060.045d-0366_01: tasmāt so 'pi hataḥ krūras tava doṣeṇa cātmanaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:060.046a: abhimanyuś ca yad bāla eko bahubhir āhave
GE07mbh_09_u:060.046c: tvaddoṣair nihataḥ pāpa tasmād asi hato raṇe
GE07mbh_09_u:060.046d-0367_02: vaiguṇyena tavātyarthaṃ sarvaṃ hi tad anuṣṭhitam
GE07mbh_09_u:060.046d-0367_04: vṛddhā nopāsitāś caiva hitaṃ vākyaṃ na te śrutam
GE07mbh_09_u:060.046d-004_0002: yac chikhaṇḍy avadhīd bhīṣmaṃ mitrārthe na vyatikramaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:060.046d-004_0005: pratijñām ātmanaḥ satyāṃ cikīrṣan samare ripum
GE07mbh_09_u:060.046d-004_0007: arjunaḥ samare rājan yudhyamānaḥ kadā cana
GE07mbh_09_u:060.046d-004_0008: ninditaṃ puruṣavyāghraḥ karoti na kathaṃ cana
GE07mbh_09_u:060.046d-004_0010: na jaghāna raṇe karṇaṃ maivaṃ vocaḥ sudurmate
GE07mbh_09_u:060.046d-004_0012: nārjunasya mate nāgaṃ mayā vyaṃsitam asrajam
GE07mbh_09_u:060.046d-004_0013: tvaṃ ca bhīṣmaś ca karṇaś ca droṇo drauṇis tathā kṛpaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:060.046d-004_0015: smara pārthasya vikrāntaṃ gandharveṣu kṛtaṃ tadā
GE07mbh_09_u:060.046d-004_0016: adharmaṃ nātra gāndhāre pāṇḍavair yat kṛtaṃ tvayi
GE07mbh_09_u:060.046d-004_0018: jitavanto raṇe vīrāḥ pāpo 'si nidhanaṃ gataḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:060.047a: adhītaṃ vidhivad dattaṃ bhūḥ praśāstā sasāgarā
GE07mbh_09_u:060.047c: mūrdhni sthitam amitrāṇāṃ ko nu svantataro mayā
GE07mbh_09_u:060.048c: tad idaṃ nidhanaṃ prāptaṃ ko nu svantataro mayā
GE07mbh_09_u:060.049a: devārhā mānuṣā bhogāḥ prāptā asulabhā nṛpaiḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:060.049c: aiśvaryaṃ cottamaṃ prāptaṃ ko nu svantataro mayā
GE07mbh_09_u:060.050a: sasuhṛt sānubandhaś ca svargaṃ gantāham acyuta
GE07mbh_09_u:060.050d-0368_01: na me viṣādo bhīmena pādena śira āhatam
GE07mbh_09_u:060.050d-0368_02: kāko vā kaṅkagṛdhro vā nidhāsyati padaṃ kṣaṇāt
GE07mbh_09_u:060.052a-0369_02: jaguś cāpsaraso rājño yaśaḥ saṃbaddham eva ca
GE07mbh_09_u:060.052c: siddhāś ca mumucur vācaḥ sādhu sādhv iti bhārata
GE07mbh_09_u:060.053a: vavau ca surabhir vāyuḥ puṇyagandho mṛduḥ sukhaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:060.054b-0370_01: āścaryaṃ paramaṃ jagmuḥ pāñcālāḥ somakaiḥ saha
GE07mbh_09_u:060.054c: duryodhanasya pūjāṃ ca dṛṣṭvā vrīḍām upāgaman
GE07mbh_09_u:060.055a: hatāṃś cādharmataḥ śrutvā śokārtāḥ śuśucur hi te
GE07mbh_09_u:060.055b-0371_01: hatāṃś ca kauravāñ śrutvādharmataś ca mahīpatīn
GE07mbh_09_u:060.055c: bhīṣmaṃ droṇaṃ tathā karṇaṃ bhūriśravasam eva ca
GE07mbh_09_u:060.056a: tāṃs tu cintāparān dṛṣṭvā pāṇḍavān dīnacetasaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:060.057a: naiṣa śakyo 'tiśīghrāstras te ca sarve mahārathāḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:060.057d-0372_01: naiṣa śakyaḥ kadā cit tu hantuṃ dharmeṇa pārthivaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:060.057d-0372_02: te vā bhīṣmamukhāḥ sarve maheṣvāsā mahārathāḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:060.057d-0372_04: hatās te sarva evājau bhavatāṃ hitam icchatā
GE07mbh_09_u:060.057d-0372_05: yadi naivaṃvidhaṃ jātu kuryāṃ jihmam ahaṃ raṇe
GE07mbh_09_u:060.057d-0372_06: kuto vo vijayo bhūyaḥ kuto rājyaṃ kuto dhanam
GE07mbh_09_u:060.058a: upāyā vihitā hy ete mayā tasmān narādhipāḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:060.058c: anyathā pāṇḍaveyānāṃ nābhaviṣyaj jayaḥ kva cit
GE07mbh_09_u:060.059a: te hi sarve mahātmānaś catvāro 'tirathā bhuvi
GE07mbh_09_u:060.059c: na śakyā dharmato hantuṃ lokapālair api svayam
GE07mbh_09_u:060.060c: na śakyo dharmato hantuṃ kālenāpīha daṇḍinā
GE07mbh_09_u:060.061a: na ca vo hṛdi kartavyaṃ yad ayaṃ ghātito nṛpaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:060.062c: sadbhiś cānugataḥ panthāḥ sa sarvair anugamyate
GE07mbh_09_u:060.062d-0373_01: evaṃ vidhātrā vihitaṃ vadham eṣāṃ mahātmanām
GE07mbh_09_u:060.062d-0373_03: bhūtaṃ bhavyaṃ bhaviṣyac ca nimeṣād yo haniṣyati
GE07mbh_09_u:060.065a: tataḥ prādhmāpayañ śaṅkhān pāñcajanyaṃ ca mādhavaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:060.065b-0374_07: āpupūre nabhaḥ sarvaṃ pṛthivī ca cacāla ha
GE07mbh_09_u:060.065b-0374_08: tataḥ śaṅkhāś ca bheryaś ca paṇavānakagomukhāḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:060.065b-0374_10: astuvan pāṇḍavān anye gīrbhiś ca stutimaṅgalaiḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:061.001a: tatas te prayayuḥ sarve nivāsāya mahīkṣitaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:061.002a: pāṇḍavān gacchataś cāpi śibiraṃ no viśāṃ pate
GE07mbh_09_u:061.003a: dhṛṣṭadyumnaḥ śikhaṇḍī ca draupadeyāś ca sarvaśaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:061.003c: sarve cānye maheṣvāsā yayuḥ svaśibirāṇy uta
GE07mbh_09_u:061.004a: tatas te prāviśan pārthā hatatviṭkaṃ hateśvaram
GE07mbh_09_u:061.005a: gatotsavaṃ puram iva hṛtanāgam iva hradam
GE07mbh_09_u:061.010a: svayaṃ caivāvaroha tvam etac chreyas tavānagha
GE07mbh_09_u:061.010c: tac cākarot tathā vīraḥ pāṇḍuputro dhanaṃjayaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:061.011a: atha paścāt tataḥ kṛṣṇo raśmīn utsṛjya vājinām
GE07mbh_09_u:061.013a: sa dagdho droṇakarṇābhyāṃ divyair astrair mahārathaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:061.013c: atha dīpto 'gninā hy āśu prajajvāla mahīpate
GE07mbh_09_u:061.015a: taṃ tathā bhasmabhūtaṃ tu dṛṣṭvā pāṇḍusutāḥ prabho
GE07mbh_09_u:061.015c: abhavan vismitā rājann arjunaś cedam abravīt
GE07mbh_09_u:061.016c: govinda kasmād bhagavan ratho dagdho 'yam agninā
GE07mbh_09_u:061.017a: kim etan mahad āścaryam abhavad yadunandana
GE07mbh_09_u:061.017c: tan me brūhi mahābāho śrotavyaṃ yadi manyase
GE07mbh_09_u:061.017d-0376_01: arjunasya vacaḥ śrutvā punaḥ prāha janārdanaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:061.018a: astrair bahuvidhair dagdhaḥ pūrvam evāyam arjuna
GE07mbh_09_u:061.019c: mayā vimuktaḥ kaunteya tvayy adya kṛtakarmaṇi
GE07mbh_09_u:061.021a: diṣṭyā jayasi kaunteya diṣṭyā te śatravo jitāḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:061.021c: diṣṭyā gāṇḍīvadhanvā ca bhīmasenaś ca pāṇḍavaḥ

GE07mbh_09_u:061.023c: ānīya madhuparkaṃ māṃ yat purā tvam avocathāḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:061.024a: eṣa bhrātā sakhā caiva tava kṛṣṇa dhanaṃjayaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:061.024c: rakṣitavyo mahābāho sarvāsv āpatsv iti prabho
GE07mbh_09_u:061.024e: tava caivaṃ bruvāṇasya tathety evāham abruvam

GE07mbh_09_u:061.026a: evam uktas tu kṛṣṇena dharmarājo yudhiṣṭhiraḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:061.027c: kas tvad anyaḥ sahet sākṣād api vajrī puraṃdaraḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:061.028a: bhavatas tu prasādena saṃgrāme bahavo jitāḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:061.028c: mahāraṇagataḥ pārtho yac ca nāsīt parāṅmukhaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:061.029a: tathaiva ca mahābāho paryāyair bahubhir mayā
GE07mbh_09_u:061.029a-0378_02: bhīmasenena ca mayā yamābhyāṃ yudhi mānada
GE07mbh_09_u:061.029a-0378_03: karmaṇā manasā vācā tvam asmākaṃ gatiḥ parā
GE07mbh_09_u:061.029c: karmaṇām anusaṃtānaṃ tejasaś ca gatiḥ śubhā
GE07mbh_09_u:061.030c: yato dharmas tataḥ kṛṣṇo yataḥ kṛṣṇas tato jayaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:061.030d-005_0001: evam uktas tataḥ kṛṣṇaḥ pratyuvāca yudhiṣṭhiram
GE07mbh_09_u:061.030d-005_0002: akṣauhiṇyo daśāṣṭau ca tava teṣāṃ ca bhārata
GE07mbh_09_u:061.030d-005_0004: sa eva sarvāṇy astrāṇi divyāni prāpya śaṃkarāt
GE07mbh_09_u:061.030d-005_0005: matsamo madviśiṣṭo vā raṇe tvam iti pāṇḍava
GE07mbh_09_u:061.030d-005_0007: bhūtaṃ bhavyaṃ bhaviṣyac ca anujānāsi cet prabho
GE07mbh_09_u:061.030d-005_0008: nimeṣārdhān naravyāghro nayed iti matir mama
GE07mbh_09_u:061.030d-005_0009: droṇaṃ bhīṣmaṃ kṛpaṃ karṇaṃ droṇaputraṃ jayadratham
GE07mbh_09_u:061.030d-005_0012: trīn vā lokān vijetuṃ hi śaktaḥ kim iha mānuṣān
GE07mbh_09_u:061.030d-005_0013: vidhinā vihitaś cāsau mayā saṃcodito 'pi san
GE07mbh_09_u:061.030d-005_0014: na cakāra matiṃ hantuṃ kṛtānto balavattaraḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:061.030d-005_0015: atra gītā mayā suṣṭhu giraḥ satyā mahīpate
GE07mbh_09_u:061.030d-005_0016: darśitaṃ mayi sarvaṃ ca tenāsau jitavān ripūn
GE07mbh_09_u:061.030d-005_0018: sa maheśvaralabdhāstraḥ kiṃ na kuryād vibhuḥ prabho
GE07mbh_09_u:061.031a: ity evam ukte te vīrāḥ śibiraṃ tava bhārata

GE07mbh_09_u:061.032c: bhūṣaṇāny atha mukhyāni kambalāny ajināni ca
GE07mbh_09_u:061.032d-0379_01: gajān aśvān rathāṃś caiva mahānti śayanāni ca
GE07mbh_09_u:061.033a: te prāpya dhanam akṣayyaṃ tvadīyaṃ bharatarṣabha
GE07mbh_09_u:061.034a: te tu vīrāḥ samāśvasya vāhanāny avamucya ca

GE07mbh_09_u:061.035d-0380_01: jayantī yatra devī tu tatra vrajata mā ciram
GE07mbh_09_u:061.036a: tathety uktvā ca te sarve pāṇḍavāḥ sātyakis tathā
GE07mbh_09_u:061.037c: nyavasann atha tāṃ rātriṃ pāṇḍavā hataśatravaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:061.038c: sa ca prāyāj javenāśu vāsudevaḥ pratāpavān
GE07mbh_09_u:061.040a: sa prāyāt pāṇḍavair uktas tat puraṃ sātvatāṃ varaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:062.002a: yadā pūrvaṃ gataḥ kṛṣṇaḥ śamārthaṃ kauravān prati
GE07mbh_09_u:062.002c: na ca taṃ labdhavān kāmaṃ tato yuddham abhūd idam
GE07mbh_09_u:062.003a: nihateṣu tu yodheṣu hate duryodhane tathā
GE07mbh_09_u:062.004a: vidrute śibire śūnye prāpte yaśasi cottame
GE07mbh_09_u:062.004c: kiṃ nu tat kāraṇaṃ brahman yena kṛṣṇo gataḥ punaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:062.005a: na caitat kāraṇaṃ brahmann alpaṃ vai pratibhāti me
GE07mbh_09_u:062.006c: yac cātra kāraṇaṃ brahman kāryasyāsya viniścaye
GE07mbh_09_u:062.007a: tvadyukto 'yam anupraśno yan māṃ pṛcchasi pārthiva
GE07mbh_09_u:062.010c: ghoreṇa tapasā yuktāṃ trailokyam api sā dahet
GE07mbh_09_u:062.012a: sā hi putravadhaṃ śrutvā kṛtam asmābhir īdṛśam
GE07mbh_09_u:062.013a: kathaṃ duḥkham idaṃ tīvraṃ gāndhārī prasahiṣyati
GE07mbh_09_u:062.017c: yathā sāhyaṃ purā dattaṃ hatāś ca vibudhadviṣaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:062.018a: sāhyaṃ tathā mahābāho dattam asmākam acyuta
GE07mbh_09_u:062.018c: sārathyena ca vārṣṇeya bhavatā yad dhṛtā vayam
GE07mbh_09_u:062.019a: yadi na tvaṃ bhaven nāthaḥ phalgunasya mahāraṇe
GE07mbh_09_u:062.019c: kathaṃ śakyo raṇe jetuṃ bhaved eṣa balārṇavaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:062.019d-0382_01: jetuṃ parān parivyūḍhān prāptāṃś caiva tvayācyuta
GE07mbh_09_u:062.021a: vācaś ca paruṣāḥ prāptās tvayā hy asmaddhitaiṣiṇā
GE07mbh_09_u:062.021b-0383_01: asmatkṛte tvayā kṛṣṇa vācaḥ suparuṣāḥ śrutāḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:062.021c: tāś ca te saphalāḥ sarvā hate duryodhane 'cyuta
GE07mbh_09_u:062.021d-0384_01: śastrāṇāṃ ca nipātā vai vajrasparśopamā raṇe
GE07mbh_09_u:062.021d-0385_01: tat sarvaṃ na yathā naśyet punaḥ kṛṣṇa tathā kuru
GE07mbh_09_u:062.021d-0385_02: saṃdehadolāṃ prāptaṃ naś cetaḥ kṛṣṇa jaye sati
GE07mbh_09_u:062.022a: gāndhāryā hi mahābāho krodhaṃ budhyasva mādhava
GE07mbh_09_u:062.022c: sā hi nityaṃ mahābhāgā tapasogreṇa karśitā
GE07mbh_09_u:062.023c: tasyāḥ prasādanaṃ vīra prāptakālaṃ mataṃ mama
GE07mbh_09_u:062.024c: vīkṣituṃ puruṣaḥ śaktas tvām ṛte puruṣottama
GE07mbh_09_u:062.025a: tatra me gamanaṃ prāptaṃ rocate tava mādhava
GE07mbh_09_u:062.026a: tvaṃ hi kartā vikartā ca lokānāṃ prabhavāpyayaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:062.027c: pitāmahaś ca bhagavān kṛṣṇas tatra bhaviṣyati
GE07mbh_09_u:062.029c: āmantrya dārukaṃ prāha rathaḥ sajjo vidhīyatām
GE07mbh_09_u:062.032a: tataḥ prāyān mahārāja mādhavo bhagavān rathī
GE07mbh_09_u:062.035a: pādau prapīḍya kṛṣṇasya rājñaś cāpi janārdanaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:062.036c: pāṇim ālambya rājñaḥ sa sasvaraṃ praruroda ha
GE07mbh_09_u:062.037c: prakṣālya vāriṇā netre ācamya ca yathāvidhi
GE07mbh_09_u:062.038a: na te 'sty aviditaṃ kiṃ cid bhūtabhavyasya bhārata
GE07mbh_09_u:062.038c: kālasya ca yathā vṛttaṃ tat te suviditaṃ prabho
GE07mbh_09_u:062.039a: yad idaṃ pāṇḍavaiḥ sarvais tava cittānurodhibhiḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:062.039c: kathaṃ kulakṣayo na syāt tathā kṣatrasya bhārata
GE07mbh_09_u:062.041c: anye ca bahavaḥ kleśās tv aśaktair iva nityadā
GE07mbh_09_u:062.042a: mayā ca svayam āgamya yuddhakāla upasthite
GE07mbh_09_u:062.042c: sarvalokasya sāṃnidhye grāmāṃs tvaṃ pañca yācitaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:062.043c: tavāparādhān nṛpate sarvaṃ kṣatraṃ kṣayaṃ gatam
GE07mbh_09_u:062.044c: droṇena ca saputreṇa vidureṇa ca dhīmatā
GE07mbh_09_u:062.044e: yācitas tvaṃ śamaṃ nityaṃ na ca tat kṛtavān asi
GE07mbh_09_u:062.045c: yathā mūḍho bhavān pūrvam asminn arthe samudyate
GE07mbh_09_u:062.046a: kim anyat kālayogād dhi diṣṭam eva parāyaṇam
GE07mbh_09_u:062.046c: mā ca doṣaṃ mahārāja pāṇḍaveṣu niveśaya

GE07mbh_09_u:062.048c: asūyāṃ pāṇḍuputreṣu na bhavān kartum arhati
GE07mbh_09_u:062.049a: kulaṃ vaṃśaś ca piṇḍaś ca yac ca putrakṛtaṃ phalam
GE07mbh_09_u:062.049d-0386_01: tvaṃ caiva naraśārdūla gāndhārī ca yaśasvinī
GE07mbh_09_u:062.049d-0386_02: mā śuco naraśārdūla pāṇḍavān prati kilbiṣam
GE07mbh_09_u:062.050a: etat sarvam anudhyātvā ātmanaś ca vyatikramam
GE07mbh_09_u:062.050c: śivena pāṇḍavān dhyāhi namas te bharatarṣabha
GE07mbh_09_u:062.051a: jānāsi ca mahābāho dharmarājasya yā tvayi

GE07mbh_09_u:062.053a: tvāṃ caiva naraśārdūla gāndhārīṃ ca yaśasvinīm
GE07mbh_09_u:062.053c: sa śocan bharataśreṣṭha na śāntim adhigacchati
GE07mbh_09_u:062.056a: saubaleyi nibodha tvaṃ yat tvāṃ vakṣyāmi suvrate
GE07mbh_09_u:062.056c: tvatsamā nāsti loke 'sminn adya sīmantinī śubhe
GE07mbh_09_u:062.057a: jānāmi ca yathā rājñi sabhāyāṃ mama saṃnidhau

GE07mbh_09_u:062.059a: tad idaṃ samanuprāptaṃ tava vākyaṃ nṛpātmaje
GE07mbh_09_u:062.059c: evaṃ viditvā kalyāṇi mā sma śoke manaḥ kṛthāḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:062.059e: pāṇḍavānāṃ vināśāya mā te buddhiḥ kadā cana
GE07mbh_09_u:062.061c: evam etan mahābāho yathā vadasi keśava
GE07mbh_09_u:062.062c: sā me vyavasthitā śrutvā tava vākyaṃ janārdana
GE07mbh_09_u:062.063a: rājñas tv andhasya vṛddhasya hataputrasya keśava
GE07mbh_09_u:062.063c: tvaṃ gatiḥ saha tair vīraiḥ pāṇḍavair dvipadāṃ vara
GE07mbh_09_u:062.064a: etāvad uktvā vacanaṃ mukhaṃ pracchādya vāsasā
GE07mbh_09_u:062.066a: samāśvāsya ca gāndhārīṃ dhṛtarāṣṭraṃ ca mādhavaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:062.067a: tatas tvarita utthāya pādau mūrdhnā praṇamya ca
GE07mbh_09_u:062.068a: āpṛcche tvāṃ kuruśreṣṭha mā ca śoke manaḥ kṛthāḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:062.068e: pāṇḍavānāṃ vadhe rātrau buddhis tena pradarśitā
GE07mbh_09_u:062.069a: etac chrutvā tu vacanaṃ gāndhāryā sahito 'bravīt
GE07mbh_09_u:062.070c: bhūyas tvayā sameṣyāmi kṣipram eva janārdana
GE07mbh_09_u:062.070e: prāyāt tatas tu tvarito dārukeṇa sahācyutaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:062.073c: tac ca tebhyaḥ samākhyāya sahitas taiḥ samāviśat
GE07mbh_09_u:063.001a: adhiṣṭhitaḥ padā mūrdhni bhagnasaktho mahīṃ gataḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:063.001c: śauṭīramānī putro me kāny abhāṣata saṃjaya
GE07mbh_09_u:063.002a: atyarthaṃ kopano rājā jātavairaś ca pāṇḍuṣu
GE07mbh_09_u:063.002c: vyasanaṃ paramaṃ prāptaḥ kim āha paramāhave
GE07mbh_09_u:063.003c: rājñā yad uktaṃ bhagnena tasmin vyasana āgate
GE07mbh_09_u:063.004c: yamayan mūrdhajāṃs tatra vīkṣya caiva diśo daśa
GE07mbh_09_u:063.005a: keśān niyamya yatnena niḥśvasann urago yathā
GE07mbh_09_u:063.006a: bāhū dharaṇyāṃ niṣpiṣya muhur matta iva dvipaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:063.006c: prakīrṇān mūrdhajān dhunvan dantair dantān upaspṛśan
GE07mbh_09_u:063.007a: bhīṣme śāṃtanave nāthe karṇe cāstrabhṛtāṃ vare
GE07mbh_09_u:063.007c: gautame śakunau cāpi droṇe cāstrabhṛtāṃ vare
GE07mbh_09_u:063.008a: aśvatthāmni tathā śalye śūre ca kṛtavarmaṇi
GE07mbh_09_u:063.008b-0387_01: anyeṣv api ca śūreṣu nyastabhāro mahātmasu
GE07mbh_09_u:063.008c: imām avasthāṃ prāpto 'smi kālo hi duratikramaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:063.009c: kālaṃ prāpya mahābāho na kaś cid ativartate
GE07mbh_09_u:063.011c: bhūriśravasi karṇe ca bhīṣme droṇe ca śrīmati
GE07mbh_09_u:063.012a: idaṃ cākīrtijaṃ karma nṛśaṃsaiḥ pāṇḍavaiḥ kṛtam
GE07mbh_09_u:063.012c: yena te satsu nirvedaṃ gamiṣyantīti me matiḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:063.013c: ko vā samayabhettāraṃ budhaḥ saṃmantum arhati
GE07mbh_09_u:063.014a: adharmeṇa jayaṃ labdhvā ko nu hṛṣyeta paṇḍitaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:063.015a: kiṃ nu citram atas tv adya bhagnasakthasya yan mama
GE07mbh_09_u:063.016a: pratapantaṃ śriyā juṣṭaṃ vartamānaṃ ca bandhuṣu
GE07mbh_09_u:063.016c: evaṃ kuryān naro yo hi sa vai saṃjaya pūjitaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:063.017a: abhijñau kṣatradharmasya mama mātā pitā ca me
GE07mbh_09_u:063.017c: tau hi saṃjaya duḥkhārtau vijñāpyau vacanān mama
GE07mbh_09_u:063.018a: iṣṭaṃ bhṛtyā bhṛtāḥ samyag bhūḥ praśāstā sasāgarā
GE07mbh_09_u:063.018c: mūrdhni sthitam amitrāṇāṃ jīvatām eva saṃjaya
GE07mbh_09_u:063.019a: dattā dāyā yathāśakti mitrāṇāṃ ca priyaṃ kṛtam
GE07mbh_09_u:063.019c: amitrā bādhitāḥ sarve ko nu svantataro mayā
GE07mbh_09_u:063.020a: yātāni pararāṣṭrāṇi nṛpā bhuktāś ca dāsavat
GE07mbh_09_u:063.020c: priyebhyaḥ prakṛtaṃ sādhu ko nu svantataro mayā
GE07mbh_09_u:063.021a: mānitā bāndhavāḥ sarve mānyaḥ saṃpūjito janaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:063.021c: tritayaṃ sevitaṃ sarvaṃ ko nu svantataro mayā
GE07mbh_09_u:063.022c: ājāneyais tathā yātaṃ ko nu svantataro mayā
GE07mbh_09_u:063.023a: adhītaṃ vidhivad dattaṃ prāptam āyur nirāmayam
GE07mbh_09_u:063.023c: svadharmeṇa jitā lokāḥ ko nu svantataro mayā
GE07mbh_09_u:063.024a: diṣṭyā nāhaṃ jitaḥ saṃkhye parān preṣyavad āśritaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:063.024c: diṣṭyā me vipulā lakṣmīr mṛte tv anyaṃ gatā vibho
GE07mbh_09_u:063.025c: nidhanaṃ tan mayā prāptaṃ ko nu svantataro mayā
GE07mbh_09_u:063.026a: diṣṭyā nāhaṃ parāvṛtto vairāt prākṛtavaj jitaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:063.026c: diṣṭyā na vimatiṃ kāṃ cid bhajitvā tu parājitaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:063.027a: suptaṃ vātha pramattaṃ vā yathā hanyād viṣeṇa vā
GE07mbh_09_u:063.028c: kṛpaḥ śāradvataś caiva vaktavyā vacanān mama
GE07mbh_09_u:063.029c: viśvāsaṃ samayaghnānāṃ na yūyaṃ gantum arhatha
GE07mbh_09_u:063.030a: vātikāṃś cābravīd rājā putras te satyavikramaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:063.031a: so 'haṃ droṇaṃ svargagataṃ śalyakarṇāv ubhau tathā
GE07mbh_09_u:063.033c: dauḥśāsaniṃ ca vikrāntaṃ lakṣmaṇaṃ cātmajāv ubhau
GE07mbh_09_u:063.034a: etāṃś cānyāṃś ca subahūn madīyāṃś ca sahasraśaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:063.035a: kathaṃ bhrātṝn hatāñ śrutvā bhartāraṃ ca svasā mama
GE07mbh_09_u:063.036a: snuṣābhiḥ prasnuṣābhiś ca vṛddho rājā pitā mama
GE07mbh_09_u:063.039c: ahaṃ nidhanam āsādya lokān prāpsyāmi śāśvatān
GE07mbh_09_u:063.040c: pralāpaṃ nṛpateḥ śrutvā vidravanti diśo daśa
GE07mbh_09_u:063.043a: tad ākhyāya tataḥ sarve droṇaputrasya bhārata
GE07mbh_09_u:063.043c: dhyātvā ca suciraṃ kālaṃ jagmur ārtā yathāgatam
GE07mbh_09_u:064.001a: vātikānāṃ sakāśāt tu śrutvā duryodhanaṃ hatam
GE07mbh_09_u:064.002c: aśvatthāmā kṛpaś caiva kṛtavarmā ca sātvataḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:064.007c: vṛtaṃ bhūtagaṇair ghoraiḥ kravyādaiś ca samantataḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:064.008c: sāmarṣaṃ taṃ naravyāghraṃ vyāghraṃ nipatitaṃ yathā
GE07mbh_09_u:064.009a: te tu dṛṣṭvā maheṣvāsā bhūtale patitaṃ nṛpam
GE07mbh_09_u:064.010c: duryodhanaṃ ca saṃprekṣya sarve bhūmāv upāviśan
GE07mbh_09_u:064.012a: na nūnaṃ vidyate 'sahyaṃ mānuṣye kiṃ cid eva hi
GE07mbh_09_u:064.012c: yatra tvaṃ puruṣavyāghra śeṣe pāṃsuṣu rūṣitaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:064.013a: bhūtvā hi nṛpatiḥ pūrvaṃ samājñāpya ca medinīm
GE07mbh_09_u:064.013c: katham eko 'dya rājendra tiṣṭhase nirjane vane
GE07mbh_09_u:064.014a: duḥśāsanaṃ na paśyāmi nāpi karṇaṃ mahāratham
GE07mbh_09_u:064.014c: nāpi tān suhṛdaḥ sarvān kim idaṃ bharatarṣabha
GE07mbh_09_u:064.015a: duḥkhaṃ nūnaṃ kṛtāntasya gatiṃ jñātuṃ kathaṃ cana
GE07mbh_09_u:064.015c: lokānāṃ ca bhavān yatra śete pāṃsuṣu rūṣitaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:064.016c: satṛṇaṃ grasate pāṃsuṃ paśya kālasya paryayam
GE07mbh_09_u:064.017a: kva te tad amalaṃ chatraṃ vyajanaṃ kva ca pārthiva
GE07mbh_09_u:064.017c: sā ca te mahatī senā kva gatā pārthivottama
GE07mbh_09_u:064.017d-0390_03: kva gatāḥ pārthivendrādya saubhrātraṃ ca samāśritam
GE07mbh_09_u:064.018c: yad vai lokagurur bhūtvā bhavān etāṃ daśāṃ gataḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:064.019b-0391_01: dhruveva bhāti sarvatra nityaṃ mohakarī nṛṇām
GE07mbh_09_u:064.019b-0391_03: na tu viśvasen nityāṃ vai hy adhruvā vai svabhāvataḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:064.019d-0392_01: imaṃ lokam anityaṃ vā hy adyāhaṃ samacintaye
GE07mbh_09_u:064.020a: tasya tad vacanaṃ śrutvā duḥkhitasya viśeṣataḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:064.020c: uvāca rājan putras te prāptakālam idaṃ vacaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:064.021a: vimṛjya netre pāṇibhyāṃ śokajaṃ bāṣpam utsṛjan
GE07mbh_09_u:064.021c: kṛpādīn sa tadā vīrān sarvān eva narādhipaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:064.023a: so 'yaṃ māṃ samanuprāptaḥ pratyakṣaṃ bhavatāṃ hi yaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:064.024a: diṣṭyā nāhaṃ parāvṛtto yuddhe kasyāṃ cid āpadi
GE07mbh_09_u:064.024b-0393_01: diṣṭyāhaṃ no nṛpatibhir nirjito na kadā cana
GE07mbh_09_u:064.024b-0393_02: diṣṭyā mayā nirjitās te rājāno bahuśo yudhi
GE07mbh_09_u:064.025a: utsāhaś ca kṛto nityaṃ mayā diṣṭyā yuyutsatā
GE07mbh_09_u:064.025b-0395_01: diṣṭyā hatā gajā yuddhe sagajārohakā bhṛśam
GE07mbh_09_u:064.025b-0395_08: diṣṭyā mamāyudhāny āśu nāśam āyānti vai kṣaṇāt
GE07mbh_09_u:064.026a: diṣṭyā ca vo 'haṃ paśyāmi muktān asmāj janakṣayāt
GE07mbh_09_u:064.026b-0396_01: svasti haṃto tv ahaṃ yuddhe nihatajñātibāndhavaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:064.026c: svastiyuktāṃś ca kalyāṃś ca tan me priyam anuttamam
GE07mbh_09_u:064.027c: yadi vedāḥ pramāṇaṃ vo jitā lokā mayākṣayāḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:064.028c: tena na cyāvitaś cāhaṃ kṣatradharmāt svanuṣṭhitāt
GE07mbh_09_u:064.029a: sa mayā samanuprāpto nāsmi śocyaḥ kathaṃ cana
GE07mbh_09_u:064.029b-0397_01: tathā tu dṛṣṭvā rājendra vartate vijayo mama
GE07mbh_09_u:064.029e: yatitaṃ vijaye nityaṃ daivaṃ tu duratikramam
GE07mbh_09_u:064.030c: tūṣṇīṃ babhūva rājendra rujāsau vihvalo bhṛśam
GE07mbh_09_u:064.031c: drauṇiḥ krodhena jajvāla yathā vahnir jagatkṣaye
GE07mbh_09_u:064.032a: sa tu krodhasamāviṣṭaḥ pāṇau pāṇiṃ nipīḍya ca
GE07mbh_09_u:064.033a: pitā me nihataḥ kṣudraiḥ sunṛśaṃsena karmaṇā
GE07mbh_09_u:064.033c: na tathā tena tapyāmi yathā rājaṃs tvayādya vai
GE07mbh_09_u:064.034a: śṛṇu cedaṃ vaco mahyaṃ satyena vadataḥ prabho
GE07mbh_09_u:064.034b-0398_02: tava priyaṃ kariṣyāmi kṛtvā kāryam anuttamam
GE07mbh_09_u:064.034b-0398_03: īpsitaṃ manasā rājan yathecchasi tathā vada
GE07mbh_09_u:064.034d-0399_01: śapeyaṃ rājaśārdūla pādābhyāṃ mama vai pituḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:064.035e: anujñāṃ tu mahārāja bhavān me dātum arhati
GE07mbh_09_u:064.036a: iti śrutvā tu vacanaṃ droṇaputrasya kauravaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:064.036b-0402_01: tac chrutvā vacanaṃ drauṇer dhṛtarāṣṭra tavātmajaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:064.037a: sa tad vacanam ājñāya rājño brāhmaṇasattamaḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:064.038a: tam abravīn mahārāja putras tava viśāṃ pate
GE07mbh_09_u:064.038e: senāpatyena bhadraṃ te mama ced icchasi priyam
GE07mbh_09_u:064.039c: vartatā kṣatradharmeṇa hy evaṃ dharmavido viduḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:064.040a: rājñas tu vacanaṃ śrutvā kṛpaḥ śāradvatas tataḥ
GE07mbh_09_u:064.043a: apakramya tu te tūrṇaṃ tasmād āyodhanān nṛpa
GE07mbh_09_u:064.043d-0403_02: āste rājā cintayānas teṣām āgamanaṃ prati
GE07mbh_09_u:064.043d-0403_04: brāhmaṇān bhojayet paścād vaktāraṃ ca supūjayet
